Later that night, at one of the house in the human village, two females were sitting on the couch and one man in good suit on chair at other side of the table. One of the female on the couch were the same light brown haired women that were with you. Other lady were a girl around 10 years old with twintailed pink hairs and a good suite. The brown haired female had a suitecase with her and then put it on the table.

"I have what you wanted as always." Female said.

She handed over to the man and he took it. He opened it and observed it as it had 25 bags filled with some sort of white poweder in it. He then smelled at the bag and smiled, then turned his attention to the lady, who were around mid-20's.

"Good job once again, anna." Man said, "Here's your pay."

He then got up and got two cases and handed over to her. Anna got it and opened it up, revealing many yens and such. Both anna and the young girl smiled as she closed the suit case, he then put four bottles on the table. She knew it was a bottle of booze as she opend up it was good brand of sake, rum, vodka, and moonshine. She smiled more and then man turned around.

"I'm so sorry about what happened to your former boss." Man said. "Feh...killed by someone we don't know."

"I know leroy..Thanks for the words." anna said.

"Yeah..but watch out for his older brother, samuel." Leroy said, "He's no push over."

Anna just nodded and leroy left the house, walked into the darkness. Both anna and the young girl then agreed to go to bed as soon as anna put the money and the booze away.

Next day came..
1113111.title: Meeting and dealment

111312.content:
"Oh, youre alive-EEP! ...Er, I-I mean youre awake!" blustered the purple haired nurse in the nice uniform a matching tie, purple skirt and... bunny ears. Yep, bunny ears. And they clearly werent fake bunny ears, because they conveniently twitched on cue with her sudden mood change!

Normally, you'd be shocked out of your mind at this oddity, but considering some of the 'interesting' people you've met under your previous employment, youre just not surprised anymore.

Anyways, the nurse straightened her hair, coughed, and resumed carrying a tray with a mug on it that had a picture of a cutesy cartoony bunny girl saying something in Japanese.
"Um... how are you feeling right now, Mr..." she read your profile on your bed, "...Whitestone?"
"Been better," you said with a groan as you stood up.

"Easy, easy," she tried to ease you, "dont get up too quickly. You bled out quite a bit earlier, you still need to rest."
You gazed down, realizing youre shirtless with a couple of bandages wrapped around your left shoulder to your right armpit. That's when you remembered. You took a nasty potshot in your back. It still hurts, but it feels like it missed the collarbone.
Normally, you'd be thankful to be alive, but in reality youre not. You have failed to exceed where your dad and sister left off. Le Fey, the freaking quote-unquote 'Fairy' Empire, the oldest and most dangerous mafia in history wants you dead. No, worse than dead. Le Fey wants you horribly tortured to the point of beyond praying you were dead. They create special living Hells for traitors like you. Letting those goons kill you wouldve be a blessing compared to what Ms. Le Fey herself has in store for you.

And Ms. Le Fey is going to be PISSED that youre still breathing.

Eh, you'll cross that bridge when you get to it (and you WILL get to it). In the meantime, focus on your current situation.

"I understand if youre stressed out after what happened," the nurse assured as she offered you the mug, "here. I made you some green tea. Uh... I hope youre not allergic."
You happily accepted the mug and took a few sips, "Thank you, Ms..."
"Udongein Inaba!" she announced her name with pride, "but you can just call me Reisen for short."
“Nice to meet you Reisen,” you greeted her as you sipped your tea, “I take it youre the nurse of this hospital?”
She scratched her forehead and smiled nervously, “Er… not exactly. I’m… more of a patient than a nurse. Which reminds me!” She reached into her coat pocket, pulled out a little prescription bottle and popped a pill in her mouth.

“Welcome to Eientei,” she greeted you, “this is a special safe haven for me and my kind. A lot of us have been exiled from our.. uh… homeland, due to complicated political strife.” Ouch. “Luckily, we have found this nice little fertile secluded patch of land a long time ago not far from civilization yet not easily found on any map. It also doubles as a refuge for the ill and severely wounded. Like you.”

Well, it’s a good thing it’s a refuge. Youre definitely gonna be needed one. Then again, there is little space on the planet you can hide that Le Fey cant find.

“Master found you lying on the ground with two other people,” Reisen said, “unfortunately, you were the only one that she managed to save. I’m sorry about your friends.”
You lowered your head, “They… weren’t my friends. But tell your master I said thank you. If she didn’t show up in time, I‘m sure those two jerks woulda done away with me.”

“Actually, you can tell her yourself,” Reisen told you, “Master wanted me to confirm your vitals were still stable. Since youre awake, it’s pretty obvious they are. I’ll bring her over. Wait right there… er… like you have a choice.”

Just as she was getting ready to leave, another memory raced into your mind. That other girl that was with the one that carried you. That wasn’t really your sister Anna, was it?
You coulda sworn Ms. Le Fey killed her. Or at least you HOPE she killed her, compared to the other things she could’ve done to her! You weren’t hallucinating when you saw her, were you?

“Um, wait Reisen!” you called for her before she stepped out.

“Yes?” the bunny girl turned her attention to you.

“Just a quick question,” you say right before taking a deep breath, “when I was brought here, your master didn’t have another girl with her, did she? A brown haired girl with green eyes and has a long cut mark from the end of her lip down to under her chin?”

Reisen answered.
111312.title: A Reisen in the Sun

1113121.content:
"Actually, yes. She's in other room." Reisen said.

"R-really!?" you spoke in slight shock, "Can I see her?"

"Sure, but AFTER you see my master." Reisen replied.

She then left the room and you sighed. You thought she was dead after she disappeared from the gang (rumor is that Ms.LeFay killed her personally). Moment later, a door opened and two people came in. One...was your big sis! Anna smiled at you as silver haired women in red/blue dress smiled.

"Anna!" you spoke.

"Long time no see little bro." anna replied.

You wanted to hug her but the pain got you so you didn't do it. The other women coughed and you looked at her.

"And you must be reisens master." you said.

"I am. My name is Eirin Yagokoro." she said, "and she told me your getting better."

You nodded and she took the bottle and gave you some pills.

"Those will ease the pain." eirin said, "I'll leave you two alone."

She then left the area. Anna stood and silence lingered. Before you spoke, anna.

"You wonder how I'm still alive, knowing ms.lefay spoke to me." anna said.

You nodded and anna made 'hmph' noise and unbuttoned her top. You blushed as she was nearly done.

"Wha-what are you doing!?" you spoke.

"I'm showing you my great example of my escape." anna said.

She then flashed her upper body to you, and you saw...
1113121.title: seeing sis.

choices: Eirin chases after her, trying to save face!
11131211.content:
You cringed seeing that big long neatly clean cut from her cleavage, down her chest and stopping just above her belly button. It looks like it's been stitched up rather nice, but your awful confident it wasnt Dr. Eirin that made the cut to begin with. Knowing history, you had a pretty good guess who did this.

"What happened?" you pointed to the cut.

"The Nephilim," was the answer to the $1,000,000 question. Just hearing the nickname alone saved a long lengthy story. The Nephilim, Le Fey's finest doctor. Despite being one of the Fey that've never been given a name, he's certainly made quite a name for himself. You havent had the displeasure of meeting him personally, but you heard a lot of stories. He's always studying species, always studying bodies, always researching them, always checking what makes each creature tick, always thinking of 'creative' ways to 'improve' on his subjects. Human, animal, fairy, whatever, if you've got a functioning body or a hollow shell, he'll want to have a look at it. You assume he's an organ harvester... that could be why your sister...

"Geez," you whisper, "does it still hurt?"
"It never hurt to begin with," she said with a little fear in her voice, "it's just the stitches that are actually painful. I think he wanted it that way..."

"Amazing that the cut was already sterilized and sanitized by the time she got here," Dr. Eirin was eavesdropping on the conservation the whole time, "No infection or punctured organs or anything! I honestly didnt need to do much other than sew up the wound. Whatever crooked black market doctor did that... seemed really keen on ensuring she survives."
"That aint necessarily a good thing," Anna ignored her intrusion and commented, "usually if the Nephilim does that, it's either cuz he's taking something out... or putting something in." Your sister seemed a bit scared. You NEVER see her afraid! None of those fairy fuckers scare her! Not even Big Bad Maeve herself can get a rise out of her. But here she was... scared. This concerned you.
"Did he take anything out?" She shook her head. "...Did he put anything in?" She shrugged her shoulders. She didnt know!
"I found no signs or traces of foreign matter in her bloodstream," Eirin stated, "she will be fine. My nurses will continue monitoring her to ensure no potentially poisonous activity occurs." That's good news.

Anna still looked pretty uneasy. Not that you blame her. She was officially one of the Nephilim's living subjects.

"Look bro. Dont worry about me," Anna tells you, "If Doc says I'll be fine, I'll be fine. Shouldnt you be busy THANKING her for saving our lives?" Shouldnt YOU be telling HER that? Anyways, you should be thanking her.
"Thank you Dr," you thanked her, "we really appreciate everything you've done for us. If not for you... we probably wouldnt be dead, but knowing our former employment, we'd be praying we were."

Eirin smiled and scratched the back of her head, "Oh, well, it was nothing, really. It's just part of the job I was assigned, is all. Which reminds me. Ms. Whitestone, it's best that you get some rest. You havent slept at all since I found you and youre looking very weary."
"Alright, doc," Anna complied, "Alex, be sure to show your gratitude to Ms. Yagokoro properly."
"Yes, Anna," you didnt care that she was trying to hard to act like your mother. You were just relieved to see she was alright after escaping the worst mafia in mythology! “Goodnight, sis.”
“Take it easy, bro.”

After shutting off the light, you and the doctor stepped out of her room and went for a walk down the hallway. Well, actually you merely followed Eirin because you owed her a debt. Maybe it’s cuz you were hanging around Le Fey for too long, but you still follow one of their basic rules. A fairy NEVER accepts nor gives free favors. You are always obligated to pay off a debt that’s owed. And since this debt is saving your sister’s life and yours, you were going to pay it off by any means necessary.

“Your sister sure is quite a piece of work,” Eirin stated, “you should be proud to have someone like her as a sibling.”
“I am,” no contest there, “I am in your debt for what you’ve done for us, Dr. Yagokoro.”
“Oh it’s quite alright. I was just doing what any doctor worth her license would do.”
“I STILL owe you,” you emphasize, “and I will STILL repay the favor in kind.”
“That’s not necessary,” she said that to the wrong man.
“I beg to differ,” you state, “it was because my family couldnt repay their debts that we ended up in trouble with Le Fey to begin with. That debt cost them their lives. You have just saved us from possibly history’s most notorious cartel that we have a debt with! I honestly owe you and I will personally do whatever it takes to pay you back!”

“Oh… my…” Eirin got a bit speechless, having no idea what to say at this point. You are stubborn, but Eirin earned payback. And simple gratitude cant come near compensating!
“I will do whatever you tell me!” you told her adamantly as you followed her to her office, “I’ll volunteer to help out in this hospital! I’ll clean, I’ll cook, I’ll assist you and other nurses, I’ll wash bedpans, showers and toilets…” you leaned in real close to her face and whispered, “I know people that can get you stocked with top quality pharmaceutical drugs for dirt cheap!”

“Aheheh…” Eirin laughed uncomfortably, “I dont think your body has healed enough to do any volunteer work yet.”
“My body is feeling great!” you emphasize, “thanks to your treatment, I feel TWICE the man I used to be! …Which means I owe TWICE the debt to you!” Eirin immediately regretted opening her mouth.
"Er, I think you need to get some rest, too," she stated while she bent down and put some files away in her desk.
"Then bright and early, I start repaying my debt?"
"Yes, sure, fine!" Eirin slammed the desk shut and groaned, "for now, you need to relax and-SSS!!" As soon as she stood back up, you heard a faint snap. Then she cringed in pain.

"Are you alright, Dr. Yagokoro?" you rushed to her aid.
"Y-yeah, I'm fine," Eirin exhaled as she rubbed her aching back, "my back always acts up once in a while. Just one of the benefits of getting old, I guess. Heh." An aching back? That spells OPPORTUNITY for you!
"I can massage you if you'd like."
You made Eirin even more uncomfortable, "Heh. Youre joking, right?"
"No I'm serious," you assure her, "I'm very good at it. Maeve used to have me massage her clients whenever they had muscle pains. The daughters of the Erlking used to come by my house like once a month just to make me massage them."

There was no point in arguing with you and she knew it. You wanted to repay the debt you owed her and you'd do so come hell or high water!
"Grr.. fine," she groaned and leaned over her desk with her back to you, "please make it fast."
You crackled your knuckles, stretched out your fingers, blew on the fingertips, and brushed her long white braided hair out of the way.
"Wow... who braids your hair?" you commented as you brushed it a little more, "havent seen such a professional braided pony-tail in a while!"
"Could you please just hurry with the massage?"
"Right, sorry."

"*Gasp!*" as expected, Eirin gasped and froze up, she clearly underestimated the intensity of your world famous massages!
"Easy... easy," you whispered as your fingers caressed her sensitive pressure points, "just relax..."
As your magical fingers eased her most painful parts to bliss, her eyes widened and drool started to drip from her gritted teeth! She bit her finger, trying to cover up a moan she desperately wants to let out! She was immediately reduced to putty by the time you worked around her shoulders! Through the mirror, you watched her eyes roll back and her jaw drop in sheer ecstasy.

"How was that, doctor?" you asked.

"A...ma...zing..." she muttered with her mouth full of drool as she leaned over against her desk, "c...can you... go... lower? P..lease?"
"Oh course, doctor," you happily obliged, working your magical fingers down her back. Her nails scratched against her table while she just barely stopped herself from letting out a scream.
"L-Lower. Lower!!" she had literally bent all the way over until her butt was over her desk as if she were presenting it! Your fingers worked their magic against the sensitive spots in her lower back and around her thighs.
"OoooHh M-Mmmyy... ggooddness!!" by the end of the massage, her body was shivering, her backside was instinctively pressing against your midsection, and the silly look on her face reeked of 125% satisfaction. If you didnt know any better, youd swear she was wanting the massage for something slightly more perverted than her silly back pain... but with the debt you owed her, you didnt care. She earned it and then some!

"Eirin, the cable's out again! I think Tewi chewed the-"

Suddenly, a black haired woman in a pink dress and gazed wide-eyed at the awkward sight of Dr. Eirin bent over on her desk with a young man pressing against her and thoroughly and intimately massaging her mid-section! Both you and Eirin stared back in shock while the woman's face went flush with dumbfoundedness!

"P-Princess Kaguya, this isnt what it lo-"

"I'LL COME BACK!!" Kaguya slammed the door shut!
11131211.title: No Debt Goes Unrepaid

111312111.content:
"On no.." eirin mumbled.

She then got up and rushed out. You could clearly tell that this 'kaguya' person misunderstood what you were doing. You decided to follow her so you got out and went where they ran off. It took at least 5 minutes to catch up with eirin as she was standing infront of the door.

"Princess, it's misunderstanding!" Eirin said.

"It's alright eirin, I'll give you some private time!" Kaguya replied.

As you came to eirin, she lookes at you with worriedness. You both know it was misunderstanding so you spoke up on the door.

"Um..miss? Your misunderstanding something." You said, "I was giving eirin a massage because her back was in pain."

Silence lingered, then the door slided revealing kaguya herself. She was blushing and figiting little then turned her attention to eirin.

".....Are you sure?" Kaguya said.

"Yes." Eirin answered.

She sighed and opened the door fully. Her kimono did suites her and both you and eirin waited to see her reply.

"If that's the case...then I apologize." Kaguya said, "is he new?"

Both you and eirin sighed in relieve, and eirin introduced you to kaguya and vice versa. After few talk, eirin promised to get cable fixed by tomorrow. Kaguya were disgruntled by this but understood as it was getting late. You two bid farewell and you went back to your room to go to sleep. You plopped on the bed and looked up at the celing for moment.

"I hope everything would be ok." You mumbled.

You closed your eyez and went to bed. Next morning came and you felt someone close to you. You shifted and when you opened your eyes slowly, you saw...
111312111.title: Eirin chases after her, trying to save face!

choices: That instant beverage has an odd side effect...
1113121112.content:
You werent really shocked let alone did you wake up with a jolt. You just found it a little odd that some young short black haired bunny girl with a little carrot necklace around her neck lying in your bed next to you was the first thing you saw when you woke up. What made it even odder was the smirk she was giving off. It didnt seem childish, playful, or uppity as you would expect any kid that loves to smile would make.
If anything... it actually leaned toward, dare you say it, 'pervy'. For some reason, youre having a strange fear of Chris Hansen.

"Morning, sweet thang!" the young girl said in a disturbingly sexy voice.

"H..." you swallowed, "hello. Who might you be?"

"Inaba," she purred, "Tewi Inaba. I'm the leading dame of these bunny babes living here. I'm also your cute little wake up girl!"
"Oh," you smiled nervously, but looked around for any cameras, "how nice."
"Did you have a good sleep?" Tewi asked, then her smirk got even wider, "...cuz Eirin sure did!" And then you suddenly got a hundred times more uncomfortable!
"Wh...what?" you pretended to be dumb, but you knew exactly what this kid was talking about!
"Not to worry, sweet thang!" hearing her call you that again made you shudder, "we at Eientei LOOOOVE to share!" You did not like where this conversation was going. Long story short, somebody else mustve taken that back massage you gave Dr. Eirin the wrong way!

Just as your face went red, Tewi leaped out of your bed and ran to the door. "You better hurry downstairs! You dont wanna be late for breakfast!" Despite earlier, you follow her to the hospital lounge. Sitting at one of the tables, you see the nurse/patient from last night, Reisen and the princess that caught you and the doc in the act, Kaguya eating together. And as soon as the two saw you coming their way, both of them gave nervous red-cheeked stares.

"Good morning," you said with a totally NOT nervous smile.
Kaguya simply coughed while Reisen's bunny ears twitched.
"M...Morning, Mr. Whitestone..." bunny girl's eyes kept rolling back and forth. Yeah, shit definitely hit the fan. You got some esplainin' to do, Lucy.

"Look, listen!" you sat at the table with them, "if this is about last night with me and Dr. Yagokoro-"
"It's... it's fine!" Reisen waves her arms, "I completely understand master has her needs!"
"We didnt... er... it was just a massage! I'm pretty well known for massages where I used to work!"
Reisen almost spit out her coffee hearing that!
"No, not THOSE kind of massages! Anyway, the doctor had a back pain so I massaged her back. Princess, the doctor and I already explained this."
Kaguya turned away, "Like Ms. Udongein Inaba said, it's alright, you dont need to excuse your actions..." her face went red, "I'm... quite happy for Eirin that despite her age she's still... um... a healthy woman."
"Heh! Yeah!" Tewi butt in and hopped in the seat next to you, "doggy-style's been known to lose weight!" You dropped your jaw hearing something like THAT come out of that brat's mouth!

*Thump!*
"Ow!" Tewi got a thump on the head for that remark!
"Thank you, Princess," thanked Reisen.
"Dont mention it..."

You sighed hard, "Seriously, there is nothing on between the two of us. I just owe her a huge favor for saving me and my sister's lives so I'm doing everything I can to pay her back."
“Wow, Eirin’s big pimpin’ in da house!” the hell did Tewi just…?!
“WELL…” Reisen rolled her eyes, “regardless, it’s nice to finally see master so cheerful this morning.”
“I agree,” Kaguya sipped her tea, “it’s very rare we’ve ever seen Eirin so.. chipper at this time of the day. Whatever you did certainly lifted her usual morning gloom.”
“Well, it was the least I could do,” you said, “as long as sis is ok, that’s ultimately all I care about. Believe me, the relationship I have with your doctor is strictly professional and for my sister’s sake.”

“Good morning, Alex!” speak of the devil, along came Eirin giving you a rather bright warming smile. She not only greeted YOU specifically, but called you by your first name instead of ‘Mr. Whitestone’.
“Good morning, Ei-” you took a quick glance at the other three, “…Dr. Yagokoro!” Her incredibly warming smile left the others more suspicious! Eirin did not concern herself with the others as she set a snazzy little custom-made Cartoony Chibi-Eirin mug full of hot chocolate on the table in front of you.

“Oh, it smells nice,” you commented, “you brew it yourself?”
“It’s a little concoction I’ve been working on for a while,” Eirin said, “it’s a kind of instant-beverage hybrid full of special super vitamins and herbal supplements for boosting the immune system guaranteed enhancement throughout the day.” Interesting.
Tewi snickered. “ “Enhancement!’ “ you heard her whisper.

“Thank you, it smells delicious,” you compliment the drink and change the subject, “so doctor… how’s Anna doing?”
“She’s currently getting her physical,” Eirin explained, “A few of my nurses are still testing for any toxicity. So far, the previous tests came up negative, but I’ll do my best to remove all doubt.” Wow, that’s comforting, “And since this surgery is fairy-related, I’m also having a specialist from one of the Fairy courts take a look at her this afternoon.” That sparked a flag.
“Winter or Summer court?” you asked.
“Summer.” You exhaled in relief. Ms Le Fey has loyal family in the Winter court. Granted, you dont trust fairies in general anymore, but it takes one knowledgeable on fairy influence to deal with fairy influence. Youre pretty sure the Nephilim did SOMETHING to your sister! Besides, the enemy of your enemy is your friend, right?

“You are the greatest, Dr. Yagokoro.”

Eirin giggled then turned to the others at the table, “Princess, the repairman will be here in a couple hours to look at the cable.”
“That’s a relief,” Kaguya sipped her tea, “I’ll be damned if I’m missing a 24 hour marathon of House MD!”
“Reisen, did you remember to take your medicine this morning?”
Reisen’s ears stood up on end, “Um… uh… y-yeah, I was just about to! See?!” She pulled out her little bottle and popped a pill in her mouth.
“That’s a good girl!” Eirin patted her head, making her face a little red, “Tewi, did you dig any holes in the yard recently?”
Tewi gave the puppy dog eyed look and pretended to act all innocent “Nooooo…”
“Then why did I just find poor little Chen this morning stuck in a hole right by the lake crying her eyes out?”
“I…I was gonna get her out! Honest! It just… slipped my mind.”
“You know what’ll help you remember?” Eirin smiled, “volunteering to clean Ran’s shrine for the rest of the month.”
Tewi’s ears stood up on end! “WHAT… B… BUT SHE EATS RABBITS!!!”
“All the more reason to be on your best behavior!” Eirin gave no fs. Well, it sounds like THIS family’s gonna take some getting used to.

“Um… Alex?” suddenly, the doc put her hand on your shoulder, “I… think my back might be acting up again. Would you mind giving me another massage later tonight?” All three of the girls eyed you attentively.
“Not at all,” you happily oblige, “I’ll do it whenever and however often you like.” Again, that damn rabbit brat snickered.

“I’m really looking forward to it. Now if you‘ll excuse me, I have some rounds to make.” And then your doctor walked off. Not like you didn’t already notice from last night, but her dress does a very good job showing off her butt… especially with the way her hips sway side to side like that as she walks…

“WOOO!! SHAKE DAT ASS, EIRIN!! *THUMP!* Ow!” Another well deserved thump on the head for the pervy brat!
Some morning this turned out to be. It doesnt look youre gonna be able to convince these girls in any way that you and their doctor arent really intimate. So instead of uselessly explaining yourself more, you just ignore the stares and sip your delicious instant beverage.
1113121112.title: AWKWARD

11131211121.content:
You had the idea that the air was getting tense as the three ladies were looking at you. You sweated little as you sipped some hot chocolate, you put the cup down and quickly thought on changing the subject.

"S-say, what are you're plans ladies?" You asked.

"Huh? w-well, I'm going play some games today." Kaguya answered.

"I'm going to human village to sell..some medicine." Reisen replied.

"I might go see some of my friends." Tewi said.

You breathed out, thinking that they would do something odd to you. You then quickly ate your breakfast, drank your drink and got up. You thanked for the food and was about to take the dirty dishes to the kitchen but reisen told you she'll do it. You thanked her and once you got to the hallway, you wondered if anna finished with her physical. You looked around but you couldn't find her, so you thought on where she might be. One thing you could come up is that she might be outside smoking since she was a smoker. You got out and with your right intention, anna was leaning on the wall smoking cigarette.

"Anna?" You spoke.

She noticed you and then blew a cigarette.

"Wassup, little bro?" Anna replied.

"nothing much...what happened to physical?" You asked.

"I'm done with physical for while." Anna answered, "I'm going to do it again on afternoon."

"I see." You said.

You came next to her and leaned on the wall. The sound of morning birds chirping were nice, and the light breeze were relaxing as well. You thought to yourself 'how did this happen?' as you did work with le fay for while. Anna done alot of hard work from difficult drug deal to destroying the mafias plot just so she could get money to keep protecting you.

"Did dad say anything before he died?" anna asked.

"Huh?" You spoke.

Anna looked at you. You remember that anna was at Chicago when your dad died. She weren't even in his funeral because she was busy with the fey. You thought for moment but couldn't' remember what dad said before he passed on.

"I don't remember." You replied.

"Huh.." Anna sighed.

She then smoked few more time and then thew then walked toward the door. You followed her and when you two were at the hallway, you bumped to tewi. You saw her grinning face, letting you have some sort of doubting feeling inside you.

"H-hey tewi, how's everything?" you asked.

"Ohh, nothing. I was just about to leave." Tewi replied. "By the way..."

She trotted to you and hugged you. You blushed little and then she looked up to you with the puppy eyes. You could tell she was up to something, then she asked you a weird question.

"Say, alex. When you do the massage again with eirin, are you going beyond just massage?" Tewi asked.

You blushed more, then...
11131211121.title: Quickly change the subject ASAP.

111312111211.content:
"EEEPP!!!" you didnt get to see Anna pull out her gun before Tewi let out an eep and jumped behind your back! It was a hell of a surprise to both of you that your own sister would pull a gun on someone for something so silly.

"What did you mean by that?!" Anna questioned.

"It was a joke! It was a joke!" Tewi shivered behind you.

"WHAT DID YOU MEAN BY THAT?!" she repeated.

"Anna, get a hold of yourself!" you try to talk sense into her, "put the damn gun down!"
"What did she mean by massage?!" the heck?! THAT'S all she's upset by?!
"Are you freaking kidding me?!" you raised your eyebrow, "THAT'S why youre pointing a gun at a kid?!"
"Kid?! I-I'm the oldest employee in this hospital!" Tewi stuttered, but you had no time whatsoever to question her age. Being oh so close to shot by your sister is a tad bit more important in this situation.

"Alex, what is she talking about?" your sis cooled down a little, but her gun was still pointing at the little bunny girl.
You sighed, "I gave Eirin a massage last night."
"You WHAT?!" she put her gun down but she began raising her voice. Great, she's gonna scream so loud, the other patients are gonna hear it!
"Look, it wasnt one of THOSE massages! She had a back pain and all I did was massage it away. Nothing erotic or sex-related whatsoever."
"I dont care if you fucked her!" holy snap she didnt?! "uggh... what were you thinking massaging her?! You know the goddamn Fey are well aware of that technique you got!"
"W... what are you talking about?"

She exhaled hard. Youre awful confident you just asked her a dumb question.

"Havent you realized by now why I tell you 'DONT GIVE PEOPLE MASSAGES'?!" aw crap, here comes the lecture that makes you feel stupid, "think, Alex! I've lost count of how many of those elven sluts you had to rub down! That is a unique trait you have that can draw attention. If word gets out about your 'unique trait', Le Fey is going to find out and theyre gonna be coming here looking for you!"
OH. Right! Those fairies know quite well of your massaging ability. That could be really helpful in finding you if word spreads about your ability. Too bad word is already out. Kaguya already knows it, Reisen already knows it, and Tewi already knows it. Who knows how many others know it!

Anna turned her head to the shivering bunny and glared, "Not a word of this gets out. You hear me, twerp?"
Tewi nodded heavily, "Y-Y-YES MA'AM!!"
"Good. Now buzz off." Then Tewi, finally being a good girl for a change, ran off with her tail between her legs!

"You didnt have to be that hard on her," you say.
"You wouldnt be feeling sorry for that brat after hearing half the crap she's done around here," she took another puff of her cigarette just before you snatched the cigarette from her hand and stomped it on the ground. "HEY!"
"Youre scared to death about having nasty stuff being put in your body? DONT PUT NASTY STUFF IN YOUR BODY!" it was your turn to lecture HER.

"I'm... not scared," she twitched, "I just know what this bastard is capable of. I've been to a few of his lectures."
"Eirin told me that she found nothing bad in you," you explain, "and even if there's something, she's not gonna give up on you. She even has a specialist from the Summer Court coming to take a look at you."
"Tsk," Anna tsked, "same pointy-earred psychopaths. Theyre probably in Maeve's pocket, too."
"No they arent," you tell her, "they hate Maeve's folks as much as we do. Theyre as close to allies as we can get."
"Close to allies, you say?" Anna put a hand to her hip and tilted her head, "I seem to recall one of those 'allies' tried to murder you for having the audacity to talk to her princess."
You sighed, "It was a misunderstanding. The Daiyousei just thought I was trying to kidnap Aurora, but she immediately apologized after Aurora explained that we were just chatting."
"The Daiyousei still has a picture of you in her bedroom where she practices her projectile throwing." Geez! That dumb fairy actually has a grudge against you?!

"Regardless of that idiot, there are still plenty of good smart NONbloodthirsty fairies in the Summer Court," you keep your defense up, "if youre really worried about what the Nephilim did to you, we're going to need their help."
"I'm gonna go lie down," and there she went, abruptly ending this conversation. But she only took a couple of steps before turning back to you one last time, "you still dont remember hearing dad say anything about me?"
You shook your head. So she continued her trek back to her room. It was a very unwanted abrupt ending, but you hope what you said to her made her feel a little better. She was right about one point, though. You really shouldnt go around giving EVERYBODY that has a backache massages. SOME of these girls here like to gossip...

"Ok, I'll just massage Eirin," you tell yourself, "nobody else. I cant massage anybody else. No special treatment for anybody else. No matter how much they-"

"Owwww... my back...."

"You've got to be friggin kidding me!" you suddenly hear someone's voice call out behind one of the bushes and curse your sudden urge to help out those in need. At least those you know you can help!

"Is anybody out there?" the voice from behind the bush called, "somebody help... I cant get up..."

Your fingers were twitching with anticipation, ready to fix a back in need! You shake your head no but your fingers twitched YES! You remind yourself that this is a hospital, and it's already full of professionals that are capable of treating someone with a bad back! They dont need you! ...Then again, the HEAD doctor here needed you, so that's kinda gotta be saying something!

"Somebody please help...." the voice continued to call, "my back... auuuggh... it hurts so muuucchh...."

You turn your head back to the door and mentally prepare yourself to haul ass and call for help, but PHYSICALLY you dont move an inch. Part of you was 199% confident that you could fix that poor stranger's back with just your bare hands! There was NO back so far you couldnt treat with a single massage!
This was like Clark Kent trying his hardest not be Superman while a burning school bus full of children was dangling off a cliff right in front of him! You just couldnt ignore it!

Gotta do something and fast! The longer you juggle around the choices to make, the worse this poor stranger's back could be getting!
111312111211.title: It's not easy being Clark Kent

choices: Patient talking to the rabbit employee
1113121112111.content:
Despite you want to give massage to the helpless person, you remember what your sister have told you. You then noticed reisen coming out of the building and you arrived to her.

"Reisen, I heard someones plead for help." you said.

"Oh? where?" Reisen asked.

You took her to the area where you heard someones cry, and it was an teenaged girl who had light blue hair and casual clothing. You didn't know who this girl were then reisen came next to her.

"Are you alright, madam?" reisen asked.

"My back....it hurts bad." Girl replied.

"Don't worry, I'll take you in." Reisen responded.

She picked her up and told you she'll take the girl in so eirin would check her up. You thanked her and once she went inside, you leaned on the wall of the fence, sighing in relief that the girl was going to get treated. As you closed your eyes and thought about some stuff, you felt little disturbed in your heart. you wanted to open your eyes but for some reason, you couldn't. You then suddenly heard someones gagging noise and chopping noise. You quickly opened your eyes and saw an disturbing vision infront of you: Anna and yourself with your face and cloth scattered in blood, holding an makeshift knife. You looked down and saw the whole member of eieintei laying on the ground filled with puddle of blood.

"What..the fuck is this!?" you shouted.

You blinked, and the vision faded away. You didn't know what just happened, but knew something was weird. You kept the vision in your mind as if it could be an good thing to remember. You then went inside the building and came across with...
1113121112111.title: Go get help!

11131211121111.content:
You sat in a seat next to a white haired girl with a big red and white bow in her hair and... little red and white bows in her hair, wearing a white shirt and slightly baggy red pants with suspenders. Looks werent really your concern. What compelled you to sit next to her was the fact that it felt surprisingly warm being near her and you were stone cold after that nightmare. Even after spending quite some time working under the Winter Court, you never could get used to the cold. Then again, what MIGHTVE helped you loathe the cold more were the Snowmen in Maeve's winter garden... those poor bastards picked the worst time in the world to be immortal.

You put on a straight face while you secretly basked in the warmth of the human fireplace. You didnt enjoy the smell of her cigarette she was smoking. Sadly, this wasnt a 'No Smoking' zone. It didnt take you long to regret sitting next to her.
Too bad, cuz she turned her attention to you.

"Hm? A guy?" she raised her eyebrow like it was a surprise to see it, "a HUMAN guy? Here in Eientei?"
"Er... yeah?" was the best response you can give her what with you being a bit dumbstruck by her first impression.

"How the hell did you manage surviving the forests this time of year?" she questioned you, "it's practically a death sentence for male humans to be outside the Village what with them now doubling as food AND breeding stock for the youkai."
"Uh... I... dont really follow," you said even more perplexed than previously.
"Y... youre not from the Village?"
"What Village?"

She tilted her head while she took a quick drag from her cigarette. She squinted her eyes as the gears in her head turned. The longer she stalled in silence, the less you enjoyed the smell of the smoke!

"Wait," she finally spoke, "you wouldnt happen to be Anna's little brother, are you?" Well what do you know!
"Y-yeah!" you nodded, "Alex. Alex Whitestone!" Hearing that made her smirk and seeing that made you feel uncomfortable!

"OOOOHHHH," she almost chuckled, "I know who you are. Youre the guy who's poking the doctor, right?"

UuuuuuUUURRRGGGGHHH!! SERIOUSLY??!!! Word has already spread fast, it seems

You lowered your head, rubbed the aching side of it, mentally told yourself to calm down, took a deep breath, and finally answered.
"I'm not..." you took another breath and looked away, " 'poking' Dr. Yagokoro. I just gave her a massage."
"Massage?! Heh, I havent heard it called THAT in a long time!"
"No, a REAL massage!" you correct her, "she's been having problems with her back lately and I offered to help her alleviate the pain... and apparently she liked it so much, she wants me to do it again later."

"In that case," she leaned over and tilted her head, "I got this terrible ache behind my shoulders ever since that stupid snobby princess shot me through a wall... would ya mind giving ME a massage?!"
Worse timing to be incredibly hesitant. You told yourself you'd keep your massaging power to a minimum for the sake of your sister.
You sucked in some air and turned away, "I cant. I'm only doing it for Dr. Yagokoro."
"Tsk!" she snickered, "older than dirt and she can STILL nail a guy a fraction of her age! ...Oh, I'm sorry. I never bothered to introduce myself. I'm Mokou. I‘m a… regular at this place." Odd how she was being vague when she said she’s a ‘regular’.

“Nice to meet you,” you’d shake her hand, but somehow making fun of Eirin’s age kinda rubbed you the wrong way. Granted, how old is Eirin, exactly? “So… you come here really often?”
“Yep,” she nodded, “me and the doc’s master don’t exactly get along and well… things break. A lot of things. Property… bones… pride… ya got a smoke?”
You stared at her with the most flabbergasted look you can make on your face, “I dont smoke. And you already have a cigarette.”
“So?” Mokou says as she takes another drag. Youre gonna have to put up with this girl a lot here, arent you?

“GOD NO!!! GET HER AWAY!! PLEASE GET HER AWAY!!!”

Oh crap. As soon as you heard your sister screaming, you almost lost control. Hearing a big brave big sis like Anna scream in such a terrified voice was something you were never used to hearing. If even SHE is scared, then it’s something meant to be feared by all!
Fearing the worst, you rush toward her room while Mokou followed. You hoped that none of Maeve’s stooges are in there torturing her!

“Ms. Whitestone! Get a hold of yourself!” you bust in to see Eirin and another nurse trying to restrain your sister as she struggled tremendously to break free of their grip!
“HE KNOWS I’M HERE! THE FUCKER KNOWS I’M HERE!” Anna was panicking like crazy, “LET ME GO! WE GOTTA GET OUTTA HERE!”
“Urggh… calm… down!” Eirin ordered as she and her assistant struggled with your panicking sis, “Alex, Ms. Fujiwara! Please help me restrain her!” Again, she calls you by your first name.

“Anna, it’s me! I’m here!” you tried to talk sense into her while Mokou assistant the doc and nurse, “you dont have to panic. I am right here."
"A...Alex..." she calmed down a little bit, but breathed heavy, "you... you gotta get outta here now! Maeve knows we're here! Her damn surgeon is on to us!"
Once again with the Nephilim?!
"What do you mean?" you asked her, "how is he on to us?"
Anna pointed a shivering finger to her bed mate, the poor unconscious blue haired girl with the bad back.
"W...what's wrong with her?"
"Look at her back."

Her bare uncovered back revealed two stitched up incisions across her shoulder blades.

Eirin sighed, "Those incisions were already there when we found her."

"I know that type of incision!" Anna added, "I've seen in one of the Nephilim's lectures. He calls it the 'Wingless Angel'." Wingless Angel?! "He mustve used that poor girl as a test subject and dropped her here as a warning! We need to leave now before godknowswhat happens to her!!"
"Ms. Whitestone, you need to relax! There's nothing wrong with-"

Holy crap. That blue haired girl's body is shaking! her arms were twisting awkwardly as she was shaking! It was already too late it seemed. The stitches on her back began to pop! Something was actually coming out of her wounds!
All five of you stared in silent shock as the wounds split apart and out sprouted...
11131211121111.title: No Smoking

111312111211111.content:
...An six wings that were purely made of ice! You felt skeptic about what you just saw and then turned back to anna who panicked again and struggled more harder. Eirin knew that if she don't do anything, Anna would commit something beyond her grasp so she immediately took the shot that nurse put to the side incase and pierced to her neck, injecting some sort of liquid and pulled it out. Anna struggled less and stopped, falling asleep.

"Phew...good thing I brought the strong sedative." Eirin spoke.

You looked at anna, seeing her sedated by the drug. Though you had some distraught feeling, you had the understanding that eirin had to sedate her as you clearly remember her trigger happy finger once paranoia hits her mind. You sighed in relief and turned her attention to eirin.

"Thank you eirin, for calming my sister down." You thanked her, "I wouldn't know what would have happened if you didn't sedate her."

"I was only doing my job." Eirin replied.

You then looked at the blue haired girl. You wondered if what anna was speaking was true and this girl would be part of the Le Fay gang, but you assured yourself that it couldn't be as your sis were good with harboring former member of the clans or any enemy who would get out of the feys sight. You sighed and then the young girl woke up slowly and yawned, rubbing her eyes.

"Mmmm...huh? where am I?" Girl asked.

"You're in the eientei, cirno." Eirin replied.

The young girl then looked at you and observed you. You didn't know why she was looking at you until someone came in from door, revealing to be..
111312111211111.title: ...fairy wings!

1113121112111111.content:
"CIRNO!!!! Cirno, what have they done to you?!" part of you wanted to scowl after hearing that familiar voice with that familiar tone of overprotective arrogance. You were not fond of seeing her at the moment of your most vulnerable, but as usual, the fates were not generous with your life. In barged that green haired golden dragonfly-winged fairy in the blue dress that left you a painful reminder of that bad first impression just for being at the wrong place at the wrong time with the wrong girl.

You took a deep breath mentally preparing yourself for the world of anguish that the Summer Court’s own Daiyousei will deliver to you again. Fortunately, she dashed past you and toward the other fairy girl.
“Oh, Cirno! Are you alright?!” she charged over to the scarred girl she apparently knew, “this was not how I intended to defeat my greatest adversary!”
The girl, er ‘Cirno’ just tilted her head questionably at the Daiyousei, “I’m sorry. Do I know you?”
The Summer Court fairy gasped in shock. “What do you mean ‘Do you know me’? Don’t you recognize your long-time respected adversary of the rival Court?! We are destined to engage each other in combat for the honor of our Queens until one of us is finally slain!”
“What’s an adversary?” apparently Cirno seemed too innocent and naïve to grasp what the greater fairy was saying.

And lo and behold, the greater fairy glares YOUR direction, “You! Maeve’s former pet! What did your master do to her?!”
“I dont have any clue,” you answered, “it might be similar to what she had done to my sister.”

“Seeing as though there are no physical changes to the paitents, it can be safe to assume that we’ve arrived on time,” said the elf in the scrubs no one noticed walk through the door. The wet brown hair, odd green optical orbs for eyes, and the outrageously big jaw that required a really big mouth-mask to cover it gave away her identity.

“Alex, this is the doctor from the Summer Court I invited to take a look at Anna,” Dr Eirin introduced, which was unnecessary,” I’d like you to meet-”

“Dr. Powler,” Margaret Powler (actually, that wasn’t her name. ‘Peg Powler’ was another nickname given to her by the locals of northern England) A senior surgeon with ties to the Summer Court that’s well known for her large jaws and teeth that could easily tear off limbs. Rumors speculate that instead of surgical knives, she uses her teeth to cut open flesh tissue during surgeries! She’s gonna be your sister’s doctor!

“Mr. Whitestone, so good to see you!” Peg smiled, her wide cheshire/Glasgow grin barely concealed in her mouth mask, “Lady Aurora sends her regards! She also wishes to offer you refuge from the Winter mafia if youre interested.”
The Summer Princess herself is offering you refuge from her arch-enemy? That is a tempting offer, but you know better.

“I’m sorry,” you turned her down, “you’ll have to tell her I cant at the moment.”
“The Princess, in her infinite generosity, cordially invites you to join her Court and you have the audacity to reject her?!” the Daiyousei (by the way, is not her real name, either. She just loved that nickname from the locals in Okinawa during a trade so much that she adopted it!) was offended by your rejection.

“That is his decision and we have to respect it,” Peg at least accepted your refusal honorably, “now. These two arrived in here with carefully carved wounds believed to be experiments of the Nephilim, correct?”

“That’s correct,” Eirin answered while you nodded and the Daiyousei looked to Cirno worried, “so far, I’ve noticed no odd changes. By the time they arrived, their wounds looked nearly healed.”
“Does it happen that he just cuts open people and just fixes them back up without doing anything to them?” you asked.

“It does happen on occasion,” Peg answered, “sometimes in the middle of surgery, he gets interrupted and is told by his clients to cancel whatever experiment he’s currently on and just seals the body back up. Either that or maybe his clients have a change of heart and decide to focus on ANOTHER experiment instead. For example, one day a client could say ‘Cut off Cirno’s feet and put bird talons on them!’ then the next they could say ‘Change of plans! Replace Cirno’s stomach with a wood chipper!’.”
The Daiyousei cringed while Cirno still stared confused. Mokou reached into her pocket to pull out a cigarette, only to get it swiped away from the doctor.
“I told you millions of times! No smoking!” Eirin scolded her.

Peg arranged several of her fellow Fey surgeons to perform a thorough examination on your sister and the girl with icicle wings. She had urged everyone to step outside while they were at work. Daiyousei paced around in the hallway while Mokou decided to take her cigarette break in the ladies room.
That just left you and Eirin who were walking down the hallway toward… actually you dont know where youre headed, youre just following Eirin.

“Sounded like you and Dai-chan had a bit of history back there,” Eirin enquires.
“Well, if you count nearly getting stabbed to death for inviting someone I didn’t know was her princess to dance, then yeah we got history,” you couldn’t help but blab.
“Oh dear,” Eirin frowned, “that sounds like something she’d do. Perhaps the whole ‘GREATER fairy’ rank mustve gotten to her head. But what of Dr. Powler?”
“I had no personal issues with her,” you say, “she’s a darn good doc. I’m confident my sister and whatshername are in good hands. Once again, I owe you, Dr. Yagokoro.”
Eirin smiled, “Yes you do. I believe you said you’d give me another massage today.”

You certainly do remember. Part of you was sort of enthusiastic about it for some reason. Plus you were obligated. She saved your sister’s life. And she means more to you than anything else in the world.

“I did say that Dr. Yagokoro,” you politely admit, “and I intend to keep my word. When would you like another taste of my patented technique?”

“Well, I’ve already finished my rounds today,” Eirin’s smile brightened, “and with Dr. Powler taking over, I’ve got free time right now.”
‘About damn time,’ a part of you that was also slightly perverse made you think that thought! But then that reminds you! The other girls at this hospital! They think youre… with their doctor!

“Youre um… not bothered that some of the uh, other girls are taking this the wrong way?” you couldnt help but ask.
Eirin just laughed as she stopped at a door, “Let the little girls gossip! Us adults have an appointment!” That was all you needed to hear to start rolling up your sleeves.

As you entered the room, you followed Eirin with anticipation to…
1113121112111111.title: The one they call Dr. Feel Good

11131211121111112.content:
It was eirins bed as it was a futon with normal looking art on the sheet. Eirin told you that the massage chair that the eientei had is broken due to Reisen putting too much strength on the patients back, making it break. You painfully laughed at what she said, as eirin helped you get some massage oils and such, she got her dress off and put some jeans on then laid down. You were not that embarressed as you have given plenty of massage in the past, even to your sis. You rubbed the massage oil on her back, you started to give eirin a good back massage. You heard her moan lightly as you gently stroked your hand on her back lightly, she felt the great massage.

"How do you feel, eirin?" You asked.

"So...good.." Eirin spoke softly.

You smiled lightly as you continued to massage her back, you started to make a chopping motion against her back lightly. Eirin felt this and her voice became more and more mellow by the overwhelming feeling of goodness from your massage. You truly didn't mind this as you thought back in time, you remember that many female patients who got your massage became so soft on the body that they refuse to get up quickly after the massage. After 20 minutes of back massage, You gave her a shoulder massage, making the massage experience for eirin more melting sensation.

"Haa...haa....Mr.White..stone.." Eirin spoke with mellow voice.

"Y-yes?" you spoke.

"Can you please...help me turn around?" Eirin asked.

You didn't know why she would ask that but you complied and turned her body around until she grabbed you and gently pushed you aside to the ground. You didn't know what was happening as eirin was now on the top mount, staring at you with some sweat and some steam on her body. You had the bad omen on what's in her mind as eirin licked her lips, she sighed in relief.

"That was the greatest massage you ever gave me, Mr.Whitestone." Eirin said, "Ms.Whitestone should be proud of herself for having such a great little brother like yourself."

"E-eirin? What are you doing?" You asked.

"Oh, for giving me a great massage, I should give you a return gift." Eirin said.

Your thought was correct as she unzipped her jeans, she started to fiddle with your crotch. You were getting scared at what eirin was about to do as you thought to yourself 'why big sis is in sleep!?'

Better question is: will someone interrupt her?
11131211121111112.title: ...Eirin's bed.

choices: "Ms. Powler would like to speak with you in private."
"Dr. Yagokoro would like to speak with you... in private."
111312111211111121.content:
Your nerves were shot like practically any young warm blooded male would be if they were in bed with a much older (much much MUCH older) more experienced woman. You were understandably nervous considering you havent had much official experience with a woman before (Maeve's clients will never count in your heart) and this particular one is taking the lead in a major way.

By the time these thoughts flowed in your head, you were already panting heavily thanks to how experienced Eirin was at gently caressing your testicles (considering she's a doctor, she'd have to be!). She leaned in close, ready to greet your open gasping mouth with hers. You couldnt help but gently stroke her nice long braided hair while you waited for her lips to lock with yours.

*Knock knock knock!*
"Dr. Yagokoro! Dr. Yagokoro!"

"SSS!!" Eirin hissed as you felt the grip on your balls tighten a bit from her flinch! Thankfully, she didnt squeeze tight enough to hurt, but it still scared the hell out of you! She quickly got up off of you and immediately zipped up her jeans and put on a nearby shirt.
"Quick! Hide!" Eirin whispered as she pointed to the closet. Despite being confused that she suddenly now cares about her reputation, you did as you told and hid in the closet!
"Just a minute," the doc called out before putting a finger to her lip and going, "shh!"

“W-What is it?” Eirin panted as she opened the door.
“Somebody mixed up Ayane’s heart medicine again! She’s experiencing convulsions in Room 31-B!”
“What?! But I had every prescription bottle properly labe-…grr… Tewi, I’m gonna kill you!” That is a common thing in this hospital?! “Alright, I’ll be right down! Give me a moment!”

As soon as the close was clear, she opened the closet door and frowned your way.
“I… I’m sorry, Alex. I-I… just dont think it’s gonna work !’ what’s not gonna work out, “I mean… well, my line of work is hard on relationships and… well, I’m not nearly as young as most girls here, so… er, you’d better head back to your room soon before somebody gets the wrong idea.”
Geez, for some reason, it kinda felt bad hearing those words come out of Eirin’s mouth. Like some part of you deep down inside that had a thing for this doctor was hurting. Well, plenty of fish in the sea. YOUNGER fish, mind you.

Eirin dashed out, forgetting to change into her work dress… and you couldn’t help but admire how well the tight jeans hug her butt while she runs. Youre confident that hips like those have plenty of life left to bare a few babies!
Ugh… why are you thinking stuff like that at a time like this?! You have far far far more important things to worry about than trying to knock up an older woman! Specifically that fate of your sister! She’s always looked out for you when you were at your most helpless, now she’s at her most helpless and really needs someone to look out for her. You shudder to think the kinds of mental trauma the Nephilim put her through… or intends to put her through.

------------------

“As you can see, class, this particular specimen is incredibly stubborn. Despite the numerous times I’ve carved this hot needle into his chest, this human has still firmly refused to cooperate. Now most humans his age and physically shape would give up before the tenth slash. So far I’ve made… let’s see… 17 slashes. He could potentially bleed out should he not be given treatment soon, but it seems his loyalty to his comrade is stronger than his desire to end this pain and suffering.”

“Errgghg….gawwg…..”

“Listen carefully, class. At this point, it’s becoming a chore on his body just to breathe. …So Mr. Tenship, are you now willing to tell me where Ms. Whitestone is?”

“Err……g….go… to….hell!”

“But Mr. Tenship. Youre injured really badly. Ms. Le Fey did not arrange for your preserved health and safety. She wont bat an eye if you die right here in front of my students. However, you have my solemn guarantee that I will personally treat those nasty wounds should you cooperate. All it takes is one simple answer.”

“…PISS….OFF!!!”

“Such extraordinary willpower! Here comes #18!”

“GYAAAAGGGHGHHHHHHH!!!”

------------------

It got awful boring sitting in your room all by your lonesome with not so much as a book to pass the time. You'd take a walk around, but considering how busy everybody is, you really didnt wanna get in their way. You lost count of the time you wasted in here, waiting for the result of Anna's physical. Images of seeing her so scared when she showed you her scar flashed into your mind. It was still hard thinking your bold, brave, fearless big sis was reduced to such a state.

"Mr. Whitestone?"

You almost jumped out of your skin, surprised as all hell when that nurse from earlier just rushed into your room without knocking.

"Y-y-y-yes, what it is?!" you asked with all ears.
111312111211111121.title: Medicine that's hard to swallow

1113121112111111211.content:
"Ms.Powler would like to see you in private." Nurse spoke.

"Alright." You replied.

You followed the nurse and once you reached the other room, you thanked the nurse and went inside. You were Greeted by Ms.Powler and she put the pen down.

"How is my sis? Is she alright?" You asked nervously.

"Good news and bad." Ms.Powler said, "Bad thing, is that I have found the item that would be part of nihilims item."

She took out two lumps of what it seems to be a small round rock with picture of eye on the middle. You shudder and looked at her.

"This is.." you spoke.

"This might have been an artifact to spy on the person from the inside." Ms.Powler explained, "It was in your sisters heart area and her stomach."

You cringe at what she said, then she smiled.

"Fortunatly, This artifact is busted, so it was not useful." Ms.Powler said.

You sighed in relief, and then she got up from her chair, telling you to follow her to see anna. You nodded and followed, and once you arrived, you've saw your big sister sleeping soundly.

"The sedative is still kicking in her body. Why don't you watch over for a while?" MsPowler said.

"I will." You repled.

She nodded and went to help Eirin. You got yourself a chair and sat down. You looked at your big sis as she was sleeping peaceful.

You then started to remember about...
1113121112111111211.title: seeing unconciousness

choices: Anna sitting up, looking at you
Dr.Powler and Dr.Yagokoro sitting next to you
11131211121111112111.content:
...The reunion between you and anna. You sighed and started to dose off and closed your eyes, remembering the past of your reunion with Anna..

---------

You were on the elevator with one of the Le Fay member. It was your first day as the part of the Le Fay gang as your father failed to meet the standerds that the Head of the family was seeing. Once the elevator opened, you two got out to see the head of the gang. The office room were like any normal business room that also included both the Irland and Scotlands national flag. You two walked toward the front desk, realizing that you saw your own sister standing next to Maeve. She noticed you and was in surprised but kept her cool. Maeve, who were wearing a mask, looking at the description on the paper about you and looked at you.

"So you're the son of David Whiterock, huh?" Maeve spoke.

"Y-Yes, I am." You replied.

She put the paper down and leaned back on the chair. You felt something chilly about this women as Anna just stood with her custom made magnum. Maeve then leaned forward, putting her arm on the desk and rested her chin, not faulting her view at your eyes.

"You know why your working with us, right?" Maeve asked.

"Yes. My father failed to meet the reputation." You replied.

"That's correct. Good thing at least you came in time." Maeve said.

You didn't know what she meant as she ordered one of the member to get her some wine, he went to the cabnet and got the bottle and the wine glass. He came to the desk and put the glass down, opening the bottle and poured some. She smiled as she lifted part of the mask, she got the wine and sipped some and put it to the desk.

"We were short of people, and some of our....men have shamed me and got off the crew." Maeve spoke as she put the mask back on.

"I..see." You replied with some horror.

She could feel the horror from you and chuckled. She looked at the paper again and looked at you one more time.

"You will be living in the apartment I provide with. Your older sister will be your neighbor." Maeve said.

You were happy to hear that and once she dismissed you, you got out and within moment you saw your sis come out as well. You were emotional as you didn't see her since middle school, you hugged her and she hugged you back.

"How long was it, that we have last spoken?" Anna spoke.

"5 years, Anna." You replied.

She then petted your head, and squeezed you harder. You could tell that she was worried shitless about you during her solo mission on the behalf of the Le Fay gang. After moment of embracement, she looked at you with light smile.

"What happened to mother? Is father still alive?" Anna asked.

"Mom, yes. Dad.....he was executed." You replied.

Her smile quickly turned frown and looked down. You were depressed as well as he was gunned down by the Le Fay gang for failing the gang themselves. She sighed again and looked at you with her green eyes.

"I guess we should work together for while." Anna said.

"Yeah. I'm glad your with me." You replied.
-----------------------------------------------------------------

You slowly opened your eyes. You noticed that you were sleeping, and once you rubbed your eyes you saw....
11131211121111112111.title: Missions with her

choices: Quick! Pull the blanket over her!
111312111211111121112.content:
The first girl in the room to greet your eyes was of course the lovely Dr. Yagokoro sitting crosslegged in her chair staring deeply into what she's studying on her desk.

"Hi Dr. Yago-"

"Zzzzz..." or just fast asleep leaning over in her chair. How she managed to sleep with her head hanging over the counter is a mystery, but she's probably done this for years so her body's probably used to it. Must be bad for her back, though. Good thing youre here!

"Oh, Mr. Whitestone, you finally woke up?" opposite of you, scribbling notes on her notepad, was big-jawed Peggy. You inhaled and exhaled hard, embarrassed that you dosed off.
"S-Sorry," you apologized, "I guess I was a lot tired than I thought I was."

"Seems like youre not the only one with that problem," she motioned over to Eirin, "did you know that during that brief moment you were sleeping, she had stopped a quarrel between patients, mopped down the floor of the hallway, did four routine checkups to four patients at the exact same time, helped me with your sister's blood test, AND alphabetically organized the hospital's main medicine cabinet?"
Your eyes widened at that poor overworked sleeping doc, "Whoa! She seriously needs a day off. No wonder her back's always aching!" You heard Peggy chuckle under that surgical mask of hers, "...You know about that too, dont you?"

"Ahem! Anyway.." fortunately, Dr. Powler wasnt the type to press onto that scandalous subject, "your sister's recovering quite nicely. In fact so nicely, she already got up and is currently having a chat with Lady Daiyousei." Yep that sounds like your sis alright. Who knows how to shrug off pain better than her?

Speaking of which...

"Does she already know about the tracking artifact?" you asked.

Peg nodded, "That is why she's talking with the Daiyousei. Princess Aurora still offers you asylum in her court and your sister... well, despite her personal opinion of us, she should be well aware that you'd be in safer hands with us than anyone under Countess Maeve. Especially that... harvester." You bit your lip and kept silent. Anna's probably worried not only for her sake, but yours too. For all you know, perhaps the REAL reason the Nephilim put that tracker in her was to use her to ultimately locate YOU.

"We wont force you into coming with us if you dont want to," Peggy insisted, "but we would rather leave that option on that table. Lady Aurora, despite the Daiyousei's dismay, would appreciate it." You heard a rumor from your former colleagues that she was hired before she born, that she was just a small fetus when her mother was hired by the fey, Anna immediately became a part of the mafia when she was born.

(I wonder..) you thought.

Just as you closed the door and turned around, you saw a tall, short purple haired girl with skull mask on her face standing before you. You jumped and before you could shout she grabbed your mouth and put you on the wall. You didn't know what was going on as the girl was looking at you for moment, she spoke up.

"What were you doing...? Master is still tired from yesterday." Girl spoke.

She got her hand off of your mouth and you breathed in.

"Better question is, who are you?" You spoke.

"I am part of the old man of mountain clan...one of the successor of Hassan-I-sabbah...they call me the Hassan of serenity.." she spoke.

You didn't even knew her exictance and after moment both you and the girl noticed the footsteps and the girl backed off.

"I hope you would not hurt master Anna..because I don't want to poison you.." girl said.

She then covered herself in darkness and left the scene. You were standing with blank stair then you saw both Anna and the nurse come out. They notice you and Anna came to you. You saw her and noticed her ears were hiding again.

"Something wrong Alex?" Anna asked.

You then asked..

You clearly forgot that your massage was dangerously good that it would make ANY patient turn from tough character to zombie like object. C.J.
