You don't remember what happened to him after that and you wanted to know.

Will you pick it up?
111312112.title: continue with massage

11131212.content:
Youve seen several of your sister's scars. Came with the territory. She's been punched, stabbed, shot, stepped on, hit with a brick, drugged, etc. and she's STILL a helluva hard knock and a tough powerhouse to keep down! But when she opened up her shirt, you shuddered at her brand new huge burn mark deep across her chest. Darkened deep reddish rashes surrounded the long thick black charred skin that stretched from the top of her chest all the way down to her belly button. You can still feel the heat and smell the burnt skin.

"Oh... my... god!" you gasped, "D...does it hurt?!"

"Like a motherfucker," Anna answered coolly, “Red Caps had a lot of fun with me that night.”
“Jesus, the Red Caps did that to you?!” you shuddered to think of that little band of bloodthirsty midgets in bloody hats.
Anna shook her head, “No, I tried to perform a new escape trick on them… that involved fire,” she looked down at her burn and sighed, “it worked, but I don’t think I did it right.” No shit she didn’t do it right! You couldn’t bare staring at it any more. It looked almost as bad as the scars the Fey gave your dad.

Almost.

“What were you thinking?!” you nagged, “and who taught you something as insanely suicidal as that?!”
“All I was thinking was that I needed to get out of there by any means necessary,” she answered, “believe me, whatever scar I got here would be pleasant compared to what couldve happened to me. You know that, right?” She didn’t have to remind you!

“Please tell me youre not gonna try something like that again!” you begged, “this is… god, I can smell the roasted skin!”
“No worries, bro,” Anna assured you, “I am through dealing with those fuckers. From this point, we’re just gonna be laying low until the Fey gets off our backs.” You sighed as she continued, “after tonight, we‘re gonna split up for a while. I‘m gonna be staying friend‘s place for a while, so I‘ll need you to stay here.”
“How long you gonna be gone?” you asked. She shrugged her shoulders. You really didn’t wanna split up after what just happened. Youre terrified for your sis. No doubt the Fey are gonna be after her first when they find out she aint dead!
“Don’t worry, Al. Youre gonna be fine. These guys here are good trustworthy people. They’ll take good care of you.” She then smirked, “Plus, it’s all girls in this place! Should be fun for you!” Even in this wounded state, she still manages to crack jokes. You wish you had half the spine as sis.

*knock knock* Just then, Ms. Yagokoro knocked on the door, cutting this reunion abruptly. “I’m really sorry to cut this moment between you two short, but it’s time for Ms. Whitestone’s er… hydrotherapy.”
You knew when people needed privacy.

“It’s cool, Eirin. It aint nothing Al hadn’t seen before!” you could not believe those words came out of your sister’s mouth! Eirin actually dropped her jaw for a moment!
“No no, it’s fine!” you insist, “I’ll see you later, sis! Thank you for helping both of us, Ms. Yagokoro.”
“Y…youre welcome…” Eirin still seemed a bit shaken up from your sister's odd response. You really REALLY hoped she didnt give her the wrong idea! It wasnt like there really anything between you and Anna outside of plain sibling bonding... well, it's not like she was SERIOUS when she flirted with you... er... not like you were actually interested or..

The two had already stepped out before it got too awkward. On the plus side, it was a relief to find out she's alright, despite the burn scar of course. But you know the worst isnt over. Le Fey's gonna find out she fled and theyre gonna hunt her down. Just like they did with dad.
The 'Fairies' are everywhere. You might as well be hiding from half of Nature itself.
"Ugh..." you rubbed your head, still aching as badly as ever, "Reisen was right. I need to rest." Hopefully, you'll feel better mentally as well as physically afterwards. You lied back down in your bed and shut your eyes as you attempted to clear your head of negative thoughts. Removing Maeve Le Fey from your head was like trying to remove a facehugger from your flesh before it crams it's embryo down your throat, but slowly and surely, fatigue took over and your fears were temporarily set aside for a moment...

......

.............

..................

...............................*sniff*

*Sniff* *Sniff*



*Sniiiiiiff*

Suddenly, who knows how much later, you hear very close sniffing. It's not enough to wake you entirely, just enough to put you in sort of a half-sleep half-awake paralysis. With one eye barely squinted open, you could make out a purple haired silhouette with bunny ears leaning her head and against your chest and taking sniffs. Wait, is that Reisen? Those red glowing eyes of hers are a dead giveaway. What the heck is she-

*Sniff! SnIIIIIFF!* "Ahhh..."

Apparently, she's enjoying your scent. Flattered, but weirded out. Part of your brain that wasnt still asleep was dumbfounded as she sniffed your neck and arms as well, possibly savoring your scent! Does she usually do this?
Come to think of it, she DID say she was more of a patient than a nurse. Maybe this was one of her... problems she's been dealing with.

Now would probably be a good time to wake up before it gets too bizarre, but you were honestly a little intrigued by her behavior. You actually felt the urge to just lie there and see where Reisen goes from there. Then again, it might not be a good idea if she has... other issues. Still, it is tempting. Might as well have a little fun before you die.

...Or before the Fey makes you beg to die!
11131212.title: Playing With Fire

111312121.content:
You had the instinct that this crazy bunny would do something...odd until she started to get into your bed! You immediatly woke up, startling the bunny rabbit and making her get out of the bed and stand on the wall. Reisen was sweating and had her eyes on other way as you were sitting on the bed stairing at her.

"What were you doing reisen!?" you asked

"I..Ah...I was checking on you!" Reisen said.

You had high doubts about that as she was looking the other way. You slowly got out of the bed to walk toward her until she noticed you getting up and rushed toward you and pushed back to the bed. You felt the pain from the shoulder as reisen immediatly put you under the blanket, you immediatly noticed her eyes becoming more insan looking.

"Don't get ok? I will treat you to the fullest." Reisen said.

"Reisen, what are-"

Before you could finish, she put her finger on your lips shushing you. You saw her grinning, revealing her rows of white teeth at you. You clearly noticed she was in complete insanity. She giggled little and then spoke to you with soft word.

"Hush hush, Mr.Whitestone. It's getting late and I will give you comftorable sleep." Reisen said, "And after that, you will having comfy stay days in and out!"

You were afraid by this and she grabbed your pjs and ripped it off, showing your upper body.

"Reisen, what are you doing?" you said.

"You might need a good night and having fun is best way!" Reisen said.

You knew what she would do: to have some...fun time with you! She then slithered her right hand down and touched your theigh. You were beginning to feel disturbed by this bunny girl and once she drooled little, she grinned again.

"I will now make you feel good!" Reisen said.

"NOO!!" you shouted.

Before she could even start, a syringe were stabbed on reisens neck. You looked at the entrance and saw both eirin and anna standing. Anna was disturbed by what she saw and eirin sighed as you saw reisen paralyzed by the syringe (some sort of drug injected?). Eirin immediatly came to you and got reisen off of you, then anna rushed toward reisen, grabbed her and slammed on the wall dispite her pain from the burn.

"What the fuck are you doing with my little brother, you fucking lunatic?" anna asked. "Having an early death wish!?"

"I-I-I-I'm so sorry!! My little disorder kicked in and-"

Before she could finish, anna pulled out her customed magnum and shoved it her face.

"Fuck your disorder, bunny! I should shoot you now!!" anna shouted in rage.

You clearly remember anna being very protective to you. When you were in the lefay gang, she beat the shit out of the member who teases you, warning them to not to come close to you. Eirin splited the two apart and turned to anna.

"Ms.Whiterock. I know your angry but please calm down. I don't want your wound to be worsen." Eirin said.

Anna were still in rage but knew what she was talking about. She then turned to you and walked toward you, then stopped infront of you. You could tell her anger was dying down but still annoyed, then touched your cheek.

"You alright, little bro? did that piece of shit harmed you?" Anna asked.

"N-no anna. Everything is ok." You replied.

She sighed in relief and got off from you and turned around. She walked pass eirin and looked at reisen and glared at her.

"Do something like this again, bunny. And I'll make sure I'll make rabbit stew out of you." Anna said, "Good night."

She went back to her room and eirin turned to your attention. You could tell she was tired and stressed out, then put hand cuffs on reisens wrists while she was slightly feared by the threat by your sis.

"I'll take care of the rest. Sorry for the rude awakening, and good night." Eirin said.

"No problem." You replied.

They both left and you layed back on the bed, resuming in your sleep. Next morning came and once you got up, you noticed the sun were already up in the sky. You yawned once you stretched, someone knocked the door.

"Come in." You said.

The door opened, and eirin came in with tray of food. It was pancakes, fruit and a glass of milk. You thanked her as you asked eirin where anna was. She replied that anna already left the building, not telling her where she was going. You were worried about anna, but you also knew she was a strong women like your mother who never knew. As you took one bite of the pancake, eirin took clapped her hands and a shorter bunny girl came in with desert eagle and 12 packs of bullets.

"Anna told me to give you this mr.whitetaker." eirin said.

She then nodded to the little bunny girl, she handed to you. You remember that you liked handguns, and you always wanted desert eagle for present. You couldn't believe actually getting one. You then remember about last night, and put the gun on the side table.

"Say Ms.Eirin..what happened to reisen?" you asked.

"Well...for what she did last night, she is punished." eirin answered.

"What kind is it?" You asked.

She answered..
111312121.title: Crazy rabbit

choices: ...a tv show... starring an old associate of yours!
1113121211.content:
"We've put her in the..." Eirin hesitated for a few seconds to finish the answer, "... happy chair."
"Happy chair?" you tilted your head in curiosity. Yep, you actually do those cutesy expressions.
Despite your cutesyness, Eirin's face went a little red as she explained, "It's sort of a special device that ensures maximum restraint for youkai up to a thousand times the strange of the average human being."
"Youkai?"
"Long story," sadly, the doctor wasnt in the mood to feed THAT part of your curiosity, "anyways, as the patient is put in the happy chair, we sedate said patient with quite a large amount of sedatives which subdues their unruly outrageous behavior and gives them a sense of euphoria for at least a few hours. Not to worry, Mr. Whitestone. Ms. Udongein Inaba will not be a threat to you nor anyone else for quite a while."

Geez. That was quite a mouthful. Then again, some hospitals could use 'happy chairs' to deal with certain patients that are too outrageous for their own good. If only there were enough happy chairs in the world to fix the Fey!

"Once again, I am very sorry about my assistant," Eirin apologized, "she's not always this way. She is really very kind, trustworthy, and friendly to most everyone here. P..perhaps she just didnt take as much of her medicine as I specifically told her to. Again." Oh, 'again'?
"It's alright," you assure her, "water under the bridge as far as I'm concerned. Heck, if I wasnt sore, I'd probably say I was flattered she wanted to mount me!" Why in Masakado's name did you just say that?!

Luckily, the worst you got from that stupid remark was Dr. Yagokoro rolling her eyes uncomfortably, "Yeah... well anyways, you dont have to be worried about the others. If any of the other rabbit girls begin to act odd around you, please dont resort to shooting them. Simply tickle them behind the ears. That usually calms them down!"
"Rabbit girls?"
"Another long story!" Eirin groaned, "anyways, you still have some of Reisen's green tea left over in the fridge. If you'd like me to throw it out-"
"No, it's fine," you tell her, "I like green tea." And even if it was drugged, it'd probably only ease your stress over being a refugee!
"Ok, if that's what you wish," she reluctantly said, "if you'll excuse me, I'm going to clean your sister's wounds then I'm gonna be doing my rounds. Feel free to use the call button if you need anything."
"Thank you, doctor," you thanked her, "and I cant thank you enough for helping my sister. She's been through quite a bit. Our old boss did not like her... not as much as me, anyway." Whether or not Ms. Fey liking you more was a good thing or bad thing would remain a mystery that you had no interesting in solving!

"You have nothing to worry about anymore, Mr. Whitestone," she said with an assuring smile, "now eat up. Your breakfast is getting cold." And with that, your doctor left the room, leaving you all by your lonesome in your somewhat cozy hospital room. Despite not having much of an appetite, you scarfed down your pancakes and drank your milk. Fruit wasnt part of your balanced breakfast.

As you ate in awkward silence, you cant get what happened last night out of your head. Understandable, but not for the reasons that should be. You honestly believe you dont have that long to live. Youre deemed a traitor to the most historically renown mafia in existence, so you might as well start writing up your will with whatever little time you got. You'll never experience getting married, having children, you wont even get to know 'true love' outside of what those stupid Pixies loved to blab about.

Perhaps you shouldve let Reisen have her way with you. At least you wouldnt have to die a virgin. Then again, if you got her pregnant, your kid would be the next in line to inherit your former position. Stupid blood contract.
For all you knew, ogres could be marching toward this hospital right about now. For all you knew, that bunny girl that brought you your gun could be in cahoots with the Bogle brothers. For all you knew, Eirin could probably be on the phone calling up Agent Trips C. Urisk and telling him your exact location. ANYTHING was possible!

"C'mon man! Get a grip!" you tried to assure yourself as you put your gun away in a little drawer, "she's not friggin God! She aint gonna find you, otherwise she'd have already found you by now! Youre safe. Youre safe. You are safe." You kept repeating those words to yourself until your heart rate finally lowered to a normal beat.

"I need to take my mind off all this," you say to yourself just before conveniently finding the remote for your room tv. Being of the millions of millions of people out there that firmly believe tv is a great escape from reality, you grab the remote and turn on the tv to see...
1113121211.title: The End is Nigh

..A news anchores with the word 'top news' behind them. You wondered what it was then the male anchor spoke.

"The major story this morning. Last night 200 bodies of dead gang members were found at the new york park. Police theorised that it was the Le Fey gangs who were behind the crime." Anchor said.

You began to have massave headache. You were chased down by the Le Fey and now this! You were glad that both you and anna were not part of that massacre! Then the view changed from the news room to the park where the massacre happened. The news reporter who were aroudn 6'3" Tall, blond caucasian women with brown eyes stood with good work cloth on and a mike.

"Yes, last night there was a gruesome murder right here at the new york park. 200 people, who wer all mens were brutally murdered and then got there head cut off. The officials and the polices theoriesd that it was the Le Fey gangs who were behind this massacre as they are one of the most deadliest gangs to be known." Reporter said.

The report continued and you had enough of it, so you turned off the tv. You laid back to get this headache off until a phone rang. You looked around and saw the desk, and once you opened the drawer you saw a cellphone ringing. You wondered how the cellphone came into the place, then you remembered that you had one and you put it away in the dark corner. Once you flipped the phone up, you saw your sisters name on the screen and you got the call.

"Anna?" You spoke.

"Hey bro. wassup?" Anna asked.

"I'm fine. I just saw a news saying that new york police found 200 gang mens dead." You replied.

There was an awkword silence for moment and then anna spoke up.

"I guess Le Fey found way to kill off one of the minor american gang wannabee." Anna said.

You had reoccurence that if anybody, major gangs or minor gangs, pisses her off there would be a hell to pay for them. Heck, last year one of the gang leader dared to threat the Le Fey leader, only to realised they signed their own death wish as 24 hours later their whole gang were annihilated. "Say sis, where are you right now?" You asked.

"Why?" You asked.

"Who knows if this phone call is bugged or not. Besides I don't think-"

'RAAWWRR!! I'M GONNA EAT YOU!!!'

You heard an young girl voice. you wondered who this girl were then you heard your sis speaking.

'Not now, Lady flandre, I'm furrently busy speaking to my younger brother.'

'Oh come on, Anna! your very entertaining!'

'I will play with you more after this phone call, so please wait just for minute.'

'Muuu..fine. I'll wait..'

"*sigh* Anyway, I will be busy hiding my hide with my friend. Be safe and be strong, ok little bro?" anna said.

"Alright..by the way, who's this flan person?" You asked.

"Um....my friends friend." Anna said, "now then, talk to you later."

She then hanged up the phone. You sighed and hanged up the phone as well, and once you laid back, you noticed someone knocking the door. You shouted that the door was open and once it was open, it revealed..

"I...I'm sorry." You said, "My name's-"

you nodded and kaguya smiled. You didn't know what she was going to do then you wondered how she knows about anna. You then asked her how she knows about anna.

you nodded and was about to tal until...
111312121111.title: Meeting princess

choices: Tell her youre not up for it.
1113121211112.content:
"Princess! You forgot to take your vagina pills again!"
Kaguya suddenly jumped from hearing the rather young high-pitched voice of the small kid-sized blacked haired girl in a pink dress with a little carrot tied around her neck and dare I say it, bunny ears. Of course, bunny ears. That appears to be the major theme with the majority of the girls here, doesnt it?

But that wasnt as much of an issue as what's currently going on. Kaguya glared at the twerp in anger.
"TEWI!!" she shouted, "what do I always tell about MY patient confidentiality?!"
"Oh, that you dont want other people to know about your vagina problems?" Tewi answered in such a carefree tone, "dont worry, I never tell anybody about those bad bugs in your cooch!" Holy shnikeyz! Kaguya's blood was boiling! Not that you could blame her. You probably shouldnt be hearing this!

"WHY YOU LITTLE TROLL!" she was clenching her fists at the bunny kid, "after all that money MY father puts into this place, THIS is how you show your respect?!"
"Whoa whoa whoa, take it easy!" you try to cool her down, "she's just a kid, you know how they get."
"Tewi Inaba is not a kid," Kaguya angrily stated, "she's an even older hag than Eirin!" Your eyes narrowed.

"Hey, watch your mouth, brat," Tewi put her hands to her hips and pouted in a cutesy expression, "I used to be the one that changed her diapers back when you were a little crybaby with no bowel control!" Man, Tewi was merciless. Anyways, if what Kaguya was saying is true, that's awfully impressive how someone like her managed to stay looking young for so long. Then again, youre pretty sure a LOT of your former co-workers were a lot older than they looked. specifically, boss lady!

As you tried to cool down Kaguya's urge to commit child(like) abuse, Tewi turned her attention to you.
"Oh! You must be Alexander Whitestone," she had already known your name, "the new guy Reisen tried to ka-boink last night!" Your eyes narrowed again. That did not sound right coming from a kid(?)! "Sorry about her. She likes to skip on her meds every once in a while."
"Er... no... problem?" it didnt take long to make the conversation uncomfortable.
"Anyways, I'm Tewi Inaba," she introduced herself, "I'm the head of the rabbit youkai here in Eientei, not to mention the oldest and most adorable employee here!" She gave a cutesy smile to match. You didnt take notice, cuz the words 'Rabbit Youkai' were making you think.

"Nice to meet you, Tewi," you humbly greeted her.
"Not nearly as nice as it is to meet YOU," Tewi gave what you really REALLY hoped wasnt a pervy smirk, " 's about time we finally get a strapping male around here. This place is a real taco fest!" Kaguya face's wet red and she facepalmed.
"Heheh..." you laughed nervously, trying to keep a straight face. Unfortunately, the loli-bait still kept talking!
"Seriously, there is nothing but girls in this hospital," she explained, "the vast majority of my species are female and our male birth rate is extremely low, so we're slowly and surely becoming endangered."
"Oh, that's terrible."
"Yep," then Tewi's pervy smirk came back on her face, "so ya better brace yourself when word gets out to the other girls that we got a guy here!” Here’s hoping tickles behind the ears are their bunny-kryptonite!

“Will you PLEASE leave already, you annoying loud-mouthed munchkin?!” Kaguya was getting incredibly sick of her. Cant blame her.
Tewi rolled her eyes, “Alright alright, Princess Crab-panties. I just came here to give you your special pill of the day.” She handed Kaguya a pill and a glass of watch which she reluctantly swallowed. “Now if you’ll excuse me, I gotta go switch Eirin’s birth control pills with Sweet Tarts again. Welcome to the family, Alex!”
“Th… thank you,” you nervously thanked her as she walked off, leaving you with a disgruntled Kaguya having a hard time properly venting her rage.

“Don’t be ashamed,” you try to comfort her, “my mom had a… disease of her own. And yet despite that, me and my sis still came to be!”
Kaguya was still upset, but at least she was able to keep her composure, “I’m sorry about HER. Not all of the damn rabbits here are like her… but a lot of them are!”
You bit your lip and asked, “Any of them willing to drop dimes on certain criminal organizations?”
“Not unless they desire to be rabbit stew!” was the perfect enough answer for you, “I have an incredibly high bounty on my head on accounts of certain things I really regret doing… despite Tewi's awfully wide mouth of hers, NONE of those rabbits dare reveal my location cuz they know what Daddy will do to them!” Translation: Snitches get stitches. “Not to mention, some of the girls here don’t have entirely innocent records either. “ Oh. So you don’t have to live like a fugitive alone, huh?

“Whatever you and your sister have done then,” she looked you right in the eye and said, “will not follow you here.” Maybe you should learn to start trusting people again. Maybe Le Fey isn’t as omnipotent as they claim to be. Besides, according to that news report, it seems they’d rather be busy devouring other phony gangs and criminal syndicates than hunt you down to your last breath! If they were still interested, the news report would involve your friends and family being shook up by those bastards instead of street scum!

“Speaking of which, there’s still a bit of free time before lunch,” Kaguya hopped up off your bed, “would you care to join me in one of my favorite past times of anonymity? World of Warcraft?”

Other were a tall man with short black hair, tanned skin and a butlers cloth. He was annas friend, and she always called him arnold as he had some resemblence to arnold schwarzenegger.

They then stopped and went into the room. The room were throne room, and they both knelt before the girl who were sitting on the chair. It was a blue haird girl with pink dress and hat, and it had a bat wing on her back while the maid with grey hair stood next to her. She was remilia scarlet, the vampire who rules the mansion and the maid was Izayoi Sakuya, her personal maid. Arnold were found here first and was placed as employee butler, and when he scouted anna she became the personal maid for remilias younger sister Flandre Scarlet.

"How is Flan? is she doing well?" Remilia asked.

"She is growing interest in me, lady scarlet." Anna replied.

"Hm...and how about meiling?" remilia asked arnold.

"She is still kinda uptight with me, but we get along." Arnold replied.

She made 'hmph' noise and then told sakuya to make some tea for the two. She understood and once she left, remilia ordered the two to stand up. Once they did, remilia stood up and came to the two with smile.

"I know you two are in troubled time...hell, even annas brother is hiding in that bamboo forest." Remilia said, "Fear not, as I and the rest of the scarlet mansion members will keep you two safe."

"Thank you, lady scarlet." anna replied.

"Good...well then...umm..anna?" Remilia asked.

Anna looked at her and noticed her blushing. Anna just smild and spreaded her arms, knowing what would come next. Remilia smiled and then jumped onto anna and clutched on her tight. Dispite the pain, anna endured it so remilia could have some time with her.

"Uu~, this IS fun!" Remilia said, "But are you ok? I know your hurt with that burn.."

"Don't worry, lady scarlet. I just need an hour of hydrotherapy, thats all." Anna replied.

"Ehehe.." Remilia replied.

Just then, both sakuya and the girl with a blond hair and red dress came in. It was flandre, remilias sister, were getting jealous that remilia were hugging on her. She rushed toward her and hugged her from the back.

"Your not taking my anna oneesama!" Flandre said.

"She's for everyone flan!" Remilia said.

They both argued and sakuya came next to arnold with smile. She gave one cup to him and poured some tea to him, and he thanked back to her.

"You have fun time, do you?" Arnold said.

"It's always a fun day." Sakuya replied, "By the way, lady patchoulie needs your attention."

"Understood." Arnold replied.

He took few sips of tea and gave the cup to her and went while anna kept busy with the twin sister.

-eientei-

At eientei, both you and kaguya were in one of the dungeon mission that had one of the powerful weapon. Your character continued to beat the enemy down while kaguya supported your character with the powerful offensive magic. It was surprisingly great and once you two defeated the boss, you two got the good amount of money and the weapon, giving you two the high five.

"That was awsome!" kaguya said.

"IT was. You replied.

"Lets now go to the next mission!" She said.

You nodded and was about to do the next mission until...
11131212111121.title: Enter worldcraft

111312121111212.content:
...A knock were made. You and kaguya turned and saw eirin coming in with a tray. You two knew it was time for lunch and she came to you. Kaguya sighed as she logged off the game and as you did the same, you two put the computer down. Kaguya then turned to eirin with some smile.

"Did you had fun princess?" Eirin asked.

"Oh yes, he is fun person to be around." Kaguya replied, "By the way, what are we having for lunch?"

Eirin opened the tray and showed both you and kaguya an omlette stuffed with rice. You remember eating this once or twice when you were with the Le Fay gang as anna liked it. Kaguya were happy and eirin told her the table were ready and kaguya nodded then turned to you.

"Lets play more warcraft after lunch, ok?" Kaguya spoke.

"Princess..he's one of the patient. I don't think-"

"I don't mind eirin." You interrupted her.

She sighed and told you she and the rest of eienteis crew will have lunch and she'll return within hour. You understood and she told you if you needed something, just call out. You nodded and the two ladies left the patients room. You rested little and looked at the food, not having enough appetite, you would save it for later then lay down on the bed to get some rest until you heard someones stomach growling. You looked at the window and saw a brown haired girl with red/white cloth, green hat and a cat ears and tails.

"Umm..are you alright?" you asked.

She didn't say anything, but just stairing. You wondered what she was staring then you traced her eyes toward your food. You clearly understands now that this girl was hungry as you noticed her drool was coming out.

"..Do you want it?" you asked.

"A..are you sure?" Girl asked.

"Hey, I'm offering." you answered.

She then came in through the window and came to your area. You helped her get onto the bed and lowered the table to her side. She thanked you and started to eat the food. You noticed she was enjoying the food, and you wondered who this girl were.

"Um..who are you?" you asked.

The cat girl swallows the food she was chewing and drank some water.

"I'm chen. Nice to meet you." She replied with smile, "And what's yours?"

"I'm Alex." You answered with smile.

"Heehee, cool name." Chen replied.

You blushed little by her smile and then she continued to munch on the food. After 20 minutes, she finished the food and petted her stomach. You were glad at least seeing other eating something.

"Say um..chen? why are you here?" You asked.

"I was told by tewi chan that a new patient were here." Chen replied, "So I wanted to meet this new patient. Are you the one?"

You nodded and then she she smiled. She came close to you and then once she stopped, she spoke to you with little blush.

"Um..alex? I have a favor to ask.." chen asked.

"and that is?" You asked.

She then put her cap down, revealing her full head.

"Would you please..pet my head?" Chen asked.
111312121111212.title: Lunch time

1113121211112121.content:
You had to think about it. For a whole 0.00005 seconds. Petting a cat... er, cat-girl was always ALWAYS a good way to relieve stress! The more stress relief, the better! So without even a second thought, you rubbed your hand across Chen's head!

Chen actually shivered with glee from the touch. She constantly nuzzled her head against your hand as you stroked her hair. You could seriously hear her purring from your affection!
Also like a cat, she tensed up with you scratched her behind the ears. Both her tails wagged with ecstasy as she practically lost herself in your pettings.
Despite keeping a straight face, inside you were going “DAWWWWWW!’ like you were petting a real adorable cute kitten. Heck, she was adorable, you actually picked her up and held her in your arms as you pet her! She not only purred like a kitten, she squeaned like a little girl!
You remembered last minute about the pain in your back, only to realize the pain wasnt happening. You feel just fine!

Ok maybe you got a little carried away. But it was probably cuz you never had pets.
Sadly you never had a pet, mainly cuz your dad had this bizarre believe that most pets had connections with members of the Fey that could communicate with them. Hell, he kept bug repellant all over the place cuz he thought the Fey trained BUGS to spy on their lackies!

Shame. You honestly wanted a cat. You weren’t a dog type. You preferred cats cuz they were typically laid back, calming, easy-going, and despite being a little hyperactive once in a while, were very patient. A type of pet you could get used to.
And so far, Chen was the closest you had to that kind of pet…

It wasn’t until Chen suddenly flinched and almost scratched you by accident that you realized the third person in the room. The bunny girl.

The red-eyed bunny girl.

The red-eyed bunny girl that tried to mount you last night.

REISEN! Already out of the Happy Chair, eh?

As you tried your best to keep your poker-fest going, Chen was not as strong-willed. You could feel her trembling under Reisen’s glowing red-eyed stare. Although Reisen’s barely surprised stare didn’t seem threatening to you, it seemed to spook Chen pretty good. Then again, it’s probably cuz she’s already used to the kind of ‘patient’ this bunny-girl is!

“H-H-H-Hi, Ms. Udongein Inaba!” Chen quickly hopped off you and bowed.
“Hi Chen,” Reisen nonchalantly greeted her, “I see you met our new patient, Alex.”
“Y-y-y-yes! That’s right! Met! Just met! That‘s all!” Chen for some reason emphasized, “a-and now that I’m done meeting Alex, I’d better go catch up to Tewi! Nice meeting you, Alex!”
“Nice meeting you too, Chen!” you said as she made a dash out of the room. And then it was just you and Reisen.

You know you shouldn’t be thrilled to see her since what happened last night, yet you dont feel you should call up Eirin yet. Keep your guard up, but dont assume the worst.

“Hey Reisen,” you say as you inch toward the drawer with your gun in it.
“Hi Alex,” she lowered her head and put her hands behind her back. Even her ears dropped to match her slightly embarrassed expression.

“I see youre out of the Happy Chair,” you commented.
“Yeah…” she said uncomfortably as she tapped the collar around her neck, “with a little… parting gift.”
“Nice collar,” you compliment.
She kept her head low as she corrected you, “Nice… SHOCK collar.”

The you in your mind let out a gasp as you continued looking unphased. She just said she’s wearing a shock collar. Not exactly something HUMANS are meant to be wearing (then again, she aint human, so maybe YOUR standards don’t apply to her!)
“Sh…shock collar?”
Reisen nodded, “Master ordered me to wear it for the rest of the day. She says if I so much as touch you, I’ll get electrocuted.” WOW.
“Yikes!” that shattered your unphased façade like a brick through your window, “that’s a bit harsh!”

“Master knows best,” the ill bunny girl admitted, before finally unloading, “Mr. Whitestone! I’m very VERY sorry about what I did last night! I don’t know what came over me, but what I did was inexcusable. I couldve hurt you or worse! Please forgive me, Mr. Whitestone. Y-Your sister isn’t still here, is she?!”

“No, she’s currently at a friend of hers,” you answered, “and dont worry. It’s alright, I’m fine. I know, uh, accidents happen.”
“That wasnt an accident,” Reisen said with shame, “that was my failure to quell my own illness. But you have my word! I’m gonna work twice as hard to fix up! I’ll double or triple my prescription intake if I have to! I’ll do whatever it takes to make sure you dont see that horrible side of me again! I’ll also do whatever to takes to make sure you don’t see my Nightmare Mode either.-EEP!!!”

Again, she twitched in shock like she just blurted something she absolutely shouldnt have!
“Nightmare Mode?” unfortunately for her, your ears were burning.
“N-no, no! It’s.. nothing!”
“What’s a Nightmare Mode?”
“It’s… not really anything you have to worry about,” she was an abysmal liar, “it’s just a tiny little iddy biddy unnoticeable phase I tend to go through every once in a full red moon.” That vague revelation only wanted you to know about it more. Not that you were quick to question her about it, though. Reisen was feeling miserable enough.

"Anyways, you dont need to be too upset about last night," you assure her, "had I not been wounded, I'd have been flattered that you were interested in me. It's not everyday I get glomped by a cute nurse!"
"I'm... not really a nurse," Reisen said despite her cheeks were flush, "um, speaking of, I noticed you were able to carry Chen in your arms with no problems. Does that mean youre not hurting so much anymore?"
"I'm not hurting at all!" you rotated your shoulders and stretched out to prove your point, "there's no ache or soreness or anything! And I havent taken any painkillers at all since I first woke up in his hospital!"

"Great! Great!" Reisen beamed, "in that case, there's still a bit of free time before dinner. If you'd like I could take you on a tour of Eientei! Since you'll be here for a while, you could use a decent guide to show you around." She was just about to take your hand but flinched back only centimeters away from coming in contact! (just barely sparing the electrocution!) "Err... if that's alright with you!"
1113121211112121.title: Spared from the Chair

11131212111121211.content:
You nodded, wanting to know the details of what eientei offers. You took the offer and got off from the bed. You felt wobbly and was about to fall until reisen catched you. She felt the shock from the shock collar, but she endured it and helped you get up.

"Th-thanks, reisen." You thanked her.

*cough* no problem, alex." Reisen replied, coughing.

Both you and reisen got to the stance and went out of the room to let you get know more about the area. Luckly for you, reisen showed you nearly everywhere that she could show. You seen rooms from patients room, kitchen, living room and so forth. You were getting to know more about this place until you heard someones voice.

"Die, you fucking princess!!!"

"Bite me, asshole!!!"

You obviously knew one of the voice belonged to kaguya, but you didn't know the other voice.

"Oh, ms.mokou is here again.." Reisen said.

"Mokou?" You asked.

"She's princess's rival for while." Reisen answered.

You were becoming intrigued by this and went out to see what was going on. Reisen told you not to but since you didn't, she followed you for the protection purpose. Onec you got outside, you saw many colorful bullets spraying through the air and on ground. You looked up and saw kaguya floating firing against a long white haired girl with red pats and white shirt.

"This time, I'll beat you to death!!!" White haired girl shouted.

"Ha! We both can't die so you're making yourself stupid mokou!!" Kaguya shouted.

"GRRR!! YOU DAMN SNOB!" mokou shouted.

They both gotten ready to attack and many bullets were sprayed more. Many bullets flew toward you, and luckly knew how to dodge them. Reisen wanted to help but if she touch you, she'll be shocked again. As you dodged more, the bullet stopped and the two girls were panting little.

"Give up, mokou. You know you'll lose." Kaguya said.

"Never." Mokou replied, "Lets end this."

They got their spellcard and attacked both. You knew something was wrong so you dashed toward the entrance until the fire that came from mokou and the rainbow bullet from kaguya shot both of your legs. You screamed in pain as you fell, you immediatly put the fire out with the bucket full of water that happened to be next to the entrance. Both girls noticed your scream and immediatly stopped the fighting. Reisen immediatly went in to get eirin to help you out. You felt pain from this and both girls came to you.

"Oh no, oh no!!! I'm so sorry!!" KAguya said, then turned to mokou "If you didn't shot that fire, he'll would have been fine!"

"me!? you shot that rainbow bullet!" Mokou replied.

You really getting annoyed by this argument and then reisen came out with eirin. She saw the burn mark and she immediatly picked you up then turned to kaguya and mokou.

"I shall talk to you two later." Eirin said.

She then took you in and went into the emergency room. She immedialty took out the pain killer and injected it on your leg. Once done, she took out some sort of bowl filled with green goo in it. She quickly got brush and put the goo on the wounded area. You felt no pain but you felt tired and went to sleep.

How long you passed out?
11131212111121211.title: Tour time

111312121111212111.content:
You woke up from the unconciousness and saw reisen sitting next to you. She noticed your waking and gave you a great smile. She wanted to hug you, but because of the shock collar, she couldn't touch you.

"I'm glad you're awake, alex!" Reisen said, "Are you alright?"

"Yeah." You replied, "What happened when I passed out?"

Reisen explained to you that your legs have more time to heal as it was pretty bad. She even told you both kaguya and mokou would be punished severely for endangering the patient by giving them butt slap 50 times each and putting them on the happy chair. You understood eirins intention, but it was still kinda bad for the two for being on the chair. You looked at your legs and bandages were wrapped on and there were few blood stains on. You sighed at least you were still alive, then eirin came in with frown.

"I apologize for what both kaguya and mokou done to your legs, mr.whitestone." Eirin said, "Because of them, your wounds will be longer to heal."

"It's alright eirin. At least I'm alive." You responded.

"That's good to hear." Eirin replied.

Before she could even talk, both you and eirin heard reisen making some sort of choking noise. She was holding her hands on her neck and knelt down with heavy breathing as if she couldnt' breath.

"Reisen!? are you alright!?" Eirin spoke.

"Gu..Gaa..GAA!?!?" reisen gagged.

You felt an sudden fear in your heart as eirin tried to calm the crazy rabbit, she then screamed high making eirin jump back. You jumped little as well, and 5 seconds later reisen stood up with her red eyes glowing. Your fear grew more then she clutched the shock collar and broke it easly. Eirin and you were shocked by this and reisen staired at you.

"Nice seeing you again...little shit." Reisen spoke.

"Rei..sen?" eirin spoke softly.

You quickly realised what happened: Le Fay used her power to communicate using a host! You don't know how she managed to use reisen but you showed no fear.

"Ms..Le Fay." You spoke.

"Ha! I knew you ran off to somewhere more...obsecure area." Le Fay spoke, "I'm so glad your still alive...so I could slowly kill you."

You feared she would say such quote, then she spoke up again.

"Hehe..but don't you worry now, little shit. I have some business taking care in this world." Le Fay spoke, "After I eradicate the rest of the petty gangs, I will enjoy killing you first while letting your tough sis anna see your Torture."

"You..you knew she's alive!?" You asked.

Le Fay continued to smile and quickly got on top of you, putting her hand on your throat as eirin summoned her arrow and pointed at Le Fay. She continued to smile and then spoke to you.

"Have you not forgot that once your in my family, the blood of the kins have special power." Le Fay said, "That includes cheating death...Longer life, and so forth."

You gulped, and she got off from you. She snickerd and then turned her attention to eirin.

"And as for you...since I have borrowed your little bunny girl, I shall curse her blood with my...blessing." Le Fay said, "Until then...take care of this traitor until I meet again."

She closed her eyes and left the scene. Eirin put the bow away and then once reisen opened her eyes, she breathed fast.

"M-master eirin! alex! Are you two alright!?" Reisen asked.

"I think that's our question reisen." Eirin said.

Reisen gotten depressed little and then touched her neck. She quickly realised that her shock collar was gone and once she looked down, the collar were there broken. She was happy but depressed as well.

"*sigh* I can't believe something like happen." Eirin said.

"I know." You replied, "I'm more shocked to hear that."

You then remembered that le fay was talking about your big sis. You wanted to call her in case if she was ok, but you feared that le fay would be there in no time.

Would you call your sis?
111312121111212111.title: Horror of fay

choices: Explain to her that she's cursed.
1113121211112121111.content:
You need to call her. Now that your old boss knows that not only are you still alive, but so is your sis. You have to warn her. Besides, there's no one else you can tell at this point. The authorities cant help. Your dad was IN the authorities and they couldnt save him!
You pulled your cellphone out of the drawer and called up your sis, hoping they didnt bug the phone.

Her phone rang.

And it rang.

And it rang.

"C'mon, Anna! Pick up!" you whispered with your fingers crossed. But it rang. "Damn it, Anna! Pick up your fucking phone!"

"HELLO. NO ONE IS AVAILABLE TO TAKE YOUR CALL." You groaned at the sound of her pre-set automated answering machine. She didnt even have the common courtesy to record her own voice. "PLEASE LEAVE A MESSAGE AFTER THE TONE." *Beep!*

"Anna, it's me!" you have no choice but to leave a message, "you need to call me back ASAP! Maeve knows I'm here! And she knows youre still alive! Hurry Anna!" And you hang up, hoping she'll get the message... and that you werent too late.
Youre pretty sure youre not too late. She's a damn good survivor. And even if you are too late, Maeve aint gonna hurt Anna. She said she'd rather make her watch you die.

Looks like you got no choice but worry about yourself at the moment. As well as those around you. Reisen’s now vulnerable thanks to you. Question is, HOW did she end up vulnerable?

“Reisen?” you turn to the ill bunny girl, “did you talk to anybody recently?”
Reisen tilted her head question as her ears curled, “What do you mean?”
“You somehow miraculously managed to impersonate my old ex-employer,” you told her, “that couldnt have happened out of sheer random! How do you know Ms. Le Fey?”
“Ms La… who?” she raised her eyebrow at you, “what impersonation? What are you talking about?”

“Do you even remember what just happened between now and when you started choking?” Eirin asked.
Reisen shook her head, “I remember feeling like the collar got a hundred times tighter… that’s all.” Well this is a problem. She doesn’t even remember the sudden possession nor does your boss’s name ring a bell to her. You had to come up with possible ways for the Fey to get in contact with her.

“Eirin, was Reisen seriously restrained in the happy chair the whole time?” you asked.
She nodded with certainty, “Absolutely. Like I said before, there’s no way she could’ve broken out.”
“Was anybody else in there with her during that time?”
“Maybe a fellow nurse or two,” she said, “but we have cameras. And I‘m always watching the cameras. ALWAYS.” That sounded a little creepy. But anyways, that weeds out one possibility. If she hasn’t come in contact with Le Fey, perhaps she’s been drugged? That so-called ‘fairy dust’ she sells to the cartels is known to provide a hell of a buzz… almost close to possession.

“What about the medicine you used on her?” you asked the doc, “have you changed any of it recently?”
Eirin shook her name, “Nope. We make the medicine ourselves and we’ve been buying our herbs and medicinal components from the same suppliers for years.” But then Eirin lifted her chin and made a thinking pose, “You know… come to think of it, there was a delay in our shipment of menthol leaves last week and the supplier never said why.” Red flag.

“This is just a suggestion and you dont have to take it,” you say, remembering your place before you suggest, “but I would recommend asking your supplier more about the delay. If they seem shady or suspicious, just tell them your kids could use some more ‘pixie stix’.”
“But I don’t have ki-” her eyes widened as she got your hidden meaning, “oh. Oh! OHHH! Oh dear! TEWI!!” she suddenly shouted, “START WHIPPING UP AS MANY DETOX DRINKS AS YOU CAN! I NEED TO MAKE AN IMPORTANT CALL!” And with that, the doc dashed out of the room faster than an electronic rabbit!

Once again, you find yourself alone with Reisen, who seemed to be poking you then flinching back, probably scared she was gonna get another shock despite the collar being destroyed.
You'd ask her to stop it, but you noticed a look of panic on her face.
"What's happening to me?" Reisen questioned, "what's gonna happen to me? Did I just get poisoned? Am I gonna die?"

"Youre gonna be fine, Reisen," you assure her though deep down you were unsure, "it's no big deal."
"No big deal? No big deal?! I was suffocating!!" she suddenly snapped, "I honestly couldnt breath and the next thing I know, you all act like I was possessed or something! Am I possessed? Am I gonna die?!" She had every right to panic. The Fey not only have tabs on her but are now using her against her will and doesnt completely realize it yet. Youre not sure if they'll end up hurting her, but you do believe as long as youre still alive and a-ok, they cant afford to hurt her.

"C'mon! Please stop looking at me in silence like that!" Reisen got a bit paranoid, "if you know something, please tell me! What has just happened to me?!"
She wanted answers. But you dont know how she'll take the truth that Maeve had cursed her and you got no idea what it'll do to her! If you had to guess, youre sure she'll flip out. And considering she's already ill to begin with, bad things could come from it.
But if you keep quiet about it or lie to her, who knows what kinds of damage Maeve's curse will do to her. Even if Maeve doesnt want Reisen to die, you can bet she could think of other ways to 'mess' with her physically and mentally. And you knew some of the ways the Fey messed with their prey physically and mentally, many you wouldnt wish on your worst enemies!

Should you lie to her or come clean and tell her she's cursed?
1113121211112121111.title: Cuuuuurse! CUUUUUURSE!!!

11131212111121211111.content:
You were hesitant to tell her about the curse, but if you didn't say anything about it she would be in grave danger. You Then calmed her down by telling her to take deep breath and out. Once she did, you told her to sit down and she started to calm down. You were glad that she was calming down then gotten ready to tell her what is going on.

"Listen Reisen. My ex-boss, Maeve LeFay, is well known Female criminal boss in my world. She uses her power to curse anyone who became one of her gang so they could never leave." You explained. "Me and my sister have a cursed blood that passed down by my father. LeFays curse are eternal, and some says her curse is both blessing and evil at the same time."

"Wha...is that true?" Reisen asked, shaking in fear.

"Unfortunatly, yes." You replied, "Once she cursed victims blood, it will never go away."

This made reisen more paranoid and she shook more. She then gazed at you for moment and suddenly she felt her heart skip and opened her eyes wide. In her vision, she saw half of your body covered in blood and half of you face as skull. Her fear grew, then she then screamed in high pitch.

"IYAAAAAA!!!" Reisen screamed.

She got up and pointed her finger at you. You realised the curse started and she summoned the bullet at you, trying to kill you. You were in fear as you couldn't move by the wound, you prayed for god that she wouldn't shoot until someone jumped behind reisen and smacked her neck, causing her to fall down unconciously. The person revealed itself to be chen and she came to you.

"Are you alright, Mr.whitestone?" Chen asked.

"Yes, thanks chen." you replied, "Wheres tewi and others?"

"They are under the treatment that eirin told to give." Chen replied, "What happened here?"

You didn't want to tell her what was going on, so you just told her she passed out. Moment later few bunnys came in and saw reisen on floor, and took her to her own bed room. Chen then told you she have to go home to tell her owners what happened. As she left, you lied down to get some rest and then closed your eyes.

-office-

Eirin finished giving out the last detox medicen to the rabbits and she took some pills to calm herself. As she was going to write the report, she heard some sort of voice. She turned around only to see nobody, and when she turned back she heared again.

"Tewi! stop whispering!!" Eirin shouted.

There were no voice, and eirin wondered why there were no voice. She leaned foreward and looked at the mirror and saw a tall women with long grey hair in kimono standing at the door. She turned around but no one was there, making eirin agitated little.

"What..who was that?" eirin spoke.

Then suddenly..

'Curse will spread through blood, and nothing can stop my curse.'

Eirin shivered and turned back to see the mirror only to find out the figure was gone. She wondered if she left until the same women were next to her, softly touching eirins back, making her shiver in coldness. The tall female giggled and spoke to eirin.

'I will send mad hatter...to make the insanity uproar..'

The female vision then faded away, making eirin breathed harder. She wonderd who that person were and what she ment by 'mad hatter'? she then ordered three rabbits to retreave the teacher in the human village to discuss about this..

Meanwhile...
11131212111121211111.title: cursed vision

111312121111212111111.content:
In the patients room, you were lying down on bed, worried about yourself and reisen. You had many thoughts on what maeve would do to her..or your sister. Just then, the cellphone rang. You quickly picked up the phone and noticed it was from anna. You flipped the phone open put it to your ear.

"Anna? is that you?" you spoke.

"Hey alex." Anna replied.

"I tried to call you, you know that!?" you said.

"I was in the middle of hydrotherapy, so I apologize." anna apologized, "And I've got your message."

You were worried, and anna thought for moment on how maeve managed to find out where they are.

"What should we do anna? She have already possessed reisen and cursed her." you said.

Anna didn't say anything for moment, then she spoke up.

"Maeve might be a tough bitch, but even such power that she have, have a flaw." anna replied.

"Flaw?" You asked.

"Maeve have many ability, but once she possesses a host, she becomes 75% blind due to different demographics and such." Anna explained, "This means, by my theory, she might have seen you and that crazy rabbit but not the whole area."

You sighed in releaf. You then slightly remember one member saying something like that.

"That's a good news." you replied.

"Yes. Anyway, I was ordered by a specific person to go see eientei to pick up some medicine." Anna said, "I'll meet you with within hour."

"Alright." You replied.

You then hanged up the phone. Hour later, you hear someone coming in. It was eirin, who brought anna and....
111312121111212111111.title: call back.

1113121211112121111112.content:
Anna brought an slightly overweighted African-American who wore red shirt and a good jeans. You immediately knew him as he was Marcus Benedict, the guy who once was a top chef for Maeve until he had to quit over an health reason. You were glad to see him as he was one of few people you could trust when you were at the gang.

“Alex? My god, haven’t seen you in a while dog.” Marcus said.

“Glad to see you too Marcus!” You replied.

Anna gruntled little by the burn pain and you noticed it. You asked her if she was ok, but she told you it was fine then turned to Eirin. She dug deep into the pocket and took out a small sheet of paper and gave it to her.

“This is what lady knowledge wants.” Anna said.

She scanned the paper and nodded, telling her she’ll be back. As they waited, Marcus smiled and holded up an box and gave it to you. You didn’t know what’s inside until you smelled something delicious in the box.

“I’ve baked some rum cake for you and your pals man. Eat wisely.” Marcus said.

“Cool, Thanks Marcus!” You replied.

You loved his cooking as when you were hungry he fed you with his home made steaks with mash potatoes one time after the errand Maeve gave you. It was delicious and it was quite addictive when he makes sweets from cakes to sugar cookies. Anna were little worried about the cake but let it slide. After a moment Eirin came back with a bag full of Medicins.

“Here’s the stuff she needs.” Eirin said.

“Alright, Thanks.” Anna replied.

She paid Eirin and both Anna and Marcus was about to go until you stopped them.

“Anna..I’m worried about you. Please stay here.” You said.

There were silence then she turned with half smile.

“Don’t worry about me. I trust the people here to protect you in danger, though somehow Maeve got through.” Anna said.

They then left the scene. Eirin then noticed an pointy ear from Anna and when they were gone, she turned to you.

“Um, mr.whitestone?” Eirin asked.

“Yeah?” You spoke.

11131212111121211112.title: call from sis.

111312121111212111122.content:
You didnt like the worried face the doctor and her tiny little incredibly old helper were giving. The kind of face hinted that they found something out that they didnt like. Like maybe your suspicions were correct.

"So what happened?" you cut the small talk and asked.

"Well, I told them exactly what you told me," Eirin explained, "then they seemed to be in denial until I told them my kids could use more pixie sticks-"
"Which is ridiculous cuz everyone knows she doesnt have kids," Tewi butted in, then whispered way too loud, "SHE'S BARREN. EEEEGGGGHHH!!!" Then Tewi started squealing in pain when Eirin began to squeeze one of her bunny ears a bit too hard!

Pretending you didnt hear that (although feeling sorry for her!), you questioned, "Then what happened?"

"He gave the phone to someone with a voice I didnt recognize," he explained, "claimed he was his new 'supervisor' and tried to sell me a nutrition supplement called 'Aos Sí Lite'." BINGO. Aos Sí Lite. One of Le Fey's more popular 'fairy-dust'-laced drugs they used to sell as a dietary supplement. Guaranteed to lose weight... because it alters the metabolism in far more ways than one.
"You could probably use some," Tewi insisted, "those thighs of yours are showing off a little celluli-EEGGHH!!"

"Yeah, that's..." you took a breath, "a Le Fey tainted product. They definitely got a hold of your supplier, alright." Eirin's eyes widened and gritted her teeth as you continued. "Whatever supplies you bought from them recently, you need to get rid of them. Destroy them."
"D-D-DESTROY THEM?!!" she was freaking out, "ALL OF THEM?!"
You frowned and nodded, "All of them. If a patient so much as smells one of Le Fey's drugs, it could taint them."

"Arrrgghh! Good lord, I...I just got through a really bad shortage and money's really tight!" Eirin began to panic, "I mean, that supply was EVERYTHING we have left! And I cant afford to just replace it all!" Yikes! Did you hear that right? The whole hospital could be filled with Fey poison! Looks like Reisen may be the least of your problems. If Maeve is bored, not even Eientei is a safe haven for you anymore.

"Told ya we shouldnt have wasted all that cash on breast expansion research," you heard Tewi mutter.
Eirin was seriously on the verge of tearing out of her hair, "Ughh... the Emperor's gonna murder me! How am I gonna explain to him I need a loan cuz of a bad deal with the cartel?!” Dang it! You owe her big. As much as you hate, HATE to do this, you have to do what you have to do.

“Hang on Eirin,” you speak up, “my sister’s gonna be coming by later. I can ask her about getting a quick restock of medical supplies She knows people that know people… that steal from people who steal from people.” Yep. Anna knows people that steal from hospitals. Imagine the numbers of lives that youre about to doom because of this suggestion.

Eirin nodded, “Thank you, Alex. Tewi, you did already give everyone their detox drinks, right?"
Tewi sighed, "Yeah... but you know a lot of the girls hate the taste! I cant convince everyone to swallow that crap!"
"Fine! Just make sure the big-risk ones swallow it down. We can handle a few minor-threat freak-outs. Let‘s just pray none of them involve a certain Princess and hated pyro-mancer."
“You want we strap Reisen back to the Happy Chair?” Tewi asked.
Eirin sighed, “She already broke her shock collar. I cant afford to replace another Happy Chair too!” She’s right. It’d probably be useless to try and restrain her if Maeve can break her out of it. But she did say she was too busy with gangs from back home to deal with you. It seems you got time.

“Ms. Le Fey said she wont kill me until she gets rid of a couple of minor-league gangs first,” you explained, “she doesn’t lie. She cant lie.”
“What makes you think that?” Tewi said.
“No, SERIOUSLY,” you continued, “she’s completely incapable of lying. One of the major laws of the Fey is that theyre forbidden from telling lies. They can twist the truth to deceive others, but they cant flat out lie.” Fortunately, humans are exempt from that law... which is why you were able to lie to Reisen. A terrible lie, but perhaps necessary.

“A fairy that still sticks to their traditions, eh?” Eirin said, “that’s both admirable and scary.” She didnt have to remind you. “Well, we’d better double check on Kaguya and Mokou, make sure they havent gone through a similar episode. As for you, your legs are pretty wounded, so I recommended keeping off your feet for a while. If the hurting stops, youre free to walk around for a little bit. Just make sure to give those legs plenty of rest in between and try to refrain from wandering too far or leaving Eientei.”

“I wont,” you assure her, “and thanks again for saving me.”

Eirin smiled and bowed before ushering her head to her little assistant and then the two headed off. As soon as they left, you eyed your bandaged legs. They were still a bloody mess, but they weren’t hurting. You felt virtually no pain from them. Either the medicine Eirin used is really good or just a really good painkiller. It doesn’t look like it was tainted Le Fey crap though, otherwise you’d probably be hallucinating tiny little people with butterfly wings gnawing at your bloody wounds!

You edged to the end of the bed then slowly and carefully put one foot off the bed and gently placed it on the floor. No pain. You then put your other foot on the floor. Still no pain. So far so good. You then slid out of the bed and stood up on your own two feet. Even after taking a couple of steps, no pain was coursing through. Much like with your arm, you had absolutely no trouble walking.

Still, the wounds looked pretty bad. Maybe it’s best to go back in your bed and lie down.

…Eh, maybe after a little more walking. You still had some time to kill until Anna comes.
If you didn’t look at the wounds, you could forget about your injuries as you headed out of your room.
Where do you plan on heading?

She let you go, and went inside to make a quick phone call to the assosiates on the restock of the meds. As you were waiting, you heared someone coming out of the bushes. You looked closely and it was...
