"I missed you, Brother whitestone!" Vivian said.

"Y-yeah, I missed ya too vivian. How did you get here?" You replied.

"Mommy brought me here!" Vivian replied.

So she brought her as well. You thought you would never see this, but at least she was doing ok. After few moment, you come inside to see reisen standing shivering. You then noticed anna standing smiling at her. You remember that she almost shot the poor bunnygirl, and anna spoke up to her.


" 'Sup, bunnygirl. Haven't you done something bad to my bro?" anna asked, "Cause if you did, You know what's going to happen."

"I-I haven't done anything wrong!" Reisen replied with sweat.

"Good." Anna replied.

You decided to talk to...
11131212111121211112222.title: your step-niece

111312121111212111122222.content:
Despite the heartfelt reunion with your sister and your step-niece, you were still feeling awful about lying to Reisen. She has unwittingly become another pawn in your former employment's game and youre not helping her by keeping her in the dark of her fate. Maeve used to comment on how spoiled mortals were with their gift to lie.

"Hey, Anna?" you turned your attention to Anna, finally drawing attention away from the cowering bunny girl, "mind if I have a word with Reisen alone? It's really important." Reisen turned her head to you with intrigue and panic in her red eyes.
"Tsk! You kidding?! After last night?!" Anna obviously wasnt wanting to hear that, "you cant be serious!"
"I am serious," you told her, "it's very important... and very private." You looked down at Vivian, "it's... not something she should be hearing." Reisen's face blushed and Anna's eyes squinted with disgust! Ok, maybe you said it wrong, but you prefer to keep it brief and simple!

"How can I be sure this nutcase wont try to hurt you again?!" Anna questioned. Ms. Udongein Inaba seemed offended by the 'nutcase' crack, but she kept her cool.
"I-I wont!" Reisen told her while constantly shifting her eyes to the window, "I'm perfectly fine. In fact, I plan on spending the rest of the night locked up in my room after our talk!"
Anna's eyes locked onto Reisen's. Sadly this bunny girl was not gonna be on good terms with your sis. However, you knew how the best way to get Anna to give you some privacy. You had something big on her.

"Sis, just go please," you tell her, "I didnt say anything when you were trying to put the moves on Ms. Le Fey's pet genoskwa!."
Anna's face went red with anger and embarrassment. Yeah, you knew she really like that thing. REALLY liked that thing! Not exactly sure why she was so damn interested in that big smelly hairy short-tempered Bigfootesque beast, but to each his own, right?

Anna gritted her teeth and blew air before leaning down at Reisen and whispered, "If I catch you even THINKING of doing anything funny with my little brother, I'm gonna use you to teach my little girl about 'Wabbit Season'!" Reisen, backed into a corner, merely nodded in agreement. "C'mon, Vivian. Let's go chase the kitty!"
"Yay!" Vivian shouted in excited as the two chased after Chen. As soon as Anna's back was turned, Reisen stuck her tongue out at her as she left!

"Reisen?" Her bunny ears stood up on end, spooking her for a split moment before turning around to face you, "can we talk?"

"I-I-If this is about g-getting more intimate with me, t-tonight's not a good night!" she said while blushing and constantly darting her eyes out the window... "p-perhaps tomorrow!" On one hand, you got to admire Reisen's boldness, but on the other...
"No, no, it's not like that," you assure her.
Her cheeks stopped blushing, "...Uh...oh... oh, ok." for some reason, she looked a little disappointed, "...then what is it?"

Despite feeling bad, you didnt have the guts to confess that she was cursed. But you still didnt wanna seem like a jerk keeping her COMPLETELY in the dark. You had to think of some middle-ground.

"I just wanted to check up on you and make sure youre ok," you tell her.
"Yeah, I'm fine," she answered with little concern, "why?"
"I was... just worried is all," you tell her, "are you feeling any different from before the uh, sudden outbreak?"
She shook her head, "Not that I know of."
"Good," you say with relief, "cuz if you are feeling worse, if you worried my boss mighta done something to do, please tell me as soon as you can."
Reisen tilted her head and raised her eyebrow, "Why are you telling me this? Should I be worried?"

"Nah," you shook your head, "I think she just wanted to scare me that one time just to rattle me up! She loves doing that. But seriously, she's too busy cleaning up street trash at home to concern myself about me, let alone you. She'll probably forget about us long before she finishes her little rival gang vendetta." That was another lie. She wont forget about you. The Fey have a very good memory. You smack an elf in the face on their birthday, then 10 years later, he’ll suddenly crash your birthday party and deliver you a smack a hundred times stronger!

"But... just in case you... see or hear anything funny going on, you can tell me," you said to her, "I'll be happy to listen and help out if I can."
Fortunately for you, Reisen seemed more grateful for your concern than suspicious of it. Then again, it could be because she was already tensing up to begin with what with the way she cant take her eyes off what's outside. You didnt notice anything of interest outside other than the full moon outside. It had a nice reddish glow to it.

"Th-thank you, Alex," she said, "I'll make sure to remember that! Now if you'll excuse me-"

"You know..." you changed the subject before she could, "we never did get around to finishing that tour."
"Sorry, maybe tomorrow," she was incredibly hesitant, "it's... it's getting really late!"
"Well, how about we just gaze at the stars?" you offered, "the moon's looking awful bright tonight. Odd... I dont recall it glowing THAT red before!"
But Reisen shook her head, "Not tonight! Tonight, I'm gonna be very VERY busy!"
"Oh? You need a hand?" you offered.
“No no no no no no!” she was pretty adamant to shoot you down, “I’m just gonna go take a super quick shower and get right to work!”
“If you’d like, I can help wash some of your hard to reach places.” somehow that incredibly perverted remark slipped out of your mouth! Reisen’s eyes widened, a hundred times more shocked than you should’ve been! Fortunately, instead of smacking you in the face and running off screaming for help, her face was completely reddened with blush, possibly considering it!

“G-G-G-GOOD NIGHT, ALEX!” she immediately ran off! You continued to stare at the bunny girl hauling ass, still refusing to take no for an answer! She was hiding something, you knew it! It probably wasnt your business, but since technically it was HER who made the first move, you had to make it your business!

Then again, maybe it was something TOO personal and that you shouldnt pry into matters that dont involve you. You had enough problems with that while you were working for Maeve!
Then again AGAIN, maybe since your personal involvement with the Fey left her cursed, you should keep a closer eye on Reisen. Even if Ms. Le Fey wont personally involve herself with Reisen’s curse, that doesnt mean she doesn’t have OTHER plans for her! So maybe for Ms. Udongein Inaba’s sake, you SHOULD pry!
111312121111212111122222.title: The Guilt... it hurts.

choices: Find a safer place to sleep.
1113121211112121111222221.content:
Nah, you knew better than to pry into somebody else's personal affairs (sorta). If Reisen has some personal demons she needs to deal with (and it's flippin obvious she does!), it'd be best to give her some space for the time being. Besides, you've caused that poor ill bunny girl enough trouble already. You only hope Maeve wont be bothered to mess with her as she's already busy enough on her side.

After you hear the sound of the running water and finish fighting off the thoughts of Reisen in the shower and washing her hard to reach spots, you shut your door and then argue with yourself whether or not you'll lock it. As tempting as it was to imagine said bunny girl sneaking in your room was, the risks involve were not worth it. You lock the door.

Yet another hell of day down. Only the rest of your life to go. But at least you werent alone. You still had your precious sister... as well as her 'daughter' to keep you company. And let's not forget the inhabitants of this hospital. This should prove to be an interesting stay. Provided Anna doesnt decide to drag you out of there, of course.
Regardless, it's still better than hanging around Le Fey. Way too many psychopaths.
You shake your head. No, you need to get Le Fey out of your head. You are safe here. Eirin's alert of their influence and Anna has connections that'll keep them away! So relax. Just relax.

So you hop in your bed and relax. Relax enough to fall asleep. See? That wasnt so tough.

…….

Some time later, you hear rustling over at your door. You wanted to get up, but you couldnt budge an inch. You couldnt so much as open your eyes. A sleep paralysis, perhaps.
Problem, because you can hear the knob rattling a bit. Somebody must really wanna get in.
Odd. Why's it so cold all of a sudden?

*Kink! Kink! Kink! Crack!* Uh oh. The knob rattling finally stopped. You could hear the door swing wide open! And unfortunately, youre still too deep in your sleep paralysis to do anything about it other than listen. And listen you did. To the sounds of the stiletto heels tapping against the marble floor as an awfully cold presence approached you.On instinct, your body shivered from the sheer cold of the presence. It was a familiar cold too. It reminded you so much of Winter.

"Hello again, little shit..." your body tensed as you heard the voice of pure sadism whisper in your ear, "did you miss me? I missed you." You shivered as you felt her icy cold hands caress your cheeks. "You didnt seriously think I couldnt find you, did you? You didnt honestly think there was ANYWHERE in the world you could hide that I wouldnt find you... did you?" Damnit body, move! MOVE! Why wont you move?! There is evil incarnate right in front of you!! "Oh, I missed you so much since we last met face to face. I really need to pay you back for that lovely scar you've given me. Oh, the FUN we're gonna have together... it'll be truly Hell on Earth." And then you felt those icy cold lips press against yours once more...

……..

"!!" you FINALLY managed to woke yourself from the paralysis! But by then, Maeve was nowhere to be seen. Her ice cold aura was completely gone. Just a bad dream? ...Or maybe it's another one of her tricks to mess with you?
Either way, it was a relief to not see that bitch again.

"Zzzz..."

Or at least it wouldve been if you didnt notice the 2nd guest sleeping in your bed! To your surprise you spotted that purple haired bunny girl fast asleep next to you.
To an even bigger surprise, Reisen looks rather different than earlier! She's bigger. Quite a bit bigger. She had a bit more of a muscular frame, too. Her suit and dress were torn up, failing to conceal her washboard stomach with sixpack and even weller-endowed bosom somehow sealed in a blue and white striped bra that practically begged to be pulled off out of fear she might suffocate! She musta hulked out in the middle of the night! But how did she get in-oh, the doorknob’s ripped right off the door.

Oh! Maybe she’s a were-rabbit! That would explain why she suddenly wanted to lock herself in her room ASAP!

This would be the part where you’d be scared shiteless, however, you honestly werent. You seemed awfully comfortable sharing your bed with this beastly side of Reisen. Somehow you’ve been staring awful attentively at her for about 5 minutes and see no interest in taking your eyes off her. Maybe it was a pheromone or something, but something was drawing you to her. This Reisen was just breathtaking! It was taking a little bit of willpower to prevent you from snuggling up to the She-Hulk bunny girl.

That and the rational part of you that wasn’t still asleep! You still havent forgotten the last time she snuck in your room. She almost hurt you last time cuz of her mental instability. Who’s to say she wont now that gone grizzly? Bet your ass that Maeve didnt make it any easier! Maybe you should find a safer place to sleep before she wakes up.

Looking over at your clock, it was barely 2am. Still way too early and youre very groggy. Youre already here in a nice cozy bed but with a potential dangerous yet potentially huggable bedmate. What should you do?
1113121211112121111222221.title: It's just a dream dream... NO IT'S A NIGHTMARE!

11131212111121211112222211.content:
Dispite your sleepiness, you were nervous about sleeping next to the were-rabbit. You got up slowly and got out of the room without any creaking noise and walked toward the kitchen. You found the fridge and took out a gallon of milk and took out a glass and poured some. Once you put the gallon away and took few sips, you noticed someone coming into the kitchen. It was vivian and she had half asleep, and noticed you.

"Hi, brother whitestone." Vivian said.

"Hey." you replied.

She asked you to pour some milk for her. You nodded and once you did you gave it to her. She thanked you and started to chug the milk down. You were surprised to see her chug down the milk as if she was a thirsty person who haven't had drink for a whole week. After 30 seconds, she chugged all the cup and breathed out and asked you to put it in the sink.

"Thank you, brother whitestone." Vivian said.

"N-no problem." You replied.

Just as you drank your cup of milk, you saw vivian walked back to her room. You had thought that maybe you could get some sleep in your sis's room. But you thought that would be rude so you thought that maybe you could sleep at the living room.

What would be your decision?
11131212111121211112222211.title: Find a safer place to sleep.

choices: Take the suppository and head to Reisen's room.
111312121111212111122222111.content:
You considered the living room as your first choice, but that pyro-maniac who's been quarreling violently with the head-mistress of this hospital is sleeping there as well. And since youre not as combat-hardened as Anna should Ms. Fujiwara turn her violent rage on you for some godforsaken reason, it's in your best interest and best health to sleep in your sister's room.

So you walk down the dark hallway, treading cautiously with each steps considering many of the tenants have incredible hearing what with their bunny ears. One in particular.

"Zzzzz... AlEx...SaaammmAaaAaa..."

You overheard that she-hulked out mentally ill bunny ear call your name in her sleep as you passed by your room. Though her voice did sound awfully alluring despite being slightly deepened and feral, you held out and resisted the bunny-siren's call.
When you finally reached Anna's room, you quietly peered open the door, trying hard not to wake her. She's got a nasty habit of attacking people that suddenly wake her from her long sleep! Bad experiences, you think.
Fortunately when you get in, you find her sleeping very soundly, hogging all the covers on her bed to herself. Not that you could share them anyways what with her having a pretty small bed. At the very least, at least the floor was nice and warm at least compared to everywhere else in the hospital for some unexplained reason. Sleeping there wont be much of a headache for you.

Before you set a pillow on the floor and made your bed there, you glanced over at Anna, seeing one of her pointed ears she usually keeps hidden under her hair out in plain sight. She hates when you do this (or at least she TELLS you she hates it), but against your better judgement, you couldnt help tickle the pointy end of her cute elvin ears!
"!!!!" and as usual, she shivers with what you assume is glee from your tickling! Her fingers and toes were literally twitching from your tickling, naturally! But you stopped after a short while cuz you didnt wanna wake her. With that fun out of the way, you made your bed on the carpet.
"Good night, Anna," you whispered before falling asleep.

*****************
"S-Sis! W-what are you doing?!"
"Shh!! Not so loud! And I told you not to call me that while we're alone!"
"B-But Anna! Why are you..."
"Alex... you said you'd do anything to help me feel better, didnt you?"
"We-y-yeah, but-"
"And he really REALLY hurt me. How could someone just stand me up like that?!"
"That was really awful of him. B-but still..."
"Please Alex... I'm just so lonely right now. I dont feel that way when I'm with you. Please stay with me a little longer..."
"A...alright si-I mean Anna."
"Closer, Alex..."
"O..ok. L-like that?"
"Closer..."
"....."
"Good boy.... now lie down."
"A-A-Anna?"
"Trust me. Just lie down... and let me get a little more comfortable.."
*******************

You quickly zip right up out of bed with your head sweating and your heart racing! Your face was red like a cherry after re-experiencing such a scandalous memory in your dream. It was certainly a unforgettable experience for you which, suffice to say, kinda expedited your whole transmission into adult hood! You certainly hope Anna didnt have ESP or anything like that.

Fortunately, she was already gone. She left behind a note on her bed. It simply read: "Alex. Off with Vivian to see her 'dad' for a deal. Will be back soon. -Anna." Ugh... her 'dad' (at least that's what she called him). Speaking of unforgettable experiences... well, let's say you'd rather lock yourself in a basement with just you and she-hulked Reisen than spend another day at HIS house! You'll bail on your sis before she makes you hide out at that place again! You dont know how Vivian can enjoy being there, but you certainly cant!
Oh wait, there's more. At the very bottom of the paper read: "P.S. I thought I told you a million times to STOP TICKLING MY EAR!!!" You exhaled hard and headed out the door.

At the very least, it was morning. Unfortunately, morning didnt matter much in Eientei. Just meant the beginning of a new day of pain.

"NO! NO! NO!!" just minutes after waking up, you suddenly heard Reisen screaming. "I'M NOT TAKING IT! YOU PROMISED IT'D ONLY BE ORAL MEDICINE FROM NOW ON!!" You rush over to the living room just in time to see the dispute being the mentally ill bunny girl (thankfully shrunken back down to normal size!) and her boss, the white haired doc.
"I know, Reisen," Eirin said, "but we had no choice but to chuck out a lot of our old medicine. All we have to treat your problems at the moment are suppositories." Oh man, you stumbled upon the WRONG argument this morning!
"I'm not taking them!!" the bunny girl screams, "I HATE taking them!"
"It's all we have for you, Reisen," says Eirin, "I'm sorry, but youre just gonna have to bare with it for a little while."
"UH UH!" she vigorously, "you promised the suppositories would stop! YOU PROMISED!!"
"Reisen, you can whine about this all day," the little brat Tewi had to open her big mouth, "but these pills are STILL gonna be going up your bunny-hole regardless."
"Shut up you little brat!" Reisen freaked out at her, too, "get away from me!!"
"Rei-"
"No no no no NO!!!!" she screamed and ran off past you, "morningalexsama!" you made out her giving a sweet smile at you for about a microsecond before she zipped down the hall and probably to her room.
"Mor...ning?" you were a little too out of it process all of it in time.

When the dust cleared, Eirin lowered her head and groaned. "I knew this was gonna happen. I just knew it."
"Morning, Dr. Yagokoro. Morning Tewi," tired of being left out, you finally speak up to the remaining two in the room.
Tewi smiled your way while Eirin failed to make eye contact. "Good morning, Mr. Whitestone. I'm... I'm sorry you had to witness that."
"A patient doesnt like taking her medicine?" you pretend to be ignorant of the situation out of politeness and tact.
"Nah, she just doesnt like taking it where the sun dont shine," but Tewi knew not the meaning of the words 'polite' or 'tact'.

"Well, I'm sorry you had to toss out all that medicine," you apologized, "I'm sure Anna will get you restocked soon. ...Er... she's... probably off doing that right now."
"I dont think we can wait for very long," Dr. Yagokoro states, "too many of our patients need immediate treatment. And little Udongein is certainly one of them. By the way, your bedroom will be under major repairs for a little while."
You inhaled and exhaled, "...I know."
"If you'd like, I got plenty of space in MY bed for ya," Tewi stated with a wink which made you feel extremely uncomfortable, "and just in case you get any primal urges... dont worry! THIS loli is legal!" You spit out your orange juice after hearing such a disturbing statement. Then you realized you didnt have any orange juice today.

"Tewi, am I gonna need to put YOU on the suppository regiment too?" Eirin warned.
The little brat quickly flinched, "N-N-No, not at all Ms. Lady Yagokoro! I'll be good!"

"Speaking of which," the doc added, "I'll be heading out for a little while. I need to find some cannabis plants to sedate Reisen when we have to give her her medicine..." Cannabis? That's legal here? You got a few friends that'd be thrilled to hear that news! Youre not one of them, of course.

"Wait, Eirin!" Tewi came up with a brilliant idea, "you dont need to do that! Just have Alex give her the suppository!"

"WHAT?!"
"What?!" you couldnt believe your ears and neither could the doc.

"C'mon, it makes perfect sense!" Tewi suggested, "she's clearly gaga for him. I'm sure she'll let HIM give it to her!"
"Are you serious?!" Eirin got upset, "I cant ask Alex to do that!"
"Think about it, Eirin," she continued, "she's tried to glomp him before. Heck, she probably woulda glomped him last night too! Lord knows he can persuade her to let him shove this little baby up her butt. She probably wouldnt mind if he shoved something much much bigger and juicier up there, too..."
"TEWI!"
"Eirin," Tewi had her hands to her hips and gave the big doctor that look, "dont pretend 'Alex-sama' cant get that done. If ANYBODY can get that purple-haired loony to take her medicine, HE can!" They both stared at eachother for what seemed like an hour in total silence.

...But Eirin lowered her head and caved.

"Mr. Whitestone," she turned to you, looking very uneasy, "this... I know this is hard for me to ask you this, and I wont blame you if you turn this request down, but we would... we would very much appreciate it if you... you..."
"Would you plug Reisen's thicc booty with this little sucker for us?" again, Tewi with no shame...
Nonetheless, it was a hell of a request to ask. But darned if you couldnt pull it off if you tried. Question is, would you?
111312121111212111122222111.title: A spoonfull of sugar helps the medicine go down...

choices: Teen with cowboy outfit and a gun
Black haired female with white robes
1113121211112121111222221111.content:
You thought to yourself and you had some idea that what Tewi was talking about. Whatever you were Reisen were near to you, she would flutter and feel all lovey toward you. You decided to agree and told Eirin the decision. Eirin sighed and handed you over the suppositories. It was little big for normal size and Eirin spoke you.

"Good luck to you, ok?" Eirin spoke.

"Don't worry, leave it to me." You replied.

She nodded and you went towards Reisen room. After free moment, you reached Reisens room and you knocked on her room.

"Reisen? It's me." You spoke.

There were no words, then..

"..Alex Sama?" Voice spoke.

It was Reisens voice and you told her you wanted to speak to her. She slowly opened her door and looked at you with her red eyes.

"L-look Reisen. I overheard dr.yagokoro about the medicine." You spoke.

"I'm not taking that suppositories!" Reisen replied.

"Listen, let me give you that medicine ok? I would like to help you out." You said.

She looked at you with narrow eyes. You had feeling she really didn't trust you on this topic, then she opened the door wide.

"If it's you..then I'm fine." Reisen said with blush.

"Thanks." You replied.

You went into her room as it looked like a vegas casino as it had slots, table and a bar counter. You then saw Reisen pull her pants down and got her skirt off, revealing her vagina before you. She got to her bed, facing upward showing her anus toward you. She was ready as you put your rubber gloves Eirin gave you and you took out the medicine.

"Here it goes Reisen." You said.

"Do it, Alex Sama." Reisen replied.

You then put the medicine into her anus. She felt the object as you felt little embarrassed, you slowly shoved in the suppository into her anus as you heared her moaning and twitching. You then finally manage to put the medicine into her anus and laid down with heavy breathing

"It's over Reisen." You said.

"Thank...you." Reisen said, "I'm going to rest for moment."

"Alright." You replied.

You then got out of the room and went toward the office where Eirin is, then you hear something outside. You wondered what it was as you got out, you saw...
1113121211112121111222221111.title: What I supposed to do?

1113121211112121111222221112.content:
Let's face it, you never had thoughts in putting a suppository on someone, even to the ill bunny. Besides, if Anna realize you put it in Reisens bossom, she'll kill anyone in her sight even if it had reason. You politely declined her and Eirin understood, telling Tewi to do some business in the human village. You offered help since that you could do. They nodded and both you and Tewi got out toward the human village. While walking, Tewi were snickering little.

"What's so funny?" You asked.

"Oh, nothing. I personally thought you would put the medicine into little udon-chans rabbit hole." Tewi replied.

"I just don't want to get into trouble, that's all." You replied.

"Mmhmm, but I kinda had feelings you do." Tewi replied.

You blushed and within hour you two reached the village. It looked like a small town with plenty of business buildings, apartments and restaurants. When you got through the entrance and walked through the street, you immediatly saw a sign of the restaurant that wrote:

"Southern cat"

(Isn't that restaurant..?) you thought, then turn to Tewi, "say Tewi, we should get some breakfast over there."

Tewi looked at the restaurant you pointing and looked at you.

"I don't have money right now, you know?" Tewi said.

"I got some spending money from Anna, and I'm starving." You replied.

"Well...alright, I could put something in my stomach." Tewi agreed.

You thanked her and you two went into the restaurant. It had many tables and the wall had many southern USA country side stare from Mississippi to arizona. The atmosphere were very southern comfort then a waitress came.

"Welcome to southern cat, how many will be seated?" Waitress asked.

"Two." You replied.

"Alright, follow me please." Waitress replied with smile.

You and Tewi followed her and you two got seat. She gave you two the menu and told she'll be back soon for the order and left. You looked at the menu and quickly knew it was the menu you know as it was the guy who owns this restaurant back at your world. You thought for moment to ask if he was here and Tewi spoke up.

"Some of these stuff looks delicious." Tewi spoke.

"It is." You replied.

After moment you two decided and the waitress can't back with a water and got her order form ready.

"What is your order?" Waitress asked.

"Yeah, I'll take pecan-praline pancake with side of biscuits with sausage gravy and coke." You ordered.

"I'll take cheddar cheese grits casserole with side of cinnamon rolll with icing, and a carrot juice." Tewi ordered.

"Alright..your order shall come soon." Waitress said.

Before she could leave, you stopped her to get answer.

"Excuse me, but does a man named Marcus Benedict currently here?" You asked.

Marcus Benedict, one of the few people in the LeFay that you actually get along as he is a heavy set African American from Deep South. He says his ancestors were brought from Liberia as a slave and after the war his great-great-great grandfather started the restaurant business and it was an instant hit for locals, both white and black dispite the heavy discrimination they felt. Marcus was picked by Maeve herself to be a head chef in cafeteria for both elites and normals, and he was THE man to go to when some needed advice and some great southern comfort food.

"Why yes, he's currently cooking right now." Waitress said.

"Can you call him out when he's not busy?" You asked.

"I'll try but don't expect anything." Waitress said.

"Fine." You replied.

She left and it took.,,
1113121211112121111222221112.title: invitation to breakfast

111312121111212111122222112.content:
You didnt feel like disturbing your sister this late at night. You know she and little Vivian are having it worse than you are and you didnt wanna burden them. Sure, it wasnt like they'd say no, but you'd rather settle this yourself. Part of you wanted to go back to your bedroom and cuddle up with the were-rabbit that was sleeping in it, but a tiny fraction of you was already explaining in broad detail why that wasnt a good idea.

So you decided to crash in the living room. On the plus side, it was much warmer than your room was. It could be cuz of the warming atmosphere coming from that white haired girl that had a fight with Kaguya earlier sleeping on the couch. Not wanting to wake HER up (despite how comfy the couch looked), you decide to sleep on the floor. Fortunately the floor was awfully soft. The carpet didnt feel bad on your back. And thanks to the warm girl, you didnt need a blanket. If it werent for the nightmare with Maeve, you wouldnt have any trouble getting to sleep at all.
It was tough, but after a while of tossing and turning, you finally manage to slip into a deep sleep.

You had absolutely no dreams throughout the night. Perhaps your brain was too scared to conjure one, but it was ultimately nothing but a long black deep sleep. But considering, any night that doesnt end with a nightmare involving Maeve is a good night.
Wow, the floor is incredibly comfortable. And somebody was generous enough to put a blanket over you.

Hang on a sec. This aint the living room. It’s not even one of the hospital rooms. You find yourself in a snazzy bedroom decorated with cool Vegas themed decorations like a poker table desk, a couple of signs of playing cards, a ‘Girls! Girls! Girls!’ neon sign, and an actual slot machine in the corner. Kinda reminds you of the time Anna took you to Las Vegas… and one of her fellow ‘associates’ introduced you to your very first strip club! Ah, the memories.

You even have a bunny girl fast asleep in your bed as well.
Oh no wait, that’s Reisen.

…REISEN?!

You almost let out a yipe, but barely stopped yourself before it came out your mouth! How did you end up in her room?! And wasnt she fast asleep in YOUR room? Apparently, she had enough time to change out of her tattered office shirt and skirt and into cute pink pajamas with little crescent moons on it.

Regardless, this was incredibly awkward and you need to get the hell out of her room asap before-too late, the alarm clock is going off. You froze up stiff as a board listening to the cheesy J-pop playing on the clock which causes your bunny bed mate’s ears to twitch and wake up with a yawn and a stretch! As soon as she pressed the button on the clock, her eyes locked with yours.

Her eyes widened as did yours.

“R-R-Reisen!!” you pleaded before she said a word, “th… this isn’t what it looks like!”
“M… Mr Whitestone, sir,” she put a hand to her cheek and her face went flush, “sneaking into my bedroom? That’s incredibly scandalous!” As expected she took your sudden appearance in her bed the wrong way. Despite that she doesn’t seem all that upset about your intrusion, you try to plead your case.

“No no no! You got it all wrong!” you tell her, “I didnt sneak in here! I was sleeping in the living room!”

“Even after I told you not to come, you ignored my warning and still snuck into my bed regardless of the potential risk of irreparable bodily harm you could’ve faced?!” it was kinda scary to hear her say that with such a swooning smile, “that’s so bold and manly!” Hell’s. Bells.

“I swear Reisen, I honestly dont know how-”
“Dont worry, Mr. Whitestone!” she said with a wink, “I can keep a secret!” Well, on the plus side, she’s not gonna rat you out. No point in continuing to defend yourself in vain. Might as well just shut up and accept it.

“Th-thanks, Reisen.”

After clearing that up without any casualties, Reisen hopped up out of bed and began undressing out of her pajamas despite you right there next to her! Still being both a gentlemen and a bashful idiot, you quickly turned away and allowed her some privacy as she changed.

“Well Alex, if you really want to thank me,” you picked up a slight hint of mischievous in her tone, “I could really use a hand this afternoon.”
“Uh, how can I help?” you politely asked.

“Well…” she paused for a few seconds, “…you see… I’ve got an… uh… appointment with a… trader down at the Human Village later. And er… I could use a hand lugging some… special supplies I’m gonna be buying from him.” That was a lot of pause. If that didnt arouse suspicion, you dont know what did. She was less secretive about it than Anna.

“What kind of special supplies,” you asked.
“Oh you know, just…” another pause, “special vitamins. Gotta keep this lovely physique in tip top shape, after all.” FAR less clever about it than Anna too.
“Are these vitamins legal?” you got straight to the point.
“Well… some places they are,” Reisen didnt answer your question very well, “well, theyre not TECHNICALLY illegal here. Theyre just hard to get. Eirin wont stock up on any of them for some reason.”

DANG IT! You thought you were done with this whole drug dealing business!
Well, you learned your lesson this time! You have had it up to HERE with drug dealing of any kind! Youre gonna put your down and tell her ‘No Way Jose!’

…No youre not. Youre gonna have a hard time trying to tell her youre not gonna do it. You still havent forgotten when Maeve took over her body. She’s still vulnerable. And you lying to her telling her she isnt didnt help her any. You’d hate to see her get into even worse trouble because of you.

“Er… aint it a little dangerous to go off into the woods outside of Eientei’s borders?” you at the least try to talk her into not going.
“For YOU it would,” Reisen answered, “the wild monsters around love to prey on lost humans. But they wont dare lay a claw on you if they see ME following you. I could tear the neck out of one of those foul-smelling swamp bitches without so much as getting my gorgeous hair dirty!”

You believe that. You saw her she-hulk out last night. Youre still wishing to motorboat that side of her too.
Still, she’s already had one bad encounter with Le Fey. You’d really hate to have her go through another one.
Then again, you’d also really hate to be in the middle of drug dealing as well as risk getting busted for it after your sister’s efforts to get you out of that life for good!

“So… you up for joining me?” Reisen finally finished changing into her suit and dress, “I promise I’ll give you a REALLY good share if you do!”
111312121111212111122222112.title: Dirty Dealings

choices: Tell her you'd be happy to chat over breakfast.
Tell her you dont have time and to hurry the deal.
1113121211112121111222221121.content:
You could tell yourself that you just wanna look out for the poor bunny girl in case she runs into trouble with bad people, but you'd be lying. Even if she wasnt in danger (let alone with Le Fey), you'd still go with her. The truth was simply peer pressure. It was shameful, but you needed friends. As many as possible before Anna moves you to the NEXT safe house!

After giving yourself a mental apology, you tell that mentally ill bunny girl, "Sure, I'll go. Wouldnt be safe letting a cute girl wander off on her own."
“Oh goodie!” Reisen giggled, “I know I'll be safe in your big strong arms. Now let's get moving!”
“Wait, I havent even changed yet… oh right,” you never changed out of your clothes from last night, “uh, how are we gonna explain this to Eirin later?”
“No worries,” she assured, “today is her only day off. Which means she's gonna be forced to spend the entire day playing Street Fighter with the princess… and keeping her from breaking any more controllers or TVs.” Dang. ...You'd kill to have a day off like that! Not literally, of course!

And surprising no one, she was quick to grab your arm and drag you off with her!
“Hey, arent we supposed to have breakfast, first?” you asked.
“We'll get something when we get to the Village! Now c'mon! C'mon!” You tried your best to keep up with her so she wouldnt inadvertently dislocate your arm! You got plenty of odd stares from other patients as she dragged you down the hall (including a snickering Tewi) as you shouldve.

Through the thick bamboo forest, you had to carefully watch your step, cuz there were loads of traps lying around to keep predators and invaders out. They were there for good reason, cuz as soon as you left the safety of the bamboo trees, you could spot youkai lurking in bushes, no doubt staring your direction, waiting for when youre the most vulnerable.
One white haired youkai with canine ears spent the most time tracking you down from a distance. You felt her feral red eyes on you the whole time and youre quite certain ignoring her was not gonna make her go away. You got incredibly nervous the moment you spotted a sword in her hand.

“Dont worry,” Reisen whispered, “they wont come near you. Cuz they wont come near ME.” Thankfully, she was 100% right. Dozens of youkai around every corner and not a single one did anything but merely observe. A long awkward but safe walk later, the two of you come across a huge 20 foot brick stronghold with a manned gate. Reisen flashed her Eientei ID to the gate guard, then the guard gave a signal, and the pathway into the heavily populated village opened up for you.

Despite being called the Human Village, the place was heavily populated with a wide variety of unique people. There were people were animal ears, animal tails, animal faces, extra limbs, extra tails, wings, horns… you'd wage a guess and say that least 60% of the Human Village population were non-human, which, though you support cultural diversity, kinda defeats the whole purpose of the name.

Speaking of, you got a huge taste of cultural diversity when a rather tall muscular woman with a red horn on her head grabbed your ass! You flinched, but you pretended not to notice as she's most likely just drunk. She sincerely reeked of alcohol.
Unfortunately, she wasnt done. The oni lushed whistled so loud, it popped your ears!
“YO! SWEET CHEEKS!” she shouted out to you, “why dont you come shake that fine ass over here?!” You ignored her verbal sexual harassment and kept walking. However onis arent the type to be ignored.

“HEY TWERP!” she began stomping toward you, “didnt you just hear me?! I said get your a-” Then this big bulky brute of a she-beast stopped cold in her tracks once Reisen gave her a cold glare. “Whoa whoa! Sorry, Reisen! Didnt know he was yours!” And she quickly trotted away, not wanting a piece of that bunny girl!
“Sorry about Yuugi,” Reisen groaned, “she and her friend dont know when to keep their big mouths shut.”

“The uh… trader said he'd be near this tea shop,” Reisen said, “he said to look for a flag with a two-headed eagle on it.”
“Like that one?” you pointed over to the big bald gent in the black business suit waving the Russian flag with the imperial emblem. Wait a sec! You recognize that bald gent with a horseshoe mustache like Hulk Hogan! OLEG! If that ruskie multi-lingual bodyguard is here, than his boss must be around some-THERE SHE IS!

"SASHA!!!" squeal the lovely young blonde slavic high-ranked FSB agent with glee! The woman in the black parka bearing her FSB badge dashed at you and quickly wrapped her arms around you, squeezing you tight. Reisen's eyes and ears twitched, but you didnt notice! You were far too thrilled to see your favorite non-english speaking client/arms dealer of your sister's again!
"Mikaela!" you shouted with delight as you returned her hug, "wow, it's so good to see you again! You too, Oleg."
"It's been a while, Mr. Whitestone. Good to see youre still in good health," Oleg kept his cool demeanor while Reisen was still twitching.
"Я по тебе скучаю!" Mikaela sighed, still holding you tight, "Я все время о тебе думаю! ...Ah... теплый."
"Ms. Yurazinksi misses you as well," Oleg stated, "as you may have noticed." Wow, she's nuzzling against you. Wow, she's chilly.

"AHEM!" Reisen loudly cleared her throat and Mikaela finally let go of you... though there were still stars in her pearly blue eyes. "I take it you know eachother, Alex-sama?"
"Oh yeah!" you nodded enthusiastically, "Mikaela Yurazinski is one of my sisters' clients and fellow dealers. She kinda runs a special business outside of her day job."
"We would appreciate it if you refrain from speaking too much about my boss's privates matters," Oleg warned you.
"Sorry Oleg," you apologized and continued introductions, "Mikaela, this is Reisen.She works over at the hospital my sister and I are currently staying at." Oleg translated what you said to Mikaela.
"Привет," she extended her hand offering a handshake, but Reisen just stared back at you suspiciously and gave a courteous bow. Mikaela paid it no mind and turned her attention back to you. She was speaking so fast, it was too difficult to type out all the questions she had for you, let alone for Oleg to translate.

"Uh, she merely wants to know how you've been doing," he said.
"Currently, we're on the run," you answered, "sis and I kinda broke out of Le Fey and now theyre hunting us down." Oleg translates. Mikaela frowned and was about to give you another hug, but Reisen pulled you back toward herself! "Uh, heh. Luckily, Reisen and her faculty were kind enough to offer us refuge and safe haven."

"Это эльф сука здесь с вами?" Mikaela was looking all directions with a stern glare in her eyes as she asked. Oleg gave an uneasy look, but translated, "Er... she is asking if your sister is here with you?" Youre awful sure he's just being polite.
"No, she didnt come. It's just me and Reisen."
"Чертовски наконец." Mikaela sighed then went back to smiling. Oleg wouldnt translate. Again, just being polite. Mikaela started speaking energetically, saying way too many spontaneous things for me to type out... but your bunny-girl companion was quick to shut her up.

"Excuse me!" Reisen cut her off, "uh, Mikaela, was it? I hate to um, break up your little reunion, but we have a certain DEAL to make, remember?" Oleg nodded and translated, to which Mikaela pouted her lips
"Позже! Позже!" she waved her hand dismissively as if implying that the deal can wait. Then she grabbed your hand and your companion's stare got cold again!
Ms. Yurazinski says a few things and Oleg translated.

"She wishes to um, discuss particular matters with you personally over breakfast first," Oleg said.
"I dont think we have time for that," Reisen stated. Oleg translated.
"Я не говорил вам."
"With all due respect, she was asking Mr. Whitestone, not you," Oleg had to be the bearer of bad news. The mentally ill and definitely perturbed bunny girl curled her lip. She seems to be getting along worse with her than Anna did!

You were more than happy to want to spend more time with Mikaela despite the whole language barrier thing, but your long-earred friend seemed awful uneasy about her being around you. Not wanting to see a fight break out, it was up to you to make the decision.
1113121211112121111222221121.title: Cultural Exchange

11131212111121211112222211211.content:
You decided to have some breakfast with the russki. You told reisen to hold on the deal for later, and she was disturbed but gave into your request. Mikaela was happy after you accepted her offer and went to the nearest shop. Once you all sat down, you all ordered the food and waited.

"So what is the things you ask me?" You asked.

Mikaela spoke to Oleg and he translated.

"She speaks that one of the closest member of ours suddenly disappeared from us, only to come back 3 days later with mass bloodstains on her." Oleg translated.

You had thoughts since you knew another female who were close other then your big sis. She was very powerful and knew a lot about medical field that she was like reisen in outside world. Mikaela took out the photo and showed it to you, revealing your point. The photo showed a woman with long grey hair, red shirt, green dress and a medic pack.

"Isn't she...nightingale?" You asked.


She was Anastasia nightingale, the direct descendant to Frances parthenope Verny, sister to Florence Nightingale. She was rich girl as her father is a multi-billionaire real-estate venture while her mother is the president of pharmaceutical company. She saw the world of gangs and violence at age of ten, and decided to use her money to be a nurse to help the wounded, just like her ancestor Florence. she was smart to the point she got an PhD at age of 20 and she started to nurse the wounded secretly by using her money to buy good medical goods.

"Mikaela questioned her about it and she told her she was clearing some gangs," Oleg said, "we didn't know what she meant until we got onformed that she killed all of top-elite of Le Fay gang."

You were very shocked to hear that. Oleg told you that the rumer spread that the Maeve herself went hiding after the incident. You cringed to hear that and mikaela spoke to Oleg.

"Anyway, the point is that Anastasia disappeared again and heard the word that she is somewhere in this world." Oleg spoke, "and she wants you to help her with finding her since she is very important nurse to us,"

"Alright, I'll help." You told him.

You had the idea since your big sis thinks of her as a close friend since they were important to her. You heard rumer one time that they were hard core lesbian, but you never knew. After you all get breakfast and finished it, Oleg paid for you all and got out.

"Well then, let's go now!" Reisen said.

You nodded and you three followed reisen. You three then reached the destination and sent in then suddenly..
11131212111121211112222211211.title: russian talk

choices: You'll take just one pill! JUST ONE!
Refuse and demand you start heading back!
111312121111212111122222112111.content:
"It's a violent pornography. Choking chicks and sodomy! The kinda shi-"

You quickly answer your phone just after realizing you forgot to set it to vibrate! You got a few odd stares from Reisen and Oleg... while Mikaela was actually whistling the rest of the song!

"H...Hello?"

"Alex?! Where the hell are you?!" were the happy cries of your beloved sister screaming into your ear, "youre supposed to be here babysitting Vivian!" She just had to shout loud so that everybody around you could hear it!
"I'm sorry sis. I cant do that right now," you swallowed, "I'm busy doing an errand with Reisen."
"Ugh!! Reisen?!" as expected, the R-word was a curse, "youre letting that mentally ill pill popper do her dirty work?!" Reisen lowered her head.
"No, I'm just helping her out," you said, "we'll be back soon." But that wasnt good enough for Anna.
"Ergh! Alex! Did you not forget she went berserk earlier?!" she had to remind you, "did you not forget she tried to take advantage of you while you were sleeping?!" And like a sorry puppy, her bunny ears lowered over her face with shame and her hands covering whatever her ears couldnt.You were incredibly thankful Mikaela didnt understand what Anna just said... although youre pretty sure she asked Oleg. But you shook your head and mouthed 'NO!', so the generous lug played dumb!

“Look, I'm fine alright?” you assured her, “besides, I'm safer in her hands. No wild crazy youkai around wants to touch her.” Reisen's mood suddenly changed immediately, she quickly raised her head with a smug smile on her face. “It wont take much longer. Anyways, I'm glad you called. Mikaela's been asking-”
“Mikaela?!” Anna quickly cut you off as if the M-word was just as big a curse to her, “what were you doing talking to Mikaela? I told you several times to keep away from her!” Mikaela, despite her lack of a grasp in the English language, squinted her eyes.
“Actually she bumped into us,” you took a deep breath, almost hearing Anna's blood boiling, “she's asking about-”
“Let me talk to her,” Anna quickly cut you off.
“Anna, I know what youre about to do. Please dont-”
“Alex,” her voice got stern, “put her on the phone now.”

You cringed, knowing what's about to come, but you were powerless to prevent it.
“Anna wants to talk to you,” you handed Mikaela the phone. Oleg translated and Mikaela's stern face matched Anna's tone!

“Anya,” her accent was void of emotion when she answered your phone. Next thing that happened was plenty of shouting in Russian from both sides! They were literally yelling at at each other from both directions of the phone. Anna may have been the bilingual sibling, but she could not get along nearly a fraction as well with her special russian client/arms dealer as you could.

As the two went at it, your bunny girl friend was holding back the urge to chuckle at her rival's expense.

As soon as you saw Mikael's eyes widen with intense fury (Anna mustve said something incredibly insulting), you quickly swiped the phone out of her hand!
“I'm really REALLY sorry!” you quickly apologized to your infuriated comrade.

“Anna what the hell is the matter with you?!” you scolded your big mouthed sister.
“What's the matter with ME?!” Anna snapped back at you, “what's the matter with YOU getting near that slimy cunt?!” Oleg thankfully didnt translate that to his boss, otherwise she'd probably stomp that phone of yours to pieces!
“Heh, 'slimy cunt',” Reisen whispered to herself and giggled.
“That 'slimy cunt' youre talking about bailed us out of who knows how many problems you got us in!” you correct her.
“Yeah, and you know what she wants in return?” Anna asked you, “you being her personal fuck-toy. Did you know she brags publicly to her fellow dealers in Moscow about getting her dirty untrimmed slavic 'kisku' rammed in by you?!”
“Кто она позвоните киску?!” Mikaela screamed as Oleg was holding her back. Reisen failed to hold back a burst of laughter, but she quickly restrained herself and whistled innocently.

“Alex, do I have to remind you of the kinds of bad people she hangs out with?” Anna continues, “especially the ones that wanna kill her? ESPECIALLY a few that work with her in the FSB?! Honestly, I trust that mentally ill rabbit rapist a lot more then HER!” Reisen arm thrusted and muttered 'YES!' as if that was a compliment!

“I'm not trying to join her posse! I'm trying to get along with her cuz she's a damn decent ally!” you couldnt nail this fact into your sis's thick skull any deeper, “anyways, she's asking about Nightingale. Anastasia Nightingale.”
There was a long silence on the other end after mention the name until she finally asks “...What about her?”

You give her footnote version of what Oleg translated to you and there was yet another long silence on her end.

“...So the top Le Fey execs are dead then?” she questioned, “OFFICIALLY dead? Not faking their deaths?” It struck odd how THIS was her top interest, but you answered yes.
“...Well, that takes care of one hell of a loose end,” she had the nerve to comment.
“Well, do you know anything?”
“Alex, just forget about it,” Anna's warning took you by surprise, “you dont need to worry about her.”
“But Mikaela, what about-”
“ALEX. TRUST ME,” she emphasized, “I'm gonna be gone for a while. I need to clear up a few things. When you get back here, I need ya to look after Viv, ok?”
You sighed hard, “Fine.”
“Thanks. Love you.”
“Love you too, Anna.” *Beep*

“Sorry. She doesnt know anything about Anastasia,” you lied, “...and I'm really sorry about her attitude, Ms. Yurazinski. Please dont take anything she said seriously. She's… not quite all up there, if you get what I'm saying.” After her bodyguard's translation, Mikaela cooled down an awful lot.
"я тебя прощаю!" she said with a sweet smile. There was no translation needed.

"Great, now that THAT'S finally settled and over with," Reisen stepped in front of you, wanting to finish what was started, "...about those pills you wanted to sell me?"

You waited patiently (though you were very uneasy) as the deal was going through. Mikaela pulled a prescription bottle of blue colored tablets with the prescription label clearly ripped off. Oleg summed up the effects of it (ie, migraine reducing, stress easing, mild aphrodisiac side-effect, etc.) Reisen was quick to reach for it, but Mikaela snaked it away and rubbed her fingers with a stern look on her face.
Reisen curled her lip and reached under her blouse (you turned away not to stare) and handed a bill that had a picture of Kaguya on it! Mikaela looked at the bill questionably, demanding to know what it is.

"That is an official Lunarian 10,000 note," bunny-girl explained, "one of those babies is normally worth roughly 48,000 in US dollars, however thanks to the current occupation happening on the moon, the distribution was suspended and these bills have been discontinued for many years, making them an extreme rarity. I'm thinking by now, they should be at least triple their original value." After the translation, Mikaela looked into her phone (possibly google searching info on the Lunarian notes) and after seeing the results, her eyes widened, and she quickly nodded, offered her a black suitcase full of those bottles, and concluded the exchange.

"Ms. Yurazinski thanks you for your business," Oleg insists before turning your direction, "she also asks if YOU might be interested in her wares? She's willing to offer a very generous friend discount."
You shake your head, "No thanks. I'm good." With that out of the way, you all say your goodbyes. Mikaela offers to shake Reisen's hand again only to once again get rebounded with a polite bow. You offer to shake Mikaela's hand, who gladly takes it... and then gives you a little kiss on the cheek!
You naturally blushed as Reisen naturally crushes one of her newly bought pill bottles (somehow, the pills were still ok!).

"Was she an old girlfriend of yours?" Reisen asked out of nowhere as she was trying to opened the crushed bottle.
"Nah, just a friend," you told her, "a very helpful friend. I wish Anna appreciated her generosity as much as I did. Well, now that that's over with, let's head back."

"Why the rush?" suddenly she wasnt so impatient anymore, "let's just hang out here a little longer. I got an extra vitamin with your name on it!"
"Sorry, I dont do drugs," you explained, despite the fact you worked in that kind of business!
"Theyre not drugs per se!" she corrected, "theyre more like herbal supplements. Really effect herbal supplements that help you unwind. Come on. Unwind with me!" She actually offered you a pill.

"I'd... rather not," you tell her, "I need to head back fast and babysit my sis's kid."
"PLEEEEEEAAAAAAASSSSSEEE?" she suddenly gave you the sad puppy dog look... although her glowing red eyes hinted naughty ambitions!

..........

1113121211112121111222221121112.content:
"Um..reisen, I know how you feel but for now I have to baby sit viv. Please understand." You explained to her.

She was little resistant, but gave in to your words and two went back toward the bamboo forest. When you two went in and walked, you felt like someone looking and looked at the top, seeing an long purple haired woman in black Arabian shirt and bra, and a skull mask. She noticed and disappeared, and reisen looked at you.

"Something wrong, Alex-sama?" Reisen asked.

"..no, it's nothing." You replied.

You two then reached the eientei and were greeted by Vivian..

-underground city-

In the underground city, Anna walked through the busy street talking with someone on her phone. After the call, the black fog were summoned, revealing the same female you saw walking with her.

"What's the update?" Anna asked.

"Your brother is currently safe, master." She replied.

Anna just nodded and reached at the certain house and got in. Once they got in, they went upstairs and went in the room, seeing a fat African-American with red shirt and blue jeans sitting on the chair. He noticed them and got up and they shook hands,

"Long time no see girl." Man said.

"Yes Marcus, long time." Anna replied.

His name is Marcus Benedict, one of the former member of Le Fay's top chef. He was ordered to resign from Maeve for medical reason and he became both a high school chef and a preacher. He may have retired from Le Fay but continued to cook some southern cooking to maeves top elite.

"Have you called Anastasia?" Anna asked.

"Sure did, said she'll be here." Marcus replied.

She nodded and all three waited for 20 minutes then finally the female came. She looked at Anna for moment and they got an friendly hug. Once done the four sat on the chair to have private meeting.

"As you might have know, Anastasia have defeated ALL of that bitch maeves top elites," Anna started, "now that they're gone and Maeve went hiding, I can safely announce that we are taking over the family."

The three clapped their hands and Anna continued.

"This couldn't be done without the sacrifices of our rebels...including adalgar." Anna said.

Adalgar, one of the former member of Le Fay and member of Anna's cause, died at the hands of Le Fay for rebelling against her. Anna took that death serious and continue to struggle against her.

"He was a good man," Marcus said, "I hope his soul is resting in kingdom of heaven."

"Yeah...anyway, I am now renaming the family name from Le Fay to Galactic mirage." Anna announced.

They clapped and she told them it will take at least a whole week to get the necessary papers to be looked. They nodded and before Anna left, Marcus stopped her.

"What?" Anna asked.

"Do you think you could ask Hassan to deliver this good old rum cake and triple chocolate brownies to your little bro?" Marcus asked.

Anna looked at Hassan and she didn't say anything. She sighed and ordered her to deliver it to him. She nodded and took the stuff and went into darkness and Anna begun her work.

-eientei-

You were taking care of Vivian as you two played the game of cards. Reisen and Tewi were there to join as well and after 20 minutes, the cards were done.

"I'm so glad I could play with you, uncle Whitestone." Vivian said.

"Me too." You replied.

At the hallway eirin was walking with one of the patient until the door were knocked. Eirin told one of bigger bunny worker to take over and once she did, eirin got the front and saw..

Eirin looked around, seeing nobody then looked down and noticed rather big package picked it up and noticed it was for you and she went back in. Back in the living room, you, reisen and Vivian was about to play board game then eirin came in.

You got the package and noticed the handwriting. You felt familiar by this then smelled something sweet from the package. You opened up the package then you saw a big rum cake and ALOT of brownies sitting next to it. You had some idea who made this then reisen looked at it and were amazed.

"Would I?" Kaguya answered.

She took one of the brownie and took a bite. You noticed her eating happily then suddenly she started to twitch little. You had idea that this was made by none other then Marcus as he always makes food that's so good that the person who eats it would react to the deliciousness intentionally or not.

"This..IS...GoOoD!!!" Kaguya shouted.

She scarfed on the brownie and took another one. Her eyes were tearing with joy and her mouth area gotten little dirty from the chocolate. After eating the second brownie, she dropped the game system (eirin managed to catch it), shivering with the sugar rush.

"Um..princess?" Reisen asked.

"I'm going to find moko-tan and play with me for while!!" Kaguya said with fast talk.

You decided to eat..
11131212111121211112222211211121.title: Sweet jolts

111312121111212111122222112111211.content:
Of course you turn your attention to the rum cake! Your favorite! The perfect combination of sweet, doughy, cakey, glazey, and so forth. The rum cake to you was the best cake that Mr. Benedict would bake for you. Must be something about that rum glaze he pours on it. It's got quite a kick and you just cant stop at one slice. Sure you werent much of a drinker, but when it came to rum cake, you had to make damn sure you had a designated driver to take you home!

You heard somewhere that he gets his rum glaze from Mikaela's private russian rum stash (but dont tell the FSB she doesnt have a liquor license!). It was kinda the reason Anna's very hesitant to let you have rum cake. She has this crazy theory that Mikaela's trying to get you drunk. Can you believe that?!

As you enjoyed a slice of rum cake, the mentally ill drug-bunny next to you was smiling your direction while gorging on carrot cake.
You hated when people stared at you while you were eating, but you were getting used to Reisen's obvious affection so much that her big shiny slighty hypnotizing eyes had a sport reserved in the corner of your view.

"You want some?" you offered her a slice of the rum cake.
"No thanks, Alex-sama," she happily declined, "one of the labels on the drug-I mean vitamins bottles said not to consume alcohol while taking these." So she'll gladly gorge on illegal prescription drugs yet somehow she drinks responsibly? Ugh, you need a little more rum cake to flush out this nagging inconsistency!
"Can I have some, Uncle Al?" Vivian asked.
"Sorry Viv," you had to turn her down, "not until youre 21. ...Or 18. ...Or... hey Reisen, what's the legal drinking age where youre from?"
"10," answered Reisen. Vivian's eyes beamed.
"We're not gonna be adopting that custom," you still turn her down.

Sure enough, the glaze in the rum cake was not only delicious, it was strong. Despite barely even noticing the alcoholic aftertaste, it had a rather high volume to it. It's not even your second slice before you experience the early signs. You eyes have a hard time focusing and you slurred a little in your speeches. You have a hard time paying close attention to most of what's going on. Youre quickly reacquainted to some white haired girl in red suspenders, but you quickly forget her name. That Tewi brat made a perverted joke when you told her about being reacquainted with your sister's client, but it goes in one ear and out another. You recall Reisen holding back the urge to choke the little brat however.

There was Karaoke. Unfortunately, nobody sang songs you heard of and their jukebox didnt have System of a Down. Not that you had much energy to sing thanks to your inability to stop eating rum cake slices!
The Mokou girl inadvertently set part of the room on fire and while everybody freaked out, you were tipsy enough to think it was a cool fire show... up until Eirin broke out the fire-extinguishers. As the doc put the extinguishers away, the Princess roared her head off at the pyromancer in suspenders for nearly burning the place down, the two had a fight, Tewi took bets, but the fight quickly came to a sudden stop after Reisen pulled two of her new vitamins and crammed each one down their throats! By the time Eirin returned, the two were hugging each other in a blissful daze.

After that, you got a bit lightheaded and you dont remember much about what happened the next hour or so, but it didnt stop you from eating one more slice of intoxicating rum cake and become more intoxicated!

"Oh dear," Eirin carefully observed you, "just how many slices of that rum cake did you eat."
"I uhhhh... los count affer da sevond!" you slurred.
Tewi sniffed at the cake, "...OH WOW! That is strong! I felt it go right up my nostrils! This is like pure grade-A oni brew right here!"
"Aw dammit, ah knew Mikalalela put her juice in it," you mumbled, "Annie's right. She DUZ wanna see me *HIC* drunk!" Despite your head getting dizzy and your vision getting blurry, there's one thing you can see quite clearly... the lovely glowing red-eyed bunny babe in the corner of your eyes still smiling your way. Suffice to say, your inhibitions were hanging by a thread. Because Reisen was looking mighty fine at the moment. If you had a fraction of the etiquette your former male Fey co-workers had, she'd be getting the rug-burn right about now!

As for someone that DIDNT tickle your fancy at the moment, the old wrinkly saggy-titted crone Eirin sighed in disapproval. "Looks like youre gonna need to rest that off. I better get some aspirin ready for your incoming hangover," she mused before turning to Reisen, "could you please take him to his room?"
The bunny babe's ears twitched as her gorgeous smile never left her gorgeous face, "Yes, master." she said with her gorgeous voice, "come on, Alex-sama."

And she helped you up. Well, she didnt just help you up, she helped you to your room. WELL, she didnt help you to your room, she actually carried you to her room with her bare hands! WEEEEELLLL, not so much her bare hands, more like her one shoulder! She actually had you in an over the shoulder carry hold and did not looked strained one bit by your weight as she was nonchalantly walking off with you in tow!

"Wow Rei....yer strong..." you commented.
"I did a lot of weight training at my old job," she replied, "...I had to." It showed. You remember seeing quite a bit of muscle on that OTHER form of hers... on all the right places, by the way.
It seemed a little degrading being carried by a woman in such a way (even if said woman is a freaking bunny-earred powerhouse), but being rather drunk off your ass, such petty issues dont concern you. You way too busy enjoying the view of Reisen's short-skirted backside swaying so rhythmically.... are those striped panties youre barely making out?

Despite being tipsy and distracted, you did see your room... that Reisen just passed right by.

"Uhhh... Rei?" you slurred, "we juz passed mah room."
"I know," she said with a giggle, "we're not going THERE."

There was no point playing dumb or even denying it. You may have been tipsy, but you were quite sure what's about to happen as soon as she takes you to wherever youre taken to.
But you know what? At this point, you welcome it! Youre feeling kinda antsy yourself, so if this gorgeous bunny babe wants to get her rocks off with you, who are you to turn her down (even if you had much of a choice to begin with)? Youre friend downstairs was sober, up with the chickens, and ready and willing to pump some life-giving seed into bunny-chick vaj!
...And maybe pump a little in her backdoor if she keeps swaying her hips like she does!

If only the sober could see the drunk you right now. He would not believe that both you and him are one in the same!

"Here we are," Reisen said as she entered a room, possibly her room, and set you down on a bed, then closed the door and locked it.
"I'm sorry to keep you waiting," she apologized, she smiling your way, "and all that pent up stress I left you for just leaving you hanging last time. Well, dont worry!" She hopped on the bed and climbed on top of you, "this time, they'll be no distractions. Just me and you..."
111312121111212111122222112111211.title: Booze Bakery

She came closer to you as you were drunk to the point you couldn't think clearly then the bunny girl gave you some lip on your mouth. You two kissed for good 2 minutes then got off from you. Her red eyes were beautiful in your blurry vision, blushing.
