"Recorded as well, udon-chan!" Tewi said as vivi holder the recorder.

This made reisen furious and chased them as they laughed, they splitted ways as vivi continued to hold the recorder and hid. She giggled for while then took out a cellphone for kids that Anna bought for her. She dialed some number and held on her ears.

"..hi mom, it's me...yeah, I'm having lots of fun...mm-hmm..oh, chef's coming over!? Great! When?...tomorrow afternoon? Great!..I miss you mom..I hope you come home soon.." Vivi said.

She then hung up the phone and went to see if Kaguya were up to play. Back at the room you were dreaming about good things and once you woke up, you realized that you slept the whole day and night! You got and got out of the room and went to the living room and saw...
1113121211112121111222221121112111.title: Cool, in denial

11131212111121211112222211211121111.content:
You saw the same male former LeFay member serving a country fried steak with cheesy mac&cheese to the eientei group. You were about to say something but the hangover from that rum cake hitting you hard and just didn't speak. They then noticed you and Marcus came to with smile.

"My man! Long time no see!" Marcus said.

"Mm, I have a hangover so please tone down." You replied.

"Rum cake..aw damn, sorry 'bout that." Marcus replied.

He then left to get your share and once you sat down, eirin asked if you took some aspirin, and you told her you'll take it later. Marcus came back with food and once he gave it to you, you all thanked for the food and started to eat. You remember the taste as he was talented chef even to the point many high skilled chefs wanted him at their restaurant but he rejected the deal since he was still with LeFay at the time.

"This is terrific, mr.benedict." Eirin said.

"The balance of flavor is so perfect it's just amazing." Reisen said.

"Thanks, ladies. My mama taught me a lot from that to her special gumbo soup." Marcus said.

You could tell he was continued his passion of cooking as you took the bite of Mac, you noticed Vivians mouth were little dirty so you got the napkin and told her to be still. You cleaned it up and once she thanked you, you all continued to eat. After lunch, Marcus cleaned up the table with the aid of the bunnies, he came back and sat down next to reisen.

"Anyway, I came here for a good reason." Marcus said, "it's about Anna."

"What about her?" You asked.

He then put his hand on his chest and mumbled something then suddenly a light were made. All of you closed your eyes and once you all opened up, you saw a golden goblet on his hand and he put it in the table.

"This, brothers and sisters, is the sacred holy grail." Marcus said.

Everyone gasped as you were fully know what the item is. Holy grail, the artifact that supposed to be blessed with the blood of Jesus Christ when he was at the cross while other says about the last supper. You couldn't believe what you were seeing to the point your hangover went away for moment.

"Marcus...is this the real holy grail?" You asked.

"Real as my souls existence." Marcus said, "when I first heard the word, Maeve was the owner of this grail until she became very jittery about it and let me take care of it."

"Does it have any form of power?" Kaguya asked.

"I searched for it, and this one have three abilities." Marcus answered.

You listened to him and he spoke up.

"This grail has the power to give the holder eternal life, eternal youth, and the unlimited power to grant wish." Marcus said.

You shivered by this and thought that Maeve owned this holiest artifact. You asked Marcus what's this got to do with Anna and he nodded and continued to talk.

"Anna knows the existance of the grail, and her eyes were fixed on that." Marcus spoke, "but she don't know that Maeve gave the grail to me, and she is looking deep into it so she could get the grails power."

"What wish is she thinking?" You asked him.

"That, I don't know. She never tells me about it." Marcus said.

"Is it alright to tell this info to us?" Reisen asked.

"Absolutely not, but I can sense she won't ask since I was not that close to Maeve." Marcus replied.

You sweated little as he put the grail and light engulfed and sank into his chest. He then told you he should get going back since Anna's expecting him to come back to her. You nodded and he got up until all of you heared a banging noise.

"What's that noise?" Vivian asked.

"It's coming from outside." You said.

Both you, reisen and Marcus got out to see what was going on then you saw the green haired woman with big chest and tattered cloth on her. Both you and Marcus clearly know who she was as she was none other then Maeve herself!! She looked very pale and her body had many scars.

"Maeve!?" You spoke with shock.

"Alex..please, help me!!" Maeve said with fear.

She grabbed your waist (reisen looked at her with narrow eyes) as you didn't know what was going on then you saw a young female with black cloth, short purple hair and a skull mask on her face. You didn't who that person were then she took out some kunai.

"Targets fear is growing..initiate elimination.." Girl said.

She then jumped and threw many kunai at her. Marcus took your hand and moved so you could be safe and reisen took Maeve and dodged the attack. The masked female were very fast as she was at maeves direction, reisen shot many bullets at her but it dodges the attack. Maeve just grabbed at reisen and then the female threw two kunais and hit in both Maeve and reisen. Reisen fell as you came to them, the female jumped back.

"The poison that is on the kunai is very potent...the target will die." Female said.

She then engulfed herself in the darkness and left. You told Marcus to get eirin and he left, thinking about the girl.

(Hassan knew she was here?) Marcus thought.

As he got in, you were talking to both reisen and Maeve. You didn't know why Maeve was this way as she was very powerful fairy.

"Whatever happened to your power, Maeve?" You asked.

"Erg...my power..is gone.." Maeve spoke in pain.

You were surprised to hear that then Marcus came back with eirin and took them into the E.R. And begun the operation. The operation took..
11131212111121211112222211211121111.title: Group meeting

111312121111212111122222112111211112.content:
It took 4 hours for the intelligent doctor to treat your former boss. During the operation, Marcus were called by Anna via cellphone to come back but he told her he have an urgent business with you so he extended his stay. After the long operation, eirin came out with blood on her rubber hand gloves.

"How was the operation?" You asked.

"I managed to pull out much of the poison out from them." Eirin replied, "but I believe the tiny dose of poison is still in both reisen and that ladies body, so I have put some antidote."

You sighed in relief that reisen is at least got out of deaths grip, but you didn't know how Maeve found this place and her power gone. You and Marcus went in the room, seeing the two ladies on the bed with antidote.

"You alright reisen?" You asked the bunny girl.

"Yes, thank you for asking Alex-Sama." Reisen spoke with smile.

You smiled then turned to the fairy queen who was your former boss. You still couldn't believe that you're seeing the queen of fairies laying on the bed with no power within her. Your head was filled with questions but you had one question that stood in your head.

"Tell me Maeve, explain to me what happened after nightingale killed every last top executive except you." You asked.

Maeve didn't say anything for moment as Marcus stood next to you, she then started to speak.

"After nightingale killed them, she fought me directly. I had the upper hand at first until the Hassan of cursed arm appeared and struck me." Maeve explained, "I fough both them but they they overwhelmed me so I fled. I fled fast and hid at my secret palace until I was caught by the Hassan of hundred faces and somehow took away my power and hunted me."

You couldn't believe what she was saying. You thought for moment, reminding yourself on this Hassan character then you heared Marcus's phone ring. He got it and talked for moment then hanged up the phone.

"Sorry my man, but your sis really needs my attention now. I must go now." Marcus said.

"Oh..well, I'm glad I could see you again." You replied.

He nodded and got out of the room. You wondered about Anna but you trust her and went to the kitchen to get some glass of water then once you walked you heared some chattering noise. You were no eave dropper but it got your attention and got on the door to listen.

"...so your telling me to kill that Marcus person?"

You know the voice were Tewis voice then other spoke.

"If we had that grail, we can easily defeat junkos authority and free our people!"

That voice were belonged to Kaguya and Tewi spoke up.

"But if he get killed, don't you think Alex's sisters going after your throat?" Tewi asked.

"I'm immortal, she could never kill me." Kaguya said, "now please send your best bunnies after him."

You were terrified to hear that and left quietly. Your first instinct was to tell, but who?
111312121111212111122222112111211112.title: Power hunger

111312121111212111122222112112.content:
Not far away, you spotted a woman at what looked to be a little souvenir stand in the middle of a bazaar, paying for her purchase with an awfully shiny platinum card. In all honesty, it was the shine of the card that first caught your attention before the woman did! But nonetheless, from your view the grey haired woman bared a striking resemblance to the woman in Mikaela's photo. The sunglasses werent doing a good job hiding her identity.
Quite possibly at the same time, Mikaela and Oleg spotted her and noticed the resemblance too!

"Nightingale?" your sister's client/arms dealer called out. Quickly, perhaps too quickly, she jerked your head your direction. And then immediately after, she dashed off!
“Стоп! СТОП!” Mikaela screamed as she chased after her with Oleg following. Not wanting to ditch a close friend (emphasis on 'close') you follow Mikaela and chase after Nightingale. Not wanting to lose a close friend, her drug dealer, AND her close friend to a drug dealer, Reisen followed you along!

“Стоп, черт!” Mikaela demanded. Nightingale didnt listen. She ran down the streets, through the alleyways, pushing people out of her way as she attempted to flee you. Despite being a hassle to move through tight spaces and crowds of peoples, you and your Russian entourage werent far behind. Cant help but wonder why Nightingale is running away to begin with.

Anastasia realized this and decided a new strategy. She mumbled possible obscenities under her breath and by the time you reached a three-way cross-street, she dropped a smoke bomb on the ground! In the blinding smoke clouds, the four of you inadvertently separated and ended up taking a different cross street. You werent sure where Reisen, Mikaela, or Oleg went, but your choice of street still had Anastasia in your sights!

You followed the runner all the way to what looked to be a nice fancy bar. Part of you felt an immensely strong aura from that bar, but you charged in there too quickly before you could question it. After a little bit of scanning around, you spotted Anastasia handing a small package sealed in packing paper to a woman in a black dress with a red and yellow Chinese-style tabard with a matching oriental crescent moon crown on her head.

Again, the aura was indeed electrifying, but again, you took no heed to it as you called out like an idiot, “Nightingale?”

The music stopped. Everybody in the bar stopped what they were doing. Even the armed ones. And every single person in the bar looked your way. Something told you were just stumbled into the wrong neighborhood.
Anastasia backed away as the woman in the black dress got up out of her seat and approached you. Part of you felt incredibly uneasy staring into her red eyes. They kinda reminded you of Reisen's, only instead of alluring, they felt intimidating and hostile. The aura strengthened and you couldve sworn you saw four purple flames sprout from behind her for a brief moment.

“May I help you?” she asked, casually sipping her drink while her eyes dug into your soul.

You had bad feelings, but you stared back and kept your cool.
“I have business with Nightingale,” you pointed over to her. You spotted a few armed drinkers begin to raise their weapons, but the woman brushed her hand downwards, and thankfully they lowered them.
“I dont believe you do,“ she states, “I'm afraid this is a private event and you were not invited. So if you could kindly be on your way, that would be most appreciated.”
“Believe me, I mean no disrespect and I'm sorry to intrude uninvited,” you humbly tell her, “but an associate of mine… and hers need to have a word with her.”
“Youre going to need to tell that associate she's far too busy,” she strictly declined.
You swallowed hard, took a glance over at Anastasia… and you got curious.

“Ok, I'll leave. But before I go, I'd like to ask her something… it's about Le Fey.” The room got quiet again. You really shouldnt be involving yourself in such matters, but there's a few things you need to know now that it's in shambles.

Although it got incredibly awkward when the red-eyed woman in front of you tilted her head suspiciously.

“ALEX!! GET AWAY FROM HER!!” speaking of red-eyed women, Reisen darted into the bar like a bat of Hell and stood in front of you as if trying to shield you from this woman!
“Reisen?”
“Stay back! Dont get near her!” Reisen warned her before turning the woman's direction. “L-Leave him alone, Junko! He has nothing to do with you!” The woman's eyes widened with intrigue. History together?

“Well!!!” Junko sighed ecstatic, “do my eyes deceive me or am I staring at the mentally broken spawn of Udongein-Inaba?” Geez, the odd look in her eyes as she stared at Reisen was making YOU uncomfortable! “Are you seeing this, Chang'e?!” Junko suddenly shouted to the ceiling, “one of your mistreated, wounded, and scarred ex-soldiers has graced my presence!”
The poor bunny girl was beginning to shiver, but she remained still, shielding you from whatever Junko was capable of.

“Oh, it seems like only yesterday when you were such a cute little kitten,” Junko stroked one of Reisen's bunny ears, making her shiver even more, “my, how you've grown into such a lovely young woman. I bet your former comrades would agree. You remember them, dont you?”

“HEY! СУКА!”

And just then, Mikaela and Oleg busted into the joint with a handful of Kalashnikov-wielding militants at her side. Both sides drew their weapons ready for a showdown as one of the militants dragged you out of danger. The moment of surprise gave Reisen time to back the hell away from Junko too.

“Если вы коснулись Sasha, я будет вырывает ваши яичники с вилкой!!” Mikaela made a damning threat to Junko and you probably dont wanna know what she said.
“You've got some nerve, young lady” Junko glared, “barging in on a private matter recklessly pointing such weapons our direction… and you dont even have the decency to wipe your feet! That carpet is expensive!”
Mikaela could give less a shit about the carpet, but the last thing you needed was a bloodbath. You hoped they could be civil before bullets started flying.

“Miss,” Oleg spoke up, “we dont wish to resort to needless bloodshed. My boss has some important business with Ms. Nightingale. It should only take a moment.”
“Whatever business you had with my subordinate does not concern me,” Junko stated, “and it no longer concerns her either.”
Oleg translated to Mikaela. Mikaela squinted her eyes and replied back.
“My boss wishes to-”

“I know what she said,” Junko interrupted her, “I know she's young and stubborn, but she needs to understand that meddling in affairs that dont involve her can result in such nasty consequences. Youre lucky I'm still generous enough to allow you, the boy, the rabbit, and your fellow thugs the opportunity to leave this place with your lives.” Junko then squinted her eyes, “But if you dont put down your weapons then turn around and leave this instant, I may have to reconsider.”

This is leaving you with so many questions. But questions dont matter if you dont still have a life left to ask them. Youre willing to walk out calmly... but is Mikaela? Just how important is Anastasia to her? And how important is Anastasia to you?
111312121111212111122222112112.title: Seeking New Employment

choices: Tell Mikaela youre staying with Reisen.
Tell Reisen youre going with Mikaela.
1113121211112121111222221121121.content:
Mikaela, at least according to your sister, was hot-headed and overzealous. Of course, that's clearly the pot calling the kettle black, but she still has a point. Thankfully, you werent seeing your life flash before your eyes yet. No bullets flying so far. Ms. Yurazinski was hesitant.
She sneered over at Anastasia who looked back at her with relent, but she lowered her head, muttered something in Russian and gave the order to stand down. Her cavalry obediently lowered her guns. No bloodbath. You were relieved, but not as relieved, who seemed to be praying and mouthing 'Thank you' under her breath!

"Well that certainly an exciting performance," Junko stated sarcastically, "I just wish my son were here to see it. ...Oh right. I almost forgot." She glared at your bunny-girl companion for some strange reason who looked as though the Devil himself was staring her in the eye! "Now if you'll see yourselves out, we'll pretend this thoughtless intrusion never happened."

Oleg ushered his head to the door. Mikaela curled her lip and gave another command and she and her men left the bar.

"Ms. Udongein-Inaba?" Reisen froze up when Junko called her by her... er... dynasty name? "be sure to give my regards to your majesty." Reisen swallowed hard as she continued walking. You followed behind as sort of a moral support. Though you didnt take much notice, Anastasia was staring at you as you left.

"Черт!" your angry ruskie broad cursed repeatedly, "Черт! Черт! Черт! Черт!" She then spoke a bit too fast to soak in even for bilingual people but her verbal reactions summed up what she was nagging. The way she was pinching her fingers hinted she was talking about how close she was, she made a little walking gesture with her hands followed by a grabbing motion, then she pointed toward the bar she was leaving, then clenching her fist, and then grabbing a fork and thrusting it upwards. To be honest, it was always fun to watch Mikaela's nagging charade game... at least until it occurs after having a major argument with your sister!

As fun as it was to watch her vent, you had to tune her out. You were still thinking about the fate of Le Fey at this rate. With the top elite members of the Winter Court dead, there's no doubt the entire family is in disarray. Titania and her Summer Court would no doubt take the opportunity to strike Maeve while her gang is wounded. What would become of the blood contract? Does this mean you and your family are finally free? And your father... IF he's alive... is he finally free, too?

"Are you alright, Alex-sama?"
"Sasha! Ты в порядке?"
Both Reisen and Mikaela derailed your train of thought as they asked you in unison, then turned to one another and gave each other cold stares.

"I'm fine, I'm fine," you assured, "thank you."

"I'm sorry about... that woman," Reisen apologized, "if I had known SHE of all people were in this village, I'd have never let you come with me today."
"You have history with this Junko woman?" you asked.
"More like the Lunarian Kingdom has history with her," she answered, "she's one of the biggest reasons Princess Kaguya is seeking refuge in a hospital on earth instead of her kingdom on the moon." Mikaela seemed to be listening in, but had no translator present, “Um… look, I know you probably have certain secrets that I shouldnt know about for my own good. When it comes to her, we've got certain secrets that you shouldnt be knowing about for your own good too. I've taken a huge risk just telling you this much!”

You nodded. You understood. It's probably best you dont know who Junko is or what she's capable of. If SHE has anything to do with the inevitable Fey civil war, she must be a force to be reckoned with!

"Hey uh, Mikaela?" Reisen turned her attention to your russian comrade who seemed to take no notice. "Mikaela?" she asked again. Again, Mikaela paid no attention. "Mikaela? Mikaela!" Reisen nearly shouted, but still no response.
"Mikaela?" you called out to her.
"Sasha?" you friend was incredibly quick to respond to you!
You pointed over to Reisen, "My friend wants to talk to you."
Ms. Yurazinski frowned and turned her head to Reisen.

"Our uh... deal?" the bunny girl makes hand gestures, miming pouring pills out of an imaginary pill bottle in her other hand, then rubbing her fingers together. Her nonenglish speaking dealer sighed hard and motioned for her bodyguard to come over. Oleg came and she spoke out her response to which he quickly translated.

"My apologies, Ms. Inaba."
"Udongein-Inaba," Reisen corrected.
"Ms. Udongein-Inaba," Oleg corrects himself, "but due to newly unexpected circumstances, the deal will have to be put on hold for today." Although you had no qualms with that, SHE certainly did!
"Youre kidding!" she whined, "do you know how many hoops I had to jump through to even arrange this deal?! I had to reschedule previous plans, call in sick to work, bribe co-workers, my own master doesnt even know I'm here!" Too much information!
"We are very sorry to cause you so much trouble," Oleg apologized even though his boss probably wasnt that concerned, "we will arrange for a personal driver to take you safely home.

She groaned hard disappointingly as her bunny ears lowered down to her face. "This was a total waste! C'mon, Alex. Let's go." You nodded and you were just about to follow along with Reisen.

Until Mikaela grabbed your arm. Even with the thick gloves, her grip was chilly! Your other friend's bunny ears immediately stood on end!

Once again, your grabber said something to Oleg who quickly translated.

"I'm afraid Mr. Whitestone needs to come with us," he stated, "he has become a vital witness and potential target. For his safety, he will be put under our protection." Aw crap.
"NO! No! No no no no no!" Reisen grabbed your other arm, "he's already under Eientei protection! We're already keeping him safe from danger."
Oleg translates, Mikaela squints her eyes at Reisen and responds.
"With all due respect," when Oleg starts his translation off with that statement, it's probably cuz his boss was talking smack, "he will need more protection that a hospital/drug house in the middle of nowhere. Which is what we can offer him."
Reisen's glowing eyes widened with anger. "Did YOU just call MY home a drug house?!" oh snap, she was plucking her earrings out, ready to unleash fury on that smart-mouth dyevushka!

"Wait wait wait! Please dont!" you told your enraged pal to hold back, then turned to Mikaela, "Mikaela, you know Anna isnt gonna approve of this."
After her bodyguard's translation, Mikaela sneered, "Tsk!" with a scowl, she went off on a rough rant. As she was talking, the bunny girl decided it was an appropriate time to pull out her phone.
"Er, w-with all due respect," oh god, here we go, "your sister needs to understand how generous my boss has been to her. Ms. Yurazinski has personally bent over backwards to ensure errands and reliable clients to ensure that Ms. Whitestone is financially capable of being on the run. And if your sister commits an action that any of her clients find incredibly offensive, my boss has personally taken matters to keep said clients from destroying contracts... let alone calling out hits on your beloved sister. HER enemies become OUR enemies." She's got a point. Anna owes quite a bit to her.

"Did you know she called your sister a bitch about six times in that whole rant?" Reisen suddenly spoke up, "look." You turned your head and she showed you the little vocal translation feature on her phone. "That last sentence, although the translation is kinda sloppy, it looks to me like she said that if she had her way, she'd clip Anna's clitoris off and sell her to a Chechen brothel." Good lord, it DOES say that! You looked at Mikaela with disgust as Oleg began to sweat.

But as grim as that was, Anna has said much MUCH worse about HER too. Regardless, youre in the middle of a tug of war between a mentally ill bunny girl and a crazy slav with a loose tongue! Best to make your choice while your arms arent permanently dislocated yet!
1113121211112121111222221121121.title: Usa-Russo Relations

11131212111121211112222211211211.content:
You thought for moment and decided to stay with reisen since you owe her and the eientei a huge favor. You told Oleg your decision and reisen hugged you in happiness. Oleg told mikaela and she was mad for hearing this and started to rant. You might understood what she was rant and she told Oleg and he came forward.

"I apologize but she cannot allow this to happen." Oleg said.

He grabbed your arm hard and moved as you were in pain, reisen pointed her finger with bullet on the tip. Oleg looked at her and reisen was in her stance.

"Alex-Sama decided to come with me, so let him go." Reisen said.

"You don't want to mess with us, ms." Oleg spoke.

Before you could say anything, a huge darkness engulfed the surrounding. You didn't know what was going on until some one grabbed you and dashed. Once the darkness faded, you and reisen were back in eientei.

"How did we-"

"My Hassan did it."

You turned and saw Anna smoking cigarette and a purple haired woman in black robe standing. You didn't know what was going on until the female spoke to Anna and she sighed.

"That Russian fucker knows nothing about me and yet she thinks she's a smartass." Anna said, "anyway, we have company to talk."

You didn't know who until you saw...
11131212111121211112222211211211.title: Tell Mikaela youre staying with Reisen.

111312121111212111122222112112111.content:
At the cafeteria section of the hospital stood that big lovable heavy-set black chef from the mean streets of Detroit (well, actually he was born in Lansing) sporting his 'Kiss the Cook' apron over his red sweatshirt he seems to never take off, and his old famous near century old chef hat that was passed down from generation to generation. His father was a chef, and his father was a chef, then HIS father was a chef, and his father was the head of a Liberian cartel known for smuggling drugs through baked goods.

"Hi Marcus!" you quickly rushed over to greet the big lug.
"Little Al?" he squinted his eyes to get a good look at you, "is that you? Damn, aint seen you in like forever!" One customized high-five and chest bump later (dont question it), "how ya'll been doing? Still on the lamb cuz ya got Le Fey up in yo ass."
"You already know the answer to that," you sighed.
He chuckled, "Damn right. Who dont? Hang on, ya still got a hankering for rum cake?" DO YOU?!
"You bet I do!" No one makes rum cake quite like ol' Marcus.

"Hold it!" Anna got in the middle of the guy moment, "you still using Mikaela's stuff for the glaze?"
"Ya'll know it," he answered proudly.
"He's not hungry!" she immediately cuts you off, "in fact, you can take rum cake off the menu permanently from now on."
"Anna!"
"Alex, we are DONE dealing with that woman," she tells you, "we do not need income that badly. I told you over and over to stay away from her! I told you numerous times what kind of terrible human being she is! I even had to tell you repeatedly why you shouldnt be sitting in the same room alone with this woman! This is the THIRD time she tried to the kidnap you!"
"Anna, she only tried to kidnap me TWICE," you correct her as if that freaking matters!
"Alex! There was clearly rohypnol in your drink over in Saint Petersburg!" she stated, "what do you THINK she wouldve done if you ended up drinking it and passed out?" You can keep denying that she's clearly bad news despite saving your sister's bacon who knows how many times. But Anna's right. If you wanna get out of the shady mafia business for good, youre gonna have to ultimately say 'Pahkah' to Mikaela.

"Guess this means shitcan the eggnog too?" Marcus asked.
"Yes Marcus," Anna answers, "shitcan the eggnog."
"Damn..." he frowned, "that was like one of my best sellers." And so he went to the back to clear out the stock. Damn shame. You REALLY loved the eggnog too. Especially when it's laced with that sweet imported 'sugar' that Ms. Yurazinki is known for dealing.

"As for YOU rabbit."

"!!" Reisen's ears immediately stood up on end as soon as your sister turned her attention to her! Anna's cold stare burned into the soul of that poor mentally ill bunny girl that put you in harm's way.

"Dont think I'm gonna forget what you did to my brother any time soon," Anna gave her a cold warning. The black robed woman edged up behind Reisen as if surrounding her. "The only reason I'm not skinning you alive after nearly getting my brother abducted is because I need you."
"W-W-what do you want?" Reisen stuttered, "I-I-I dont know anything-"
"You got a lot of nerve lying to me!" Reisen made Anna angry. Bad move, "you think I dont know you got history with that woman who's currently employing one of Mikaela's old associates?" Oh dear, she already found out.
"Er... l-look, for master's sake, for the princess's sake, I dont wanna get any of them in trouble with her!"
"Dont worry, I'm not gonna get them involved," Anna assures, "just YOU. Alex, could you please step out? We need to have a private talk with Ms. Inaba."
"U-Ud-"
"Shut up!"

It was understandable to be worried for Reisen's sake.
"Anna..."
"Dont worry, we're not gonna hurt you," your sister tells you, "you have my word." You felt uneasy for that bunny girl that got you in trouble, but you trust your sister's word. You nodded and stepped out, hoping for the best.
You sighed in deep relief, thankful that your sis didnt decide to relocate you again. You were getting awful sick of moving around so much. You could really use some more friends and you cant do that if you cant stay in one place for more than a while!

You stood outside in the hallway waiting patiently for whatever conversation they were having to be over. Judging by the fact you dont hear Reisen screaming, you could tell your sister kept her word.
Speaking of which, despite such a terrible episode, youre still reminding yourself of Anastasia. It probably shouldnt be your business anymore, but now that she played a key role in practically destroying the Winter Court, you have questions that you think she might have the answer to. One of them, the most pressing of all them, involves the fate of your dad. Not even sis will tell you what really became of him if he isnt dead and you heard stories about what Maeve's people do to traitors and you'd way rather he be dead than put to such drastic activities! But if he ISNT dead... well...

"It's a violent pornography. Choking chicks and sodomy..."

And then your phone went off, knocking your train of thought off the tracks. Honestly, you didnt feel like answer the phone, but you peeked at the caller ID. Unknown ID. Probably another stupid telemarketer.
You exhaled, waiting for the System of A Down song to be over so it'd be sent to voice mail.

"Sasha? ...Sasha?" Mikaela?! How did she get your phone number?! Oh right. You got drunk off rum cake this one time and you gave it to her willy nilly! What kind of mafioso are you?! Anyways, you greeted your teeth in thought as she continued to call you by your nickname. You thought about it, then you thought about your sister, then you thought about how mad your sister would get if she found out that Russian fucker was calling you on your phone.... then you...
111312121111212111122222112112111.title: What part of "Нет" dont you understand?!

1113121211112121111222221121121111.content:
You decided to not pick up the phone since you had bad feeling that Anna's might go ballistic to see you in contact with her. You waited then the phone finally finished ringing and it went to voicemail. You thought for moment until you noticed Marcus come out with loads of trays.

"How's Anna?" You've asked.

"She's still talking with ms.udongein." Marcus replied.

"Ah, I see." You said, "anyway, what's with the trays?"

"Giving out some tasty fudge to patients." Marcus replied.

You asked if he needed help and he gladly took the offer. You took some trays and carried it as he went from patients to patients, regular to diabetics, young and old. They thanked you and Marcus, letting you think about him. You know Marcus from beginning as he was your average chef in the mess hall at the maeves place. He knew how to cook good food from perfect turkey sandwich to pot roasts. He left maeves place after he was told he couldn't work after his medical issues. After giving out the last fudge to the patient, Marcus smiled.

"I hope you'll get better soon." Marcus said.

"Thank you mr.chef." Patient spoke.

Both of you left and you saw..
1113121211112121111222221121121111.title: ...wait for her to hang up.

choices: "Who gave you permission to wander off to the Human Village?!"
"DID YOU JUST BUMP INTO JUNKO TODAY?!!"
"Did you lend Mokou my copy of Street Fighter V?!"
11131212111121211112222211211211112.content:
The sight of the purple-haired woman with bunny ears immediately caught your undivided attention. It was an incredible relief that she looked unharmed after whatever she went through with your sister behind closed doors. In fact Reisen was so fine, she was seen signing the leg cast of a young patient in a wheelchair.

You stared as she carefully scribbled her name in kanji with a purple marker and even added a cutesy little anime bunny-girl face at the end of it. Certainly no sign that Anna horribly abused her beyond repair there!
"There we go!" Reisen finishes her autograph with a chipper tone in her voice.
"Wow! Thanks, Reisen!" the little girl in the wheelchair beamed, admiring the stylish penmanship and little art design.
"Make sure you dont let it get wet for a while," Reisen says, "the ink takes a bit of time to dry."
"I wont!" the girl promises, "and I promise I'll take good care of it until the cast comes off!"
"That wont be very long now," Reisen assures, "with Dr. Yagokoro's treatment, that leg will be healed up in no time."
"When it does, can we go play volleyball on the beach soon?"
"I've already picked out my new swimsuit!" Hmm. There's a beach nearby?

Anyways, Reisen gives the young patient a friendly and careful hug and she rolled off on her way. And as soon as she was out of there, that was your moment to strike!

"Hi Reisen!"

"!!" she suddenly froze up. You didnt know why, but you coulda sworn it out of fright. It took her several seconds to finally turn around and greet you with a friendly smile. "Hi Alex-sama!" Though her smile looked genuine, her eyes quickly beamed around you like she was checking for something behind you! You had a feeling you knew who she was looking for.

"How was it with Anna? Are you alright?" you asked her, "she didnt hurt you, did she?"

"No, no, she didnt, I'm fine," she tells you, "forthemostpart."
"She absolutely didnt hurt you?" you observe her to be safe, "she didnt leave you any scars or anything?"
"No no no no!" she brushed you away, "nothing like that."
"So what happened?" you ask, "what did she do?"

"Well, she questioned me about how I knew your friend Mikaela," Reisen explains while still looking around for Anna, "I told her what I knew, I told her about some my contacts and their connections with certain groups. Then she asked me to call up one of them to set up a deal with her." Ugh.. of course! She's STILL doing this shit and now she just dragged Reisen into it! Well, to be fair, she was already a part of this mess before, but now she's forcing that poor mentally ill bunny drug mule into even deeper shit!

"Then after that, she let me go."
You sighed. But then her ears lowered as she finished with regret, "But not before telling me that if she ever caught me putting a hand on you again, she'd stick so much C4 up my ass that my cough would trigger an explosion." DAMN IT, SIS! She can sure be a handful.

"I'm sorry about her. Dont worry, I'll talk to her-"
"No, that's ok," she assured her with a defeated frown, "it's... probably for the best. I got you in enough trouble, already.”
“It's not anything I'm not used to,” you attempt to ease her sorrow, but to no avail.
“It could be,” she admits, “I'll probably end up getting you hurt or worse. Heck, I might end up trying to take advantage of you again like that one night.” And that's an issue, why?
“I'm prepared to take that risk,” you made no effort trying to hide your excitement.

At the very least, it made Reisen smile, “Dont worry, Alex-sama. I'm sure you'll find someone else easily. There are plenty of suitable available girls here.” Aww… but you didnt even get a chance to be raped by She-Hulk Reisen yet!! “Besides, you dont need to worry about me. I'm thinking of calling up an old friend I havent seen in a while.”
“Oh?” your interest sparks and you do damndest not to be jelly.
“Yeah, she's the gardener over at Hakugyokurou. Youmu.” 'SHE'?!! “She's the bravest roughest swordswinging most determined phantom half-breed you'll ever see in this lifetime and the next! Plus, she sure knows how to rock a bikini when she finally musters the guts to put one on!” Wow. It's one thing to discover that Reisen is bi, but it's another to see her swooning over an old friend. It kinda warms your heart, but youre not only still jelly, youre TWICE as jelly now that you find out this crush of hers is a girl!

“Well,” you swallow pride (and a little sadness), “if something does manage to spark between the two of you, I hope you have a great time together.” You could hope for a threesome, at least!
“Thanks, Alex-sama,” your bunny-earred friend (emphasis on FRIEND) smiled. To everyone's dismay, the smile didnt last long. She quickly reminds herself of the OTHER bad thing that happened today. “OH! A...about that… (gulp) woman we met at the bar.”
“Oh, you mean Junko?”
“SSSH!!” she quickly shushes you while glancing everywhere for eavesdroppers, “dont say that name so loud! If anybody hears that we bumped into her, all hell will break loose!”

“She's a lot of trouble for you guys, isnt she?” your curiosity sparked.
Reisen just got uncomfortable. She didnt look willing to talk about her. “Look, just… just pretend we never bumped into her in the first place. And please dont breathe a word about her to the others, I dont want them to start panicking.”
She bites her lip and gives you a pleading look with her big alluring red eyes.

“Ok, Ok! I wont say anything!” you cave, “I promise!” Not like it'll matter, anyways. You probably aint seen the last of her and her ilk.

“REEEEEEEISEEEEEEEN!!!!”

You almost jumped out of your skin suit and Reisen's ears sprung up with fright! That loud shout came from Eientei's own Lunarian princess who suddenly appeared out of nowhere, standing right beside you!
“Y-Y-Y-Your majesty?” Reisen bowed nervously as Kaguya glared back.

Kaguya took a deep breath before shouting into the bunny's face...

“OH!” both you and Big Yumi replied in unison.

“M-M-Me?!!!” she said with widened eyes behind her spectacles and a blush. You were simply at a loss for words.
But Reisen nods, “She says youre required. We're gonna need to have you fitted for your specially made suit!” The thought of Big Yumi dressed as a playboy bunny just left you feeling awful flustered. It took way more effort than it shouldve to fight off the nosebleed.

And thankfully to you and your pervy imagination, she reluctantly agrees. “O...ok. If I have to.”

But Reisen still wasnt done.

“Alex-sama, you need to dress up, too.”

You stared back at her in silence, trying to process what she just said.
“Um… as what?”

A couple of seconds later...

“WAIT! WHAT?!!” you raised your voice in a panic, “ME?!! A BUNNY-GIRL?! BUT I'M A GUY!”
“The mistress says everyone has to dress up,” Reisen repeats herself. You couldnt believe what you were hearing! Is Kaguya serious?! Does she not see how obviously wrong that is?! What is with that weird look Yumi's giving you?!

“Well… if we're doing a casino theme, shouldnt I dress up as like a dealer or magician or something?”
“No, the mistress is gonna be the magician,” the real bunny-girl answers.
“This… this aint gonna work!” you object, “I-I'm a guy! I cant dress up like that… it… it just aint right!”
“Those are her orders,” Reisen states, “you have to do what youre told. Otherwise you have to face the consequences.”

What kind of 'consequences'? Are they even worse then dressing in drag as a playboy bunny?!

“Come Alex, just do it,” Big Yumi looks down at you and tells you with encouragement, “I'm sure it'll look really good on you.” Errr…
“Me too,” you heard Reisen whispered.

1113121211112121111222221121121111212113.content:
Your tall bunny-earred goddess whom you unofficially made yourself an acolyte for locked eyes with the bunny-earred chocolate-skinned assassin from a distant land you probably cant pronounce. Before either of them even said a word, you could tell by the attentive glance they gave eachother that they knew one another.

"Ash?!" Yumi spouted in shock, "what are you doing here?!!"

"Ms. Whitestone summoned me here," 'Ash' answered, "and why are YOU here? And dressed as provocatively as Alex if not moreso?" She even had the audacity to point at her bunny suit she was delightfully scantily clad in! Yumi leered down at her and covered her nearly exposed chest region from her view!

"Alex's sister told me to come here and keep an eye on him!" she answers. Immediately upon answering, Serenity glances both direction.

"Then where is Tamamo no Mae?" she questions, "why is she not here with you?"
"I didnt bring Tamamo with me."
"Why not?"
Yumi squints her eyes, "You know why I didnt bring her." Her eyes quickly gesture your direction! Serenity then turns her head to you.
"I see," and it seemed like that was all she needed to hear!

"Who is Tamamo?" you ask.
"Ms. Majima's ser-"
"Nevermind,” Big Yumi cut her off, “anyways Ash, I take it that the princess of this place got you involved in her weird scheme?” She asks, pointing out Serenity's new bunny suit.
“I suppose so,” Serenity remarked, a hint of nervousness in her otherwise calm facade, “surprisingly, it doesnt feel quite as uncomfortable as it looks.”
“Yeah...” you failed to keep that word from slipping out of your mouth.

“Yes, the tailor did some impressive work,” Yumi looked down at her own suit and you tried not to stare too hard yourself, “I havent come across any movie costume designers with the kind of talent she has.”
“Still, I cant say this costume suits me,” Serenity critiqued, “I wouldve preferred more of an Arabian harem theme, myself.”
“Please dont say that too loud!” Big Yumi whined, “you dont wanna give these guys ideas!” Too late. The spectacular image of Yumi as a belly dancer is now engraved in your mind and it aint coming out for no one!

“W-w-w-w-we...” you stutter to utter the very first word while thoughts of the tall bunny goddess gyrating her heavenly hips to the rhythm of middle eastern music dominated your mind, “*cough* well, I think an arabian theme would be a cool idea. Aladdin was my favorite Disney movie, I loved the setting and the mythos it revolved around.”
“That disgusting hollywood perverted cartoon written by illiterate infidels did not do the proud glorious mythos justice,” Ash suddenly got a bit defensive.
“My favorite Disney movie was Mulan,” Yumi interjected. Sadly, Secret Female Wei Warrior Yumi was not nearly as breathtaking as Belly Dancer Yumi, “it was also based on an actual historic events.”
“No it wasnt,” Serenity asserted, “it was based on an old chinese ballad in the 11th century.”
“Which derived from her legend recorded in Yan Xiyuan's 'One Hundred Beauties'!” Yumi quipped.
“That only referred to Chinese women of folklore,” Serenity quipped, “not historical documentation.”
“That was typical how historical documentation was recorded back then!” Yumi remarked.

The two of them bickered and you were too busy zoning out over Yumi as a belly dancer. All the while, another particular bunny girl in bunny girl attire was rushing over after overhearing awful news.

“Pst! Hey! HEY!” you finally snapped out of it when you heard someone quietly calling over to you from behind the doorway. Sure enough, it was OTHER bunny goddess you were lusting over, peeking out from the doorway jerking her head her way. She certainly didnt have to tell you twice!

“What is it, Rei-sama?” you didnt even realize you gave her such a formal address out of nowhere. She totally notice and briefly swelled up before quickly resuming her panicked expression.

“Bad news! Really bad news!” she emphasized in whispered, “like REALLY really bad news!”
“What's the really really bad news?” you ask.

“Remember that bar we ran into where we chased that Anastasia girl and bumped into…. HER?”

….Yep. That bar. Oh dear.

“Y...yeah….” you were beginning to panic just like Reisen.

“I just overheard the princess talking with one of the ad agents,” she took a deep breath and continues, “they're gonna have a couple of us serve as waitresses there.” WAITRESSES?! As if you werent already embarrassed by sporting this stupid ensemble (and getting awful used to it after seeing Reisen and Yumi sporting it as well!), now you gotta bring it out in public and bus tables?!

...Wait a minute! Even worse!

“Is uh… Junko still over there?”
“I dont know,” she shook her head, “but I'm sure she hasnt forgotten we barged into her private party.”
“Do you think she remembers me?” you ask.
“Well she certainly remembers ME!” Reisen snapped for a sec, “you remember that confrontation before that Russian skank barged in! She knows way too much about me! She knows my freaking family name! Oh god, I can still feel that creepy ass gaze of hers gaping into my soul!”

“Reisen. Reisen! Get a hold of yourself!” you grabbed her shoulders and talked her down. Instinctively, she wrapped her arms around you!
“Sorry, sorry, I got a little carried away,” she apologized… but still had her arms around you, “but what are we gonna do? If the princess even finds out that Junko and us crossed paths, she's gonna wonder why! Then she's gonna find out about… you know… that deal between me and the skank.”
“Well, we'll just need to keep our distance,” you suggest, “dont give direct eye contact and try to stay in the background as often as we can.”

“HEY YUMI! THAT BUNNY-GIRL'S TRYING TO MAKE OFF WITH YOUR GUY AGAIN!!”

Suddenly, you can hear the familiar shouting of Big Yumi's #2 fan (you became #1 ever since she wore that bunny girl outfit!). Apparently Yumi and Serenity needed a 2nd opinion on the historical accuracy of Mulan, so they got her on the phone and as she was giving her totally unbiased opinion, she caught sight of you and Reisen! ...Not sure why Sumireko's in a bunny girl costume too.

“Y-YUMI-SAMA! THIS ISNT WHAT IT LOOKS LIKE!” Reisen got incredibly defensive.
“What does it look like?” Serenity asks, not getting the picture.
“Like Rei-Rei over there was trying to get all touchy-feely with Bunny Babe Yumi's other bunny babe!” quipped Sumireko before Yumi groaned and set her phone to mute.

“Anyways, you seemed pretty jumpy,” despite her nosey fan being too nosey, she did notice something was up.
“J-Jumpy?!” Reisen kinda lost control of her voice, “me?!”
“Yeah, is something wrong, Reisen?”
“Something we need to know about?” Serenity got suspicious herself.

The two of you gave a quick glance at eachother before answering...

1113121211112121111222221122211121112.content:
As soon as you spotted two familiar women wrapped in towels standing by the sink and mirror, your heart raced.
You quickly cringed and hid away in a shower stall, fearing yet another round of exhausting, agonizing, break-free mating as soon as you spotted the doc and that particular purple haired bunny girl who pretty much got you into this mess in the first place! Youre not sure you can put up with any more! A dozen girls in one go is ENOUGH for one night!

Thankfully for your current mortal shell, Eirin and Reisen werent noticing you. They seemed too concerned with whatever they were doing. Despite the thoughts of the worst case scenario filling your mind, you couldnt help but eavesdrop. It was like a natural impulse for you. Reisen scooted up close to Eirin anxiously while her master was eyeing a little tiny thin device in her hand uneasily.

“What's it say, master? What's it say?” the overactive bunny girl quick, trying to peek over.
“Negative,” Eirin said with a disappointed sigh and a spirit-broken frown on her face to match, “I'm not pregnant.” Oh… that's what it is, huh? Aw, that look on Eirin's face was really tugging at your heart strings!

“Dont give up,” Reisen tried to cheer her boss up, “I'm sure you'll get a baby real soon if you keep at it.”
“I think it's too late for me,” the doc said with defeat in her voice, “I'm already past my prime. I dont have nearly a fraction of the energy all the girls around here have anymore.” She tossed the little device in the trash.
“Dont say that!” the bunny girl remarked, “you've gone more stamina than any one of us put together! Youre strong, smart, resilient, and you got a gorgeous bod that even the princess is secretly envious of. Seriously, I overheard her!” That's for sure. She sure had a smoking body for a woman her age! ...Er, how old is she, anyway?
Eirin chuckled, “Thanks, Reisen. But not even supermodels can escape the inevitable course of age. Maybe I shouldnt have devoted so much of life to my studies and actually gone out and mingled a little more. I just have to face it. My biological clock stopped ticking a long time ago.” She tried to keep a straight face, but you could tell her heart was breaking. You'd rush over there and give her a big hug if you werent worried they were gonna double-team you until you died of a heart attack and drug overdose!

“No it hasnt!” her loyal subordinate disagrees, “you still have it in you! You just have to mount Alex-Sama a few more times! Youre sure to have a bouncing baby girl or boy in no time!” You almost hyperventilated hearing that! Fortunately, Dr. Yagokoro wasnt that eager.
“I almost threw out my back fucking him that ONE time!” she exclaims a little louder than she shouldve, “I dont know how you and Tewi do it, but there's no way I can go at it for hours on end!”

Reisen just giggled and smirked and her ears twitched. You got a bit suspicious of that response and so did her master.

“What was that?!” Eirin questioned as the cheeky bunny girl smiled slyly.

“Weeeelll….” Reisen rolled her eyes, “if you REALLY wanna know my secret… I know of this special super secret drug shop that sells really good 'vitamins' for 'endurance enhancing'!” Uh oh.
Sure enough, Eirin was not amused.

“Reisen, youre still skipping on your meds and buying illegal drugs?!” she was steamed, “I specifically told you hundreds of times not to do so!”
The bunny girl lowered her ears with shame (TEMPORARY shame) “I know I know… but they are VERY good drugs! Seriously, Eientei could really use the kinds of medicine they have to offer… especially now that we're in such short supply!”
“For the last time, we're NOT going to a black market dealer!” Dr. Yagokoro adamantly refuses, “if the princess's father ever found out we stooped to that level, we would lose everything!”
“But master, we've got an incredibly low stock now that you dumped out all the tainted stuff!” the bunny drug pushed pleaded, “and this store has practically everything we need for all our needy patients!”
“We're not going that route!” snaps the doctor, “now never bring it up again!”

“Ok ok,” Reisen was smart enough to back out, BUT... “...but I'd at least consider checking out the hormonal drugs they sell-”
“REISEN!”
“Wait, master! Hear me out!” she pleads, “there's this one drug they sell call 'Venus Infinity'. It's an outrageously strong hormonal enhancement for females and it guarantees 100% fertility or double your money back!”
“Just a useless sells ploy with fine print that goes on for miles,” Eirin shrugs.
“Believe me, it isnt!” Reisen shakes her head vigorously, “I know of one 80 year old human woman from the Human Village bought a bottle… and only months later, she gave birth to twins!” The flying hell?!

That was so unbelievable, even Eirin did a double take, “TWINS?! From an 80 year old human?!”
Reisen nodded, “Yeah, and obviously human females about their age are LONG past their baby-making prime! If a wrinkly old prune like her could still make babies, you'll have NO problem!”
The doctor squinted her eyes and sneered… but she seemed pretty speechless. It looked difficult for her to flat out brush off such a potential improvement after hearing such an unbelievable anecdote!

“Er...” she moans, “...I… guess… this place might be worth browsing. JUST browsing! And if you tell ANYONE about this..”
“I wont tell a soul! You have my word!” the bunny girl winks, “hang on, I'll call Mr. Hokuo and see if the store's open today.”
'Hokuo'? That name rings a bell. ...Didnt Anna used to go to a doctor named Hokuo? The medicines he prescribed to her were pretty shady…
Nah, it's probably a coincidence! There's quite a lot of people out there with the last name Hokuo! Probably plenty of doctors named Hokuo, too! ...Are they plenty of shady doctors that prescribe shady drugs most likely not approved by the FCC named Hokuo?

Suffice to say it sparked your interest. Must be a small world if Anna's friends have ties with your new friends here. Whether it's a good thing or a bad thing remains to be seen.

Despite your body being a little weak, your mind and will are still strong. Should you follow these two in secret later and find out more about this Hokuo and his most likely not legal drug store or ignore it, finish your shower and get some rest?

Bunny Anna lowered her head, "it's my fault that Eientei was attacked. I shoulda known better than to trust that fucking Persian."
"What are you talking about?" you asked her.
Anna's bunny ears lowered along with her head in shame, "A while before we fled Le Fey, I made a pact with Adalgar and tried to forge a coup against Mo..Maeve. Maeve caught wind of it pretty fast. I thought Adalgar sold me out.... but I guess it turns out he had his own plans."

"It's not like I can call up a few friends for help," she groaned, "nobody's gonna recognize me like THIS. Ugh, of all the bodies I have to be in, it just had to be the one resembling those two filthy sluts. How long do I have to wait until my real body's recovered?"

"I...I...I was just... he-helping him to his room? L-L-Like Master Eirin ordered!"
"REALLY?" the mentally ill and incredibly stern bunny girl questioned her junior, "that's not the direction of his room. In fact... that's actually the direction of YOUR room." Reisen II got more and more uncomfortable. You wanted to step in, but the tension coming off of your druggy friend was a bit too much even for you!
"If I didnt know any better," Reisen's smile widened, showing teeth, "I would think you were attempting to mate with my Alex-sama."
"I-i-i-..." the poor girl looked helpless, "...w...we...b-b-but the Princess said we all got to-"
"What was that?" Reisen tilted her head and her bunny ear twitched.
"Th...l..." Reisen II swallowed, "Lady Kaguya said we could share him!"
You heard Reisen I's knuckles crack!
"I'm sorry, Little Reisen, I didnt quite hear that," Reisen smirked and her eyebrow twitched, "what did Lady Kaguya say?"

The poor short haired hopefully not mentally ill bunny girl shivered, dare not mustering the courage to repeat herself. "N....nothing. She didnt say anything."
"Oh. Ok then," her superior's tension finally eased, "well then, if you'll excuse us, I'll be escorting Alex-sama to his room, then!" And with that, she grabbed your hand and escorted you with her.
"W-Wait! That's not where his room i-"
"What was that?" Reisen turned her head back to Reisen II, who quickly shut her mouth.
Reisen II lowered her head, "Nothing, Ms. Udongein Inaba." Sheesh. Poor girl. Even as the two of you walked away, she still stood there with her head hung low. You could feel her self-esteem practically crushed under her senpai's shoe.

"Did you really have to be so rough on her?"
"You dont have to worry about her," Reisen assures you, "the sooner the lower-ranks understand their place, the better." Cold as ice. Despite her rather mean side, she still showed a bit of compassion to you and your sister. "I'm really sorry about what happened to your sister. But dont worry. She'll be just fine. Master knows what she's doing."
"Thank you," you thanked her, "and I'm really sorry about the whole Adalgar debacle. We'll do whatever we can to make sure trash like that doesnt sneak into Eientei again.”
“You wont be doing it alone,” Reisen added, “I myself know quite a bit of Persian culture from Zoroastrian to Ismaeli Shi'ite. I'm also very fluent in Farsi and will do whatever it takes to help your sister get her body back!” Aw, that's so decent of her… she's really a good girl, you know, despite raping you for several hours straight! “In the meantime, Anna will enjoy being a moon rabbit! Keen eyesight, long life, strong immune system, enhanced strength and intelligence… she might not wanna turn back.”
“Well, we'll see,” was your only response to her statement, “but thanks for your help. We're gonna need it.”

Reisen smiled as she opened the door to her room and invited you in. You knew what was coming (and even worried a little about potential Maeve influence!), but like with Gilgamesh and the spear, youre ready for it and embrace it!
You try not to be TOO distracted by the flashy neon signs and the casino music in the background as you kept your focus on the bunny girl.
“Sorry to drag you here,” she said, “your room's kind of a pig stye right now. And I had absolutely nothing to do with it, I swear! (this time)”
“It's alright,” you say, “it… kinda reminds me of Vegas.” Ah, the nostalgia.
“Well feel free to make yourself comfortable… again,” Reisen's face blushed, “I'm gonna go get us some drinks. I wont be gone for long!” She dashed off, leaving you to bask in the ambiance of her casino-theme bedroom alone. Your sister probably never knew of your secret gambling addiction and this was kinda the perfect place to revel in it.

You couldnt decide what to do first. Play some cards? Spin the roulette wheel? Pull the lever on a slot machine?
Hey, how about checking out the room that's marked 'VIP Only'?
“Dont mind if I do!” you say to yourself as you opened the door. Unfortunately, it just turned out to be Reisen's closet. Although the clothes she had on hangers were awful intriguing to look at. She had way more than that simple business suit and skirt. She had a neatly cleaned nurse's outfit with matching cap, a slightly dusted and worn out military uniform with the name tag in unfamiliar language, a pretty pink kimono that youre sure she'd look great in, a cute sailor school girl uniform for some reason, a bunny girl outfit...

You squinted your eyes staring at the bunny girl outfit. It even had the the matching bunny ears and bunny tail.
"Huh," was all you could muster spouted as your mind was briefly blown.
Anywho, Reisen's wide variety of unique clothes went on from there. Not sure if you could consider many of those to be practical and more 'cosplay', but to each his or her own.

After skimming through a dozen of her hung clothes, ending with a power rangers uniform and a kaiju suit, you were gonna leave the 'VIP Only' room... until you spotted something at the very end of the room that was next to impossible to unsee. You stared blankly and unblinkingly for quite a bit of time, practically speechless at the sight. Dont blame you, considering youre staring at...

11131212111121211112222211222111212121.content:
The day felt complete seeing your secretly favorite mentally ill bunny girl sitting on the couch sipping tea. Despite her clearly drugging you and raping you along with her little comrade for dang near half the entire day, you seemed quite a bit relieved to see her after what's been going on with your sister. Stockholm Syndrome, perhaps?

Reisen's ears twitched upon hearing your footsteps and she quickly turned her head your direction and smiling.

"Hi Master! Hi Alex-sama!"
Eirin just hmphed suspiciously as if suspecting something was off.
"Hi Reisen," you greeted her back.

"How's your sister doing?" was the first question she asked, "is she alright?"
"She's doing better now," you answer, "it's not exactly the uh, recovery she wanted, but she's in far better shape now."

"Of course she is," Reisen says, "that's because Master's looking out for her. And there's nobody on the planet that can save lives quite like her. Anna-chan will be good as new in no time flat.”
You believe her. It was a godforsaken miracle AND an ungodly miracle she managed to properly place your sister's brain inside another well-functioning body. Dr. Frankenstein could take notes.

Eirin, instead of being flattered, just stared sternly at her mentally ill patient and subordinate.
“By the way, Reisen,” the doc was quick to dominate the subject, “it's awful late in the afternoon. Did you remember to take your morning pill?”
Reisen's ears and eye twitched upon hearing that question. Suffice to say, she was no good at making a poker face.

“U-uh-uh, I was… just about to right now!” the bunny girl quickly pulled out a pill, popped it in her mouth, then washed it down with some tea. Then she cringed at the godawful taste that came with it. “...There! Done!” Not good enough for Eirin, unfortunately.
“Reisen, I shouldnt have to constantly remind you every day to routinely take your medicine on time,” she lectured, “the last thing we want is another one of your 'episodes' occurring because you forgot to take a pill. And you know what we have to do when we have to treat you too late.”

Reisen tensed up in her seat. If you had to make a daring guess, you'd say she was clenching her butt cheeks. Yikes.
“I know… I know..” the rabbit girl whined, “but could you at least add some sort of flavoring in them? They taste horrible and they leave a nasty aftertaste that doesnt go away for hours! I've eaten expired K-rations when I was serving that didnt taste as foul as those pills!” Well, god help you if YOU ever get sick!

“I will admit that our current tablet medicine cabinet is certainly peculiar tasting,” Eirin states, “however, that's because they have preservatives necessary to ensure very VERY long shelf life. And if the mere price to pay to ensure we have good medicine that lasts a long time is taste, so be it. And I cant afford to tarnish such preservatives with any artificial colors or flavors.” It was a battle of words that Reisen could not win. Of course that means that Reisen will most likely still get her drugs elsewhere…

“Have you tried mixing it into your food?” you offered a suggestion, “that's what we used to get our dog to take his medicine when he hated to just take the pills themselves. We just mix it in the middle of his dog food and he scarfs it down without even realizing it.” You realize it's incredibly silly and perhaps offensive to compare Reisen to your dog… but to be fair, even your dog handled being in heat better than her!

“I've tried that on a lot of moon rabbits,” Eirin answered for her, “didnt work on any of them. They've got far too keen a sense of smell and could easily sniff the pills out and pluck them right out of their food.” So they got a keen sense of smell to go with their keen sense of hearing.
“It's a major survival factor that gives us moon rabbits an edge!” Reisen brags, “these noses of ours are trained to sniff out unknown intruders, poisonous additives in our food and drinks, and even nearby fires, armaments, and mines hidden on a battlefield!” Makes for a damn decent marine! “By the way...” Reisen's cheeks started getting red, “you smell really good today, Alex-sama...”

You couldnt fight off your own blush from her flattery and obvious invitation.

“Reisen,” Eirin got a bit cross with her subordinate, “need I remind you that he's still a valued guest here?”
“Right, right!” Reisen nodded obediently, “Alex-sama, I'm really sorry about the teeth marks I left on you the other night!” Eirin cringed as your face got even redder. “If I had known the princess was planning to share you with others, I swear I would not have tried to mark you like I did!”

“Reisen, did you seriously bite him?!” Eirin questions as you showed her Reisen's faint teeth marks on your back. They didnt hurt but… well, if a somebody walked in on you shirtless, theyre probably gonna be at a loss for words.
“Just gently!” the bunny girl with loose lips noted, “I didnt draw blood, honest! I only used enough force to show that he was my buck and no one elses.”

“I'm gonna try REAL hard to pretend you did not just do that!” Eirin was doing her damndest to keep from blowing her top, “but only because Mr. Whitestone and I are far too busy to come up with a suitable punishment!”
“Are you gonna try to impregnate yourself with him again?” Reisen made an educated guess.
“Of course not!” Eirin said with a blush, “that… official order by the Princess has already been fulfilled.” It wasnt an 'official order' to suck you off! “Now I'm just waiting for the results of the test to come through.”

“Oh c'mon, you cant stop at just one time,” Reisen couldnt stop, “you should do it at least 20 times to make absolutely sure!” Now twenty sounds like an awful lot… but you kinda lost count how many times you and Reisen went at it.
Eirin was having a really really hard time not losing her cool, “Tw-twenty ti… urghh...”
“Dont worry about hurting Alex-sama,” the wascally wabbit kept on going, “he incredibly resilient! He's got more stamina in his human blood than all of my fellow GI girls put together!” Not gonna lie. You still cant wrap your head around how you managed to mate with that mentally ill veteran for so long!

“Reisen, am I gonna have to put you back on the suppository regiment again?” Eirin warned.

“C-Can Alex-sama be the one administering them?” both yours and Eirin's eyes bug out after hearing that pervy bunny-girl spout out, “...I can only ask that you please be gentle. That hole is still virgin and very sensitive. ...A-although it might help if you were to stick your tongue in there, first...” WOW. Kinda hard not to unhear that.

“I should probably have you checked for sexually transmitted diseases as well,” Eirin murmured to you.
“HEY!” Reisen understandably took offense to that notion.
“Anyways, speaking of drugs,” Eirin added, “Mr. Whitestone, I could use your assistance. Since Tewi's not in today, I need an extra hand dealing with some special customers. A few buddhist monks from Myouren Temple wish to finalize an opium deal with us.” Opium? OPIUM?!
By the way, Reisen, you do know what day it is, right?”

“Oh! Right!” Reisen nodded, “today's the monthly opium shipment to Hakurei Shrine!” MORE opium?!
“Is everything packed and ready?”
“Uh huh!” Reisen nodded again with enthusiasm, “everything's counted for!” With that, she was heading off, “I'll set up and start leaving right after I take a nice warm shower!” Her red eyes glowed your direction as she said that. A familiar enticing glow. “See you later, buck-sama.” her voice suddenly sounded more alluring than earlier. You couldnt help but eye the enticing spring in her step as she left.

“Alright, help me get this place organized,” Eirin ordered you, slightly snapping you out of your little daze, “the monks will be here soon.”
