1113121211112121111222221122211221.content:
The bullet wound wasnt pretty, but it didnt look horrendous nor was it bleeding out that badly. Compared to certain wounds your sister receives on a regular basis, this ranks just a tad above flesh wound. She could probably dislodge the bullet and sew up the wound herself, but because of the possible risks of infection, you'd way rather let a professional like Eirin treat it.

"Does it hurt really bad?" Eirin asked her.
"Had worse," Anna shrugged, pretending like it didnt bother her.
"I'm gonna pump a little anesthetic here," the doc said, "the wound doesnt look very bad, but I'm not sure how deep the bullet is."
“Pump away,” she said, continuing to act like it was virtually nothing to her. And as expected, the process took very little time to unfold. After injecting the numbing shot, Eirin managed to carefully pluck out the bullet, sew up the wound, and quickly disinfect it in record time without Anna so much as flinching. You had to turn away, however, cuz it was still kinda gruesome to watch.

With your sister saved, you gladly thanked Eirin a couple of times while she had an awful hard time trying to keep a straight face with you (probably cuz she knows about the whole 24 hour session you had with two of her employees!) and she awful quick to get out of there and leave you and your sis with some privacy.

Anna, understandably gave an odd expression, “Geez, what's up with her?”
You swallowed hard and tried to keep your own straight face going, “Uhhh… maybe she witnessed something really shocking this morning and it's still stuck in her head.” Sometimes you didnt necessarily have to lie to Anna to cover your tracks, “...so um, how did the whole arms shipment thing go? You know, before Maeve's ambush.”

She lowered her head in shame. Bad news.
“Terrible,” she groaned, “I think someone dropped a dime to Maeve's goons about our shipment and somebody on the inside drilled a couple holes in our boat. Everybody's alright, we got to the lifeboats on time… but we were only able to save a handful of weapon crates from sinking to the bottom of the ocean.”
“Aww, dang,” you sighed, “how many crates did you lose?”
“Well, we managed to save about three,” she gulped, “….out of about 70.”
“Jesus!” you cringed, “...th...then what?”
“Long story short, the buyer was pissed, the supplier was pissed, I'm now tens of thousands of dollars in debt… and…. er...”
“And what?” you asked her.
“...Mikaela tore up our contract.”

“MIKAELA?!!” That was a name you didnt wanna hear bad news about! Anna was referring to none other than a powerful ally/wealthy arms dealer/well ranked FSB agent/really good friend of yours, Mikaela Yurazinski! A very lovely young Russian arms dealer that you really got along with and was very generous with providing your sister with sidejobs that pay well! You dont really understand why Anna doesnt get along with her considering she owes her big time, but Mikaela seems to like you a lot (despite the two of you completely unable to understand eachother cuz neither of you speak the same language!).

“You lost a contract with Mikaela?!” you STILL couldnt believe what your sis didnt say, “urgh… did you two have a fight?”
“We didnt have a fight!” Anna got defensive, “when I had to break the bad news with her, she started running her mouth, I replied in kind, I forgot what happened next, and before I knew it guns were blazing between her fellow ruskies and mine.”
You face-palmed. And you thought what YOU did earlier was dumb.
“You realize SHE was the one providing your whole arsenal, right?” you question your sis, “youre not gonna find military-grade hardware just anywhere else if Le Fey ambushes you again.”

“Well, maybe if that stuck up little Ortho-dyke stopped looking down her nose at me every chance she gets,” Anna sneered, “I mean I've been doing a lot of her dirty work! I couldve just ratted her out to her bosses about her shady business deals a long time ago and got her put in front of a firing squad if I wanted!”
“You shouldve had ME talk to her,” you tell her, “I couldve resolved this matter without resorting to guns blazing!”
“For the last time, YOU DONT EVEN SPEAK RUSSIAN!”
“And I STILL get along better with her than you do!” sometimes it helps being a people person!
“Probably cuz the little suka wants you to 'annex' her little Crimea..” you heard her mutter under her breath. You pretended you didnt hear that. Youre gonna miss Mikaela, though. She wouldve probably offered you protection in Moscow. You woulda gladly taken it if only you knew Russian.

“I'm sorry, Bro,” she apologized, “but women like her are bad news for you, anyway. She'll just end up getting you killed by HER rival thugs.” Probably. Besides, youre sure Mikaela wont be happy if SHE ever found out what you've recently been doing in this hospital!
...Or maybe she WOULD be happy and wanna join in, you dont know!

And speaking of women who might be bad news for you, heading this way was your good pal and good fuckbuddy, Reisen! You'd be dumbstruck to imagine her not only recovering so quickly after a whole day of mating but even be in such a chipper mood, but youre sure it's cuz moon rabbits have incredibly good stamina!

“Hello, Alex-sama!” Reisen bowed with a huge smile on her face, “hi, Anna-chan!”

Anna just stared coldly as you while you smiled back, trying to hide your sweat, “H-Hi Reisen!” Oops. Was your voice a little higher than normal.

“Just came to wish your sister a speedy recovery,” Reisen said, “Dont worry. Master is the best when it comes to surgery. She'll recover in no time!”
Anna just kept staring coldly.
“Thank you, Reisen,” you had the decency to thank her at least.

“Also, I figured you might be a little hungry after everything, so I got you some frozen yogurt!” the awfully generous happy bunny girl handed your sis a ice-cream cone (sorry, FROZEN YOGURT cone). “This one's vanilla. It should be mild enough on your stomach to eat after your surgery.”
Anna grunted. That was the closest she was gonna get to a 'thank you' from her.
“Oh, and I got one for you too!” Reisen smiled and handed you a cone with blue-colored frozen yogurt. “This one's blue raspberry flavored!” she said with a wink. Your face got a little red.
“M-my favorite!” you smiled as you shivered a little, “th… thanks a lot, Reisen!”
“No… thank YOU,” she whispered in your ear, “come back and help me again soon. I promise Tewi wont be bothering us the second time!”
She gave you a kiss on the cheek and trotted off humming merrily as you were still frozen stiff with fluster from earlier!

And to make matters worse, Anna noticed that fluster!

“Help her with what?”

“Huh?”

“She said you were helping her,” she questioned with a raised eyebrow, “what exactly were you helping her with?”
1113121211112121111222221122211221.title: Bila Ne Bila

11131212111121211112222211222112212.content:
Tsk! Yeah right! Like youre actually gonna tell your sister that you spent the last 24 hours scratching the itch between Reisen's legs with your cock?! Only a lunatic would confess that and not be oblivious to the obvious massacre that would unfold shortly after. Sure, she MIGHT possibly be more dangerous than Mikaela (heavy emphasis on MIGHT!) especially if Maeve's still keeping tabs on her, but you dont believe she deserves to experience one of Anna's many unique methods of 'interrogation'! Besides, obviously you had no problem going at it with that mentally ill bunny girl and her loli friend for a whole darn day otherwise surely you'd have resisted. You didnt even so much as try to pull your dick out of Reisen's mouth!

"Well," you sniffed, pretending that Anna could smell your fear (not that you know she couldnt!), "I was... spending... most of the day... helping her haul inventory." Good one. "You know, boxes of pills, first aid material, herbal supplements, all that stuff. A lot of it were in crates."

Anna raised her eyebrow at you as you tried to keep that infamous poker face of yours going.
"That bunny bimbo made you spend the whole day organizing their stock?"
"Well..." you sniffed, "to be honest, I think SHE was the one doing most of the work. I mostly," you sniffed again, "assisted when I could. Seriously, she's pretty strong."
"Uh huh."
"Anyways, after all of that," you sniffed once more, "her back was aching pretty bad, so I gave her a massage."
She groaned, "Ugh. You massaged her? You know she's gonna see that as an invitation. That's like flat out asking her to take advantage of you!" Too little too late, sis.
“Later, Reisen's partner/distant relative, I think, Tewi snooped in uninvited, and I kinda gave her a massage too.”
Anna sneered, “That cheeky little brat? Dont turn your back on her. I've heard a lot of bad things about her from the other rabbits here.”
“Dont worry, I'll try to keep my distance from her,” you assured her.. youre not sure if youre gonna make good on that assurance, however the fear of being thrown in prison for being an alleged pedophile boosts the chances!

“I dont know what's with you and dangerous women,” your sister nagged, “first those sluts at Le Fey, then the Russian slut… then mom… now a mentally deranged bunny bimbos and a loli conartist.”
“Look, you dont need to worry about me right now, I'm just fine,” you tell her, “right now, you need to focus on feeling better.”
Your sis shrugged, but thankfully caved, “Alright alright, fine. But you owe ME a back massage after this is over!” Sure youre not related by blood, yet something deep down tells you that you need to be disturbed by that remark! But the blush on your cheeks apparently wasnt listening!

“You got it sis,” you smiled, “as soon as you recover, I promise to rub down those hard to reach spots 10 times better than I did with Reisen and Tewi!” You gave her a wink.
And Eirin gave what looked to be a completely disturbed stare, possibly listening in on the conversation and no doubt taking it the wrong way.

“Ahem! I'm er… sorry to interrupt your incestu-I-I mean close family bonding,” Eirin coughed with a uneasy blush on her face, “but I'm afraid visiting time is over. I still need to run a few more tests on Anna in private.”
You nodded and agreed to give the doc and your sis some privacy, also hoping she doesnt blab to Anna what's REALLY been going on! You gave your sis a gentle hug and headed back to your room.

You should probably feel bad for lying… actually, you shouldnt. You knew it was the right thing to do. You knew what could happen if you told the truth. She'd probably end up doing something she'll regret and end up getting you and her kicked out of Eientei just like she screwed over her partnership with Ms. Yurazinski.

This will be your way of making up to her for lying. Cleaning up her mess. You pull out your smartphone and look up Mikaela's number (you never told Anna you had her number, but the less she knew, the better). You hoped she'd answer as you listened to her ringtone that for some unexplainable reason was a recording of Vladimir Putin singing 'Blueberry Hill'.
Unfortunately, after the engrish singing was over, you heard the recording in Russian that you assumed meant to leave a message after the beep.
*Beep*

“Hi, Ms. Yurazinski. It's me, Alex,” you left your message, “I know you probably cant understand me so I hope you'll get your bodyguard Oleg to translate. Look, I'm really sorry about my sister. I know she's kinda really hard to put up with at times, but we really appreciate everything you've done for us so far. I'd hate to ruin our friendship over a silly misunderstanding. If it's alright with you, maybe you and I can work something out… in private, if you know what I mean. Please call back as soon as you can! Thank you, Ms. Yurazinski. Spokoinoi nochi!”

After leaving that lengthy unintelligible message, you hang up and wait, hoping you'll be able to salvage the remaining bits of the partnership Anna just stomped to pieces. You wait with your fingers crossed, not caring if all youre hearing is random gobbledegook you dont understand, just as long as she answers...

1113121211112121111222221122212.title: Mokou?

11131212111121211112222211222121.content:
What in the ever loving hell?! Before you and the bunny girl you (in)voluntarily gave yourself to stood that white-haired girl from last night! It shocked you pretty much while Reisen seemed awfully calm despite her obvious mental illness, but the intruder looked the most shocked out of all of you!

Her red eyes widened and her face went red with embarrassment as if realizing last minute what she just did! She quickly jerked her head away and wrapped her hospital gown around trying to cover her naked body. Why it was naked to begin with is a mystery, but you have a darn good guess why.

“Hi Mokou!” Reisen seemed happy to see her even though she rudely intruding on you and her going at it like… well, rabbits!

“I-I-I-I’m so sorry, R-Reisen!” Mokou hid covered her face with her hand, “I didn’t mean to uh... I-I-I don’t know what came over me! Oh god, does anybody see me?”
“It’s ok, you can come in,” Reisen actually invited her in her room, “and would you mind locking the door?”
“Yeah yeah, sure sure,” the embarrassed white-haired girl locked the door behind her. Despite being the only three in this room, The white haired fire mancer was still constantly looking back and forth with sweat dripping down her forehead!
“Hey,” she nervously greeted you.
“Hi,” you nonchalantly greeted her back. And then it got awkwardly quiet for a while. You understood why Mokou was in no mood to talk, what with she suddenly barged in nearly naked for no apparent reason and suddenly now has shame for it. You cant help but wonder why she barged in here in the first place though.

Fortunately, Reisen already figured it out!

“Oh, youre in heat too?”

Mokou’s eyes widened as she stared at the bunny girl funny, “Wh-what are you talking about?!”
“I already notice the signs,” Reisen said, “your face is awful red, youre panting, your legs are trembling, and youre staring at Alex-sama all dreamy-eyed.” Come to think of it, she IS staring at you that way, isnt she?!

Once again she realizes her mistake last minute and turns away, sitting down on the floor cross-legged to hide her trembling legs!
“S-Sorry!” Mokou apologized, “Eirin’s trying to force me to quit smoking so she’s got me on a stupid medicine regiment that’s supposed to kick those urges. Damn woman didnt tell me it’d have bizarre side-effects!” Yikes. And this is the kind of girl that plays with fire!

“I uh… think my sister Anna might still have some nicotine patches you can use,” you offered, then remembered how much she does not like that very girl you just slept with! Oh man is she gonna be pissed when she finds out.
“Actually…” Mokou attempts to avoid eye-contact, “…you wouldn’t happen to have a cigarette, would you? I’d kill for one right now.”
“We dont,” Reisen smiled, “but we do have something to quell that side-effect youre having.” And this where the phrase ‘Actions speak louder than words’ comes into play. No words could speak louder than the action Ms. Udongein Inaba performed: Hopping off her bed and offering Mokou her side of it!

“WHAT?!” you and Mokou dropped your jaws. This was incredibly surprising how your own partner who clearly wanted you all to herself now seems generous enough to share you with a stranger!

“Oh right, your kind’s used to monogamous relationships,” Reisen snickered and bopped her head, “dont worry. It’s very common for a moon rabbit to share her mate with family members and close friends. Think of it as a matter of trust.” What?
“Reisen, you cant-”
“And honestly, despite your constant feuds with the princess, I do personally see as a close friend I can trust,” Reisen admitted, “honestly, I personally respect you a bit more than most of the other girls here in Eientei. If there was anybody else worthy of being knotted by my Alex-sama, it’s definitely you!” Oh geez, that almost sounded heart-warming. And what’s ‘knotted’?

Sure enough, it actually got to Mokou a bit. “Aw… gee, I… I didn’t realize you thought of me that way. I… I dont know what to say. B-But I dont think I could just take your uh, Alex-sama right in front of you.”

11131212111121211112222212122.content:
Anna and Eirin both gazed at you with worried, uneasy expressions on your face. You attempted to hide your fear, but the fatigue from er... um..... eeeehhhh.... hell, I say it!

The fatigue from brutally screwing Reisen in the ass nonstop kinda took it's toll on you! Whether it was your fault or not, you were too exhausted to think of a lie or even attempt to cover up what you did. Besides, you just cant lie to your sister. And even in the extremely rare times you can, she can easily sniff out that lie in no time flat!

Might as well just come clean now.

"Listen. About what happened earlier in my room with Reisen-"

"Please! Dont fucking talk about it!" thankfully, Anna cuts you off with sheer disgust, "I dont wanna fucking hear it! I get it! Youre lonely! I havent given you much opportunity to find a girl and that pill-popping disease-ridden lunatic is offering herself to you every chance she gets!"
"Ms. Whitestone," Eirin turned to her, feeling a bit perturbed, "I'd appreciate it if you'd not talk about one of my most trustworthy assistants like that."
"And I'D appreciate it if your most trustworthy assistant would keep her disgusting claws off my brother!" Anna snapped back.
"If you talk back to me ONE more time, I'll throw you out!" Eirin warned her. Anna gritted her teeth and raised her finger as if she was about to say something right back, but thankfully she bit her lip and sighed hard. Good sis.
However, she did manage to squeeze out "This discussion between us aint over."

"ANYWAYS," Dr. Yagokoro turned her attention away from your sister and back to you, "since we're on the subject, it's come to my attention that Reisen made quite an incredible mess of your room, is that correct?" You mean the whole She-Hulk thing where she trashed your bedroom cuz you werent there and she wanted to awake when you were kissing her tits according to Maeve while she was possessed by her?! Yep.

You glanced over at Anna who was looking bad rather coldly and nodded.

"So she HAS been neglecting to take her medicine then," Eirin sighed embarrassingly as Anna looked back at HER coldly, "Mr. Whitestone, I am sorry that you had to witness my subordinate in such a state. I have strictly told her time and time again that she needs to take her medicine in a timely manner to avoid these particular incidents. Has she hurt you in any way while she was... changed?"
"Cuz if she did..." your sister points to her gun holster.
But you shake your head, "No. She was completely fast asleep by the time I woke up and er... noticed her in my room." Despite not being much of a liar, you still had a thing for deliberately leaving out detail... like that she rolled over you in her sleep and you had her bedazzling striped bra clad boobs pressed into your face as you slept! Even now, you STILL had those stripes imprinted in your mind.

"And you never thought to slip out of that room as soon as possible cuz 'holy shit Crazy Reizy is a freaking werewolf I need to go before she rips me to pieces'?" Anna made a really good point.
You got a little nervous and answered, "N-no... she didnt seem threatening to me. And even if she did... well, if I TRIED to sneak out and I ended up waking her... it'd be safer to just stay put and keep quiet." That wasnt a lie, by the way! But you DID leave out the fact that you were incredibly infatuated with Were-Reisen and kinda hope you get to see her like this again!

Nonetheless, Eirin bows apologetically, "I'm very sorry this happened to you, I assure you, this occurrence is incredibly rare and only happens during a particular full moon, so it's extremely rare you even witnessed it to begin with!" EXTREMELY RARE?!! AWWWW!!! "Nevertheless, I'll see to it she takes her medicine."

"Well thanks to this little incident, I have to find Vivian a better place to hide out," your sister explains, "if I had known this place cant properly lock up their more problematic patients, I wouldve never entrusted it with my little girl!" She then glared at you, "I'd worry the same about you, but you know what? I give up! If you wanna chase crazy unstable tricks so badly, fine! You go right ahead! Dont come crying to me when she ends up breaking your heart... and maybe some bones." Geez.
"What's gonna happen to Vivian?" you ask.
"I'm gonna have to call her 'dad' to come pick her up," she answers as she pulls out her phone.
"Ms. Whitestone, our lady would really appreciate it if you kept our location confidential," Eirin tells her.
"Shoulda thought of that before you decided to let your pet werewolves roam free!" she punches a few digits on her phone, waits for the ring, and then the answer, "HI Yumi, it's me. Yeah yeah, I'm doing fine, how about you? ...Oh really, that's cool, congrats. Listen can you do me a big favor? Can you get Goro on the phone? ...Yeah, I know I told him never to call me, but this is kindof an emergency."

......

You breathed a hard sigh of relief that you dodged a bullet. You really thought you were in trouble, but it turned out to be a false alarm. Well maybe not so much. You may have just lost a little respect from your sister, but part of you believes (and may be right) there's a certain other reason she doesnt want you getting too clingy with other girls...

Speaking of, you really hope Reisen will be alright. You really shouldve told her that Maeve's gotten a strong hold of her. Maybe then you couldve avoided that little episode.
And you couldnt believe you had actually done what you did. Despite that cute mentally ill bunny girl's cries of begging you to stop, you continued almost emotionlessly until she collapsed from exhaustion! That is not you! What could have happened that caused you to do something so cold?! You needed to talk to her. Maeve or no Maeve, you need to make it up to her.

You quickly head over to your room, but it was already blocked off due to rabbit nurses currently working on repairing it. Boy, they sure got to work fast.

The next option would be to head over to Reisen's room. It wasnt that difficult to spot, thanks to the cute bunny-shaped placard that read 'Udonge' on the door. Not only was the door unlocked, it wasnt even closed. Instead of knocking, you just creep right in uninvited, assuming that the inhabitant doesnt have a tendency to shoot trespassers!
You glanced around her fancy Vegas Casino-style bedroom, practically filling to the brim with nostalgia about the few times you spent in Las Vegas, but kept focused on the task at hand.

"Reisen?" you called out, "Reisen, are you here? I need to talk to you. Reisen?"

Suddenly, you hear the door slam shut behind you! Just before you could turn around, you felt a quick sharp jab in your neck! Oh crap, a needle! And unfortunately you didnt get time to register the shock from the sight of it before your body loses it's balance and you collapse on the floor! For the moment, you have tremendous difficulty moving your arms and legs, let alone attempt to get up off the floor.

And right on cue, above you stood that cute purple haired mentally ill bunny girl staring down at you. Good news was Maeve wasnt controlling her. Bad news was she STILL wasnt happy to see you!

"Alex-sama! How could you?!!" she screamed at you with tears in her eyes! "*SNIFF!* How could you do that to me?!! That really hurt me!!"
"R....Rei...sen..." you could barely mumble as she continued.

"You knew you werent supposed to put it in THAT part of me!" she whined, "A ladies butthole is absolutely 100% forbidden! Dont you know how incredibly sensitive that part is?! You were supposed to put it in HERE where it rightfully belongs!" she pointed between her legs. "And even after I begged you to stop, you just.... *SOB!!*" She sobbed away as you felt very VERY uneasy by this side of her! She snapped again! You had the worst feeling Maeve was still watching. And smirking with glee!

Reisen wiped the tears away with her tattered sleeve and gave what looked to be a cutesy angered glare, "*Sniff!* Fine! You wanna play rough, Alex-sama?! We'll play rough!!" She reached under her tattered blouse, "I've got something really really REALLY special just for you! Hope youre ready for it!"

Your eyes widened as you watched her pull out...

11131212111121211112222222121.title: temporary job

111312121111212111122222221211.content:
Despite that whole exhausting episode, you werent feeling tired. Constantly moving from one place to the next is way too stressing to allow sleep. Sooner or later youre gonna catch insomnia if you dont finally find a suitable home to lay down for good, but as long as youre sticking around your sister, it aint happening.
Since you cant sleep and probably wont sleep for a while, you might as well make the most of your new temporary resting place.

Might as well take a walk around and clear your head. If youre gonna be stuck here until one of the occupants becomes the next victim of Maeve, you might as well get accustomed to the surroundings.

The hallway itself was pretty long and boring save for the corner turns across the mansion. Majority of the rooms were locked tight as if they were expecting loads of guests that aint arrived yet. Plenty of old european framed artwork mounted on the wall of who you assume were previous generations of the Scarlet nobility. Sadly, none of them depicted a certain black haired mustached man in red infamous for his efforts in warding off invaders... specifically via impalements. A TRUE vampire.

You passed by the library, which the room itself looked even bigger than the actual library where you used to live. Thousands upon thousands of books stalked neatly on floors upon floors of shelves possibly in some sort of specific order which no doubt may have taken years to perfect. You saw the leading librarian, the purple haired girl in the purple sleeping gown and matching sleeping hat sitting in her chair reading a book that looked to be in a language that probably no longer exists in this day and age. A ways away, you spot a red-haired girl with bat wings sprouting from her back and little bat wings sprouting from her head carefully sorting some books in a shelf.
A succubus. A perfect reason to lock your door and maybe push a dresser against it before you go to bed.

Next you pass by the kitchen and see that grey haired maid from earlier Sakuya washing dishes. One of her little lackies comes struggling by with a ton of dirty plates in her hand, stacked twice her height! She's wobbling and shaking from the weight of the stacked plates and you know what's about to happen next.
"Wh...wha...wha..." the little lackie trembling desperately trying to keep her balance but it was inevitable, "uh...uhh... AHHHH!!"
She tripped and dropped the plates! You caught a quick glimpse of Sakura jerking her head to the lackie just before she hit the hit the floor and the plates went-

-...carefully stacked neatly on the floor without so much as a chip?! In a microsecond they went from about to spill all over the place to carefully stacked on the floor with no hassle!
"Whew... thank you, Ms. Izayoi!" the lackie thanked Sakuya for some reason.
"Just be careful next time," Sakuya said as she picked up a handful of the plates and added them to the sink, "dont rush and pick up more than you can handle."
"Yes, Ms. Izayoi!" and the lackie marched off to gather more dirty dishes. As soon as you spotted the fairy wings on her back, your stomach cringed.

You pass by the dining room to see numerous maids preparing several tables that look to be expecting several guests for dinner.
The maids were all fairies. You could tell just by the looking at the wings. Everyone of them had wings. Every single maid a fairy. Fairies setting dishes, fairies polishing silverware, fairies cleaning windows and vaccuming the carpet. Here a fairy. There a fairy. Everywhere a fucking fairy.

Considering your experience with fairies, it understandably made your blood boil to see so many of them in one room. And Anna thought THIS place was a safer place than that hospital?! ANY of them could be working for Le Fey! ANY of them could have ties with Le Fey! ANY of them could know somebody who knows somebody in Le Fey!
'No!' you think to yourself, 'I know my sister better than this! I gotta trust her. She knows what she's doing."

"May I get you anything, sir?" said a posh voice from behind. You quickly turned around and had to look downward to see the short, green skinned bald pointy earred impish fellow in a butler outfit. A hobgoblin. ANOTHER kind of fairy.
"N-no thanks," you started to back away as you felt queasy, "I'm fine. Thank you." And you continued your trek down the wall. This place was gonna take some major getting used to.

The Scarlet Mansion Hallway Express came to a complete halt thanks to a boulder blocking your way. A boulder in the shape of a red haired woman in a green chinese dress that you remember seeing help Arnold kick out an intruder when you first got here! Fancy seeing her again, but she was in your way the moment.

Scratch that. She wasnt just in your way. She was intentionally blocking your path. Judging by the smile on her face, she wanted to chat. Oh what the heck, you got nothing better to do.

"Ni hao!" she shouted with glee. You stared at her slightly confused.
"Uh, that means hi," she stated. Now you just feel silly.

"Oh! Well, hi," you greeted her back in english.

"So you must be the little brother of the mistress's associate, right?" the girl was observant.
"T-that's right," you answer her, "Alex Whitestone."
"Pleasire to meet you, Al! I am the head guard of the gate of Scarlet Mansion, Hong Meiling!" she proudly introduced herself, "I make sure no uninvited trespassers get in... and no unpermitted guests or food get out." That kinda made you wanna shiver, but seeing as though youre in a mansion full of monsters (especially FAIRIES), you do your best to show no fear.

"Nice to meet you, Ms. Hong," you offered a handshake, she happily took your hand... and sniffed it!

"Hmm," you heard a light moan behind that smile of hers, "you smell good. A nice... man's smell." Awkward, but you already had a share of awkward with that crazy bunny girl!
"Oh, um," you took a deep breath, "I uh, put on a little Old Spice earlier. It doesnt last long though."

"I have to thank your sister," Meiling suddenly changed the subject, "thanks to her hired help, I finally got a bit more free time." She was referring to Arnold.
"Yeah, Arnold's a real tank," you stuck on the subject, "I'm sure Scarlet Mansion's in no safer hands than his... UH, NO OFFENSE! That is, I'm not saying youre bad at what you do, ER! I mean, I'm sure youre great what you do!" Meiling leaned in closer, the smile still remaining on her face. "It's just um... he'll make a great partner!"

"Good," Meiling sighed, edging even closer to you, "you have no idea how long it's been since I had a nice long break." She was getting so close, one of her front braids was rubbing against your cheek!
"That's... great to hear!" you instinctively stepped back, "er, what do you typically do on breaks?"

"Eh, mostly naps," she kept edging closer, "sometimes meditate and do some martial arts training. Do you know any martial arts?"
You backed into a wall, "N-No, not really. "
"That's too bad," she stalked toward you, "around here, self-defense is a requirement for staying alive. I myself know Kung-Fu, Karate, Tai Kwan Do, a little Jeet Kune Do, that's Bruce Lee's style in case you were wondering... and also Karma Sutra." Karma Sutra?!
"That's... not a martial art."
"Oh, I beg to differ! It's an intense stimulating exercise that demands hefty concentration as well as a strong body and plenty of stamina!" Damn boner! Stay down or she'll notice!

"Well, that's amazing," time to end this discussion ASAP, "well, I better start heading back to my room. It was nice meeting you, Meili-" Aw crap, she grabbed your arm! Dear god, here we go!

"Wait," Meiling gave you no choice in the matter! "since you got a bit of free time too, how's about we take a walk in the backyard? We'll have plenty of things to do there!"
"Uh... I... well... I dont wanna make anybody worry that I'm not in my room."

"It wont take long!" she said with a wink, "qiiiiiiing?"
111312121111212111122222221211.title: Let's take a walk down the hallway...

choices: ...suddenly, the head maid interrupts the two of you!
1113121211112121111222222212111.content:
The Chinese lady seemed pretty adamant and didnt wanna take no for an answer. As much as you didnt wanna take 'Qing' for a reply, you were feeling a bit lonely since you left Eientei. Since your sis and most of the her friends seem a bit busy and you didnt trust any of the fairy helpers as far as you could blow their brains out... you figure why not? If the freaking head body guard of the mansion wants to get to know you, you'd be a damn fool to turn down companionship... and potential protection.

You shrug your shoulders, "Um, ok. You talked me into it."

"Xie xie!" she gleefully said with a grateful bow before she grabbed your arm again and dragged you off with her.

No seriously, she DRAGGED you off! That wasnt a figure of speech. Your shoes were scrapping the carpet before you could move your feet fast enough to keep up with her!
"Make sure you stick with me at all times," Meiling suggests, despite not giving you a choice in the matter, "many of the em... 'Caretakers' arent friendly to strangers."
"I'll be careful. Thank you." You pay no attention to the fairy maids staring your way as youre dragged down the hall. You also dont pay attention to the Hobgoblin butler shaking his head disapprovingly.

Thankfully, Meiling let go of your arm the moment the two of you went through the door leading to the backyard. And what a backyard it was. It may as well have been an entire town behind the mansion what with how enormous and populated it was.
"Keep close," she ordered, "I, Hong Meiling, Scarlet Mansion's finest beloved Guardian of the Gate shall be your tour guide." You do as your told as she showed you around.

"Here is Her Lady's prized flower garden," Meiling pointed over to the tremendous field of flower beds of dang near every breed, "we nearly every single exotic flower species in all the world. Imported directly from almost every single corner of the earth, nurtured and cared for to ensure they feel like their still in their native habitat. Stay away from the sunflowers, though. They um, werent necessarily taken LEGALLY from the Garden of the Sun. And dont touch the Venus flytraps. Contrary to the name, it's not just flies they like to trap."
You can tell what with a few gardeners trying to pry out one of them comrades from the jaws of a giant flytrap!

"Over here is the hedgemaze," Meiling brings you over to the hedge-PYRAMID, "it's still unfinished, but it's packed with several twists, turns, and traps, and many MANY surprises for those who wander too long or take one too many wrong turns. I've kinda got a little frustrated navigating through it one day, so I made a shortcut!" Meiling points over to the big trimmed hole going right through most of the pyramid as the trimming crew look back at her with angry glares... even the minotaur who appeared to be mumbling Greek curses."

"Here is our glorious pool", Meiling takes you to the largest pool built right under a water theme park complete with slides, tubes, boat rides, etc. "the perfect place to relax and cool down on a hot frustrating day. On your day off, of course!" Well, YOU certainly know where youre going on your day off!
"!!!" suddenly, something grabbed your leg, causing you to lose your balance and began pulling you toward the pool!
*STOMP!!*
"EEEKK!" That is until Meiling stopped the arm grabbing you and let you go! She then shouted angrily in Chinese at the group of sad pouty-faced Mermaids with one rubbing her aching arm before they dived off.

"Er, duibuqi..." Meiling bowed apologetically, "some of the aquatic life here can be pretty unpredictable." Whelp, so much for your day off plan!! ...Unless of course, one of those 'unpredictable aquatic life' members happen to include a certain purple haired mentally ill bunny girl!

Anyways, after that encounter, the rest of the tour is pretty mild. Sure there was a large farm with plenty of livestock, a private horse ranch with several rare breed mares and stallions, a statue one of the Scarlet sisters' ancestors made entirely in 24 karat gold, a concert with several bands practicing, but you were quickly tuning them all out. Maybe it was cuz your mind was wandering so much. What with so much going on in such short time, it was hard to maintain focus and concentrate cuz your brain was going a mile a minute.

There was ONE thing you had no problem keeping your focus on, however. While Meiling was talking, you were following behind her, eyeing her firm toned backside as her hips swayed in such an invigorating motion, encouraging those watching behind her to keep up! And sure enough, you channeled what energy you had in your body to assure you were following the movement of her hips swaying to a tee! She could march right off a cliff and you'd gladly follow her charismatic swaying bottom all the way down to THE bottom!

“...And over here is the fine firm glorious ass of Hong Meiling! It's irresistible back and forth rhythm has been known to lead many mesmerized men to their unfortunate ends!”

You snapped out of your brief trance, the moment you realized Meiling notice you were checking out her ass!
Your face goes red and you turn away, cursing yourself for what you done!
“I-I-I'm so sorry, Ms. Hong!” you quickly apologize with a reddened face, “that was… incredibly inappropriate! I wont do that again, I swear!”
Fortunately, she laughed at your perverted idiocy. “Hahaha! Wu so wei, Alex! I'm glad to see you appreciate my figure!” she winked, “but please try to keep your primal urges in check during work hours!” It was incredibly ironic to hear a youkai of all things tell you this. But still, you gotta stay professional. You are in no need of a sexual harassment seminar.

So with a blush and a scratch of the back of your head, you put yourself back on track.
“Heh… so, what's next on this tour of the backyard?”
“Actually… that's about it,” Meiling admitted, “there are a few other sites to see, but I'm kinda banned from going to them.” She frowns, “Long story short, sometimes I dont my own strength. I guess I'm too strong for my own good...” Yeah, guess that's what to expect from someone who's an expert in kung fu, karate, Tai Kwan Do, Tai Chi, Chai Tea, and a whole other bunch of martial arts Meiling's got a black belt in. ...Color you interested if Kama Sutra's one of 'em!

“Well that concludes our tour!” the red-headed Chinese woman announces, “*Yawn* That took a lot out of us.” Meiling speaks for you as she feigns being tired. “Why dont we take a break?” and without even getting your input, she grabs your arm, “I know of a nice secluded place not far from here where we can meditate if your interested.”
“Uh, I-”
“Or if you like, we can get a drink or two! The bar should be open by now! Wanna get pissed?”

Not like she's giving you any other choice at this point. Besides, you feel like spending some more time with her, so you figure you might as well play along.
After a bit of thinking and hard pretending that the overly intrigued stare she was giving you doesnt weird you out, you decide to...

111312121111212111122222221211132.content:
You'd think that only organizing the comic book shelf of the mansion's grand library would be an incredibly easy task. And you'd be wrong. Mainly because as youre organizing, you have the librarian yourself breathing down your neck the entire time and being incredibly obsessive compulsive to how the comics are properly organized.

All the while Patchouli was hounding you on what comic to put where, she had you organize certain comics by alphabetical order with each issue by issue date, then OTHER certain comics by author name alphabetically THEN separating them from other comics with specific separators (some she wanted arranged by shape, others she wanted arranged by color)... and then when you got to her MANGA collection... it was a librarian bootcamp.
She wanted her manga books sorted specifically in her own personal name order that wouldnt make sense to anyone BUT her (in issue order, naturally), then you had to separate CERTAIN manga books a particular distance from other manga books and putting the appropriate paperweights between certain manga books cuz of a long lengthy explanation that you still cant wrap your head around. She also wanted you to wipe the dust and dirt off some of her old manga books (note: SOME, not all. For another nonsensical reason, she thought some of the dirty manga books were lucky and didnt want them clean!) and hell, when you were moving a particular series of manga books, she wanted you to address her as 'Patchouli onee-sama' while you were doing it! (again. Nonsensical). Oh, and she also made you promise not to tell anybody about the collection that depicted beautiful men in er... 'romantic' scenes with eachother (which WAS sensical... until she made you promise while still addressing her as 'Patchouli onee-sama'!)

Suffice to say, you really wished you were organizing the REST of the entire library with your sister and dealing with Patchouli's calmer less OCD bat-winged assistant.Sure, letting a succubus get that close to you may be dangerous to you, but dangerous to HER as well, cuz she can guess what Anna'll do to hear if she tries something!

After an extremely long time of putting up with this and missing the brief time you spent with the Chinese gate guard, you finished the organizing the stupid comic shelf. And of course, Patchouli carefully inspected and observed every single detail.
"Hmm..." she leaned in close to inspect each uneven gap or speck of dust, "Ok. This is workable. Could be better, but certainly not bad for your first day."
"Thank you, Ms. Kn-" Patchouli jerked her head to you and raised a finger, "er... I mean Patchouli onee-sama!" It made her swell up with glee hearing you call her that.
After quickly regaining her serious composure, she turns her attention to her assistant, "How's the rest looking?"

"Just finished organizing everything else," Koakuma states.
"Good," Patchouli doesnt even bother inspecting Anna's work, "since we've finished early, you may take a break, Mr. Whitestone. Ms. Whitestone, may I have a word with you in private?"
Anna sighed, "Sure. Alex, try not to wander to far off."
"I wont."

In a short amount of time, you wandered off pretty far. To be fair, the mansion was huge and filled with loads and loads of rooms and hallways, so getting lost was inevitable.
It could be magic that's making the mansion difficult to navigate. That would explain why you've ran walked passed the same imp anxiously shivering with impatience outside the bathroom door several times going down the same non-bending hallway!

Fortunately you did pass by a room that you overheard your sister and Patchouli arguing in. Unfortunately, that argument involved you.

"For the last time NO! Not happening!" you hear your sis state.
"C'mon, this is a perfect opportunity," Patchouli argued, "it would be the discovery of brand new species if your brother successfully manages to inseminate one of them!"
"I'm not letting you use MY brother for a perverted science experiment!"
"Like I said, it's nothing dangerous! I've looked them all up and I made sure he wouldnt risk losing
any limbs or being eaten afterwards!”
“Youre gonna be losing plenty of limbs if you even THINK of trying that little scheme with Alex!”
“Ok! Then what about just Wriggle then?! Wriggle happens to be a very safe, very friendly, and VERY estrogenic female. Your brother has nothing to worry about-"
"I wont warn you again. Get off this subject. NOW."
"Urgghhh, fine fine! ....Can I at least bring him to the upcoming Animecon? I've got this really nice suit that's just his size!"

“Excuse me, Mr. Whitestone. Shouldnt you be working?”

AGAIN, your heart nearly jumps out of its ribcage cuz the head maid literally appears out of nowhere and surprises the bejeezus outta you!
Oops! No time to catch your breath. You just got busted eavesdropping AND slacking off.

“Oh! S-Sakuya!” you regain your composure, “Yes, I already finished organizing books in the library. Patchouli on-ugh… I mean Ms. Knowledge told me to take a break.”

“Well, that's very generous of her, but that I'm afraid she's in no position to give anyone breaks,” Sakuya told you, “everyone has a designated break time on their individual schedule and yours wont be showing up for a while.” Drag. “In the meantime, you must ALWAYS keep yourself busy while on the clock. ALWAYS.”

You sighed and kept your cool. Youre seeking asylum here so you best cope and make yourself useful to remain here.

“Ok, well… what else can you have me do?” you ask her, “I'm available.”
“Scarlet Mansion always has chores available to keep everyone busy,” she remarks, “for example, we could use a little more help in the kitchen. Some of the maids have a bad habit of overestimating their strength and balance and they could use an extra set of hands to help carry the load and avoid breaking more outrageously expensive fine china!” Youre reminded of that moment a maid nearly spilled a ton of plates on the floor and nearly breaking every single one had Sakuya not intervened and… whatever she did.
Youre ALSO reminded that maid was a fairy…

“Another choir we have available is tending to the garden in the backyard. I'm sure your associate Arnold would appreciate if you helped him water the Mistress's flower garden and feed the pets in the pool.”
You quickly have a flashback of that huge venus flytrap and those grab-happy mermaids! But at least you'd have Arnold to protect you in case something bad happens!

“Also...” you heard Sakuya let out a slightly annoyed grunt, “...since you got along so well with our gate guard earlier, perhaps you could lend her a hand watching the gate? ...Or at the very least keep her from falling asleep on the job again.” Assisting Meiling, huh? Sounds like an opportunity! ...It also reminds you of what happened the LAST time a girl got too clingy with you… and already you start to miss good ol' Eientei and that wascally wabbit…

Shaking all those thoughts of, you had to keep yourself focused. And with the options Sakuya made available for you, you make your decision:
111312121111212111122222221211132.title: Patchotaku

1113121211112121111222222212111322.content:
You decided to help Arnold with gardening. Sakuya nodded and helped you get to the garden. Once arrive, you noticed it was not that bad, with pretty flowers and such. You then noticed Arnold giving water to Venus flytraps and Sakuya came to him.

“Arnold, he came to help you.” Sakuya said.

Arnold stopped and looked at you for moment and nods.

“Thanks.” Arnold Thanks her.

Sakuya then retreated, leaving you and Arnold together. Moment later Arnold left and came back with bag stuffed moving with something. You wondered what that stuff were until until he told you he need you to come with him on the mermaid pond. You two went and once arrived he opened the bag, revealing to be a two young males in straw straps and mouth bands.

“You two shall now be their breakfast. Be happy.” Arnold said.

“W-wait! They haven’t done nothing wrong! Why would they be-“

“They are kids who’s parents debts to scarlets devil never repayed.” Arnold said.

He then grabbed one of the boy and threw him off the pool. The mermaids attacks the boy bloody and and now the area were now puddle of blood now.

“Your turn now Alex.” Arnold replied.

You were scared shit about this, but it was a job given as a boy looked at you in plea. Will you do it? Or not?
1113121211112121111222222212111322.title: Good for thoughts.

1113121211112121111222222212112.content:
Dispite what she was saying, you felt very tired. You declined her offer and quickly went back to your room. Once you went back to your room, you noticed that the bed sheets and the cover were cleaned up. You smiled lightly and went to the bed and lied down to get some rest. You looked at the ceiling, wondering about the future in this area. Sure, you thought that Anna was doing this for your safety but you wondered if she was doing this with caution as Le Fay gang is fairy type by majority, and this mansion is just riddled with fairies.

"I hope Anna knows what she's doing." You mumbled.

You then felt more tired and closed your eyes to get some sleep. You slept until you felt someone shaking your body. You opened your eyes, seeing your own big sister wearing a butler suite on. The suite were almost the same as Walter Dornez from the Hellsing manga except that she was: 1.She was a women and 2.She was younger then Walter. You got up slowly as Anna stood, you also noticed remilias younger sister was standing next to her.

"It's time for dinner brother." Anna said.

"Alright." You replied, "What's on the menu?"

"Salisbury Steak and home made mash potato." Anna answered, "There is pudding for dessert."

You nodded and got up to go with anna for the dinner. You were surprised that you slept through the day and you felt little awkward to see your own big sis wearing an butler suite. She had the towel on her right arm, walking normally then you quickly saw her magnum on her pocket. You sighed that you knew she would carry a weapon, no matter where she was at.

"Say sis, why are you wearing an butler suite?" You asked.

"Lady Scarlets order." Anna answered, "She was thinking about letting you put on as well, but I told her you suite more in the casual cloth then formal one."

"Gee, thanks." You replied.

You then saw Flandre stopping both you and Anna. You didn't know what she wanted until she rose her both hand at Anna. Both you knew what she wanted and Anna lifted her up and placed her on her shoulders to carry her on top. Flandre liked this and they continued to walk toward the dining room.

"Say, onee-sama." Flandre spoke, "Would you and your otouto-sama would live here forever?"

You were very shocked to hear that and Anna just giggled.

"Right now, no Imouto-sama." Anna replied.

"Aww, but I like you, and Your otouto-sama looks pretty decsent." Flandre replied.

You were sweating as her words on 'descent'. After moment, they got to the dining room and opened the door. You noticed the chairs were almost full as Anna took flandre to her seat, there were only two open seats left: one that was next to sakuya, or the seat next to patchoulie herself.

You wondered for minute and decided to take seat next to..
1113121211112121111222222212112.title: Insist that you cant!

11131212111121211112222222121121.content:
Because it was the seat that looked the closest to where Anna was sitting (even though it was still pretty far in itself), you decided to take the open seat next to the head maid. It was probably the best decision, considering she's the one in charge of all the maids here... FAIRY maids. You'll get no safer than the one the fairies of this mansion answer to.

You take a deep breath and head to that seat showing as little fear on your face as possible. Fairies could smell that, you know. The more feral ones, anyway.

"Er, is this seat taken?" you remember to politely ask Sakuya before jumping the gun and making yourself look rude.
She shook her head, "you may sit down." And sit down you did.

"Nihao!!" and that's when you noticed a wee too late that your seat was on the opposite side of that friendly gate guard from earlier!
You swallowed, "Hi Meiling."
"Ah so you two have already met?" the head maid was clearly observant.

"Yeah, I was taking a little walk down the hallway earlier and I bumped into her."
"Down the hallway?" that arouse suspicion from Sakuya, "Meiling, werent you supposed to be guarding the gate?"
"M-Ms. Whitestone said it was ok to let her bodguard Arnold take over!" Meiling said, "I mean I was really hesitant and wanted to tell them no, but... well, theyre our guests! Youre not suppose to say no to guests!" Something told you this girl was used to getting yelled at. You might wanna keep an eye on her. Not too much of an eye though or she might think youre coming on to her!

"Well... he did finally manage to evict that book thief," Sakuya commented.
"He's definitely the guy you can trust with your life," you say, "he wouldnt still be hanging around Anna if he wasnt." Ms. Hong resumed smiling at you. "He aint much of a talker though, so dont expect to get many long-winded conversations out of him-!" You flinched as soon as you felt Ms. Hong stroke your hand on the table.

"Well, then that narrows down the chores he'll be doing in this mansion," the head maid scuffed, "I certainly hope youre just as hardworking, because you will put to work while youre staying here." You understand. Gotta earn your place for refuge and such. No freeloading.

You nodded, "Absolutely. I'm very hardworking. You name it and I'll do it to the best of my Ah-" suddenly you felt something stroke your shin, "-abilities!"
"Good," the head maid didnt seem to notice your sudden flinch, "I was thinking having you be a greeter for when we have guests. Most of our guests that come here are female nobility and I'm certain they'd appreciate receiving proper greetings from a young nice looking male servant rather than the um... lesser physically flattering goblin butlers."

"I can do that," you say with no hesitation, "I've done a bit of butlering back at my old job. Uh... I'm not gonna get a lot of cigarette burns, am I?"
"Certainly not!"
"Ok, great! Ss!" you flinched again. Somebody's bare foot was rubbing up against yours!
"Although I would strongly recommend that you dont reveal yourself to be a human too much," Sakuya said while you felt a foot rubbing up and down your leg! Worst time in the world to wear shorts, "many of the youkai matriarchs are not very fond of humans. Please dont take offense if a few say seemingly racial remarks about your species." That foot is getting a bit too close to your knee! Meiling was merely leaning her head in her palm while she smiled your way.

"T-T-that doesnt bother me," you pretend to keep your cool while your leg was getting a bit of a rub down, "I'm uhh... used to dealing with those ahh... types! U-usually a simple sshhhh...shoulder rub cools them down-*GASP!*" You almost jump out of your seat! That crafty foot rubbed up against your inner thigh! The smiling gate guard's cheeks went a bit bright pink!

"No, I dont recommend physical contact," Sakuya says, completely blind to your squirming due to a foot going for your crotch region, "many take that as offense. Just keep a distance when youre talking to a guest until it's clear she trusts your company enough."
"Okeeeh.... Ok...." you panted. Great, now she's using BOTH her feet! Both going to work on your inner thighs! Meiling started to pant a little herself, obviously what she wanted was well within her reach! Man, you never met a girl with talented legs like hers!

"But first we'll probably have you help some of the maids with the laundry too," the head maid suggests, "and dont worry. None of them have sworn allegiance to anyone but the mistress."
"I'm... soooooo..." you moaned, savoring how good Meiling's toes felt against your sweet spots, "....glad to hear that!" Since she wasnt keen on stopping any time soon, you might as well exact a little revenge on the crafty gate guard. While her feet were at work, she left herself vulnerable. After slipping your shoe and somehow your sock off too (suspension of disbelief, please. Suspension of disbelief), your own foot and wriggly toes took a lunge between Meiling's legs!

"AAHH!!" unlike yourself, Ms. Hong let out a loud gasp that everybody around you at the table noticed! They all stared her direction.

"Er....s-sorry," Meiling scratched the back of her head, pretending to look clumsy, "...just a toe cramp!"

That brief moment of humiliation ended that little footsie play gone wrong. You tried to keep cool, pretending that you just didnt get fondled by feet.

“Well, dinner seems to be taking a little longer than expected,” Sakuya notes, “I better go check on the kitchen staff.” With that, she gets out of her seat but only gets a couple of steps before she stops and offers, “If you'd like, I can introduce you to the staff right now and help you get acquainted with some of your new fellow associates”

It would be a wise idea to get to know them and get used to them ASAP since you'll probably be spending a lot of time with them while you and Anna are on the run.

But just when you were about to take Sakuya up on that offer, you felt a cool pleasant and quite alluring breeze blow gently into your ear. You couldnt help but shiver with delight before you realized it was that darn gate guard again trying to get a bit clingy.
And because you clearly didnt learn your lesson when you were in Eientei, that move made you immediately reconsider being introduced to the kitchen crew and instead spending a bit more time, preferably alone, with Meiling.

You quickly shook yourself out of it before answering...
11131212111121211112222222121121.title: Footsie Fever

111312121111212111122222221211212.content:
Within the few seconds of pondering, your mind pondered for hours the decision. You still have a bit of a phobia for fairies and this chinese woman in front of you doesnt look or smell anything Fey (although you did detect a slight reptilic odor about her) and she seems awful friendly emphasis on 'FRIENDLY' (and 'AWFUL'!). Plus, you've been given an opportunity to make a really close friend on just your first day of being here. Might as well not blow it.

"That's alright," you say to Sakuya, welcoming Meiling's stare of interest, "maybe later."

"Alright," the maid caved, "dinner wont be long. Meiling, try not to embarrass us in front of our guests again, ok?"
Meiling tsked and muttered something in Chinese under her breath.
"What was that?"
"I said yes, Sakuya!" Meiling quicly changed her story, "absolutely, Sakuya!" But as soon as the head maid left the scene, she gave a long hard impatient sigh. Guess that took way too long for her to finally have some alone-time with her new boy-toy.

The awkward silence between the two of you amplified the room. It was getting awful uncomfortable just watching her stare back at you in silence. Well, you got your alone time. Quick! Say something to break the silence! C'mon! Something! Anything!

“...Wow, you speak real good english for a Chinese girl! Most of those I worked with spoke in broken sentences and mispronounce syllables!”

YOU. FUCKING. IDIOT.

“KST!! PHWWAAAHAHAHAHAA!!” super lucky for you, judging by how Meiling hammered on the table and broke into a fit of laughter, she's got a sense of humor, “hahaha! Wow, so Ms. Whitestone's little brother has a spontaneous side as well? Youqu, da.”
Your face went red with embarrassment, realizing far too late how stupid you just sounded. “Heh. Sorry. I get a little carried away sometimes. But your english is really good.”
“Well, to be honest, I spent a tremendously long time learning it,” Ms. Hong admitted, “I was a pretty slow learner when it came to learning a new language. Fortunately, dragon youkai live a very VERY long time!”

“Dragon?” your eyes widened a bit.

“One of the strongest, fiercest, most powerful and most feared breed of beasts in all of Gensokyo,” she said with pride, “stories and fairy tales about us are the most popular worldwide.” Personally, you prefer the ones about killer robots, but to each his own.

“Well, Scarlet Mansion must be impregnable with a dragon guarding it!” Why the heck did Meiling frown uncomfortably a second there?!

“*Ahem!* Anyway, it's nice that the mistress finally hired some male help around the mansion,” she commented, “usually the workers we get here are strictly girls. She's probably worried there might be xing'ai or xingbing going on, but I dont believe that's a bad thing. Personally, I think shared genetic traits from the offspring would make for some fine future helpers!” Whoa. And you thought what YOU just previously said was no holds barred. But you do notice nearly every other single person in this place is a girl (most of them FAIRIES!). You might be feeling a bit lonesome, but then again, you dont remember anyone else in Eientei being a boy either.

Plus, you do notice the hobgoblins are BUTLERS, not MAIDS (unless it's cuz theyre too darn ugly).

“Oh, but I thought those goblin butlers were guys,” you interject.

“Theyre exceptions,” she sighed depressingly, “theyre all eunuchs.” Your nerves immediately shot up by instinct! For good reasons, you became terrified out of your gourd.

“A-A-Are they gonna make me a eunuch too?!”
“Of course not!” Meiling smiled, “Anna threatened to have this mansion nuked if they did.” Whew. God you love sis! “Of course if word gets out that you still have your xingqiguan in tact, things may get awkward.”
Perhaps you were a tad too quick on the relief, “Awkward?”
“Well, I'm not saying ALL these workers are segui,” she stated although you have no clue what 'segui' is, “many are very reserved and strong willed against such urges. The librarian's assistant, however, is not one of them.”
“Librarian's assistant?”
“Koakuma,” she said, “a succubus.” You had almost forgotten seeing a succubus down at the library arranging books. That could probably lead to a serious situation for you unless she's full-on lesbo. And knowing the nature of a succubus, awkward situations would be the LAST thing you need to worry about!

“Dont worry,” Meiling assures you, “she wont hurt you,” she smirked and leaned closer to you, “provided you've got the scent of someone much stronger on you.” You raised your eyebrow, trying your damndest not to look interested. You knew exactly what she meant by that. Not even Reisen could lay it down any thicker.

“Your tea, sir,” and then out of nowhere, one of the very few male hobgoblin eunuchs magically appear and placed a cup of tea on your side of the table. Fortunately, it's green tea. You like green tea. It relieves stress.
“Thank you,” you gratefully accepted.

“Your uh… 'Baiju', ma'am,” but instead of being a proper stereotype and getting green tea as well, Meiling was given a little green bottle in Chinese with a picture of a temple on it.
“Xie xie!” she thanked the eunuch butler with a smile. You tilted your head curious of that drink she's got, but as she popped open the bottle, JESUS did that strong stench of ammonia and alcohol pierce through your nostrils like a fowl-smelling bullet!

“You… you actually DRINK that?” you said with your eyes watering.
“Oh yes,” she answered with zero guilt, “Baiju is the best kind of alcohol you'll find the world over. Sure it's not quite as strong as Oni brew, but it's guaranteed to grow scales on your chest, provided youre dragon enough to handle it. Do you drink, Whitestone?”
“Not very,” you answered, “at the most just a little rum or Jack Daniels on special occassions.”

“Tsk, those kiddie drinks are for weaklings!” Meiling boasted, “you want a REAL youkai's drink, Baiju is the way to go! Take a sip! It'll get you pissed!” You wish you knew the proper Chinese equivalent to 'ARE YOU SERIOUS?!'
That crap she was about to drink was still burning your nostrils and she wants you to put that in your stomach?! She's out of her mind if she thinks you'll be dumb enough to swallow that crap!

“Uhhh… no thanks,” you reject the offer a lot more politely than deserved.

“Oh c'mon!” Meiling insisted as she poured some of that Baiju into a little shot glass, “Dont be a wimp. One sip will really bring out the dragon in you!” Childish egging doesnt work in this situation.
“No, that's alright. I'm good,” you assured her.

Then the gatekeeper raised her eyebrow. Not a good sign.

“If you take a sip...” she whispered, “I'll protect you from Koakuma.”

The room went completely silent. Well actually it was still pretty noisy with all the endless chatter, but the tiny space between you and Meiling became dead silent! Reminding you of the succubus reminded you of what succubi are capable of.

“I mean dont get me wrong, our lady promised you protection,” Ms Hong continued, “but things can happen. And I dont even remember the last time Koakuma ever got to feed on a tasty male, so you should probably learn to sleep with one eye open!” You already do. But anyways, danged if she didnt make a little sense. What if that librarian's assistant tried something in your sleep like in those stories Jenny Greenteeth would tell you?

“Of course, as I said,” the gatekeeper smirked again just before pushing the shot glass full of Baiju toward you, “you might not have to worry about that… provided you had the scent of somebody bigger and stronger keeping her away, yeah?”
111312121111212111122222221211212.title: Rock the Dragon

1113121211112121111222222212112121.content:
You knew she was up to something. You knew Reisen was up to something too. But it wasnt the first time you had a run in with dangerous girls attracted to you and hopefully it wont be the last! (HOPEFULLY?!) Besides, she might be a dragon youkai and youre lacking knowledge of what those types are capable of, youre well aware of what a succubus can do and you'd rather not risk your soul taking such chances! Fairies may be sadistic, but they dont go for your SOUL as well! Ms. Hong was offering your free protection (free, your ass!) in exchange for showing how much of a man you are by taking a sip of her accursed booze.

"You... promise you'll protect me from this Koakuma girl?" you questioned.

Meiling smirked and winked at you, "Oh yeah! I'm gonna protect you REAL good!" She even licked her lips after saying that! She was not even TRYING to hide her ulterior motive! She'd probably go as far as to reach down her unbuttoned blouse and pull out a condom, but it's likely she wants to be knocked up. Regardless, the worst case scenario for sexing up a dragon is a few broken bones (hopefully). The worst case scenario for sexing up a succubus is LOSING YOUR SOUL!

"Alright," you took the shot glass of Baiju and gulped, "just one sip." You took a deep breath before bringing the glass close to your face so you dont breathe in the insanely strong alcohol and ignoring the millions of voices in your head screaming not to, you took a sip.

You cringed the nanosecond the nasty burning alcohol touched your tongue! The taste was unimaginable, unlike any kind of beer or vodka you've ever tasted. The flavor was worse than nasty. It was painful to taste. The taste honestly hurt your tastebuds, burned the inside of your mouth, and just by twitching, you felt the taste waft through your nostrils making it hard to breathe without burning!
You swallowed it fast, hoping you could get rid of that horrific flavor ASAP, but you feared what the putrid alcohol would do to your stomach. You coughed, desperately trying to get the flavor out of your lungs before you suffocate in it!

As you suffered, Meiling giggled and clapped her hands, impressed by the size of your balls (which sadly were smaller than your brain at the moment!)

"Zuòde hǎo!" she gave you a thumbs up, "feels good, huh? Dont feel truly awoken?!"
"Definitely woke me the hell up," you gagged as you washed it down with your green tea, "is this stuff gonna do anything to me?"
Meiling smiled and nodded, "It's not merciful to newbies. If vodka makes you tipsy, this stuff will FAWK you up!" She added heavy accented emphasis on 'fuck'!
"It's gonna FUuuuuUuuu...." holy crap, youre starting to feel the side effects! Suddenly you feel dizzy. Incredibly dizzy! The whole mansion was shaking around, yet nobody but you was feeling it!

"OH Gaudd!!" your eyes were having a hard time focusing, "wuts goin ahn?!" You were slurring like crazy. It was already hard to speak.
"Youre getting fawked up," Meiling smiled. It was impossible for your eyes to keep focus on anything but Meiling's smiling face.
"Jeezzez... wah dah hell's een dis stuhp?" man did you slur! You dont ever recall getting yourself THIS drunk before. Sure, there were times when you binged, but never to the point that you were feeling THIS tipsy!

Miles and miles and miles away from your table, you could barely make out the blurry figure of Ms. Scarlet giving an announcement to everyone in the dining hall. Despite the loud ringing echo in her voice, you couldnt make out a word she was saying. You assumed that other blurred figure beside her was your sister. But you couldnt understand a single syllable of the entire announcement. Even if you could, you wouldnt be listening, cuz you were too busy trying to keep balanced in your seat what with you being so dizzy!

Fortunately, Meiling held your hands so you wouldnt trip and fall over. She also caressed them, but you werent noticing it at the moment. The world was spinning at a tremendous speed and your body couldnt keep up with it. Your eyes were getting heavy. You were getting nauseous, but you didnt have anything in your stomach to throw up. The damn gate guard didnt just get you pissed. She pretty much drugged you with that hellish booze of hers! And this was your first day here at this mansion! YOUR FIRST DAY! Youre not sure you can handle this! You were probably infinitely safer back at that hospital. God help you if Maeve finds a way to possess Meiling too...

After the world finally finished shaking you down, your head collapsed on the table and you went out like a light.

********

"GASP! Mr. Whitestone! What happened to Mr. Whi... Meiling, did you feed him that stupid drink of yours?!"

"Aheheh... yeah. Sorry, Patchouli. Guess I got carried away."

"Damnit Meiling! How many times do I have to tell you stop giving our guests Baiju?! You know no one else can tolerate that stuff!"

"Aww... but he was so cute trying!"

"Quiet! Hurry up and move him to his room before his sister or the mistress notices!"

"You can count on me!"

*********

"Arrrgghhh..." you slowly wake with your head pounding. Youre not sure how long you were out or if you were doing anything between now and hitting your head on the table. Though your head was aching, your blurred vision cleared very quickly and you found yourself lying on a nice comfy bed in...
1113121211112121111222222212112121.title: Alcohell

11131212111121211112222222121121211.content:
You looked around, noticing some stuff of yours that you took when you left eientei. You understood this was your room, and when you layed down with some headache, you heard a door knock.

"Come in!" You spoke.

The door opened, revealing itself as Arnold carrying a cup of water. He came and put the cup on The desk and pulled himself a chair.

"How's everything? Saw you acting all funny." Arnold spoke.

"Just..a minor headache." You lied, "where's Anna?"

"She's currently entertaining flandre with stuffed toys." Arnold replied.

"..how long was I out?" You asked.

"Whole night and morning, lunch is almost ready." He replied.

You sighed harder by this then you heard a door knock, seeing sakuya with lunch tray. She came and put it before you as you opened the tray, showing a plate of lasagna and a cup of grape juice. You thanked her for lunch and started to eat as Arnold got up, bid farewell and left the scene.

"Anyway, after lunch you can start your first day of work here." Sakuya said.

"Alright, what's my job?" You asked.

"Well, you could be..."
11131212111121211112222222121121211.title: First actual job.

choices: Agree to go on the date.
11131212111121211112222222121122.content:
It was a long walk to the very end of the table (and it was a really big table) but you decided to take the seat next to the bookworm, Ms. Knowledge, who was still a bit too occupied in her books. Fine with you. That means it'll be a little more quiet... and a little less fairy-involved. Sitting next to Sakuya who's still coercing with the fairy maids means trouble for you should one of them have ties with Le Fey. The long walk was well worth it.

So you sat down next to Patchouli, still too deep in her book to notice you there. She had a stack full of books on the table, so it looked like she was gonna be busy for quite a while.
You nearly jumped out of your skin when a fairy maid appeared out of nowhere and poured tea (or so it seemed) into your teacup.
"Th...thank you," you muttered quietly, a bit too nervous to raise your voice high enough for anyone to hear. You dare not put that cup in your mouth unless you were absolutely sure it was safe to drink.

You wait patiently as the maid pours the tea into Patchouli's cup and quickly moves on to the next person. You watched the purple haired bookworm carefully, waiting for her take her eyes off the book and sip her tea. It took a bit of time (apparently whatever she was reading was a darn good read), before she finally reached for her cup (her eyes still focused on the book) and gave it a sip.
She seemed perfectly fine. She's not hacking up, her face aint changing color, she didnt so much as blink. Ok, maybe the tea isnt poisoned after all.

Good thing. It wasnt bad tasting. Couldve used a little more honey, though.

Ok, now you feel that it's a little rude to not say hi after this long. Although she clearly looks like she's in no mood for a discussion, you felt obligated to at least say hi.

"Hello," you give a quick greeting.
"Hi," she predictably gives a quick response without even turning her head. Unpredictably, her eyes widened and she did a double-take at you! "Wait! ...Youre Ms. Whitestone's brother, arent you?" Oh, interested in you, is she?
"Yes," you answer, "Alex Whitestone. And you must be Pachouli Knowledge, the-"
"Yeah yeah yeah," she cut you off, apparently not interested in any introductions, "listen. Youre a male, right?" The hell kind of stupid question was that?
"Uh... yes?" you pretend not to be a little disturbed by that question. Apparently it was the right answer. Patchouli then for some reason skimmed flipped through her little book looking for a certain page until she finally found it and read it out.

"And you dont have a mate-I mean girlfriend, do you?" awful subtle question.
Despite memories of that mentally ill but still darn lovable bunny girl, you answer, "No I dont."
"Great! Great!" Patchouli slammed her book on the table, almost knocking over her teacup, "listen, I'm wondering if you could do me a little favor tonight?" She tapped her fingers on her book while she asked.

"What kind of favor?" you asked her.

"You see, I've got a...friend," she stalled on that word, "I've been trying to hook her up with someone. A particular someone. You know... cuz she's been seeming lonely lately and I think it'd be a good idea to find her a decent guy. A lot of the males-er-guys I've seen around here... not her type."
"Uh huh..." you let her continue, although you sense something odd about this. You notice one of the books on the stack is about the human anatomy.

"Her name is Wriggle. Yeah, I know, silly name," Patchouli says before you can even think, "but Wriggle's a great friend. A really nice girl too. She wouldnt harm a fly, er, ahem. I personally think she deserves a break from all of that, and I think the best kind of break would be a nice relaxing date with an equally eligible bachelor!" Another book seems to be about mating rituals for fireflies. Odd.

She nodded, "And of course, I think you deserve a nice relaxing date too. I heard from your sister that you had a nasty fallout with one of the patients over at Eientei." Good lord, Anna told her?! ...And who exactly wrote the book 'Will They Procreate?: 101 Reported Successful/Failed Human-Youkai Crossbreeding'?! "Well, dont worry. Wriggle's completely sane and incredibly sound mind. She's also very nice and fun to be around. She's incredibly cute, too."

On one hand, it didnt seem like a bad idea to go on a date, considering you were sorta feeling a little lonely (and youre only gonna get lonelier). On the other hand, those books Patchouli's reading dont seem to strike well with you. I mean, what's up with that book 'World's Most Famous Crossbreeds'?

"Is there a particular catch to this?" you couldnt help but ask.

"No! No no no no no! Of course not!" you could tell she's lying, "it's just a friend helping out a friend! Although I most certainly wouldnt mind it if you two were to hit it off... and well..." her face got a little red, "...you know..." You finally noticed the cover of that book she's currently reading. It's the one you spotted in the unfamiliar language... the cover depicts what looks to be some 8th century Byzantine mosaic of what appears to be a human man and a four-armed woman with antennae in what looks to be the Splitting Bamboo position (dont ask how you know the name of it!). This girl was starting to be a little too disturbing for you.

……….

“Er, where are we going Wriggle? I cant see a thing.”
“Dont worry dont worry. I’ll show you when we get there.”
The forest seemed endless and pitch black except for the stars in the sky. Navigating through this dark forest no doubt full of dangerous hungry beasts was dangerous for someone like you, but Wriggle seemed to have no trouble leading you through it. Clearly, she’s used to the routes so you’d rather not question her.

Besides, she seemed incredibly enthusiastic to lead you somewhere and it wasn’t long before you found out where it is.

A nice large pond barely lit up by the little fireflies flying around it. The water looked crystal clear and possibly clean, though you don’t consider bathing in it, let alone drinking from it. It was rather nice to see your reflection and notice the way your eyes sorta twinkle.

“This is our little late night hangout,” Wriggle explained, “it’s not spectacular or anything, but it’s awful relaxing after a super hard day’s work of tending my boss’s garden.”
“Well it definitely looks,” you took a breath, “FEELS relaxing.” It was until a firefly zipped too close, almost colliding into your eye before you flinched. Fortunately it swoops around you and lands on your shoulder lighting you up.

It’s understandable, because unlike fireflies from most of the world, those spawned from a youkai are rather hostile and protective of it’s host. Should the female feel threatened, their bioluminescent abdomen also conduct electricity when they swarm prey.”

“These fireflies are like the watch dogs of my pond,” Wriggle said, “theyre trained to guard this place and attack those that threaten it without mercy.” You cringed when another firefly lands on your other shoulder.

“By natural instincts, the human male seems intimidated due to being outnumbered and possibly fears the slightest move could set the firefly army to strike,” Patchouli narrated, “sensing his fear, the youkai offers assurance.”

“Don’t worry,” Wriggle assured you, “they only attack when I tell them to. And I told them youre ok.”
“Er… thanks,” you cooled yourself down, believing her words, “have you ever… had to have them attack someone?”
“Not lately, it’s pretty rare,” she answered, “and I dont just have them attack random people just passing by. You’d have to REALLY be a threat to get swarmed.”
“Anyone around here that is a threat?” you continued to question.
