“Judging by his interest, the human seems to have built a trust with the youkai that she means him no harm,” Patchouli narrates, “however due to his tragic experience with his last youkai mate, successful breeding may not prove an easy task for the firefly youkai. She may need to offer more appeal to him to truly gain his satisfaction.”

“And guarding the pond’s not the only thing they do,” she says, “I’ve also trained them to do tricks.”
That caught your interest pretty fast, “What kind of tricks?”

She didnt tell you. She showed you.
With a twitch of her antennae, the fireflies suddenly halt their random circular flying and float motionless in the air. Even the ones on your shoulders join them. With another antennae twitch, the fireflies line up together and start circling around in a 360 rotation. Another twitch and the long row of fireflies zip toward Wriggle and spin circles around her. Then they zipped at you and spun circles around you before returning to the pond.

Wriggle’s antennae twitched again and the fireflies swarmed up in the sky until they formed what looked to be a cute little cartoony image of Wriggle herself!
“Wow, that is neat!” you gave her props, but she wasnt done.
Another twitch, then they flew down toward the pond… then they split into little single-filed groups and zipped up toward the sky before suddenly splitting and scattering as soon as they were high enough! They were imitating fireworks!

“Whoa ho ho!!” you chuckled in awe, “that is amazing!”

“The youkai’s effort to appeal to her potential mate as succeeded,” Patchouli narrated with a victorious smirk, “breeding has been ascertained!”

Suddenly, the confident smile on Wriggle’s face turned to suspicion! As if sensing hostility with her twitching antennae, she quickly jerked her head to whatever was out there and placed herself in front of you like a protector.
“What is it?”
“Shh!” Wriggle hushed you.

“Suddenly, the female youkai senses a potentially hostile presence,” Patchouli narrates, “she puts herself in front of her mate, ensuring the safety of him and their potential offspring. She gives her drones the signal to attack.”

Wriggle’s antennae twitch again, giving her fireflies the signal to swarm! They immediately response, zipping toward and eventually surrounding the intruder!

1113121211112121111222222212112211113.content:
You suddenly feel the unquestionable urge not to end this potential relationship abruptly. It didnt matter to you if you and the firefly youkai with the world's shiniest ass werent compatible biologically (and you most likely werent!). It didnt even matter that you hated the majority of bugs with a firey passion (including the ones that werent trained to be spies for Le Fey!). And it wasnt YOUR fault that your match-maker clearly had shady motives to book you on this blind date!

"Ugh..." speaking of which, Patchouli sighed hard, "nevermind her, Alex. If she doesnt wanna be rich and famous, that's her loss! Let's check and see if human/spider youkai hybrids are a thing.... Wait! Alex, where are you going?!"
You didnt say anything back to her. You didnt even acknowledge her or so much as give her eye contact as you just blindly walked into the absolute darkness toward the direction Wriggle's glowing butt was heading! Unsafe obviously, but you were totally interested in making this potential relationship work! At least that's what you tell yourself.

"Hey! Come back! It's dangerous to head out that way alone!" Patchouli shouted, "...cant you at least wait for me to recharge the camera battery?!" By the time Patchouli finished that question, she was already a speck in the distance, what with the fact you had to pick up the speed tremendously cuz Wriggle started running!

At this point, the rest of the forest was pitch black. Couldnt see the trees, shrubs, bushes, or unknown critters hiding among them. You couldnt see the hand in front of your face. You could barely see the glowing eyes hidden amongst the darkness. If you were thinking rationally, you'd realize what a great big stupid move you just made. But instead, you were only focused on chasing the only well lit light in the middle of this darkness! Fortunately, it was a very inviting light and had a very nice shape. It was damn near impossible to take your eyes off it ever since Wriggle first showed it to you when you came so close to mating with her on all fours! It felt way way WAY too early to say goodbye to it after only being introduced to it!

The very tiny part of you that wasnt mesmerized by the glow was hoping Wriggle wasnt gonna dim her butt-light any time soon, otherwise you'd be SOL. It was far too late to turn back now even if you wanted to, cuz you didnt know where back was anymore!

After over a mile and half of running trying to catch up with the glowing backside, the light finally dimmed out. Fortunately by then, Wriggle had already stopped at a well lit shack in the middle of a cavern lit up by thousands of tiny fireflies. The cavern itself had a very colorful glow, the stalagmites illuminating all sorts of rainbow colors. A nice little tourist attraction. You'd take photos if you brought your smartphone. Now you cant so much as call for help and the only person who knows where you are just dashed into her shack and slammed the door shut behind her!

Shaking off the trance, the fear of being completely stranded in the middle of nowhere washes completely over you! You nervously head toward the shack and knock on the door.

You see Wriggle's eyes peek at you through the mail slot on the door, then they quickly narrow and you hear her shout "GO AWAY!! LEAVE ME ALONE!!"

"W-Wriggle, please let me in," you plead, "I... think I might be lost."
"THAT'S YOUR PROBLEM!" she shouts, "I NEVER SAID YOU COULD FOLLOW ME!" Geez, what were you thinking?!
...Oh right.

"C'mon, Wriggle, please let me in."
"Why? So you can finish Patchouli's stupid nature porn?!" she snapped, still angry about it, "go away now before I summon the hornets!"
As much as you didnt wanna risk getting stung to death by a swarm of angry hornets, you keep pleading with the bug girl.

"Listen, I'm really sorry about that stupid stunt she tried to pull," you apologize, "I swear, I had no idea she was gonna film us! That's not what I agreed to when I decided to go on this blind date with you!"
"Tsk... yeah right," Wriggle tsked from behind the door.

"I'm serious!" you insist, "I really did just want to unwind and take a break from all this insane shit I've been experiencing since being on the run... and have a nice pleasant evening with a really cute girl."
She didnt say anything, but you could sense she was listening.
"And hey..." your cheeks go red, preparing yourself to make a bold ballsy (what the fuck?! That's an actual word in the dictionary?!) statement, "...it's only an added killer bonus if it's this really cute girl's special time of the month. What kind of gentleman would I be to just leave such a cute girl hanging when she's in need of having her urge sated?"

"Uhhhh.... ummm..... uuuuuuhhhh..." you could tell she was getting awful nervous behind that door! You could imagine her face getting bashfully red. You were surely gonna get some tonight!!
"Now come on and let me in, Ms. Nightbug," you say, "let's both quell our primal urges, just the two of us!"

"H... how did I know that bookworm wont still be taping us?!" she questions.
"We can cover up all the windows!" you suggest, "and if she still somehow finds a way to sneak a camera in here, I'll have my sister strangle the living shit out of her!"

You waited patiently for Wriggle to decide whether to let you in and allow you to get reacquainted with her blinding bright rump. For the brief moment it was quiet except for the sounds of hissing and growling in the distance, once again reminding you how far away from safe haven you were!

"..Alright... but on one condition!" Wriggle demands.
"Name it."
"...Youre gonna let one of my special bugs bite you!" Bite you?!

She opened the mail slot again and an odd rainbow colored spikey beetle with large pincers flew out! You backed away, surprised as it landed on the door, and you eyed the eerie symbols on it's abdomen with caution.

"W....what is that?" you ask.
"It's a Wokandan Rainbow Beetle," she answers, "they are incredibly aggressive and their bites and very venomous!" All six eyes of the beetle gazed into yours and it made a loud scary hiss.
"V-V-Venomous?!"
"VERY venomous!" Wriggle corrected, "one single bite and the poison will work it's way through your body in only minutes!" You jumped back the minute it snapped it's big pincher-jaws at you! Second thoughts quickly arise.

"Dont worry, the poison wont kill you or anything bad like that," Wriggle assured you, "however it's gonna leave a few strong side-effects that wont go away for several hours!"
"W-what kind of side effects?" you ask as the beetle made you think was an attempt at a grin.

The sparkly eyelids of her enlarged bloodshot optical orbs widened as she spotted the antennae sprouting out of her sparkly green hair, the glowing celtic markings all across her exposed arms, her neatly trimmed nails now long and jaggedly, the pointed fangs in the middle of her dropped jaw, and the colorful butterfly wings sprouting out her back!

It felt like ages have past before the disturbing hallucinations finally subsided and the many voices in your head finally went quiet. You were still very lightheaded and dizzy, not to mention croggy, nauseous, and sorta twitching uncontrollably. The pain where the beetle bit you didnt seem to bother you as much anymore, but it might be because your hand was going numb. Your body has yet to recover from the poison. Still, compared to much earlier, you were feeling better.

As your vision clears, the first real image that catches your eye is the lovely face of a cute green-haired girl with bug antennae looking back at you with a worried expression. Oh hi, Wriggle.
"Alex? ...Alex?" her voice echoed a little as your eyes tried to focus.

"Ughhh..." the first words coming out of your mouth were mere groans. Your throat was sore and the inside of your mouth felt incredibly dry.
"Easy easy, dont force yourself up," Wriggle eased you, "relax. Take slow breaths." You do so. Not like you have any energy to do much, anyway. You shoulda known this was a terrible idea.

“Here,” the bug youkai offered you a drink, “drink this. It'll ease most of the symptoms youre currently experiencing.” Your better judgment was too busy groaning in agony to question drinking such an odd concoction, so you take the drink and slowly sip it, bracing yourself for the nasty taste.

There was no nasty taste. There was no taste PERIOD! Both your senses of taste and smell were gone at the moment. However your stomach was still feeling really queasy, so you had doubts you could hold the stuff down as you swallowed it.

“How are you feeling?” Wriggle leaned in close and both her and constantly warping twin sisters ask in unison.
“Been better,” you muttered with what little energy you had in your voice. You can at least make out the look of guilt and shame on the Wriggle clones' faces.
“I'm really sorry to put you through that,” she apologizes, “I had to make sure you were really committed to this and werent just in it for whatever stupid nature film that conniving book-humper was trying to make!” Unless Patchy intended to blur your face, the last thing you wanted was to have it put up for display all over television while youre supposed to be hiding out!
“Well,” you coughed a little before slurring, “did I convince you?”

Wriggle smiled and nodded, “Most humans wouldve cowered and ran at the sight of just one of my more harmless bugs. I honestly never thought I'd see one that'd willingly take a bite from one of my more poisonous ones just to prove his love to me! That's so romantic!” Romantic, she says?! That interesting choice of words. “I'll be honest. My original intention for our date was to have you breed with me one time so that I could get pregnant… that is before a certain spider interrupted us. There wouldnt be a second date if you successfully impregnated me.” Damn, you were just a bootycall? (Funny, considering her booty could literally charge your phone!)
Thinking about it, it actually made you feel a little hurt. Especially considering you did wanna eventually stop running and lay down and start a family. “I'm sorry, that's how most insect youkai relationships work. It's specifically to ensure future generations and nothing more.”

Then her eyes beamed up once more, “But after seeing the way you braved a dark creepy forest of unknown predators and even took a bite from one of my most venomous bugs, all for the chance to be with me… sigh… I was a fool to let you go! I'm so sorry I doubted a potential King!”
“Uh…'King'?” despite your head still spinning, you heard that peculiar word clearly.
“A colony king,” Wriggle stated, “a devoted alpha and leader of the hive who leads alongside the Queen as her prime partner.” She blushed a little, “It's… the closest we have to a 'husband'.”

Ok, THAT word sparks you up nice and good. Unfortunately for all the wrong reasons!
“W-w-wait! Husband? Arent you getting a little ahead of yourself?”
“Not at all!” Wriggle shook her head with determination, “only someone as bold, courageous, handsome, and daring deserves the right to be called 'King' by me!” Wow… handsome, she says? Maybe it's still the venom affecting your brain, but you didnt really feel the urge to argue why it's still way too early for her to consider you her 'King'. You werent even thinking about your sister and how worried sick she must be. Hell, at this point, you had all but forgotten you had a sister to begin with! All that really mattered to you at the moment was Wriggle.

“Th...thank you, Wriggle,” you were much more flattered than you normally would be, “that means an awful lot coming from such a cute gorgeous Queen.”
“Mmmm!!” she buzzed with joy and nuzzled her awfully ticklish (itchy) antennae against your head. You were a little confused by this odd gesture and Wriggled quickly realized that. “Oh. That's sort of our equivalent to this. *Smooch!*” Ok, THAT you understood… and blushed accordingly from it. It mustve been the venom going through your system, cuz it was all but enough to convince you to put aside everything else in life and accept your fate as Wriggle's King. Thank you Patchouli for screwing up so monumentally! If not for her, you'd never have had this incredible opportunity and this cute firefly youkai wouldve ended up choosing someone much less worthy to rule her colony!

“This is wonderful! I'm so excited!” speaking of, Wriggle was beaming with excitement, “I-I-I gotta tell Yuuka! She'll be so psyched that she's gonna have an official kingdom looking after her garden!” You'd ask who this Yuuka person is, but at the moment, you were still too blissed out on Wokanda beetle venom

“I better call her up now and give her the good news!” she reached for her awfully cute ladybug-shaped cellphone, but just as she was about to press a button, she hesitated, “Um… that is… if youre feeling up to meeting her right now. We could meet her later if you need more rest.”

...Then Wriggle blushed and gazed at you dreamy-eyed, “Or… if you'd like… we could… start on making our colony's first prince or princess…" Even her ass lighted up with anticipation! Your toxified brain gave it a little thought before you gave your answer.

"What's a spinneret?" asked her naive assistant.

11131212111121211112222222121122111211.title: Work well done

choices: Tell Meiling you need to talk to Patchouli.
111312121111212111122222221211221112112.content:
You'd look forward to seeing Billy again. It seemed like forever since you last seen your old friend. You'd really REALLY love to catch up. But right now, you got certain priorities of your own to attend to. You just came to this mansion and you'd REALLY like to break into it as soon as you can. Youre tired of constantly moving from place to place just to evade certain pursuers. This place feels well protected. Hell, the friendly gate guard helped you feel well protected (VERY well protected!). Besides, you just spent last night helping a cute girl in need as well as fed her uninvited acquaintance's odd little fetish. While Patchouli had obvious ulterior motives for having you date her friend, you didnt regret it a bit (despite still slightly surging!). If she intends to put you through more 'blind dates', you'll gladly volunteer for it! You hope you'll get the opportunity to tap Wriggle's glowing ass again soon.

You explain to your sis about how you'd prefer to stick around the mansion and break yourself first before going off on another one of Anna's little adventures (you leave out the part about Patchouli's experiment, of course!). She sighs, but understands.
“Tell Bill I said hi,” you give one last request before she leaves.
“I will,” she says, “later.”

And then she left again. You felt a little lonely as soon as she was gone, but you knew you had plenty of companionship within this mansion.

“Ni Haooooo!!!”

Speaking of which, it's not long before you hear a loud super energetic accented shout right behind you that almost made your skeleton leap out of it's shell! You turned around and reached for your gun then realizing the mansion staff already confiscated it before seeing that smiling red-headed Chinese gate guardian from before! Sitting in your bed next to you. You never even seen her come in…

When your heart finally stopped racing, you returned the greeting. “Oh… uh… hi Meiling.”
“Shuì de hǎo ma?” she asks you with a beaming smile.
“I'm… sorry?”
“Did you sleep well?” she gladly translated.
“Yeah, yeah I did,” you answered, “um… anyway, how did you get in here? Me and Anna never noticed you come in.”
“Of course you wouldnt!” Meiling had a bit of pride in her voice, “a nimble warrior like myself moves swiftly with the elements and the environment to avoid detection from mortal eyes, human or elf! You have no idea how many beds I've slept in without being detected by their owners!” Certainly, er, astounding.

“S-speaking of which,” you wanted to change the subject, “is Arnold still watching the gate?”
Meiling nodded, “I was supposed to be over there guarding with him, but he brought a new friend of his to cover for me! 'Ali' I think his name was.” Ali? …not a name youre familiar with. Then again you dont know ALL of Anna's old associates. “It's SOOO good to finally get a day off! I can finally sleep in without getting stabbed in the face by Sakuya again!”

“Stabbed in the… face?” it was incredibly disturbing hearing her state that so carefree! “Er, anyway, I hope the uh, mistress isnt upset that Arnold's covering for you again.”
“She thought I could use the day off,” Meiling said still smiling, “xièxie shàngdì! It's SOOO boring standing in front of that gate 18 hours a day just waiting for the extremely unlikely event that SOMEONE could show up to give me a decent challenge!” she whines and pouts, “even the very tiny few that DO make it this far turn tail and run as soon as I crack my knuckles.”

You try to relate to her dilemma, but the issues you have arent very relatable. Although it did kinda make you fantasize she had a pretty ripped body under her dress which did kinda intrigue you... up until you felt a sharp spark from your crotch! Body still hasnt fully recovered from Wriggle.

“Oh by the way,” Meiling frowned, “Patchouli told me to tell you she wanted to talk with you.”
“Oh?! Ow,” another spark, “w-what did she want?”
“To use you as another experiment and call it a 'blind date'.” You were just about to do a spit take, only to realize you didnt have anything in your mouth!
“Y...YOU KNEW ABOUT THAT?!!”
“Knew it?” Meiling smirked, “Koakuma burned me a copy of their 'documentary'.”
“What the...documentary?!!” you jumped out of your bed, ignoring the dozens of sparks, “s..s...she filmed me and Wriggle having sex, didnt she?!!”
“Ohhh, méi cuò!” Meiling beamed, “and what a grand job you did of her, too! I never wouldve guessed a gao bízi like you would be well equipped with a dragon's jiba! I'm surprised you didnt break Wriggle's baoyu when you ravaged it!” Meiling's foreign dirty talk was giving you a migraine. Nonetheless, if what she said was true, you need to have a talk with Patchouli… THEN you might need to have a talk with Anna if she doesnt straighten up!

“I'm sorry about Patchouli,” your bed mate sighed, “this isnt the first bizarre hobby she had and it certainly wont be the last. Maybe next time, she'll try to hook you up with Kisume to see if you can make bucket-babies! Hahahaha!!” You didnt exactly get the joke, but you gotta give her props for trying to cheer you up.

“Well, let's forget about her for now,” Meiling finally hopped out of her bed, “how about we go get a drink? I know a nice bar not far from here. ...And unlike Wriggle, MY baoyu doesnt conduct electricity!” Come to think of it, you havent had a good drink in a while… well, that could be because Anna's forbade you because her clients were TRYING to get you drunk! You could probably use the time to unwind, regardless of the gate guardian's shady motives.
Then again that would mean skipping out on what Patchouli wanted to talk to you about (and what you need to talk to HER about!) and you hate to be rude. Besides... you'd be the biggest liar on the planet if you said you didnt enjoy your time with Wriggle and Yamame. What should you do?

1113121211112121111222222212112211121121.title: Meet the crew

1113121211112121111222222212112211121121.content:
You ordered a glass of rum. It was way way WAY too much alcohol to be consuming this early in the day especially without a designated driver to take you home, but hey, after all the crap you went through, never hurts to spoil yourself once in a while, huh?

Meiling, however, as soon as she heard the word 'rum' leave your lips, let out the biggest condescending tsk.

"Rum?" she said with disgust in her voice, "rum? Youre just getting rum?"
"Er, yeah?" you said with a raised eyebrow, completely oblivious to the joke.
The chinese dragoness gatekeeper just rolled her eyes and exhaled, "Alright. Shameful, but alright." SHAMEFUL?
"Wait, what's that supposed to mean?" you got suspicious.
"Of all the strong, incredible, potent, knock you to the floor seeing stars alcohols this magnificent bar has to offer, you go for RUM?" Meiling questions your tastes in alcohol, "RUM is incredibly low class weaksauce! It's made for naozhongs with bad stomachs, yang guizis that cant read or write, and female gao bizis that are going through pregnancy!" You couldnt help but feel offended though you didnt understand the chinese nouns she spouted (and if you did, you'd be MORE offended!).

"Hey, rum isnt 'weaksauce'!" you stated, "it's alcohol content is incredibly high!"
Meiling laughed, "Ha ha ha ha! Oh, no. No no no. Rum is nothing, NOTHING compared to Baiju! Baiju DESTROYS weaklings." And you assumed that huge ass bottle in a burlap sack with kanji stamped on it that she ordered was this Baiju she's talking about. And just as soon as she uncorked the bottle, the burning alcoholic stench hit your nose!
You had to flinch away on instinct cuz the burning smell was too harsh on you! Meiling took a nice whiff of it like it didnt bother, then ignored the glass and took a swig right from the bottle!

"AAAH!!!" she sighed, "THIS will bring out the grand dragon of any lower life form! Wanna try?"
"N-n-no thanks!" you shake your head as you casually sip your infinitely less unbearable rum! You had to cover your nose most of the time you were drinking cuz the stench of the baiju lingered. How anyone ANYONE in their right mind could possible tolerate such a strong concentration of alcohol is the million dollar question! Then again, you did know of a few junkies who would literally drink gasoline to get their unquenchable alcohol fix! Then again again, youre awful sure they didnt live very long.

Not much passed during the time you two were drinking your drinks, but because of how awful the smell from Meiling's Baiju was to you, it may as well have been hours. You had to quickly come up with something to talk about just to get her to stop drinking it!

"So.." you took a deep breath, being careful not to breath in the toxic alcohol fumes, and quickly think of a subject to talk about, "...do you have a boyfriend?" Out of ALL the things you could talk about, you chose THAT?!

She finally stopped drinking, recorked her bottle (thankfully sealing in the toxic fumes) and frowned, "Bu... never really had much free time to look for one anyway, what with guarding a gate for so long. And if I'm caught so much as chatting with somebody for what Sakuya believes is too long, I get one of her fucking knives in my forehead!" YIKES!
"Aw, geez, I'm sorry!" you regretted getting on this subject, but have no choice to continue it, "getting stabbed just for talking to somebody too long? That's a little excessive!"
But she shrugs her shoulders, "Eh, it doesnt bother me. Sakuya fights like a little shabi, anyways. I only take her stabs cuz I feel sorry for her and I dont wanna get in trouble with the mistress. Otherwise, I'd break her neck with a single round-house kick. ...ERRP!! Please dont tell her I said any of that!"

"I wont," you say with gritted teeth, "I promise."

"And what about you?" she turned the conversation back to you, "besides that bug who's baoyu you popped, do you have a nuuyio? Or a naanyio?"
You shake your head, "Having had time for a relationship what with having to constantly be on the run. I was close to a few girls in my life, but my sister had a tendency to scare them off before anything major could happen."
"Aww... was Anna jelly?" Meiling snickered. You blushed. For particular reasons, you didnt wanna answer that question.

"Well, while I was at Eientei, there was this one bunny girl that got a bit clingy," you finally build the nerve to bring up Reisen, "suffice to say, Anna didnt approve of her, then stuff happened, then the next thing we knew, we ended up moving over to your mansion."

"A wise move," Meiling stated, "lunarian moon rabbits are dirty."
You almost did a spit take from hearing such a statement, but you harshly swallowed down that sip of rum and questioned, "What do you mean dirty?"
"Dirty as in theyre sick," she then pointed downwards (toward her crotch) and emphasizing, "SICK."
You squinted your eyes, "...Are you saying they got... diseases?"

"I'm saying they got every known discovered disease you can fit in a tight little baoyu!" she laid it on THICK, "if you actually mated with one, you might as well cut off your jiba as soon as possible!" Talk about tactless! That's incredibly fowl of her saying such things about Reisen and her fellow girls!
"N-no, I dont believe that!"
"You can believe what you want, gao bizi," she states, "but the truth is there is nothing filthier on the planet than a moon rabbit! Even onis are a million times cleaner than those disgusting filthy mammals! And onis... heh... you'll more often see a full Red moon than you'll ever see an oni actually bathing! You can smell one of those nasty flea-ridden trash heaps coming from a mile away!"

"TAKE THAT BACK!"

Uh oh. Someone overheard Meiling's ranting. You quickly jerked your head over to the angry pink-haired woman with chinese-style buns in her hair, a white and green dress with a long brown front panel over it that depicts a long thorny rose motiff! She clenched her fist despite that whole arm was bandaged up and glared your direction.

"TAKE. THAT. BACK!" she demanded of your partner.

"Oh, nihao Kasen!" Meiling smiled her way, "I didnt smell you over there. Must be my bad sinuses acting up again."

"Take it back, you slovenly disgusting serpent!" Kasen ordered, "I'll have you know, I have MANY oni friends and they happen to some of the cleanest youkai around! Theyre also more competent in their jobs... unlike certain glorified lizards that tend to hibernate on days that ends with 'y'!"

Bloody hell, Meiling got up from her seat and looked her direction, "I'm very sorry, Kasen." she snuck her finger in her ear and cleaned it out, "for a moment there, I almost heard you claim that dragons are lazy."
"Nice to see that foul smelling drink of yours didnt impair your hearing like it impairs your brain cells!" Kasen remarks. OH SHIT, THE BAR GOT AWFUL QUIET!

Meiling cracked a smirk. Not a happy smirk.

"Kasen, let's just go," Kasen's oni friend tried to stop the inevitable train wreck, but Kasen didnt wanna stop.
"Absolutely not, Suika," she stands her ground, "not while this awful serpent insults the honor of us... I mean you onis!"
"You should listen to Suika, Kasen," Meiling warned, "HER family didnt completely inbreed the common sense out of them!"
"THAT'S SOME TALK COMING FROM YOU!!" the angry not-oni shouted, "considering YOUR kind HAS to rely on incest since nobody ELSE wants to fuck them!" Ouch.

Meiling cracked her shoulders then her knuckles.

"Kasen, please!" Suika begged her friend to stop, "cant we just drink somewhere else?"
Unfortunately, Kasen cracked her knuckles and assumed a martial arts stance. Meiling assumed a kung fu stance of her own. Quite a lot of the sober(esque) patrons rushed out of the door!

Um... dont just stand there! DO SOMETHING!

"Wǒ cào!" she exclaimed with astonishment, "check out the balls on this gao bízi! You can really handle a drink like that?"
"I've had it a couple of times," you tell her, "usually one of my sister's clients from Russia makes me drink with her when we visit her in St. Petersburg."
"Oh?" Meiling raised an eyebrow and smirked, "so I'm not the only girl that tried to get you drunk?"
You smirked back (though a little forced), "Heheh... she did a lot more than try to get me drunk."

Shortly after, the barman brought over your drinks. He got a rather big bottle of authentic imported Tsardom Vodka for you (seriously, it even had the official Empire insignia and seal of approval) and a rather tiny bottle tied in a little burlap sack for Meiling. Baiju, you assume. Meiling bowed in gratitude and handed the barman her credit card to who bowed in gratitude in return and went off to slide her card and give her the receipt.

As soon as she twisted her little Baiju bottle open, the strong harsh smell of alcohol stung your nostrils and nearly filled the entire room, causing the customers around her to flinch and cringe! Despite clearing parts of your sinuses that you never even knew you had, you pay it no mind and ready the shot glass. You pour a little vodka into the glass as Meiling takes her drink from the tap and both of you take a quick swig and slamming the glass on the table with a hard sigh.

Burned like a Chinese firecracker going down. And that's not a sexual euphemism, by the way! But all that alcohol's gonna ease that pain as well as other pains you were experiencing real fast.

“Too warm,” Meiling groaned in disappointment, “I keep telling them to cool it first. They never listen.”
“Too bad,” you slur before taking another shot of your vodka. Yours felt like it came right out of the freezer and it STILL burned going down! Meiling took another long sip of her Baiju and you couldnt imagine what kind of damage it's doing to her throat! Then again, she most likely breathes fire…

“Are you drunk yet?” she casually asks you right after slamming her bottle on the table. You moved your hand in front of your face and try to remember what you did last night. Definitely remember doing a firefly youkai doggy-style while being electrocuted by her vagina!
“No, I'm still pretty sober,” you answer, “what about you? Are you drunk?”
Meiling frowned and curled her lip, “No. I still only see ONE strapping gao bizi in front of me.” You'd be flattered, but something was telling you that nickname was not flattering.”
“Well, it's not really a bad thing,” you say, “I dont like feeling sick or throwing up or waking up with a really bad hangover.”
“Ditto on the first two,” Meiling agreed,”but the hangover is not really that much of a problem for me.”
“It isnt?”
She shook her head, “It must be thanks to the numerous stabs in the forehead I've gotten from Sakuya for sleeping on the job so much.” Yikes!
“Uh… well, I dont notice any scars,” you state.
“Scarlet Devil Mansion has very good medicine,” Meiling says, “not that a dragon youkai even needs much medicine to heal simple cuts and scrapes, anyways.”
“That's good news,” you answered, “my sister has a huge tendency of getting herself hurt. She's gonna NEED that medicine!” Of course, you'd have plenty of medicine had you still stayed in Eientei…

“I wouldnt worry about her. Snow elves could shrug off getting a limb chopped off.”

You immediately spit out your vodka!
“H-How'd you know she's a snow elf?!” you question, astonished by her perception.
“I recognize the tribal tattoos on her arms,” she answered, “we used to have several temporary workers who were snow elves and they all had those similar designs on their body. Not to mention each one was a total biyan to deal with!” No argument there. Just as long as none of those fairies working at the mansion are any of Maeve's snow elves…

Sadly, before you could ask her what else she knows about 'snow elves' before you finally get drunk, Meiling immediately jerks her head toward the door as someone enters. She exhales hard as a person, possibly someone she knows personally, walks into the bar.
Curiously, you turn your head as well to see and in walks...
1113121211112121111222222212112211121121.title: The Breakfast of Champions

1113121211112121111222222212112211121121.content:
You saw a tall muscular lady with long blond hair and a red horn sticking out of her forehead. You were drunk, so you couldn't really see her good as meiling got up, she came to her and had a high touch and a hug.

"Yuugi! Long time no see!" Meiling spoke with cheer.

"Hehe, same as I." Yuugi replied, "by the way, who's that young mortal?"

Meiling introduced you to her and Yuugi came and sat next to you. You could feel some vibe that she's no ordinary human or youkai, you just faintly smiled at her.

"H-hi there." You said lightly.

"Heh, I haven't seen an young human male for long time." Yuugi said, then turns to barter, "hey, give me the best sake you have!"

"My pleasure." Barter replied.

As he left, you took another swing of vodka while meiling and Yuugi looked at you. You felt little uneasy by this as the barter brings the sake to Yuugi, she poured some in the cup and drinks it.

"..puhaa!! Now that's what I call it good sake!" Yuugi said.

"Say Yuugi, lets all have little drinking contest!" Meiling said, "your joining in too Alex."

"Huh? But..I,,"

You tried to get out but your inner side tempting you to do it. You gave in and agreed to the challenge. Meiling ordered few more boozes and all three of you started to drink the alchohole: whiskey, rum, tequila and others. After a whole hour, you wobbled and fell to the ground passing out. You could swear you heard Meiling calling your name but you couldn't completely hear it. Your surrounding were pitch black and you didn't k ow where you were until you saw a tall, long black haired woman with pointy ears and a fox mask on her face.

"..who are..you?" You asked.

The woman didn't say anything then walked toward you. You felt little chill from the lady then after moment she was infront of you. You felt as if you seen her before, then she nodded.

"My daughter...you have looked at her very well." Woman said.

You didn't know what she meant until she puts off her mask, revealing a face that represented your big sis Anna perfectly! You then had the idea that maybe...just maybe, that's she's-

"Someone is waking you up." Woman said, "we can talk again when you sleep again."

With that, a Sakura peddle storm suddenly appeared, causing you two to be separated. You opened your eyes and your first vision were..
1113121211112121111222222212112211121121.title: Dream of geisha

1113121211112121111222222212112211121121.content:
Through your vague, hangover-induced blurry-vision. you make out long fire-red hair. A bit less blurry, you start to make out a familiar flesh-colored figure below the fire-red hair. You had no difficulty determining who this figure was, however it appeared to be missing quite a lot of green to match. Scratch that, no green period. No green uniform? Not even the green hat above the fire-red hair.

After the blur finally subsides, your vision clear and you see that is indeed Meiling. Just naked. ...NAKED?!

You turn away with embarrassment as you hear her approaching you, whistling. Judging by the wet and steamy atmosphere around her, she mustve just gotten out of the shower.

"Oh! You finally woke up!" you force yourself to look back at her smiling face, daring not to look down at her breasts barely 'censored' by her braids or below her scratched and bruised yet well defined washboard stomach, "the shower's yours if you wanna wash up. Let me know if you need someone to wash your back."
Trying to find a way to diminish the blemish on your face, you turn your attention to the hotel room you found yourself in. This, like that bar, had quite an eastern theme to it. It's like you suddenly woke up and somehow found yourself in China! ...Again.

"Wh...where am I?" you groaned as you slowly lifted yourself up from the bed.
“Oh, this is just a little hotel run by friends of my family,” Meiling explained as she got dressed, “we've saved their lives from bandits and invasions several times, so they repaid us by offering us free lodging whenever we wish.”

“Well, that's awful decent of them,” you state as you rubbed your head.
“To be honest, they SHOULDVE given us the suite with the jacuzzi,” Meiling nagged a little, “I mean c'mon. After protecting their asses for so long, havent we deserved a little luxury for our kindness?”
“It's… still a nice place,” you admit, “compared to quite a lot of the places I had to stay at while me and Anna went to hiding… I'd feel right at home sleeping on the floor.”
Meiling tilted her head as if she heard something completely foreign to her (heh!), “Wow… you mean there are gao bízis that cant afford more than one house? I always thought you guys have at least one for each season. The mistress does.” What in the living… was that a racist crack?

“Well youre wrong, slanty-eyes,” you repay her politeness in kind, “anyways, we should probably be heading back. I bet Anna's worried sick by now.”
“Bu!” Meiling shook her head, “we cant just yet! My mother's gonna be coming over pretty soon!”
Not really getting the point of that statement, you shrug your arms in confusion, “And?”
Meiling scoffed as if offended by your question, “Dont you remember? I told you she was coming over to visit and you said you'd pretend to be my husband to get her off my back!” WHAT?! HUSBAND?!

“Wh...wh...when did I tell you this?!” you questioned.
“Right after you lost the drinking challenge with Yuugi,” she answered.
“W-w-wait! I dont remember that!” you stated honestly, “I was drunk!”
“Heh, yeah, you'd HAVE to be to challenge Yuugi of all onis!” Meiling laughed, “now hurry up and get ready! The first thing mama is gonna ask is where my zhangfu is!”
“But… I… ungg...” this was going to fast for you. You knew you shouldnt gone drinking! You KNEW you were gonna get yourself in trouble and you wouldnt realize it until the hangover kicks in!

“C'mon! She'll be here in any minute! Hurry!” Meiling wasnt willing to wait!
“I… I dont even know where my clothes are!”
“That's fine! She'll just think she walked in on us trying to make a baby!” yep, she honestly suggested that.
“Seriously, I'm sorry, but I'm not sure this is gonna work. If my sis finds out, she's gonna flip.”

“Look, I really REALLY need this!” Meiling tells you, “mama's been getting really impatient with me over the fact that I'm the ONLY one of her 20 daughters that doesnt have a zhangfu! 'Meiling, how come you dont have a zhangfu?' 'Meiling, why are you STILL the only girl that didnt give me grandchildren?' 'Meiling, even your baby sister Fanren found a zhangfu before you!' 'Meiling, you know youre not gonna stay young and beautiful forever.' And so on and so on! Urgghh!! Does she not realize how hard it is to find a mate when youre busy guardian a mansion by your lonesome 24 hours a day?!”
Oy… if you didnt already have a migraine, THIS would be migraine-inducing. You'd like to relate to her mother-child dillemma, but unfortunately YOUR mom died of leukemia. And if she was alive, she certainly wouldnt approve of the particular girls you've been getting close with lately.

“C'mon, Alex! It's only for one day!” she pleads, “then the next time, I'll just tell her we broke up. I wont ask you to do this again! Qing!!” This is a ridiculous request. Then again, it's nowhere near as ridiculous as that request in the form of a blind date with Wriggle that led to the best electrifying sex you've ever had.
Nevertheless, things wont be better for you if you let everybody walk all over you and keep folding over to all this silly requests all the time!

Time's a wasting. What should you do?
1113121211112121111222222212112211121121.title: Big Trouble In Little China

1113121211112121111222222212112211121121.content:
You had felt that a lot of people were using you, and you felt you had no reason to fulfill her reason, but because her mother was coming over, you had no option at this moment. You felt light as you wondered what she's doing then you saw her and her moth undress and came on you with smile.

"Um...meiling? Mrs.Hong?" You spoke.

"Let's create a bigger family together." Meiling spoke.

Before you could say anything, you hear the door slam open. You all looked and saw...
1113121211112121111222222212112211121121.title: Making blood boil

choices: Tell her to let go of your hand.
1113121211112121111222222212112211121121.content:
Your eyes widened seeing the familiar purple-haired mentally ill bunny woman bust through the door like a SWAT raid! Speaking of which, your eyes lingered on too strongly at her new outfit... or rather new UNIFORM. Heavily padded camo-military uniform, that is! Dog-tags, rank and unknown nation's flag shoulder patches, and black garb with a golden crescent moon imprinted on it covering her mouth. And that was a very realistic looking modified AR-15 she was wielding! She wasnt just dressed to kill, she was dressed to INVADE! And speaking of invade...

"ON THE GROUND!! NOW!!" she immediately bum rushed you and pinned you to the ground, "HANDS WHERE I CAN SEE THEM!" pointing her gun at you as you did exactly as you were told. Meiling and Meifang stared absolutely shocked and confused at what was going on!

"W-W...What is the meaning of this?!" Meifang questioned the soldier currently patting you down, despite not wearing much to pat down to begin with!

"Lunarian Revolutionary Guard business, ma'am! Dont get too close!" Reisen ordered, "this fugitive is armed and extremely dangerous! You ladies are lucky to be alive after hanging around someone as vicious as this!"

"F-F-fugitive?" Meiling's mom squinted her eyes at the word, then turned to her daughter who looked completely clueless.
"Alexei Whitesobromavich," Reisen explained as she restrained you and covered your mouth, slurring your protests, "infamous for preying on young adult women and single mothers in bars and slaughtering them, selling their severed limbs and organs in black markets."
'The FUCK?!' you wanted to blurt out but had no ability to.

"MEILING, you were honestly going to make HIM your zhangfu?!" Meiling's mother was just as shocked to hear the awful news!
"W...I....B...But..." poor Meiling was not prepared for such a realization, "...but well... he's staying with... I mean but his sister... err..."
"I'm very sorry that you two were nearly victims of this disgusting trash!" Reisen pulled you up and twisted your arms to cuff you so you couldnt move and dragged you toward the door, "now if you'll excuse us, Mr. Whitsobromavich has a date with the LRG Warden and the electric chair! START MOVING!!" Somehow Meiling didnt question Reisen's obvious exaggerations that simply didnt add up. Instead, she was too busy being on the receiving end of a roaring fit in Chinese from her mother, completely outraged that her daughter was about to marry Jack the Ripper!

"R-Reisen, why are you-"
"SHH!!" she shushed you as she 'escorted' you all the way out of the hotel as well as a couple of blocks away as local bystanders looked your direction! It was a very appropriate time to realize you left your clothes back in the hotel room! So the bunny girl in military uniform paraded your nearly naked body across the crowded street until the two of you reached a little park void of any onlookers where she finally let you go and uncuffed you!

"Heheh! Wow, Kasen was right!" Reisen giggled, "Dragons are STUPID!" After that little fun ride, you were in no mood to laugh. You rubbed your aching wrists and stared over at Reisen as she removed her garb and smiled at you.
"Hi Alex-sama!" she greeted you with such uppity gusto. You certainly missed her despite her uh, issues, but now wasnt a good time!

"Reisen, what are you doing here?" you got straight to the point, "you know if my sister finds out what you did, she'll flip!"
"What I did?!" she snapped, "SHE left you to fend for yourself against a violent kungfu-crazy lush and all her drunken friends... AND her horny cradle-robbing hag of a mother!" To be fair, Meifang was anything but a hag... that milf's youthful chiseled yet very womanly figure left quite an impression on you. Not hard to see where Meiling got her best features from!

"S-Still!" you try to cover... yourself, "she moved us out of Eientei for a reason! You know youre gonna be in huge trouble when anyone finds out.”
“I… I know,” Reisen's bunny ears lowered as did her head, “but after what we all just went through back when you were with us, it's not fair for Anna to just pull you out. There's just so many unanswered questions and… and surely, the help you were getting was certainly better than the kind youre getting NOW.” As a matter of fact, you dont really feel any safer at Scarlet Mansion. Surrounded by vampires, fairies of questionable origin, a dragon that might have an overactive libido like Reisen only she likes to drink and fight, a librarian that wants to breed you with creatures you probably shouldnt be breeding with… you cant say THAT'S better than a hospital with a snobby princess, an immortal smoker that fights with her for some reason, the world's best doctor, and a ton of cute bunny girls!

“Well...H-how were you were able to find me, anyway?"
"Your sister's not the only one with 'special connections'," Reisen said with a clever wink. Damnit, HER too?! You sighed hard. You didnt have time for this. You were supposed to get AWAY from this type of criminal lifestyle! God help you if SHE ended up dragging you into something deep, too!

"Ahem!" Reisen cleared her throat for some reason.

"Hm?"

"Arent you gonna comment about my uniform?" she twirled around, showing off her camo suit, "what do you think? Hard to believe someone as cute as me is a solid fierce combat-hardened leatherneck?"
"Wow, it looks very authentic," you admire her uniform, "it's real?"
"Yep!" she stated proudly, "1st class Revolutionary Guard AND Reconnaissance Sergeant of the Udongein-Inaba branch of the Moon Rabbit Corps. Sigh... havent worn this in uniform in years and it STILL fits me!"

“I'm really happy for you,” you smiled irritated, “now if only I had much to cover ME to begin with!”
The bunny girl in military uniform laughed nervously, “Heh. Sorry, Alex-sama. I had to make your capture look convincing. It doesnt make sense I let a wanted fugitive go just to give him free time to put his clothes back on.” Point taken. “Besides… you certainly have nothing to be ashamed of.” Aw geez, why are you such a huge sucker for flattery from a cute girl (well, cute female veteran)?! This is how youre easily taken advantage of!

“A-A-anyways, we can talk about this later!” you quickly change the discussion “is there a clothing store nearby?”
“Maybe later,” the bunny girl states, “right now, there are some friends I need you to meet.”
You cringed at the statement, “...Your 'special connections', right? Sorry Reisen, I think it's better I just go back to my sister and-”
“One of my connections told me to mention that the bite mark from Pacifica's goddamn dog still hasnt gone away.”

It took merely seconds to process what she's referring to.

“BILLY?!!” you nearly jumped upon realizing it, “Billy Tenship?! You know him?!”
“Well, not really,” she admits, “but he says he knows you.”
“I havent seen him in like forever!” you briefly reminisce, “I thought he mighta got himself killed. How's he doing? What's he up to?”
“Well, besides getting dog bites,” Reisen snickered, “he's been working with somebody who says he's really close to you as well.”
“Who?”
She lowered her head, “I'm sorry, Alex-sama. Billy wouldnt tell me cuz he was told not to tell you.” Nghh. “Well, maybe he can talk to you about it. He's not that far from here, c'mon. Let's go.” As if it's gonna be that simple.

“Reisen, I cant do that,” you stop her, “I'm already with somebody. My sister.”

“But Alex-sama,” she whines, “she's just gonna keep getting you into trouble.”
“AHEM!”
“Ok ok! MAYBE I'm not exactly one to talk,” she puffs her cheeks, “but if you found out what I found out about her, you wouldnt be so loyal to her, trust me.” That struck a nerve.
“What's THAT supposed to mean?!”
“I mean she hasnt been very honest with you,” Reisen warns, “you have no idea the game she's playing with you!”
You squint your eyes, “Care to enlighten me?”
“Billy will tell you when you see him again!” she grabs your hand, “Now c'mon! Let's go, already!”

It was the doctor herself. She noticed you and gave you a warm smiles as you came to her, you two gave a warm handshake. She asked some questions but told you to come in so all the eientei crew could catch up on the details and you all went in. At the scarlet manor, Anna was standing before the vampire herself. Remilia was little bit angry at Anna for not keeping you under control but more angry at meiling for nearly raping you and the moon rabbit for kidnapping you. Anna, who were in the minds, felt very emotional for being relieved from the duty she was so used to doing, narrower her eyes.

(I know what I’ve said and done, but how dare he relieve me.) Anna thought.

“Ms.Whitestone, I apologize for what our gatekeeper have done, but you should be ashamed for not looking out for your brother.” Remilia said.

“..yes, I truly apologize for the incident.” Anna replied.

“Oneesama! Anna didn’t do on purpose! She’s nice and humble to act against us!” Flandre said, “in fact, that rabbit is the one who kidnapped her precious oniisama!”

They all were silent until one of the Hassan appeared behind Anna. She spoke quietly next to Anna and backed off. Anna sighed and looked at the vampire.

“My lady, my..brother is now at eientei. I would like to retrieve him back.” Anna said.

“Despite the rabbits intention to keep him there?” Remilia asked.

“I have a plan. Please give three days grace and I can get him back.” Anna responded.

Remilia noticed the graces and remembered that the red full moon was on the third day. She thought for moment and then gleefully showed her teeth’s. Anna was waiting for the answer and then Remilia called for her maid and she appeared next to her.

“Sakuya, we will have a meeting with the eientei in full moon. When that comes, gather everyone and we will go there.” Remilia said.

1113121211112121111222222212112211121121.content:
Your session, unlike the previous one, lasted about 2 entire hours if the clock in your room was accurate. You lost of the number of times you blew your load inside the bunny girl's insatiable snatch. It was mind-perplexing enough trying to count down the number of sex positions the two of you engaged in during that 2 hour fun ride! Suffice to say, Reisen was incredibly energetic!

And so were you, surprisingly. Your hips somehow didnt give out after the umpteenth down you were riding Reisen doggy-style, thrusting as fast and fierce as you could, immersing yourself in her long pleasure-filled moans, imagining her ahegao face she was making that you couldnt see in your position!
"Ohhhh....aahhh..ahha...AAAAHHHH!!!" she let out a long gasp the moment she felt your tool spill it's life-giving seed inside her yet again, "...aaahhh-*BZZZZZZTTT!!*HEEEEEEEEEE!!!!" as well as squeal and twitch from the intense electrical surge your dick gave off yet again cuz it STILL hasnt fully recovered from firefly-youkai sex!
It was awful difficult explaining that whole event after the first surprise orgasmic jolt! Understandably, she was kinda terrified at first (and mad, cuz some random firefly youkai beat her to you!)... but now she's practically ADDICTED to it!

Finally, the two of you collapsed on the bed panting and gasping.
“A….a….awesome...” Reisen panted, “...I dont think I'll EVER get tired of that tingly surge! We really oughta bring Wriggle in for a threesome some time!” Tempting. Would hurt like hell, but tempting.

“Ok! I'm all rested up!” Reisen yet again leaps up out of bed with a second wind, “let's go again!” But the feeling wasnt mutual. That last burst finally took it's toll on you.
“Ugh… sorry, I'm… out of it...” you groaned.
“C'mon! I'm still not tired yet!” the overly energetic bunny girl whines.
“I dont even think… I can get up any time soon...” you mutter, failing to muster the courage to lift yourself up!
Reisen pouted with disappointment, “Oh alright. I guess I shouldnt push you too hard. You did have quite a rough journey after all.” That's right. Rough and bumpy. And a bit hard to swallow. And developing a whole new perspective on who you thought was truly looking out for you.

After wiping off your mess on her, she quickly put her clothes back on and gave you a nice goodbye.
“If youre ready to finish where we left off, you know where my room is!” she said with a wink then gave you a sweet kiss on the cheek! “Welcome back, Alex-sama.”

She then turned around and trotted off happily.
*Bzzt!*
“EEEEeee!!”
...And suddenly felt another jolt out of nowhere! After she finally stops twitching, she sighs, “Oh.. so good...” and resumes her leave.

Fast forward a couple of days. Not wanting to be a freeloader, you find yourself working at the pharmacy of Eientei mainly handling stock or manning the front assisting customers. It wasnt a difficult job. It did require washing your hands an awful lot what with handling godknowswhat kind of chemicals and dealing with customers suffering from godknowswhat kind of diseases! But besides that, it's not bad. Eirin tells you to get her something, you get it. Tewi tells you to help her move something, you move it. Reisen tells you she needs to have a private word with you in the broom closet, Eirin gives her the cold stare, Reisen flinches and runs off. Easy peasy.

At least it WAS easy, until one night you were closing up the pharmacy by yourself while your coworkers were off doing their own thing. You had already locked the door, shut off the sign lights, and were getting ready to put several boxes in their designated drawers, when somebody knocked on the front door. At first you ignored it, cuz you hoped they'd figure out that youre closed.

Nope. The person outside only pounded the door even harder. You waited them out a little longer, but the pounding still wouldnt stop. Whoever was outside mustve had a big emergency!

With nobody else around to answer the door and tell them to come back tomorrow, you sighed and head over yourself to do just that.
You unlocked the door and open it, revealing….

1113121211112121111222222212112211121121.content:
The very first thing to greet your eyes is the inside of someone's jaws. You paled staring down the dark abyss beyond the uvula and wet slimy tongue as your face was pressing way too close to a set of pearly white sharp bone-crushing fangs! You gasped and flinched backwards away from the jaws... and found yourself staring down at Meiling's oni friend from earlier, Yuugi... who is snoring rather loudly with her mouth open. And you are currently lying right on top of her!

She's also naked.

And so are you.

There's also white stuff dripping from her crotch.

There's also white stuff dripping from YOUR crotch, too!

You gazed downward silently and speechless. You grit your teeth and curse yourself for the grand taboo you have committed as your blood ran cold! Worst of all, you cant remember a damn thing after that drinking contest but youre now absolutely sure you've done things you really shouldnt have done!

At the very least, the adrenaline rush was doing a great job countering the pain of the hangover. Still, that doesnt excuse the fact that you just screwed a complete stranger during your intoxicated episode! Especially a really big bulky muscley no doubt super strong oni stranger! God help you if she ends up being pregnant! God also help you if she wakes up and doesnt remember getting plowed by you… and becomes furious from it!
Being very quiet and very careful, you quietly and carefully dismount yourself from her, trying ever so hard not to wake her up.

“ZzZZ!!” Yuugi flinches and you almost leap out of your skin! Fortunately, instead of waking up, she merely rolls over in her sleep… and you notice white stuff dripping from between her toned yet exquisitely plump ass cheeks!
“Ugh… seriously?!” you whisper to yourself and facepalm with embarrassment. Yeesh, how much did you drink?! You would never in a million years go that route! Well, that's gonna be a hell of a situation when she wakes up.
And you do not wanna be here when she does! You look around for your clothes in the middle of this dark damp humid shack you dont recognize. You spot your clothes in the corner of the room… or what's left of them. Theyre tattered and ripped now! Guess you shoulda expected that from sleeping with an oni.

Having no position to complain, you put on what's left of your clothes which doesnt really cover much and sneak out of the little damp shack.

You have no idea where you are. You dont recognize this part of town if youre still in the same town to begin with. All the houses and buildings are closed, boarded up, or dilapidated. Majority of this shoddy town looked like it's been abandoned for years. The very few locals still around did not look friendly nor did they look like anything remotely close to your kind! Judging by the horns, the sharp teeth, and the stench of raw meat and strong alcohol coming from the lot of them, you assumed theyre all oni.
“This is seriously the last time I let myself get drunk,” you tell yourself, “for real! From now on, no more alcohol for me!” Youre probably gonna celebrate by getting pissed drunk if you make it out of here alive!

You carefully stroll down the destroyed street nearly naked trying not to give any direct eye contact to any grizzly looking locals. Damned if you know how youre getting home. Meiling was nowhere in sight and Yuugi… well, you'd rather not stick around to explain why both her holes feel incredibly sticky!

You try your hardest to clear your head and remember how you gotten yourself here, but the furthest you remember through your drunken stupor was that odd dream involving that woman who bares a resemblance to your sister. Now you have some questions to ask Anna, but that's provided you can even make it back first!

You'd follow the street signs, but not only are they in another language, theyre either worn out or graffitied which obscenities or crude drawings.
You cringe as you spot the very few humans in this slum of a town… being caged up and dragged off by onis! Not good!

Remaining in the shadows and not getting any attention from anyone is a brilliant move on your part. Lord only does what these oni bastards are gonna do their human captives. Judging by the numerous screams for help, it certainly aint gonna be good.

"Hey! What are you doing here! Youre not supposed to be here!" said a voice whispering from the shadows. You cautiously turn around and see a pink-haired woman with chinese-style buns in her hair, a white and green dress with a long brown front panel over it that depicts a long thorny rose motiff. Her whole right arm is completely bandaged up, yet seems to have no trouble moving it carefree.
At first it seemed slightly refreshing to see a fellow human not captured and at the mercy of onis, but the way she stalked toward you left you suspicious.

"W-who are-"
"SHH!!!" she shushed you and with a single tug of her bandaged hand, pulled you into the shadows with her before anyone could spot you. The two of you wait silently until the oni gang pass by with their captive in tow.

She sighed, still having a slight death-grip on your arm with her bandaged hand.

"Have you any idea what these savages do to yo-us humans?" she questioned you, "why would you venture here all by yourself?" How did she even know that?
"H-How did you know I came here myself?" you asked, "and who are you anyway?"
"Kasen Ibakari, just a simple human hermit of the mountains," she answers with a little pride in her voice before her tone quickly changes, "and duh! If you, a lowly weak human like myself, were captured, you'd STILL be captured!" she said as if stating fact, "no one can escape from an oni! ESPECIALLY at this time of year!" You squinted your eyes at her, but youre not in much of a mood to question.
"Alright, I dont really know how I got here," you answered.
"What do you mean you dont know?" she tilted her head.
"All I remember is getting drunk at the Human Village with a gate guard of Scarlet Mansion, then a big bulky oni friend of hers came in and challenged us to a drinking contest."
She groaned. "That was an incredibly dumb move on your part. NEVER take an oni up on a drinking contest. That is practically BEGGING to die of liver poisoning! Well, you shouldnt be drinking PERIOD, but it's especially bad when youre drinking cuz youre goaded by an oni!" You were in no mood to listen to her nagging, so you ignore it and continue.
"Anyways, I think I passed out and next thing I knew I woke up here. Wherever here is..."

" 'Wherever here is'..." Kasen repeats hinting being offended by that remark, "...is Hellgondo. Major oni territory that we humans have no business being in unless we dont plan on leaving. FOR GOOD." You feel red flags raise every time she mentions humans in such an odd way.

"Well, it's not like I wanted to come here," you shrugged, "how far are we from the Human Village?"
"That's like on the other side of the island!" your fellow human remarks, "youre gonna be preyed upon long before you get there, fellow human!" 'Fellow human'? Who the heck talks like that?!

"Aw crap," you cringed, "so I'm pretty much stuck here?!"
"You certainly will be," she stated as a matter of fact, "if us humans dont stick together. Come with me, I've got a nice house on a hill not far from here. We can hide out there until Oni Season ends." Oni Season?

Before you question or raise a single objection, she was already dragging you with her by her bandaged arm. Is that even hurting her?

"C'mon, keep up!" Kasen ordered you, "I know we humans are slow, but not THAT slow!"
"S-Sorry, but this is getting kind of awkward..." you finally reveal to her your suspicions, but your 'fellow human' wasnt having any of it!
"There's no time to question," she tells you, "it's Oni Season! If another girl-I mean if a female oni happens to spot your delightfully chiseled physique clad in those torn revealing tattered rags of yours, she'll lose her mind!" You couldnt help but hear her sound a bit giddy when she said that. Yep, you may be a fool, but you know an obvious deception when you see it.

Question is, will you play along with it?

1113121211112121111222222212112211121121.content:
Standing at the door gazing practically lazy-eyed at you was an awful roughed up looking gentleman. His business suit attire looked incredibly worn out, tattered, and unwashed with plenty of rips and tears. Tons of bandages covered up quite a bit of his skin from head to toe. The skin that wasnt covered looked rather gruff, unshaven, and rather dirty. The crow on his shoulder gazed into your soul with it's single remained red-eye.

Despite picking awful vibes from this man, you stared back blankly. He forced a grin that looked like it was a pain in the ass for him and removed his fedora to give a polite bow.

“Good evening Mrs. Robinson!” he spoke in a forced uppity tone, “youre looking quite lovely today.”
“I'm… sorry?”
“I'm Emeril Exequiel from the Restful Hills Memorial Park,” he introduced himself as the crow continued to stare, “you know you are exactly the way your husband said you are, he's a very lucky man.” Does he not even realize youre a guy?!
“Er, have we met before?”
“No, but your husband told me all about you,” Emeril continued as the crow tilted it's head, “Mr. Robinson just covered a down payment on a cemetary plot specifically for the two of you. I'm here to discuss the details of the plot he reserved. Is he in?” THAT'S what he's here about?! Something tells you he's not only got the wrong house, he's most likely got the wrong NATION for that!
“Um, I dont think there's anybody here by that name,” you answer.
Emeril tilted his head as the crow squinted it's eye. “Hm. Is this 2465 Maple Street?” he pulled out a paper and read off his note.
“No, it's uh...” you remember the sign outside Kasen's house, “Ibaraki Hill, I think it's called.”

Emeril smiled and laughed, “Haha! My apologies, miss! Early morning jitters, you understand." It's past midnight! "Have a good day, ma'am!” He quickly turned and left… though his crow twisted it's head completely behind it and kept gazing your way. What an odd fellow.
Though if you didnt know any better, you coulda sworn his note read 'WHITEST-'

“Who was at the door?” Kasen called to you.
“Just some solicitor,” you called back, “he had the wrong house.” ...Didnt he?

Meanwhile in the kitchen, as Kasen waits for the water to boil, she quickly freshens herself up. She put on lipstick, added a little mascara, carefully adjusted her hair buns to ensure those bits werent showering, looked over a few pages in her book 'I Human Too: 786 Tips to Properly Assimilate in a Human Population', sprayed a little breath spray in her mouth, then sprayed a little perfume on her armpits, then sprayed a little more, then sprayed even more in a desperate attempt to hide the uh… 'oni smell'.

After spray herself an awful lot, she sniffed herself but could still detect a little of her 'oni smell' on her body. She sighed and hoped that the human she was trying to mingle with wouldnt notice. Fortunately, he's a foreigner so hopefully that means he isnt familiar with recognizing the natural scent of an oni.

The water boiled, Kasen poured it out into two cups, put them on a try, put in the teabags, and got out the sake for added flavor-”NO!!” she stopped herself before letting her natural urges take effect, “you are cutting down! You are cutting down!” She managed to halt her insatiable alcohol craving for now, but thoughts of pouring sake into the human's drink sprouted, which she quickly stomped down! Shame on her for even CONSIDERING drugging that poor human in need! Especially after some other sot had drugged him… and who knows what else she done to him! She briefly meditated and chanted to ease away her bad urges before picking up the tray and heading to the living room.

“Ok! It's ready!” she came in and announced, interrupting your mental reflecting. The smell of the green tea wafted through your nostrils. “Give it a minute or two to cool down. The tea is still pretty hot.”
“Thank you,” you take a cup, “what's in it?”
“Certainly no alcohol or barbiturates whatsoever!” Kasen suddenly got defensive, “which is something most uncivil onis tend to put in an unsuspecting victim's drink either for cruel humor or very underhanded reasons!”
“I meant what kind of flavorings did you put in the tea?”
“Oh. Just some honey, lemon, and a bit of spice,” she answers, “I dont usually put anything spectacular in tea.”
“That's fine,” you assure her,”I prefer my tea ordinary anyways.” As you are about to take your first sip, Kasen feels the need to add, “Be sure to take slow sips. The best way to savor the natural flavor of green tea is to take slow sips.” Sheesh, you aint a baby. But being a good guest, you do as youre told.

The tea wasnt bad. Nothing special. In all honesty, it COULD do with a little alcohol, but you've learned your lesson! Stay away from the booze! Speaking of which, you remind yourself of what Kasen said earlier. Youre a long way from home (at least the current one).

“Kasen?” you pause from drinking to ask, “how do I get back to the Human Village from here?”
She takes a little while sipping her cup as if trying to stall out the question but she answers, “Well… it's hard to say at the moment. The route out of Hellgondo is usually obstructed during Oni Season. We'll probably need to wait at least 1… 3 weeks for the road to be rebuilt.”

“THREE WEEKS?!” you werent THAT patient, “my sister's gonna be worried sick! There's no telling what she's end up doing if she assumes I'm in trouble!”
“I'm sorry,” Kasen apologizes, “but it's too dangerous for us humans at the moment. It's best to remain here where it's safe until the Season's over. But dont worry, we have plenty of food here until then. Plenty for us and all my pets. I'll show you them in the morning.” In any other non-tense situation, you'd ask what kind of pets she's got. But now, all you cared about was one thing. Making sure Anna knew you were ok!

“Do you have a phone?” you ask. Who knows where you left yours!
“Drako ate it,” Kasen pouted her lips, “dumb dragon. Besides, there's no reception here, anyway. Hellgondo isnt exactly a high-tech kind of village.” Geez!
“Well, is there anyway to send some sort of communication? Telegram? Letter? Carrier Pigeon?”

“Perhaps we could look for a payphone in the morning,” Kasen suggests, “for now, it's getting awful late. It's best you get cleaned up and out of those dirty tattered revealing clothes. The bathroom is just over to the right. You can shower there. I'll see if I got some spare clothes I can lend you.” As worried sick (and homicidal) your sister must be by now, it is awful late. Besides, you do kinda reek of booze and girly parts! For now the best course of action would be to take Kasen's offer.
"Thank you, Ms. Ibaraki," you offer your thanks.
"The pleasure's *sniff!* all mine," she said with a sweet, yet tense, smile.

You thank her and head to the bathroom, feeling her odd intrigued stare burn a hole through the back of you! Fortunately, the lock on the door works. It didnt take you long to get used to how the shower operates.
With your clothes off and one of Kasen's herbal soaps lathered all over your naked flesh, you sigh and relax under the gentle warm shower pouring down the shower head. It was a very brief moment of peaceful bliss out of the unbelievable chaos you've just been caught in the middle of!

For at least this one brief moment, nothing could irk you.

...Not even the pink haired curly-horned idol at the window that just snapped a photo of you on her phone.

Well, if it isnt the bookworm matchmaker and that totally not-succubus assistant of hers again. Fancy seeing them again so soon. Patchouli smiled your way as she brought over a tea tray as Koakuma stared back nervously as she hiding the title cover of the book in her hands.

The sip would quickly turn into a chug then you'd gleefully pour yourself another cup full until you ultimately finish the entire pot!

You had to force yourself to set the dang cup down cuz you reminded yourself of that eventful encounter with the T-X.

"S...So," you coughed, "did Arnold or my sister mention anything about what that girl I brought over here?"

"Oh, the cyborg?" Patchouli asked, "they took it down to the Ravine to have the technician over there, Ms. Kawashiro, look at it. The poor busted thing was sparking from top to bottom, the mistress was worried it was gonna start a fire!" She did look like she took quite a beating on the way here. Since when was Anna ever involved in building cyborgs? Granted, you dont know EVERYTHING she's ever been involved in, but youre certain fooling around with robo-people wouldve stuck out too much in your mind!

"I hope she'll be alright," you say.
"I'm sure it'll be fine," the librarian assured, "no one knows freaky futuristic gadgetry quite like little Nitori." Well, that sounds like good news to you. Anna's still got a bit to answer to, however. Then again, so would you... she probably wants to know where you've been all night! AND SPEAKING OF WHICH...

"So how was the date?" figures Patchouli would bring it up. That's the sole reason she came into your room, wasnt it?

"It was... incredible," that was the best word to describe it, "I would totally look forward to a second date with Wriggle. When can I get a second one?"
"Err.... not for a while," she breaks out the bad news, "I'm afraid Wriggle's gonna be very busy most of the season... notcountingthematernityleavespendaturesandthedocumentarysponsorships *COUGH* Anyways, I'm sorry, but she's not gonna be available for some time." Bummer.
"Damn," you say with disappointment, "I honestly thought we clicked."

"That's what I'm HOPING," you hear Patchouli mutter under her breath, "but anyways, dont feel so down. Besides, I've got another girl in mind who could use a nice handsome single gent to keep her company!" Koakuma sighs with exhaustion. That tells you something fishy is up yet again, but you humor her.

"Who?" you asked.

"Her name is Kisume," Patchouli explains while Koakuma bites her lip, "she's a very... unique youkai girl that tends to hang around near caves and wells... ONE well in particular lately. Dont worry, she's not dangerous or anything."
"Yes she is," her bat-winged subordinate mumbles.
"No, she isnt!" Patchouli snapped at her then turned back to you, “she's just a little misunderstood. There's a few awful nasty rumors going on about her doing really horrendous things.” Good lord almighty! “But the truth is she wouldnt hurt a fly. Sure, she might spook a few unsuspecting people now and then, but nothing worse than that.” Hm.

“I see,” these 'half-truths' if you wanna call them that are leaving you feeling uneasy. But then again, you did just mate with a firefly youkai and had electrical surges jolt through your genitalia, and yet you'd STILL go on a second date with Wriggle!

“Anyways, you've got nothing to worry about!” Patchouli tells you, “she's a very nice girl and fun to get along with...” She pauses for a moment, which tells you there's a tremendous catch to this blind date proposal, “...but speaking of rumors, I would really REALLY appreciate it if you help us solve a particular one involving Kisume. It's nothing major.”
You inhale and exhale hard, “What is it?”

Koakuma breaks the ice before her boss is, “The thing is she's a tsurube-otoshi, in literally terms, a 'bucket dropper'. Her tribe of tsurube-otoshi literally contain themselves in buckets. When they feed, they tend to ensnare prey within their buckets and only their bones end up coming out.” Interesting. Possibly horrifying too. “The whole stigma behind them is that their own bodies themselves never seem to leave their particular bucket.”
“Some theorize that the buckets themselves are a part of their actual bodies,” Patchouli finishes, “some even say that the bucket itself is the actual tsurube-otoshi and the youkai person within it is more like a puppet to lure prey in. However, there is a more compelling theory I've been researching and I need to verify it: The bucket they contain themselves in is actually a vast independent furnished home for the tsurube-otoshi! Like hammerspace, the bucket contains a large possibly infinite sized dimension inside it with limitless space that is specifically suited for the individual youkai living in it!” Hm.

“She read about that in this stupid book,” Koakuma, with humiliation in her facade, shows off the book in her hands entitle 'Unsolved Youkai Mysteries'.
“That 'stupid book',” Patchouli remarks offended, “happens to be a collection of well thought out peer-reviewed theories from very acclaimed professional researchers! Anyways, I repeat that it's a 'theory', because it's still yet to be proven. Mainly because anyone who's ever went into a tsurube-otoshi's bucket never comes out.” Well, that's just swell! “Which is part of the reason, PART of mind you, I was hoping you'd accept this date with Kisume so you can help me determine if this theory is true or not.” In other words, she wants you to be her guinea pig again!

“Have you ever thought about just asking Kisume what's in her bucket?” you asked.
She sighs,”I have, but she's incredibly secretive about it. She says her bucket is extremely personal! Which is why I'm hoping you being her boyfriend will win her trust enough to welcome you into her bucket. That way, once youre inside, you can snap a few pictures and jot down a few notes and bring over what you got by the time the date's over!”

You… you didnt say anything. You just stared back at her in absolute silence. While sipping more of that delicious tea.

“I told you this wasnt a good idea,” Koakuma whines.
“Silence!” Patchouli shoots her down and turns back to you, “come on, Alex. This is a both a grand science AND history changing discovery if you pull this off! We'll have our names posted in news worldwide that we were the first humans in the world to actually prove this long pondered mystery of the world! Plus, Kisume's cute. She's got that going for her…. You'd get prestige AND you'd get a babe! That's like, more win for you than it would be for me if you do this!”

After pondering the absurdity of Patchouli's proposal and nearly blissing out on the taste of the tea, you set your tea cup down and...
