1113121211112121111222222212112211121211.content:
Immediately after promising she'll make you feel better, Kisume started licking your forehead! It took you by surprise and it got you wondering why she's... then you noticed your bleeding! SWEET JESUS, SHE'S DRINKING YOUR BLOOD!!

You immediately jerk yourself away from her, leaving her giving off a cutesy questionable expression while your blood is dripping from your lip!
"W-W-WHAT DO YOU THINK YOURE DOING?!"
"Uh, I'm healing you," she seemed to legitimately not know what was wrong with this picture!
"No youre not, youre drinking my blood!" you exclaim. Best make a mental note to lock your door tight when you sleep too. You cant trust the headmistress as far as you can swing a Belmont whip at her, either!

"OH! You mean this?" Kisume just nonchalantly stuck her tongue out at you, "dont worry. A tsurube-otoshi's saliva happens to be a well known type of antiseptic that quite a few healers in the human village use when they perform surgery. My spit'll speed up the healing process of that nasty bruise and you'll be all better in a jiffy!"
Your mind was temporarily blown from that believe it or not educational oddity.

"R...really?"
"Yep!" Kisume tips her chin and looks up at the sky, giving off a cutesy thinking pose. "...At least I think that's how some old friends of mine advertised it..." Against your better judgement, you believed her.
"Oh. Alright then. Go ahead and keep licking."
"YAY!" she squealed with excitement and lapped up as much blood from your bleeding head as she could! She took her time slurping your bleeding wound while you tried your best to keep a straight face while her slightly abnormally long wet and slightly grainy tongue kept stroking across your head, lick by lick!

“Wow! Youre O+?!” Kisume suddenly blurts out in the middle of her slurps!
“H-H-How did you know?!”
“It's been a long time since I got to taste this succulent type!” Kisume beams, “Slightly bitter and salty, yet still jam-packed with flavor! Is it alright if I pour some of it in a jar and save it for later please?! Pretty please?!”
“I would rather you not,” you stated boldly, already having second thoughts about this blind date! And you just got through with sticking your dick in a girl with a vagina that conducts electricity!
“Aww!” she pouted, “fine, but if you cut yourself again, please tell me ASAP, ok?”
“I'll think about it,” note to self: pour toilet cleaner in that fat librarian's tea!

“Alright, there. Good as new,” finally Kisume stopped licking and applied a nice little bandage over the wound.
“Thanks,” you thanked her even though you wont forget this disturbing moment for a while. To be fair, the bleeding did seem to slow down considerably. Maybe Kisume was telling the truth. Still, youre not having very high hopes about this blind date.

“Kisuuuuuume…. oh Kisuuuuuuume!”
And because you clearly needed MORE proof this blind date was a bad idea, you hear a voice calling out for Kisume in the distance which she in turn changes her emotional state from cheerful to frightened!

“Oh no!” Kisume jerks her head toward the direction of the holler, “not them! Anything but them! Why now?!”
“Who is i-”
“SSHH!!!” Kisume quickly puts a finger to your lips and shushes you.

“Kisuuuume!” the voice keeps calling out, “come on out! Your 'protection' rent's past due!”
“Yeah!” said another voice, “youre super late! You didnt think we'd forget, did ya?”

Kisume shivered with fright “It's the Douji sisters! Theyre the meanest pair of girls in town!”
“You got a bully problem?” Oh boy.
She frowned and lowered her head, “They've been hassling me and my friends for a while. Shaking us up for money, calling it 'protection'. Cant they just leave me alone and hassle somebody else?!” Lovely. Just what you needed. To be caught in a kid's little bully crisis.
“Have you told anybody they were bothering you?”
“Are you kidding?! Nobody wants to mess with them!! Theyre super strong!!” she seemed legitimately frightened by these sisters! So frightened in fact, she was almost on the verge of tears! “I'm sorry, Alex! Had I known they'd be tracking me down, I'da postponed our date to the next billing cycle!” Ugh! Did Patchouli even know about this before she decided to use you as a guinea pig?!

“Alright, twerp! You dont wanna come out? We'll just have to come in!”
“And you better have your wallet ready!”

“Aw shoot! Quick! Hide!”
“Hide? Wh-” too late. She and her bucket zipped way up to the ceiling, hiding up in the shade! As you heard footsteps coming your way, you figured you'd just avoid a confrontation and take Kisume's advice.
You quickly squeeze yourself in a big dark crack in the wall and disappear in the shadow as the two bullies enter the scene!

The two bullies that were scaring Kisume whitless were two young horned girls in colored kimonos that matched the colors of their hair. One was blonde with tons of red tattooed markings all across her body, yellow slanted eyes, and what you assumed was a tattoo of a vertical eye on her forehead just between her horns.
The other girl had short purple hair, slanted purple eyes, blood-tipped horns, and was shamelessly not wearing her kimono very well, barely bothering to cover her incredibly scantily clad armor that didnt really cover ANYTHING but her breasts and crotch!

Great. These two brats are oni. Young oni. As if they werent a big enough pain in the ass to deal with as ADULTS! Unstable powerhouse lushes are one thing, but unstable powerhouse lush KIDS?!
Obviously, talking them out of cutting out their little extortion ring is out of the question, let alone threating to take off your belt and spanking them (they'd probably LIKE that!)! Suffice to say, Kisume had very good reason to be afraid.

“We know youre here, Kisume,” called the purple-haired sister, “just come on out, hand over what you owe, plus an added interest and we'll forget this whole nasty episode. Heck, we'll even share a nice cold drink with you to bury the hatchet!” She pulled out a large sake bottle from… nevermind, you dont wanna know!
“Ugh, dont sweet-talk the bucket-wimp, Shuten!” the blonde sister remarked, “besides, she aint gonna drink that stuff. She's too pure and wholesome.”
“Heh, and so was her friend Kyouko,” Shuten replied, “yet she was awfully quick to make an exception after you threatened to stick her broom where the sun doesnt shine.”

“YOU HEAR THAT, KISUME?!” shouted the blonde, “IF YOU DONT WANNA PAY US PROPERLY FOR OUR GENEROSITY, MAYBE WE OUGHTA TAKE IT OUT ON YOUR FRIEND AGAIN?! THINK SHE'S GOT ENOUGH CASH STASHED AWAY TO BAIL YOUR ASS OUT?!” You could barely make up the bucket in the ceiling shivering a bit!

“Dont listen to Ibaraki, Kisume,” Shuten said, “we wont do that. SHE'S a responsible paying client, unlike you. The longer you hide from us, the higher the price gets… and the less likely whatever we break will heal back properly even with the best treatment.” It seemed so wrong that you were taking these two little twerps' threats so seriously. But not even you wanted to step out of your hiding spot and confront these brats! All you could do at the moment is wait. Wait. And Hope. Hope that you and Kisume will make it out of this in one piece regardless of what happens.

“Hurry your ass up, Kisume!” Ibaraki shouted, “you cant stay hidden forever!!”

1113121211112121111222222212112211121212.content:
Your curiosity sparked seven-fold. The aching question could ache you no further. It needed to be answered.

"Why did you create her?" you finally build up the will to ask, even though it shouldnt have been difficult to ask in the first place, "Why'd you create that... T-200, was it?"

"X-200," Arnold corrected you. Nonetheless, it didnt need correcting. Anna knew what you were talking about. As if slightly irritated by that question, she bit her lip, then exhaled.
Then she lit up another cigarette despite Scarlet Mansion's rule 1 being 'NO SMOKING ON THE PREMESIS'!

After a long puff, she finally gives you the answer.

"First of all, I didnt create her," Anna's turn to correct you, "I had her commissioned."
“By who?”
“A client referred me to an underground advanced tech industry in the black market. I dont remember the name of the company… too hard to pronounce. Anyways, I took their tour, they showed off their display cases for AI bodyguards and I got interested. I got a good deal for one… but I guess I got what I paid for.”

“Ok, so why did you have her commissioned?” you finally repeat your question.
Again, she exhales and takes another puff.
“To protect you,” she finally answers.

“Protect me?”
“Yeah,” she curls her lip as if it was a pain for her to answer, “in case I get bumped off. I know I'm not gonna be able to protect you forever. And I got WAY too many enemies on my back-”
“A couple of which I had to talk to just to ease tensions,” you had to interject.
She sneered, “yeah yeah, I get it! Anyways, she seemed like a suitable fill-in to watch your back after I kick the bucket. She's smart, well armed, and has access to more martial arts abilities than this place's gate guardian.”

“I highly doubt that!”

Suddenly, surprise to everybody here, that particular gate guardian Anna was referring to appears out of nowhere to intrude on the private discussion.

“I happen to be a living archive of most of the world's best known methods of martial arts,” Meiling brags, “plus, I dont short-circuit or rust like that pitiful tin can soldier!”
“Meiling, what are you doing here?” your sister questions her with irritation.
“Youre talking about me behind my back and you expect me NOT to jump in and intervene?” Meiling gets defensive.
“This isnt even about you!” Anna snaps, “this is about Alex's robo bodyguard and how much it's gonna cost me for your kappa friend to fix.”
“Nitori's prices dont come cheap if it requires rare materials to fix,” Meiling assures.
“Her CPU is a learning computer with one of the most powerful microprocessers ever built,” Arnold explains, “theyre are unreleased military grade prototypes that not even a vast majority of the Pentagon is aware of their existence.”
Meiling's grin widens and Anna drops to the floor with her hands grasping her face, overloaded with the realization of how royally she fucked up.

“Now dont worry too much,” Meiling assures, “there's a way for Nitori to waive the bill.”
“T..there is?” Anna removes her hands from her face.
“Sure,” Meiling nods, “all it would require is for you to hand over your shirikodama.”
“What's a shirikodama?” Anna asks.
So Meiling explains, “It's that special ball of soul energy found deep within your gangmen.” Your sister cringes as Meiling gets descriptive with hand gestures, “What Nitori would do is take her gloved hand and stick it DEEP into you, like almost all the way in, and claw around your insides until she feels that hard warm glowing orb, then YANK it right out with one hard tug!”

Both you and Anna cringed at that horrifying thought.
“No, I think I'll gladly pay that bill, thank you very much!” Anna remarks with disgust. No sooner after this disturbing conversation did her phone ring. She quickly checked the caller ID and groaned.
“Well, that's my cue, I gotta take this in private,” Anna gets up, “Arnold come with me. Meiling, can you make yourself useful and watch my brother while I get this?”

“BIXUDE!!” Meiling shouted with absolute excitement!
“Whatever,” Anna had no time to humor her as she and Arnold stepped back inside to take the call. And as soon as the two of them shut the door behind them, the gate guard sighed, stretched her arms, and lied back against the wall next to you.

“Ahhh… finally!” Meiling sighed, “alone with the only gao bizi around here I do like… not counting the mistresses of course!” Youre kinda flattered by her statement, but parts of you believes that word she uses is definitely not flattering!
And no sooner did Scarlet Mansion's gate guard loosen up to you did your phone give off a ding. You just got another text. Again from 'Ex-moon soldier'. Because you just had to check, you checked.

'Alex-Sama! Udonge again! Just wrapping up a hard day of work. Still making plans to see you again! I'll find you soon, I promise! Save some room in your room in your bed for me! ;D'
Oh man, Reisen's quite a handful. How did she get your number anyway? Youre pretty sure you never gave it to her…

“Crazy ex stalker?” speaking of handful, Meiling was sitting so close to you, she was eavesdropping on your text reading! Not that this was a particular secret you can keep, anyways (cuz bunny girl and dragon girl might likely cross paths!).

“Something like that,” you give only a partial answer.
Meiling nodded, “I know how that feels. I still get love letters from my qian nanyou… who wasnt even much of a nanyou to begin with.”
“Oh?” you couldnt help but lend an ear.
“He's a pretty high ranked officer of some fancy family run shakedown business… 'Qian Sheng Wo'.”
“Qian Sheng W-”
“SSSH!!” Meiling covered your mouth and shushed you, “you dont just blindly blurt out a name like that out in the open! Do you wanna get yourself killed?!” Aw no.
“It's a...” you lower your voice, “a cartel or something?”
“Triad,” she whispers back then speaks normally, "ever since Hao Long came to our mansion to try to peddle real estate, he's been smitten with me. Not that I can blame him of course," she smirks, "but I've been conveniently spotting him nearly everywhere I go lately! Grocery shopping, the laundromat, meditating at a nearby shrine, the discount theater when they had a special 24 hour event of nothing but Bruce Lee movies... honestly, he just doesnt get that I'm not interested in him!"

"Sorry to hear that," you apologize, even though you felt like asking if HE tried to mount her while she was sleeping, too!
Meiling looked back at you and then smirked. Bad things came from that smirk.

"You know what? I think I know of a way to make Hao Long finally get the message!"
"How's th-wait!" you quickly figured it all out as soon as she pulled out HER phone.
"Mr. Whitestone, could you please do me a favor and take a few selfies with me?"
"I'm not sure that's a good idea!"
"But it's really simple!" she assured, "you and me take a couple of photos together and I'll post them on my twitter... which I know Hao Long prowls because he made like a dozen fake accounts just to follow me on it! Then he'll think I'm already taken and FINALLY get off my back!" Or you'll make a triad agent jealous and have MORE haters on your ass!

"I'm not sure that's a good idea!"
"Are you kidding? It's a BRILLIANT idea!" Meiling argues, "not only that, maybe YOUR crazy ex stalker will have a peek at that and finally leave you alone too! Win win!" OH RIGHT! REISEN!! WHAT IF SHE SEES THOSE TWITTER POSTS?! ....Er... and even if it works and she DOES stop stalking you instead of trying to murder Meiling, part of you just doesnt wanna say goodbye yet! Not only that, you even thought about Wriggle, the OTHER girl you got incredibly close with in one night. So close, your dick is STILL surging a little from that encounter! Ugh.. Wriggle, Reisen, Meiling.... who knew love triangles would be so complicated?

"C'mon, Alex!" Meiling pleads, "It'll be fun! Qiiiiiing?"

1113121211112121111222222212112211121212.content:
*Bang!*

HOLY SHIT!!! YOUR SISTER WAS SHOT!!! You were quickly panicking like mad, but you noticed it wasnt lead sticking in her shoulder. It was a tranquilizer bullet!
"Anna!!" still, you rushed over to your sister's aide, but she was already knocked out cold! Fortunately, Meiling and Arnold helped drag her out of harm's way like decent people!

"Dont worry, it was a light sedative," Reisen assured you, "she'll wake up just fine in a while! ...YOU, on the other hand.." She looked over to Meiling and pulled out a different gun, "...wont be waking up PERIOD!"

*BANG!!!*

In absolutely no time whatsoever, the sound of a gunshot was heard far too close to your ears which caused them to ring for a while and slighty bring up some shaky flashbacks! By the time you registered the gunshot, you realized the gunshot came from Reisen herself! By the time you realized it was Reisen who fired the shot, you realized she was aiming at Meiling! And by the time you realized Meiling was the target, Arnold had already jumped in front of the bullet!

Thankfully, Arnold looked unphased from the shot. His chest was a little scratched, but besides that, he was fine. Who WASNT fine on the other hand were Meiling and Anna! Anna who was not happy seeing Reisen of all people here, and Meiling understandably perturbed that she was nearly shot!
The guardian had her jaw dropped like she was absolutely insulted that someone like REISEN would actually try to shoot her!

"Move aside, Hulk Fabio!" Reisen ordered Arnold.
"Request denied," Arnold coldly stated, "firearms are prohibited on the premises of Scarlet Mansion." All the while, Scarlet Mansion's actual gate guard was still boiling with rage.

"E....EXCUSE ME, YOU BUNNY-EARRED ZI WEI DU!" she snapped at Reisen, "Did YOU... just try to shoot ME?!!"

"No, I was aiming for the OTHER cold-blooded scaley-cunted home-breaker!" your former bunny-earred friend snapped back. Meiling just cracked her neck and assumed a martial stance, ready to fight.
"If you wanna fight, put down that stupid weapon and fight me like a TRUE warrior!"
"Tsk! Like I'm gonna risk soiling my hands on filthy trash like you! The bullets are more valuable than your worthless carcass!"
"Fighting is prohibited on the premises of Scarlet Mansion-"
"SHUT UP!" both Meiling and Reisen snapped at Arnold!

This was getting nowhere. If anybody could put a stop to this mess before your sister and everybody else get involved, it had to be you!

"Reisen!" you stepped in front of Arnold. Upon seeing you, Reisen lowered her weapon.
"Alex-sama!"
"Reisen, you shouldnt be here."
"No!! YOU shouldnt be here!" she shook her head furiously, "this is the worst place for a human like you to be trapped in! What was your sister thinking bringing you here?! The owners of this place are VAMPIRES! The librarian's an otaku lunatic with an assistant who is a SUCCUBUS! The head maid could freeze time and molest you 50 times before you so much as register how violated you are! And THIS bitch is a fire-breathing retard!"
"Better than a mentally-ill drug-addicted lesbo with anger management issues!"
"I'll fucking skin you alive and sell your hide to Coach!"
"BRING IT, HUANG JUN!"

"Arnold hold Meiling back!" you ordered him who immediately did so as you used yourself as a shield from Reisen!
"Alex-sama, we need to get you out of here! Youre clearly not safe here!" she tells you.
But you shake your head, "No, I have to be here. This is my home now."
She grits her teeth, "This is NOT your home! Your home is in Eientei... with me! You cant settle for this awful place! You deserve much better than... HER!" she points over to Meiling who's glares right back, "Your virginity is far more valuable than to be giving it to something like THAT!

And as soon as she brought up your virginity, your face went red and that red-haired dragon youkai snickered.

"Heh! Virginity, you say?!"
Reisen's ears twitched.
"Oh, I'm sorry, bunny! But if youre looking for Alex's virginity, little Wriggle already took that before even I could!"

Reisen's red eyes widened, "W-W-W-WRIGGLE?!! AS IN WRIGGLE NIGHTBUG?!!!" Oh dear, she knows her?! You lowered your head and Meiling's serpent grin widened. "Y-Y-YOU LOST YOUR VIRGIINITY TO.... *GULP!* HIM??!!!" ...'Him'?!
Reisen not only looked at you with concern... but even a little disgust, "Alex-sama, it's obvious youre feeling lonely in this horrible place, but you were so lonely that you looked for comfort from another man?!"

"Er, Wriggle's a gi-"
"THAT'S RIGHT, BUNNY-GIRL!!" Meiling zipped at you and covered your mouth, "and you shoulda seen the way Alex bàoed that little bug boy's tight little juhua! Heh! I bet sperm is STILL dripping out of Wriggie's glowing gangmen!" Sheesh, Meiling! Did you really have to lay it on so thick?!

Reisen's face went cold, she's probably got such a disgusting image stuck in her brain now, but she exhaled and shook her head, "Ok, Alex-sama! Dont worry! We'll have you tested for any STDs later!" Does brief sparks from your dick count as an STD? " Now c'mon, let's get outta here!"
"I told you already, Reisen. This is my home now."
"But Alex-sa-"
"Reisen, I'm sorry," you gave it to her straight, "I cant go back. Youre gonna have to leave."
That poor bunny girl looked like she was mere moments away from crying. It really broke your heart to see her in such an emotional state. But you knew it was something you had to do.

Reisen gazed back at you, breathing heavily and trying to fight back the tears in her eyes. Damn it, the look she was giving you was making it hard for YOU to hold back the tears! Yet, you just didnt have the heart to just turn away from her. But all you could do was just hope she'll get the message and turn around and leave... even though part of you hopes she doesnt...

Reisen...

1113121211112121111222222212112211121212.title: Annoying guy

1113121211112121111222222212112211121212.content:
The head mistress of the mansion blocked your path. You were obligated to stop whatever it is you intended to do and give her your undivided attention. Especially when you she was giving you a stern glare. You didnt need any explanation. You knew why she was her.

"M-Ms. Lady Scarlet," you werent exactly sure whether to bow your head or stand straight in attention.

Didnt matter though.

"Mr. Whitestone," Remilia spoke, "it has come to my attention that a former colleague of yours approached our mansion heavily armed and attacked your sister and my gate guard." You had figured. There was no point in denying it.
"Y-yes," you responded, “I assure you I did not have anything to do with her coming her. I specifically told her off.”

“Be that as it may,” Remilia didnt seem to care, “such a dangerous person whom YOURE acquainted it tried to attack underlings of my establishment. And any attack on my subordinates is an attack on my establishment. And any attack on my establishment, I will consider a personal attack on me.” This statement coming from the matriarch of the very manor youre seeking refuge in is quite a hard statement.

“Reisen wont be coming back!” you tell her, “I promise! I wont let her back here. Her hurting my sister crossed the line. I'm not gonna let her hurt anybody else here too!”
“How exactly can I be sure of that?” she questions you, “that was a heavily armed deranged lunatic that was awful quick to pull the trigger! Especially on your very sister! Do you seriously think youre capable to stopping someone with such an unhinged mindset?!” Good question.

“She wont come back,” you tell her, “she ran off crying when I told her off. She got the message that I cant go back with her.”
“Or she's motivated to go to even worse extremes!” Remilia quipped, “which do you think I should assume?” Now that she says that, what makes you think Reisen wont do something even worse? You wish you had the perfect response to that quip, but sadly you didnt.

“I wholeheartedly agree, Lady Scarlet!” however Meiling suddenly appeared out of nowhere yet again and came with a response of her own, “not to mention, judging by the military grade arsenal and the way she wield her weapons, she's clearly ex-military trained. Who knows what kinds of special forces tactics she's capable of.”

After thoroughly hammering down the threat to her mistress, Meiling picked the opportune time to offer a solution.

“Which is why I propose we bring in some added security detail to protect Mr. Whitestone from that conniving huang zun!”
“Meiling, what are you up to?” Remilia asks the same question you were thinking.
“Please hear me out, my Lady!” Meiling pleads, “I happen to have a few friends who are fellow professional guardians that are currently down on their luck who would be happy to lend a hand with assisting me protecting Alex and his sister until their current personal bodyguard is fully repaired.”
The head of the mansion looks at her sternly, tapping her neatly trimmed fingernails.

“How much is this going to cost me?” Remilia got directly to the point.

Meiling shook her head, “Not much if anything! These friends are pretty desperate for work and some will do it simply for free food and a roof over their head! One will watch the front, another will watch the back, one will patrol the halls, and I myself can keep an eye on Alex personally in his room in case the rabid rabbit tries to sneak in and take advantage of him in his sleep!” AGAIN.
Remilia just groaned hard, “Alright Meiling, I'll think about it. In the meantime, please escort Anna's brother to the library. Patchouli requires his personal assistance.” What? She wants you to impregnate MORE oddities! Contract MORE ungodly STDs the likes of which no one's ever seen?!

Meiling bows, “Bixu-I mean, as you wish, my lady!”
“Wait,” Remilia stops the two of you, “before you go. Mr. Whitestone, there's one more thing I need from you.”

“What is iAAAUUGGH!!” suddenly, you felt a sharp stab into the side of your neck! By the time you gripped it in pain, it was already bleeding! “Fucckking…. Hell...” you groaned.
As you shouldve expected (and so should Anna!), Remilia was wiping the blood from her lips with her handkerchief.
“Ok. You can go now,” she ordered.

Your oh so friendly Chinese dragon youkai admirer generously wrapped a bandage around your neck to stop the bleeding as the two of you walked off.
“I'm sorry about her,” Meiling apologized, “you know how wild young vampire brats get, right? ...No? Um, anyway, dont worry. That'll heal just fine. Vampire bites are no more dangerous than sticking your jiba in a firefly's baoyu!” UGH!! Did she have to remind you?! ...Maybe, considering you need to have a word with Patchouli!

“Are there any others here that'll bite me too?” you asked.
She shook her head, “No. Remilia's sister prefers her food dead. As for Koakuma, let's just say it's not BLOOD she likes to suck!” Awkward, but not nearly as awkward as when she added, “As for me, the only time I'd ever bite you would be to mark you as mine! And since we had that tweet together and told off our stalkers and IkindasortatoldmymomthatyouandIweregoingsteady, I think it's high time to show the world that youre Hong Meiling's gao bizi!”

She literally was about to sink her teeth into you!

“No! No no no no no!” you immediately refuse, “no marks, thank you very much!”
“Naozhong...” Meiling sneered at you under her breath. Youre pretty sure that was an insult.

But before you could do anything about that (as if you could!), you heard yet another ding from your phone. While Meiling gone in a sour mood from your mark rejection, she was now ignoring you. Which meant opportunity to check your newest text.

Make that newest 20 texts! Sheesh, how you miss all them?! And of course, they all come from Ex-moon soldier! Mainly messages of begging, pleading, apologizing, cute sad emoticons, there was probably a nude selfie or two in there somewhere. Can she not take a hint?!
You seriously need to change your number.

Youre gonna have to tell her off, but youre not sure she'll take no for an answer. If anything, it'd probably just encourage her to KEEP trying to come for you. Perhaps you should just block her and be done with it (and hope she doesnt have multiple backup numbers to pester you with!). But then again, what makes you think it wont encourage her to try to get in contact with you in other ways? What makes you think the lack of any and all replies from you wont just make her antsy and push her to try to contact you face-to-face again?

You glance over at Meiling, who was still ignoring you, and think about your next move...

"Wait," you interject, "Arnold mentioned something about a full moon."
Reisen's ears twitched conveniently matching her wide-eyed expression.
"He said I would regret my decision to be here when the moon is full," you explained, "does something bad happen on a full moon?"

Reisen suddenly got a little nervous.... as if a familiar awful flashback occurred in her mind.
"Ummmmmmm...." she dragged her 'um' for almost half a minute, "...no, I wouldnt say 'bad' per se. It's really nothing a couple of locked doors, a few new sets of clothes, and a large bottle of lube cant take care of." What?
"What happens?" you get curious.
She gets really REALLY nervous, "N-n-nothing major. Although I MIGHT get a bit more cuddly with you if you dont mind. Well of course you dont mind! You are my hubby, after all!" Curiouser and curiouser.

"Anyways, I'd love to chat some more, but I do have a few chores master wants me to do real soon," she seemed quick to end this chain of discussion quickly, "but before I go, though..." she blushes again, seeming quick to return to ANOTHER chain of discussion, "d...do you want to go check out my hideaway home later on tonight?"

Again tempting. But again, full moon. You think for a minute before you finally answer your wife...
1113121211112121111222222212112211121212.title: The Buck and His Doe

choices: Short purple haired female with skull mask
1113121211112121111222222212112211121212.content:
You decided to check out the secret hiding place. You nodded and reisen smiled gleefully and went away as you got out of the bath and dried yourself. Later that night, while you were asleep reisen woke you up and told you to follow her to the secret hideout. As you’ve got your cloth on and got out, it took at least 30 minutes to get to the hideout, and it was magnificent. It was a house that were like elite looking style with swimming pool and garden. Once you’ve got in, the inside were terrific.

“Reisen, how did you manage to afford this place?” You asked.

“Simple, I used my changes I’ve keep hiding from master and I bought this place.” Reisen replies.

“Wow...just wow. Even Maeve wouldn’t allow me and my sis to move in like this.” You replied.

As you got in deeper, you noticed reisen rushing the doors and locking the door. She then tells you she’ll be sleeping alone for tonight but will be together tomorrow. You nodded and she went into her private room. You sat down on the chair and started to relax until you heard an small ‘bang’ noise from outside. You looked out and noticed a orangish light not too away from your new place. You noticed it was Eienteis route and your fear grew little, but kept it to yourself and relaxed.

-Eientei-

There were fire around the area and both eirin and Kaguya And Tewi were outside fighting Arnold and Anna themselves! They were fighting through the area then eirin spoke up.

“Where is reisen? I thought she was with you?” Eirin asked.

“What? I never let her in incase there were trouble!?” Tewi replied.

“I’m tired of your rambling, bitch! Where is my brother!?” Anna shouted.

“He was with us because he was unconscious by wriggle!” Eirin said.

“Lies! Your bitch bunny stole from me!” Anna shouted in anger.

“Reisen....did she lied to me?” Eirin whispered.

“Now now, don’t get too irrational Anna. Lady eirin, where’s Alex?” Arnold asked.

“She might have snuck away from us.” Tewi replies.

There were horror rushing down from them and Eirin wanted clear answer but then Arnold put out his arms and struck a blue lightning from his fingers toward Kaguya. She shouted in pain as it stuck her deeply, Arnold struck her again and she screamed in pain.

“No! Don’t!” Eirin pleaded, “I don’t know where they went! Please don’t hurt our lady!”

Just then, a long purple haired female with skull mask on her face appeared behind Anna.

“We have located your brother, Anna.” Female said.

“Good, we will go after them...oh, before I go, here’s a little farewell present.” Anna said.

She took out some sort of a launcher with a bomb on and she pulled the trigger. The bomb went away and the three dodged the bomb only to be struck toward the facility, exploding with mushroom cloud up on the air.

“I sense...radiation! Quick Tewi! Let the remaining survivors out!” Eirin ordered.

“Y-yes master!” Tewi replies.

-secret hideout-

You felt unnerving to know what’s going to happen to reisen and the Eientei crew. You wondered if reisen were ok, then suddenly you hear a clicking noise and you turned around only to see a tall man with orange right arm and a skull mask on his face.

“What the-“

“You’ll come with me, mr.whitestone.”

Without you replying or running away, he got you and got out only to hear a noise.

“My hubby....IS MIIINNNE!!!!”

You heard a pounding noise from reisens private room and the skull masked man just rushed you and himself out until the door slammed open and you saw reisen....in different mode. She was more muscular and her eyes were red, and she was looking for someone to cuddle and fight. The skull masked man took out an dagger and sighed.

“If it’s time to fight, then I shall do it discreetly.” Man said.

He started to run fast and fought her as you were in shaky situation, you were greeted by...
1113121211112121111222222212112211121212.title: Destruction of Eientei

choices: Go for it. Second time's a charm!
Tell her politely to piss off.
1113121211112121111222222212112211122.content:
You overdid it. What you just experienced was a tad too extreme for you to handle for the first time. Granted, you wouldnt mind doing it again after a while, but it takes a tremendous toll on your body. As soon as the convulsions end, your vision gets blurry, your eyes get heavy, and you get incredibly tired. You could make out the look of surprise on Wriggle and Yamame's faces before everything goes black.

"Oh dear. Uh, Yamame, I think he fainted."

"What?!! No fair!! I aint got a chance to drill him yet!!"

"Sadly, the human learns far too late that mating with a firefly youkai can be far more... 'electrifying' than he can handle."


********************

Your fantastic dream of being a magnificent Sultan being blissfully ravished in the middle of a glowing Wriggle harem has come to an end as you woke up aching head to toe. As you took your time to allow your muscles to recover, you assess the new surrounding and find yourself lying on a bed of someone's bedroom littered with bookshelves! Despite your brain being a little dizzy, you quickly figure out whose bedroom this belongs to as soon as you catch sight of Patchouli sitting at a desk sipping her tea and reading a book. Sadly, neither Wriggle and the other girl were anywhere to be seen.

"Oh, youre finally up!" Patchouli got up out of her seat and brought over a teacup and teapot, "wow, you sure slept rather soundly."
You were just about to get out of bed, but you ached way too much to lift yourself up.
"Hold on, dont rush it," she poured tea in a cup, "drink this first. It'll help you recover."

"Thanks," you groaned and sipped a little, paying no attention to how hot it was despite nearly burning your tongue.

"So..." not even waiting for you to recover, she leaned in and smiled, "...how was your date?" Memories of that night flash back in your head.
"A hell of a first," you answer truthfully, "I er... didnt really expect so much on a first night."

"Yeah, most feral youkai arent really reserved or interested in taking things slow," Patchouli stated, "once it's that time of the year, it doesnt matter what base you made it to, their eggs need fertilizing!" Well that'll take some getting used to. Then again, you kinda already had a sample of that with Reisen.

"Ugh, about... that... what happened with us... well... would it be hazardous to my health?"

Patchouli shook her head, "You'll be fine. Those pains youre feeling from the shocks, they'll go away really fast. Although you might wanna avoid strenuous activity for at least a few hours." Dang. But damned if it wasnt worth it.

"So when am I able to date Wriggle again?" you asked.
"Never."
"What do you mean never?" you woulda done a double-take, but it'd hurt too much moving your neck like that.
"You already gave Wriggle what she needed," she answered like it was a matter of fact, "so she doesnt need you anymore."
For all the right reasons, youre a bit upset. "What?! Why?!"

"Oh! Gee, did I forget to tell you?" Ms. Knowledge bopped herself on the forehead, "firefly youkai dont mate for life. Typically, the whole purpose for mating is primarily to secure the bloodline than actual pleasure. And once the tests come out positive, you've already fulfilled that purpose.”
Hearing that hurt you a lot more than it shouldve. She was not only saying you were just a fling, but a fling meant simply for impregnating, nothing else!

“But… what about… I mean… well, er…. well, what about our kids, I mean I'm still their father so-”
“Oh you dont have to worry about them. Wriggle's boss will find decent jobs for them,” she assured you, possibly not understanding why youre really upset, “I'm really sorry, Alex. Look on the bright side. You made that poor lonely girl a very happy expected mother. You mightve even made her *cough*andme*cough* world famous what with her soon to birth a whole new hybrid species!” THAT'S supposed to make you feel better?!

Well, at least she's happy. It doesnt seem fair, but human and youkai are completely different species with completely different cultures and values. Darn shame. Youre really gonna miss Wriggle. And that whole shock-sex thing. You could totally get used to that.

“But dont feel bad,” Patchouli smiled, “there's plenty more girls where that came from. I happen to know of a particular one that just might be in your league.”
“Oh?” you said, pretending to care.
“Yep,” she nodded enthusiastically, “my pal Parsee's been giving subtle hints about how she's feeling lonely. Well, 'subtle' aint the word. More like she'll never shut the hell up about it. *Ahem* Anyways, she's a very modest girl. Yep. Modest.”

You squint your eyes, “Uh huh.”
“Yeah, poor Parsee spends way too much time hanging out at a bridge feeling sorry for herself and hanging out with big dumb lushes that are seriously trouble! I, as her sorta best friend, believe she deserves a change!”
Youre getting bad feelings.

“Oh! And dont worry about being a fling! Trust me you wont!” Ms. Knowledge tells you with certainty, “in fact, if she really likes you (in her own way), she might get a bit clingy! Really clingy!”
You raised your eyebrow and eye the book on her desk.
It's actually a composition book. So she's currently writing instead of reading, eh? What is she writing, you wonder?
Whatever it was, you spotted the title she wrote on it: 'The Hashihime and Me'. Genre: Romance/Horror?
1113121211112121111222222212112211122.title: Plenty More Where That Came From!

11131212111121211112222222121122111221.content:
You hesitated, wondering what would happen, but your curiosity got over you and decided to agree with her. Pachoulie were delighted to hear it and told you to wait as she had to get some stuff and left. You waited for moment and then she came back with two books.

"What's that book?" You asked.

"Oh, some books for protection, that's all." Pachy replied.

You doubted her but gave in. You, patchouli and koakuma got out then you saw Anna standing with Arnold at the gate. You three came to them, you asking what's up then she told you she's meeting an Allie to her that dwelled in the underground city.

"You know Marcus? That guy that nicknamed real chef? I'm going to see him." Anna said.

You knew who he was as he was Marcus Fireblue, a fat African-American man who likes to cook and eat. He was nicknamed 'real chef' as he had a voice and the attitude same as chef from South Park. He was in the Le Fay gang for long while until he was discharged after he had an bad case of flue.

"We're going to that destination, so you can come along." Pachy said.

Anna nodded dispite your thought. After the transportation, you four arrived at the underground city. Anna bid farewell to you three and left. Pacholie then told to move out and you all did, then after 5 minutes of walking you three found parsee...
11131212111121211112222222121122111221.title: Go for it. Second time's a charm!

1113121211112121111222222212112212.content:
The two of you crossed through an open field. Not much here. No trees, bush, flowers or wild animals (or wild youkai). Just grass. And maybe bugs but mostly grass. Which isnt a bad thing, because it's dark out. No stars in the sky and you couldnt make out the new moon. It was almost pitch black. You really shoulda carried a flashlight. But instead you could only rely on your blind date to guide you and hope she isnt deceiving you or anything like that. Hopefully it'd be an unlikely scenario considering it was Patchoulie's idea to set you up on this blind date. If something bad were to happen to you, she'd be in Anna's mercy. And Anna aint known for mercy.

Wriggle at least knew where she needed to go and she seemed like a nice girl, so you trust her. Still, you didnt like walking blindly in the darkness.

"Gee, it's kinda dark," you speak up.
"It's no problem," Wriggle assures you, "I'm used to this route. I can get to where we need to go with my eyes closed."
"Still, I certainly cant," you say, "did you bring a flashlight or anything?"
"No, but if you need light, I've just got the thing!"

Then suddenly, there was a bright light around you that illuminated the field. It was plenty bright now. Sure there still wasnt much to see, but you felt more secure to at least see where youre going. However, it was where the light was coming from that made you do a double-take. She wasnt carrying a light on her person. Her midsection itself was glowing!
"Better?"
"Y...yeah," you stare at Wriggle dumbfounded, "h...how are you doing that?"
She just smiled and patted her butt... the brightest part of her!

You stared unblinkingly at a complete loss for words. You should already expect such oddities from youkai and even certain fairies, but dating a girl who's ass can glow is still a new experience. ...You are both confused AND kinda aroused at the same time!

So you followed Wriggle down the open field now lit up by her butt until you came across a swarm of fireflies. Hundreds if not thousands of them buzzing all around. Wriggle casually walked right through the swarm like it was nothing. It was a little difficult for you, considering when you tried to go through them, they buzzed all over you. Loads of them got in your face, way too close to your eyes and mouth and you began to worry they were gonna fly up places you really didnt want them flying up in!

You swat at them trying to get them out of your face.

“Wait, dont hurt them!” the nightbug youkai was stressed by your action, “theyre just making sure youre not a threat to me.”
“Well…!! I'm not… egh!” you speak as you constantly try avoiding the bugs flying toward your eyes and mouth, “cant you.. grrr… just tell them I'm not?”
“I did,” she did, “but the thing is they act on impulse… just bare with it for a little while. I promise it'll be over soon.” As much as you hated being swarmed by bugs, you took her word and put up with it for the most uncomfortable minute of your life.

After a minute of permanent mental traumatizing, the damn bugs finally buzzed away. You shivered in places you didnt know you had but for your blind date's sake, you continued to hold out. Thankfully, your destination was reached. You saw a small little house at the end of the field with a lot of fireflies buzzing around it.

“We're here,” Wriggle said with a bit of glee that warmed your heart as her butt-light dimmed down, “this is my home. Come on in.” Hm. Being invited into a girl's house on the first night? That's actually a major step in the relationship very early, but remembering Patchoulie's books, that might have been part of the plan.

A little issue. The house wasnt very tidy. Well it kinda was, but it had a bit of a bug problem. It had bugs crawling all over the place. Cockroaches crawling across the floor. Crickets chirping at the windowsill. Roly-polies in the ferns. Ants going after leftover snacks on the living room table. A bees nest right up in the corner of the room.
“This is my humble abode!” Wriggle says with pride, “built it all by myself! Er… with the help of all these tenants here, of course!” She was referring to the bugs. Cripes almighty.
“It's….” you swallowed, trying to keep a straight face, “…it's really nice. Really nice work you did here. *Gulp* You ALL did here!”
“Make yourself at home. Dont forget to take your shoes off,” she tells you. You cringed again, but you took off your shoes, praying the centipedes nearby werent gonna make a beeline for them!

“Have a seat. I'll go whip us something up to eat,” Wriggle headed over to the kitchen as you gazed over at the couch occupied by dozens of beetles. There was a small rocking chair that didnt have bugs crawling on it, so you sat your non-glowing butt in it while eyeing the bugs cautiously.

You sat there in silence as the sounds of buzzing annoyed you. You told yourself not to pay attention to the big green buzzing beetles flying across the room, but their buzzing was irritating you and you kept having images in your head of them flying right into you and splattering their buggy guts all over your face!

It's your first date and already you dont think this relationship is gonna work long-term. It pains you that she wont approve of you calling an exterminator. If anything, that lovable mentally ill bunny girl might have been a more tolerable choice. Boy do you miss her. You hope she's doing ok.
Then again, maybe youre overthinking this way too early. You barely know Wriggle and just havent warmed up to her yet despite Patchouli's obvious plan. Besides, if there's one unique positive about her… well, her ass comes in real handy during a blackout!

“Ok! It's ready!”

Speak of the devil (and he shall appear). Wriggle returns from the kitchen with a tray that consists of a sandwich with grayish sticky jelly substance in it and a glass of thick yellowish/orangeish honey-like liquid.

“Sorry, I'm kinda neglected to go grocery shopping lately,” Wriggle apologized, “so I was kinda short on ingredients. I just had enough stuff to whip up a lightly seasoned snail sandwich and a nice protein pollen smoothie!” You eyed the snail sandwich and pollen smoothie very very cautiously while trying to keep a straight face.

“You can pick which one you want,” Wriggle offered, “I'll just have the one you dont.” You didnt want either. Eating splattered gooey snail between two slices of bread made you cringe. Then again, Escargot is a delicacy in parts of Europe. Not that it encourages you to start eating snails!
The pollen smoothies seems slightly more appealing in comparison. But you dont consider drinking pollen very appealing to begin with.

But despite the rational part of your brain telling you not to consider eating either, you dont want to seem rude in front of your date. So while secretly praying that it doesnt make you sick, you politely choose...
1113121211112121111222222212112212.title: Never Say Yes to a Blind Date

choices: Anna's calling to check up on you.
Wriggle seems to be getting drunk from her smoothie.
You notice someone's watching you with a camera through the window!
11131212111121211112222222121122121.content:
Snail sandwich sounded nasty. But pollen smoothie made from a bug (youkai) raised questions. What if this particular pollen is safe to consume for bug(youkai)s, but not humans? Youre awful certain that bug(YOUKAI)s have a particular diet consisting of many types of foods that human beings shouldnt dare touch due to them being particularly toxic and/or harmful to your body. Would you dare share the same meal of a dung beetle?! ...Not that I'm implying that Wriggle eats shit or anything, I'm just saying 'what if'! And it's a BIG 'WHAT IF'!

As for snails... well, as bad as it sounds, if it's good enough to be a delicacy for certain parts of Europe, it should be good enough for you. At least youre not getting a side of maggot cheese to go with it! UGGGHH!

"Uh... I'll pick the..." you do your best to hide your disgust before answering, "...snail sandwich."

"Oh. Ok," Wriggle handed you the sandwich, "alright, I guess I'll manage with the smoothie then." She sounded a little disappointed. Maybe she really wanted the sandwich. Too late to change your mind, unfortunately! Sorry!

You hesitated to put that sandwich in your mind, but it seemed like the eyes of the world were upon you. Or at least far more eyes than Wriggles. Quite a lot of those bugs littering her house had their dozen or so eyes on you. You hated to look like a bad host, so you took a deep breath and took a deep bite.

Surprisingly, it was nothing like you expect tail would taste like. Salty, bitter, incredibly gooey, but with the right kind of sauce and seasoning mixed into it, it wasnt that bad. The closest you could describe it would be like gooified tuna. Something that tastes like that with this kind of texture is very very weird. But overall, it certainly wasnt disgusting.

“How is it?” Wriggle asked as she sipped her pollen drink.

“It's… not bad,” you boldly admit, “never had snail, so this is a new experience for me. But it's certainly a lot better than I thought it would taste.” The bug youkai wasnt exactly certain whether it was really a compliment, but she chalked it up as her being ignorant to fancy city-boy lingo or something.

Despite the odd texture to match the tuna-like taste, you manage to scarf down half the sandwich and still show no sign of stopping. So far, the blind date isnt a complete waste of time. The only gripe you have so far is the bug infestation that happens to be your date's tenants. Somehow, the fact that her butt can luminate a whole room makes up for it! Granted, you personally think Reisen has a nicer butt, but you gotta put Eientei behind you.

“Mr. Whitstone, what do you do for a living?” Wriggle opened up the dialog with a question that didnt have an easy answer.
“Well, at the moment, I'm not doing anything,” you tell her, “I used to be affiliated with a cartel until my sister and I got into major trouble with them. We have to lay low for a while.”
“Did you do something really bad?” she asked.
“More like I DIDNT do something really bad,” you answer. Thankfully she was polite enough not to pursue the subject, “and how about you? What do you do?”

“Uh, for a short while, I used to run a bug delivery service,” the bug girl answers, “basically, when customers needed certain bugs to help pollinate their flowers and crops, or keep away other pests, or just wanted particular pets, I'd be in charge of delivering them right to their door. Unfortunately, it didnt do as well as I hoped, so I ended up closing down.”
“Oh, that's too bad,” you say, eyeing the swarms of bugs eerily.

“Currently, I'm hired by a caretaker at the Garden of the Sun to help watch her sunflower beds,” she continues, “make sure theyre well taken care of and protect them from wild intruders or pests.” So she's hired to protect a garden? Hm.
“Is it a tough job?” you ask.
“Not really,” she says, “most of the trespassers are easy to scare off as soon as I sic the bees on them!” You heard a couple of loud buzzes of pride coming from the beehive in the corner.
“Yeah, I'd imagine that'd scare off a ton of people,” you comment while at the same time holding back a shudder!
“As it should,” Wriggle added, “unlike other bees, MINE dont just sting you and die. They sting you hundreds of times, then they give off a pheromone to alert the other bees that youre a threat, then they ALL swarm you and sting you hundreds of times!” Geez, luiz! Pray to whatever god or gods you worship, Wriggle doesnt suddenly go yandere on you!

“But besides that job, lately I've been going to school,” Wriggle thankfully changed the course of discussion to something more pleasant.
“Oh yeah?” you got your own two cents in, “I'm thinking of going back to school myself once the heat dies down.”
“You really should,” Wriggle suggests, “Ms. Kamishirasawa is the best teacher I ever had. She knows practically everything!” You already forgot what her name is.
“What does Ms. Kamashamashariah teach?” you ask, completely skewering her teacher's name.
“Oh she teaches a bit of everything,” Wriggle answers and goes down the list, “she teaches math, history, spelling, geography, the alphabet...” Alphabet?
“Uh… what college does she teach at?”

“...College?” Wriggle tilted her head. That shouldnt have gone over her head. You made another guess.
“Oh, it's an adult school?”
Wriggle shook her head, “No, I dont see any adults in my class. Just their kids and a few orphans whose parents were eaten by youkai.” Grimm. And now you have TWO reasons to feel uneasy.

“Hm,” you kept a straight face as you took another bite of your snail sandwich. After swallowing dow enough, you finally ask, “How old are you, Wriggle?”
Wriggle… well, she looked upwards, staring in deep thought. Not a good side.
“I… dont know.”
“You dont know?” you question that answer.
“To be honest, I got bored with counting all those days every single just to find out what and when my birthday is,” Wriggle gave you the oddest answer, “I dont even remember how many days is was since I stopped counting. Ugh… just thinking back at all those days is making my head hurt.”
She forgot how she old she is… because she stopped counting the days in each year. Is this really making sense to you?

“But dont you have a birth certificate or something?” you asked. Wriggle shook her head. “We didnt have that kind of technology where I came from.”
“The hospital didnt have the technology to keep a record of your birth?!”
“I wasnt born in a hospital,” she explained, “it was more like a… um… little hut out in a small rural farm village. I cant even remember where this village was or if it still exists.” Wow. This is certainly interesting. So either she's so old, she was born during an era where such record keeping was hard to come by… or she's still young but just grew up dirt poor. Determining whether she was legal age was a coin toss! Not only that, it made you feel how much more privileged you were compared to her.

“I do know that I'm at least old enough to have kids!” she suddenly blurts out oblivious of how awkward she made herself look, “that's because my backside glows! When a firefly youkai comes of age, she's able to activate her luminating ability. It's not just to light up dark areas, it's primary use is actually to attract a mate.” to demonstrate, she turns around and bends over and her butt magically lights up with an incredibly bright glow! “See?”

It was kinda hard for you NOT to look at her ass while she had it sticking out at you and glowing brightly, definitelt making itself the center of attention! Not even the threat of burning your retinas deterred you!
“Yes… I… see...” you really really really REALLY hope she's legal age! “It's… incredibly bright!”

“Yep! It can be seen up to 2 nautical miles away!” Wriggle educates you… while still showing off her blazing bright behind, “that's over 12,000 feet away according to what Ms. Kamishirasawa taught me.”
“That's amazing,” you exclaim, still unable to look away from dat blindingly bright ass.

Finally, the glow of her backside dims down, snapping you out of the trance, but leaving your vision in kind of a fuzz for a while.
Even Wriggle notices your pupils were having a hard time focusing and she blushes.

“Heheh, sorry. Guess I dont know my own strength.”
“That's alright, Wriggle,” you tell her, “I can see why you use it to attract a mate. It was certainly hard to take my eyes off it.”
“Th… thank you, Alex,” Wriggle blushed with flattery. You really really really REALLY TIMES INFINITY hope she's legal age!


......


And so a bit of time passes by without anything out of the ordinary were to occur, that is until...
11131212111121211112222222121122121.title: An Unforgettable AND Educational Dinner

choices: Ask for a taste of her smoothie...
Dont do anything. Just sit and watch tv with her.
111312121111212111122222221211221213.content:
Wriggle hopped up out of her seat to go pour herself another glass of smoothie. She asked you if youre sure you didnt want any and you assured her that you were good (trying not to make it obvious you were scared it wasnt safe for human consumption!). Again, she seemed a bit more disappointed than you expected hearing you turn her offer down. She seriously did want you to try that pollen concoction! Guess she took pride in making her smoothies, huh?

Nonetheless, you waited patiently for Wriggle to come back as you continued eating your snail sandwich and watching bugs cautiously, hoping none of them will buzz into your food and contaminate it. You kept questioning whether the food was even safe for you to eat, but then you also reminded yourself that youre possibly pushing incompatible boundaries dating a bug youkai, so shut up and eat your stupid sandwich!

“Here we see the human male attempting to adapt in the female firefly youkai's habitat.”
Suddenly, you overhear a familiar voice narrating.
“He sits waiting patiently for his potential mate to return while at the same time looking hesitant being around so many creatures outside his species.”
You hear the narrator's voice just outside the window! It wasnt hard to guess, but lo and behold it was none other than that crafty librarian herself… filming Wriggle's house with a camera! ...And in some sort of bubble for some reason.

You glanced over at the bugs who didnt seem at all interested then reached over to the window.

“Possibly filled with nervousness and anxiety from the inevitable human/bug youkai coitus, he decides to open the window and get some fresh air-”
“PATCHOULI?!!”
She immediately jumps with fright then pauses the recording and shushes you. “SSSHH!! Keep your voice down! I'm trying to work here!”
“Work?!” you whispered with exclamation points, “Peeping on people with a camcorder is work?!
“This time, it is!” she explains, “perhaps you mightve gotten the subtle hints earlier, but I'm kinda trying to film a nature documentary.” You squinted your eyes as she continued, “Involving the birth of a brand new human/firefly youkai hybrid species.” Ugh… you figured as much! So much for a blind date.

“D-Does Wriggle even know youre doing this?”
“...Not yet. But I'll tell her… while we're discussing royalties.”
“Look, you better leave!” you warn her, “before you get… you know… discovered!” You usher over to the wasp nest in the corner of the room.”

“Oh no need to worry about me,” Patchouli assures, “thanks to this bug repellent bubble I picked up at the Ravine! It's 100% non-detectable by 99.99% of all bug antennae radar!” That silly little bubble's supposed to keep her from being detected by bugs? Well, seeing as though the wasps STILL havent descended on her, stung her a billion times, then gave off pheromones to alert neighboring hives to sting a billion times, guess it's working!

11131212111121211112222222121122122.content:
You had no idea if a smoothie made entirely of flower pollen (from who knows what flower) was safe for human consumption, let alone if it even tasted good, but compared to eating a sandwich full of nasty slimy snails, it seemed like the best option! Here's hoping you dont regret it.

"I'll take the pollen smoothie," you answer.
"Ok," Wriggle gladly handed you the glass of thick yellowish sap fluid and kept the sandwich of crushed snail paste. Oddly, she seemed a little gleeful with your choice, but it didnt matter to you. All that mattered was trying to make yourself a decent guest in her guest… and hope that whatever drink that was doesnt end up poisoning you or make you sick.

Good news was that it didnt smell off. It had a fruity/citrusy scent to it with a hint of honey added. You attempted not to show any signs of nervousness while you carefully inspected the smoothie. As you inspected, Wriggle was taking eager bites into her snail sandwich, obviously savoring the delicious slimy salty pasty goodness! At the very least, she made it look like it was delectable.

'Here goes nothing,' you think to yourself and finally take a sip. It's thick. It's very thick. Very gooey and sticky too. You tasted quite a lot of honey in the texture. Sadly, it didnt taste as fruity and citrusy as it smelled. In fact, it had a very bitter aftertaste, almost like there was a little alcohol mixed in. All in all, it wasnt that bad. It wasnt something you'd consider drinking often.

“How is it?” Wriggle had to ask.

“It's… not bad,” you say, taking another sip, urging yourself to finish the entire glass for her, “er, what kind of pollen is in this?”
“It's mostly sunflower pollen,” Wriggle explained, “extracted from Yuuka Kazami's prized sunflower bed at the Garden of the Sun. I'd watch over her flower garden once in a while and she'd let me extract jars of sunflower pollen as payment. It's really good stuff.”

It certainly wasnt awful tasting, it might make for a booze substitute if you wanted to unwind and party, it just wasnt really something youre into. Not like one of those various carrot-related dishes they had over at Eientei. THAT was something you could get used to eating regularly AND feel good about it since carrots are very nutritious. But alas, thinking that way only ended up reminding you of dear ol' Reisen. You miss that adorable little mentally ill attempted rapist!

“It… might have a bit of a strong kick, though,” Wriggle took a little too long to finally add that warning.
“W-what kind of kick?” your suspicions rise.
“Well...” she scratched the back of her head, “I tend to get a little tipsy if I drink too much of it. You know, get light headed, say and do things I normally wouldnt do, blurry memory, and I wake up the next morning with a big headache.” Interesting.
“Is there alcohol in this drink?” you question.
She shakes her head. “No, it's mostly pollen, honey, a bit of fruit… and a few herbal supplements I've got from Eientei.” EIENTEI?!!

You seriously wished you waited until now to swallow that stuff! But even if you could spit it out upon hearing the E-word, it was way too thick and sticky to even leave your mouth!

“Eientei?!” you repeated what you think she answered, and lo and behold, she nodded.
“They have incredible medicine,” Wriggle explains, “like the strong, rare stuff you cant find at any hospital or pharmacy.”
“Yeah, I'm well aware of that place,” you explained to her, “I was staying there for a little while until my sister moved us out.”
“Really?” you sparked her interest, “did you get to meet the purple haired rabbit girl? Ms. Udongein Inaba?” Oh come the fuck on! Fate has a sick sense of humor, doesnt it?

You swallowed hard, “Er… I have… met Reisen. ...A few times.” You dare not go into detail. It's bad enough you called her by her first name!

“Oh cool! I've gotten most of my herbal supplements from her.”
“Herbal supplements?” that mentally ill bunny girl sold this mentally sound bug girl drugs?!
“Mostly stuff to increase my stamina, focus, and keep stress down,” Wriggle explains, “I need all I can get to take proper care of all my bugs. There's a saying 'busy as a bee' for a reason.”

Youre getting a little worried. Understandably so. Messing with hospital drugs (or drugs acquired from shady means) is never a good idea… and god help poor little Wriggle if any of those drugs were tainted by Maeve!

“Hm,” you keep a cool face despite the pent up worrying, “but are you absolutely sure these 'herbal supplements' are safe? I mean I've...” you swallowed hard and chose your words very carefully, “known people that heavily relied on recreational drugs to improve themselves and they ended up destroying themselves and their families.”

“Of course theyre safe,” she assures you, “I've been taking supplements for quite a while and I take them responsibly. I never mess with the really strong stuff unless I'm trying to drug somebody with it. By the way, how's the smoothie?”

Why the hell did she think now was an appropriate time to just up and change the subject?!

Why do you suddenly feel dizzy?

Why do you suddenly feel drowsy?

Since when did Wriggle have a twin?

...Triplets?

“Are you feeling the kick yet?” you heard her voice echo and make out her face beaming, “are you?”
“Wh-wha...wha...” you were slurring a little in your speech while you were trying to keep your balance, “what i...s in thi..s.. stu...ff?”
“I told you. Pollen, honey fr-”
“THE HERBAL SHIT!!” you snapped, “WHAT IS IT?!”
“Oh! Hm...” Wriggle thought, “...what did Reisen call it? Flu… na… tra.. something. Anyways, it should put you to sleep real soon.”
“S-Sleep?!” you fight the urge to fall asleep, but the urge got heavier and heavier, “W-why?!”
“So you wont run away when it's time to mate,” she flat out says it like it was nothing. She just nonchalantly admitted she wanted to commit date rape! “I'm sorry, but I'm getting desperate. All the other males are either taken or are prejudiced bugophobes that quickly zip away at the very sight of a bug! We still have feelings you know!”

You get a bit nervous as you hear the bug buzzing get even louder! Swarms of bugs were gathering around you! By then, you couldnt run from them, cuz you didnt even have the strength to stand up! The world was spinning, and your legs were feeling weak! Geez, why oh why did you agree to go on a date with a BUG GIRL?!

“Dont worry Alex!” Wriggle's voice echoed, “you'll be just fine. In fact, I added a special supplement for male enhancement in the smoothie so when you wake up, you'll be more than ready to sire my larva!” Larva? Eww.
“Iiih…..uuhh….uugghh...” *THUD* You collapse like a sack of rocks on the floor as the bugs crawled all over you. You wish you could at least cover your ears, nose, mouth, and… other holes so they dont crawl in! Instead, you lose consciousness…

…..

“Urrggh….gawwdd...” man oh man is your head pounding! The insanely bright light in your face only amplified the pain! But on the plus side, you were alive! Sadly that was the only plus side. As soon as your blurred vision finally cleaned, you found yourself...

As much as you wanted to explore the lovely mansion until the cows come home (whatever that means), your eyes were feeling a little heavy. It cant be helped, considering the tremendous amount of fun/torture you just been put through over in Eientei. You feel really sorry for Reisen and hope that your ex-boss wont do anything truly bad to her. Despite your worries for her, it was in your best interest to leave that place according to Anna. And Anna knows best.

Ugh, just THINKING about it's making you even more tired. You couldnt take it anymore. You had to take a nap. You had to sleep this off. So you hopped in your bed and pulled the covers over you. Sweet. The bed was a hundred times comfier than the one back in the hospital. And you didnt have to worry about crazy patients sneaking into your bed at night.

...Why did that make you feel unhappy?

Nevermind nevermind! You just clear your head and shut your eyes.

********************

"Miss Mary Mack! Mack! Mack!" Anna was playing her favorite childhood hand game with Flandre, "All dressed in black! Black! Black! With silver buttons! Buttons! Buttons! All down her-"
When suddenly her cellphone rang. Well actually, it sang 'Makes Me Wonder' by Maroon5 but same thing. The hand game came to an abrupt stop as she checked the ID on her cell. An old associate of hers, 'Demitri'.

"I'm sorry, Flannie!" Anna gave the girl a sweet apologetic smile, "I have to take this call. It'll just be a moment."
"Ok, onee-sama!" Flandre nodded. Anna stepped out of the room, looked down the hallway just to make sure she had plenty of privacy and answered the phone.

"Yeah?" she was quick and to the point.
"Bad news for your brother," the light-pitched tone in his accent seemed stressed, "Govno hit the fan."
"What happened?" Anna questioned.
"I'm looking right at bounty contract with brother's name," Demitri answered, "these contracts are mass produced. This is seventh town I've been in that has them."
"S-Seriously?!" Anna had a hard time controlling the volume of her voice, "B-but we've only been gone for like a few days!"
"One of local Fey must have foreseen you coming," Demitri theorized, " seen Fairy militias gathering to search for brother. Few of them wearing special bracelets of Aos Si."
"B-Bracelets of-.. urgghh," Anna groaned as she sweat, "where the hell did they get those in such short time?!"
"Byez ponyatsiya," Demitri didnt have a clue, "perhaps something to do with their local Fairy Queen? Mab, I believe her name."
"...M... Mab?"

***********************

*Sniff!* ......*sniff!*

Suddenly, who knows how much later, you hear very close sniffing. Just like last time! But unlike last time, you felt a bit of weight already on top of you, so getting up was easier said than done! Fearing the absolute worst, you decide to barely crack one eye open before daring to scream off the top of your lungs!

Fortunately and Unfortunately, it wasnt your favorite ill bunny-girl this time. Inches in front of you lied that red-haired girl in the Chinese gi you saw kicking out that blonde girl when you first came to the mansion! You didnt get her name, Arnold's partner Not that it concerned you at the moment. What concerned you was the icy cold glare she was giving you at the moment.
It didnt seem angry, but the look in her bright blue slightly slanted eyes made you incredibly uneasy. You tried very hard not to flinch after feeling her squeeze both your wrists! And considering you've seen a brief example of the unsurpassed strength she's capable of, you were a little too afraid to wake her up and cut whatever she's doing short.

Instead, you lie there pretending to sleep, waiting very patiently to finish sniffing you out. Bad feelings emerged as you felt her humidly warm breath hitting your face hard with each heavy pant she was making!
She whispered something that you assumed was Chinese, but you couldnt understand it.

As if that wasnt nerve-wrecking enough, she started licking your cheek! Hard not to cringe, but you tried your damnest not to as you felt her warm tongue rubbing across your face, licking up the sweat that was dripping on it!
She whispered into your ear more stuff you couldnt understand. Just when you tried to muster a guess what she was telling you, she nibbled gently on your earlobe! It didnt hurt, but you did feel sharp fangs with made you even more uneasy.

"Meiling, what the heck are you doing?"

The red-head leaped up in frightened shock, obviously caught in the act! She jerked her head over the purple-haired eavesdropper.

"P-Patchouli!" Meiling stuttered and began speaking english again, "t-this isnt what it looks like! I was... checking up on our guest!" She gave the same excuse Reisen did!
"By climbing on top of him?"
"He looked like he was shivering in his sleep, so I... well... warmed him up."
"Uh... huh," Patchouli didnt look like she was buying it, "anyways, just what exactly are you doing here? Shouldnt be guarding the gate like youre HIRED to do?"

"I decided to take a short breath," Meiling said as she finally climbed off of you, "besides, I got that Arnold guy filling in for me."
"Need I remind you he's only gonna be here until Ms. Whitestone leaves?" Patchouli says, "so I'm sure Lady Scarlet will appreciate it if you dont take advantage of him."

"Yeah yeah," Meiling sighed.

"Well, since you got so much free time," Patchouli changed the subject, "how about helping me clean up the library? That stupid witch-thief made a huge mess of the place! And rearranged all my books out of order!"

"Absolutely, Patchouli!" Meiling happily agreed, "I'm always happy to help!" She gleefully followed Patchouli off... but not before turning around and giving you another long quiet stare. Even from the other side of the room, her stare still creeped you out!

"MEILING! You coming or not?!"

Meiling jumped again, "Oh! Y-yeah! Sorry!" and ran out of the room!

You got up out of your bed and groaned hard.
"HERE too, huh?" you sighed to yourself. Once again, you may have found yourself an odd admirer. Not that you minded it TOO much, though. You did enjoy the attention that cute bunny girl was giving you. And unlike her, Meiling not a mental patient, otherwise she wouldnt be mentally sound enough to be a gate guard, right? Here's hoping Maeve doesnt find out about her, though.

Anyways, nap time is over.
After stretching a bit. you decide to head out. Where do you wish to go?
