11131212111121211112222222121211.title: remilia scarlet

111312121111212111122222221212111.content:
Just when it was about to be a heartwarming moment with siblings bonding between other siblings, Anna had that look on her face. Youre way too familiar with that look than you should be. This is the look she makes when she's about to step out to talk to... 'friends'. Damnit, just when you thought she'd FINALLY quit with the 'associate' bullcrap which would only get in more trouble.

“*Ahem* Please put me down,” Remilia ordered. You put her down.

"Ms. Lady Scarlet," Anna called to her liege, "there's a pressing matter I need to attend to. I have to speak with an old associate of mind a few hundred yards south of here." Again with the associates. What has she gotten into this time?
"What about?" Remilia rightfully questioned.
"Bad people are putting out contracts for Mr. Alex!" Flan answered for your sister, "Onee-sama needs to talk with her special associates about drawing attention away from him!” Wow. The kid sure knows such big words.

“Dont worry, I’ll leave Arnold here to protect your mansion if anyone comes by,” Anna assures Remilia.

Ms. Lady Scarlet squinted her eyes, “How long will you be gone?”
“She’ll be back by tonight!” Flandre answered for your sister again, “she promises!”
“Heh. What she said,” Anna laughed.
Remilia stared in deep thought for a moment, then looked up at you.
“She hasn’t broken a promise yet,” was your second opinion.

“Very well,” Ms. Scarlet gave her blessing, “but because the safety and security of the Scarlet family is of utmost importance, should you not return by midnight tonight, you will not be welcomed back here.” Aw geez! She’ll banish Anna if she doesn’t return on time?!
“You have my word, my lady,” Anna bowed, “please take good care of my brother while I’m gone. And Al, dont worry, I’m gonna be right back.”
“Ok…” you murmured uncertain.

And as soon as you see Anna walk out, you feel lonely again. You dont trust her associates, but it’s not like you can do much to stop her. At the very least, you had Remilia.

“Would you like me to carry you again, Lady Scarlet?”
“Absolutely not!” Remilia suddenly got all high and mighty with you, “I think I’ve given a mortal commoner far too much privilege earlier! Need I remind you that you and your sister are not here on vacation? You are refugees given refuge in MY mansion and you owe a debt to me in doing so.”
You nodded, in no position to argue, no matter how much you didn’t need to be reminded!
“If youre going to stay here, you need to be useful,” Remilia stated, “there are plenty of chores you can be spending time doing.” She looked over to the dining room and back at you, “You need to EARN your scones!”

Youre pretty certain this had less to do your ‘job’ and more to do with Remilia wanting to spend time with her sister. No point in arguing, though. You just nodded obediently.
“Good. Now if you’ll excuse us, me and my sister have some catching up to do. C‘mon sister, let‘s get some scones.” As you suspected. Flandre grabbed her sister by the arm and shouted, “No, Nee-chan! Let’s play Anna’s favorite game, Five Finger Fillet!”
“WHOA WHOA WAIT! SLOW DOWN, FLANDRE!!” you heard Remilia scream as her sis dragged her off.

Once again, you were all by your lonesome. And considering what Remilia told you, you need to be making yourself useful. You just had to find a job to do. Question is, what job? There was probably a vast amount of choirs and tasks that require your attention, but you didnt even know where to look or what you could even do. You could wash dishes if you knew where the kitchen was. You could clean the bathroom if you knew where the bathroom was. You could help fix up the library if you knew where the library was. You could just vacuum the damn hallway if you knew where a vacuum was! Maybe you should go look for that cute fairy you helped earlier. Surely SHE could use some more help. Pray that she has no relation whatsoever to your former employment.

Man, you were starting to feel lonely just wandering about this humongous mansion. Part of you kinda misses Eientei… especially a certain ill bunny girl! Plus, after the hell you’ve just recently escaped, you could’ve at least gotten some free anti-depressants.

Here, it feels like a rich prison. The hallway seemed vast, endless, and empty. Despite having probably a few hundred servants working in this mansion, you havent gotten to see a single one down your trek! You probably just ended up getting yourself lost just wandering the hallway for too long. You’d call for help, but you really didnt wanna look anymore stupid than you already do.

It wasn’t really that you wanted to do chores as much as you just wanted some companionship. You really need to make some friends and bad. Friends come and go in such short time for you what with big sis always dragging you from one place to another in such short time. And you know she wont be able to watch over you forever. Sooner or later, you’re gonna have to find your own way to deal with things. Your own way to deal with your enemies…

*Pant! Pant! Pant!*

Suddenly, you heard some excessive panting in one of the rooms. Some very desperate panting! Is somebody in pain or the verge of passing out? Maybe theyre lifting something really REALLY heavy and need some help! Maybe they fallen and they cant get up! Finally, somebody to make yourself useful to!
*Pant pant pant pant PANT PANT!!* As you stalled, the desperate breathing got louder and heavier! Youre wasting time, you fool!

Wasting no time (no more than you already wasted), you dash to the direction of the breathing, and rush into the room (thankfully the door was unlocked!)!
The heavy panting was coming straight from the red-haired girl in the green uniform lying on the bed facing away from you! Oh wait! That’s the girl from before! The one that snuck into your room, Meiling!

Regardless of what she did earlier, you were concerned with what was wrong with her. You stepped toward her to ask if she was ok.

“Ohhh… ah… ah….“ But just when you were about to open your mouth, you caught a better glimpse of what she was doing. She had her arm reaching her under her dress, buckling her legs in rhythmic motions, and gasping and moaning on cue.

……………………

…O_O…

Oh. Sweet. Mother. Of. Did you just seriously walk in on the gate guard playing with herself?! Lovely. Just lovely. You havent been this disturbed since the time you walked in on your sister making out with the Genoskwa!
Even worse, you overhear the antsy Meiling muttering the same Chinese you swear you heard her muttering when she was on top of you earlier!

You were incredibly lucky she was noticing you were there, cuz it seemed like the door was miles away! You really really REALLY need to get out of that room before she discovers her peeping tom and beats the crap out of you… unless YOURE the cause of her antsyness, then you’ll probably be wishing she beat the crap out of you!

Instead of making a mad dash to the door and risk getting pounced on before you reach it, you decided to take very slow and quiet steps, treading especially carefully on the only floor in the mansion that’s inconveniently hard wood! You slowly and surely went creepy crawly taking gentler than gentle steps on your tippy toes, hoping to get out as quietly as possible…
111312121111212111122222221212111.title: I walk a lonely road...

11131212111121211112222222121211111.content:
Anna always said you were too damn softhearted and one of these days, your softheartedness would get you killed. But you know what could also get you killed? Not having enough friends or close allies. Good friends can help out in a pinch and considering the enemies you currently have, you need all the friends you can get.
Not to mention... you could really go for some more friends.

You looked away from the bed that's currently soaked with Meiling's fresh Niao Long and turn to Patchoulie.

"No, Patchoulie, dont tell the mistress," you tell her, "I dont want Ms. Hong getting in trouble!"
The purple haired librarian looked at you funny, naturally confused why you would defend somebody that was schlicking off in your bed!

"Er... you dont? After what she just did in your bed?"

Normally no, but if you were gonna save Meiling's career, you had to take drastic measures. It wasnt something you were gonna like (at the moment), but this was probably the best way to do it.

You groaned over to the naked gatekeeper, "...God, Meiling, you seriously couldnt wait for me? I told you I'd be back in a minute!"
"Ehhhh?" judging by the questionable tone in her heavily accented syllable, Meiling was confused by your facade.
Patchoulie on the other hand knew what you meant and was incredibly sickened by it, "Oh. OHH!! OH WHAT?! YOU AND... YOU ARE...? WERE...? Aw no!"

"I'm dreadfully sorry, Patchoulie," you forced yourself to blush nervously to hide your panicked sweat, "the thing is... well, I've been feeling awful lonely and depressed lately and... well, she offered to comfort me and... one thing led to another, and... well I was ABOUT to, but I couldnt find any condoms."

"I wont let you use a condom," Meiling for some godbedanged reason just had to let that slip!

On the plus side which is still on the bad side, Patchoulie believed your lie. And she was mad. At you. She gave you an unamused glare which you rightfully deserve seeing as how special guests of a luxurious noble mansion do not overstay their welcome by sleeping with the employees of the house!
She sucked in air and prepped for her lecture, "Ok. First of all, Mr. Whitestone, if youre feeling lonely and depressed, this is NOT how you alleviate your stress! Secondly, this is not how you properly repay my mistress for her kindness and generosity! This is a noble’s mansion, not a brothel!”
You bowed submissively, “My sincerest apologies, ma’am. This will not happen again.” Like a boss.

“As for YOU,“ Patchoulie turned her attention to Meiling, “god help you if your libido winds up hurting Ms. Whitestone’s little brother. You two better have those sheets cleaned before the Lady picks up that stench. Now if you‘ll excuse me, I‘m in the middle of a good read.”
And with that, she walked out, slamming the door shut. Definitely dont look good in her eyes now, but at least you spared Meiling whatever wrath that was about to be upon her.

“Whew!” you sighed, “that was close one. I didnt really think it was gonna work! Heh-EESHH!!” And as soon as you turned your head to Meiling you were suddenly hammered against a wall by a red-haired typhoon! In a nannosecond you went from ‘Whew’ to ‘Why are my arms pinned to the wall? And why is Meiling staring at me with a cold glare with her cheeks flush red?’

Once again the excessive warmth of the gate guard’s body was too close for comfort, only this time soiled bed sheets were the only thing in the way from being in contact with her burning hot genitalia.
Maybe you really need to start learning from history. Helping the strong ill girl with a scary fascination for you will HURT you! You really began to miss Natsuki. If that was her real name.

"M-Meiling!" you struggled in her grip to no avail, "I-I just saved you!"
"Thanks for saving me," she said unmoved, "now take off your pants. I dont like the feel of humping corduroy."
"What?! No!" you struggled even harder, "let go of me!!"
"But you said you were gonna mate with me," Meiling didnt seem to know a ruse when she hears one!
"That was a ploy to get Patchoulie off your back!"
"Well now she EXPECTS us to be mates," the gate guard got smart with you, "wouldnt it arouse suspicion if we WERENT mating?" Urgh, as expected there was no point in arguing with her! Unlike Reisen, Meiling IS sane and in the right state of mind while she's putting pressure on you! Man, where is Natsuki when you need her?!

Just then, her head edging up real close to yours and sniffing you out reminded you of that bunny girl. What DIDNT remind you of her was the way Meiling's face squinted with disbelief.
"...*Sniff!*... Wait! ...What the..." the gate guard looked puzzled about what she smelled, "...*sniff*... why do I smell moon rabbit on you?!" Oh wow, her sense of smell is keen!

"OH...well..." you blushed, "the thing is... well... before I came here, I was staying at Eientei and this nurse there, Reisen, she got a bit clingly once in a while."

"Rgggh!" Meiling suddenly stepped back with disgust, "Reisen?! That pill-popping loony got to you first?! I’d expect the pyromaniac or that lonely old hag of a doctor, but REISEN?! Erggh... I can only imagine what kinds of undiscovered diseases that filthy thing gave you!" While you dont appreciate her trashing talking an old odd friend (who was responsible for making you end up here) at least it helped keep her away!
Still, Scarlet Mansion's gate guard was beaming upset.

"Cao ni zu zong shi ba DAI!!!" Meiling screamed in Mandarin as she stomped around, "is there no available male left on this damn piece of rock?! Urgh... it seemed like years since I've ever seen any contact with fine males outside of thieves and solicitors trying to pass the gate! I finally get to meet one fine male suitable for fertilizing my eggs and he's probably infected..." Yeesh. It must suck bad being a youkai in heat. Then again, you aint telling her you never did it with Reisen!

"Er... if youre that desperate," you speak up, "why not go with Arnold? You two seem to get along well enough. Plus he's single. Not to mention, he's built like a brick house, you'll get plenty of good strong babies with him." You fail to tell her that he does in fact have Syphilis.
Meiling sneered, “I dont want a big bulky brick house, I already AM a big bulky brickhouse. I want someone much smaller and scrawnier with a cute face that cant break out of my grip to properly balance out my superior genes!”
Aw geez! She was actually thinking THIS far ahead about her offspring?!
“Why did you have to go and bào a diseased rabbit‘s júhuā?!” Meiling was pissed, “your adorably scrawny body was meant for satisfying clean fit healthy women like myself!”

“Well uh…” you blushed awkwardly , “sorry to disappoint you. Heh, curse me and my mad thing for crazy bunnies with crazy bugs!”
Meiling sneered at you again, “Damn shame. Youre a REAL catch. I’m sure all the dangerous wild youkai outside the mansion that don’t care about contracting diseases would agree.” Was that supposed to be a threat? Or a fact?! "Sigh... I better take a shower and wash all this filth off."

As Meiling headed to the bathroom and turned on the shower, you pondered just how dangerous the outside world is. Granted, ANYWHERE in the world is dangerous when Le Fey has a contract out on you, but what other kind of dangers would you face if you consider leaving the safety of this mansion?
And you know what ELSE bugged you? If word got out that you received the package from Reisen! You'd way rather that rumor not spread for obvious guy reasons. Youre awful confident it'd kill whatever chance you had left of getting a girlfriend... let along stomp your attempt at getting to know Natsuki better.

*Click!*

Suddenly, you noticed a faint flash outside your bedroom window. It wasnt an unusual flash, it was a flash you remember way to well. A flash from a polaroid camera! Through the corner of your eye, you could spot the source of the flash. The bush a few yards away.... the bush with black wings and a funny little red hat... and a camera sticking out of it!!

Instinct kicked in. A certain somebody just took a picture of you without your absolute consent. That could only mean one thing. Your cover's been blown!
Could it possibly be an agent hired by Le Fey to track you down?! Even if it isnt, you really REALLY cant afford photos of you falling into the wrong hands! Not to mention, even if it doesnt end up being found by Le Fey, you certainly hope this stranger didnt hear the part about you getting an STD! Your life socially AND literally are at stake!

But just when you considered jumping out the window and going after that snoop, you remember what Meiling said. Stepping outside the mansion could put you at risk if wild youkai are out. For all you know, the snoop could be a youkai itself astounded by it's new little flashy toy!

Think. Think fast. Think hard.
11131212111121211112222222121211111.title: It's fun chasing Bugs!

You opened your mouth about to say something, but then you closed it because you had to give it a second thought. But then you shook your head and continued.

Oh. The second thought returns. Granted, it may have been rude to question how your caretakers handle dealing with personal affairs, but you were kinda caught in the middle of one. "Er.... does this... uh... help treat her.... disorder?" it was a tremendous difficulty for you to ask, but it HAD to be asked!

"I dont know," and sure enough, even Eirin was doubting this method of punishment, "it's certainly not how I would prevent any more of Reisen's potential outbursts." Ok, now that she expressed her criticism of this method...
"Then why are you putting her through a buddhist chant?" you felt obligated to ask.

Eirin looks over her shoulder as if to check if anyone was watching, but the coast was clear for her.
"To tell you the truth, it's the princess's idea," she points the finger at Kaguya, "ever since she's listened to a sermon from the monk of Myouren Temple, she actually got the idea in her head that we should start using faith-based alternatives to treat some of our more suffering patients' mental disorders! Yes, she actually wants us to start pushing Buddhist prayers on our patients instead of actual drugs!” Yikes. That sounds pretty reckless.

“Well… uh… I guess she's really committed to her conversion,” was all you had the will to say without saying something that might rub some people the wrong way (no matter how much they deserve it!)
“She didnt even convert!” the doc snapped, “she doesnt even know the first thing about Buddhism outside of whatever that rainbow-haired snake-oil saleswoman told her! Now she expects ME of all people to take time off tomorrow to schedule a pilgrimage to the Great Mausoleum!” Oh boy.

“Well… I'm sure it'll be good to take some time off,” you say, trying to get her to look on the bright side, “maybe you'll enjoy a little sight-seeing.” She quickly gives you a cold glare. “...Sorry. Yeah, I dont think I can be asked to change my religion either. And believe me, a few of my sister's associates tried to!”

Eirin sighs, “To tell you the truth, I never was much of a fan for organized religions. Never had time for them, mostly focused on my medicinal studies. And ever since I began my career, the worst patients I've ever had to deal with were uptight religious zealots. Far too many of them were too stubborn to take their properly prescribed medicine and preferred to rely on their own special methods of healing themselves from 'spritual' healing to much dangerous methods like consuming actual BLEACH! The horror stories I can tell you could fill a novel… Hmm. I think I mightve written one at least ONCE in my life, but I cant remember very well.”

“I cant say I blame you,” you tell her, “I had my fair share of zealots too. Still, I did manage to find common ground with some and made good friends with them.” You also wanted to add that they made great drinking buddies, but you felt it was inappropriate.
“Yeah, I guess...” Eirin grumbled, “still, even if, and that's a huge IF, I was interested in that creepy child snatching Hijiri's escapades, all it would do is make me a target for the TAOIST nutzos that her goons are quarreling against! The last thing we need is to bring their religious feud HERE!”
Oh boy. That is way too much information that you wanted to register this morning! Youre still lingering on the words “Creepy… child snatching?”

“Er, I think I said too much,” Eirin finally groans with exhaustion, “but you'll have to excuse me for having doubts about yet another one of her majesty's unusual phases. And please dont tell her we talked about this!”
“Dont worry, I wont,” you promised. Youre sure things are about to get way more uncomfortable, it still beats Le Fey. Though that might not be saying much.

“I um, better return to my desk,” the doctor states, feeling she needs to stop talking about it, “please bear with the lady's little phase. It'll be over soon.”
“I will, I will,” you assure her. And with that, she gets up and heads to the door, but not before stopping then adding, “If Reisen tries anything with you, let me know… just try to keep it on the down low. I'd rather the princess not get involved and solves the problem her own way again!”
“Ok sure thing. Later.”

Time passes. Not much time, mind you, because you've gotten bored really fast. Yet you did not feel like leaving your room after the whole incident. You were not in the mood to deal with any gossipers or nosey nancies. You didnt feel like listening to any sermons or lectures by any of Kaguya's new friends either. Youre not interested in saving your soul until you can properly save your life!

Well, youre still feeling a little exhausted since you havent gotten enough sleep thanks to that particular bunny-earred intruder. Combine that with the fact that you were in no mood for uncomfortable introductions or deep religious lectures, and taking a brief nap wins hands down!

Unfortunately, your brief nap is even more brief than you hoped it to be, what with the sound of someone's heavy breathing just over your head! Peeking with one eye barely open and it thankfully it wasnt Reisen this time!

Instead, the first thing you spot peering over you is...
1113121212.title: You Gonna Get Enlightened!

11131212122.content:
...is a mouse eared girl with grey skirt on. You leapt up as you noticed a mouse crawling on your forehead and the girl just made an ‘tch’ noise and came forward with a two wands and it widens before you.

“I knew it. You have something that I need, hand it over.” Girl said.

“Ok, first off, who the heck are you? And second, I don’t have anything!” You said.

“Liar! My dowsing sticks never makes mistakes!! Now hand it over or else...”

Oh, oh...you don’t like the way the girl is looking at you, and you started to run. She summoned more mouses and ordered to get you. You were horrified to see the rodents running towards you as the girl was flying toward you, you noticed someone shot an arrow that barely missed you and hit the mouse girls shoulders. It was Eirin! And you were glad to see her and she came to you.

“Did Nazrin hurt you? Did she bother you in any shape or form?” Eirin asked.

“She said something about me having something special.” You replied.

Eirin didn’t know who or what you meant then suddenly you saw your sis coming in with some treasure on her hand.

“Hey, look what I found, a treasure.” Anna said.

“That’s...”Eirin gulped.

“That’s ours dang it!!!” Nazrin shouted.

Does Anna gives the treasure back?
11131212122.title: Treasure hunter

choices: Wake up wake up WAKE UP!!!!!!
111312122.content:
Maybe it was sheer curiosity. Maybe it was the inevitable fear of dying alone. Maybe it was simply that youre a plain ol' perv. But instead of waking up and confronting Reisen about her odd behavior, you just remained motionless... with an eye barely open to see what this odd bunny girl is up to.

As you feigned being asleep, you could hear Reisen's sniffing become faster as she continued sniffing you up and down. You noticed an odd twinkle in her big red eyes, as if she's not acting like herself. Or maybe she's acting like her TRUE self and that calm nurse-y etiquette side of her from earlier was just a facade from the drugs she was taking.

She must feel incredibly hot right now. You noticed sweat dripping from her forehead and her bunny ears seem fidgetier which matched her heavier breathing. It was so hot, she unbuttoned the collar of her shirt and constantly adjusted it a bit to compensate.
What in the, is she drooling?!

You had a bad feeling about this. Nonetheless, you still remained emotionless and pretending to sleep.

"!!" you almost ALMOST flinched when she started licking your chest! For a split second, your eyes were wide opened, but they immediately snapped shut before she could notice (provided she CARED if you were up at this point!). Her wet salivating tongue was incredibly ticklish and she licked you up like an excited dog!

"Delicious," you heard her whisper in the middle of her licks. You couldnt resist breathing heavier as her tongue worked her way up your body. Your nails inadvertenly dug into the bed by the time she licked your neck and then your cheek.
"Delicious," she whispered again. You had the world's best sleeping poker face despite the fact her hands felt so good rubbing your chest like that. As much as you really REALLY hated to admit it, her tickling your nipples felt pretty good too!

"Oh, Mr. Whitestone.." Reisen whispered, "you have a lot of nerve tempting this poor little moon rabbit. Tricking this innocent young woman into doing naughty things. Have you no shame?” The hell?! It’s YOUR fault she cant control herself?! “You wont be forgiven, you crafty devil. When you tempt a high-leveled moon rabbit like me, you better hope that you can back up what you flaunt!” Back up WHAT?! What are you flaunting?!

Despite being a LITTLE worried, you kept pretending to sleep, curious to see how far this rabbit hole goes!

“?!!” your eyes opened and widened for a split second when Reisen locked lips with yours! Man the willpower you had not to cringe in ecstasy from her tongue tickling yours! Right then and there, she had just stolen your first kiss (well, technically it‘s your second, but you refuse to consider the one Maeve gave you as your real first kiss!). Unlike the other one, you actually felt loving passion from it instead of cruel cold dominance. Sure it was really more LUST than LOVE, but for the moment, you had all but forgotten the horror that was Le Fey and just filled your mind with bliss from this odd sick bunny girl’s kiss.

Sadly, it didnt last long enough for you. You really missed her lips by the time they parted from yours.

“Aw… Princess Charming’s kiss couldnt wake Sleeping Beauty from his spell,” she whispered smiling down at you. She had gotten so bold, she climbed up in your bed and straddled you, despite your injuries! You’d think she’d have been caught by one of the other nurses by now! You really REALLY shouldve woken up and ended this charade, but nope. You still faked it, putting yourself in even more harm’s way.

Wow, she’s warm. Nearly burning hot, even. Does she have a fever or something?

“Oh my,” Reisen panted and sweated, “I think I’m burning up. It’s… way too hot… I cant… handle it!” She was so hot, she quickly unbuttoned her blue suit and white shirt underneath it. Even in your ‘sleep’ state, it was tough keeping a straight face seeing Reisen’s exquisite chest clad in a blue and white striped bikini top! You werent sure why she was wearing something like that to begin with nor did you give a fuck. There was no way to hide your blushing in your sleep!

Then being on a streak, she took your hands and placed them on her chest, allowing you the honor of copping a feel of her incredibly warm boobs! Geez, they were like over 100 degrees! She could burn somebody with those babies! You fought back the urge to caress them and give them a firm squeeze, then maybe bury your head between them and motorboat those puppies!!
“Aahhh… so cool…” Reisen sighed from the feel of your stone-cold hands! She looked all directions one more time, JUST to be safe… then placed one of your hands down her skirt, fidgetting even more than ever!

“Aaahh!! A-A-Alex, sir!” she had a hard time keeping control of her volume, “y-y-your hands… they’re so cold, b-b-but… so good…” Holy crap, she is WAY too into it! Why are you still letting her do this?!

Because you were getting into it yourself. Part of you wanted to lose your virginity to her. You would not have the luxury of finding true love when Le Fey catches you. The least you could do is experience this kind of pleasure before you die a horribly slow agonizing death.

Then again, youre simply thinking with your crotch instead of your friggin brain! You know better than to do this! Reisen’s employer/master and crew literally saved your life and THIS is how you repay them?!
You know what you need to do. You need to wake up and stop this mentally ill bunny girl before she does something she’ll regret!

…Then again, since Le Fey’s gonna find you anyway (they always do), what’s the point?
111312122.title: Nice Dreams

choices: Tell her you'll be too busy.
1113121221.content:
'What's the point?!' What the hell kind of emo nihilistic thinking is that?! Your sister busted her ass and risked her life to ensure your safety against the Fey! You owe her not to give up.
Speaking of, if you let Reisen take advantage of you, you know what Anna's gonna do to her. 'Overprotective' doesnt even begin to describe the relationship with your sister! You'd rather avoid a potential bloodbath in Eientei after they were generous enough to treat your wounds.

You pondered just snapping awake and go all 'WHAT THE HELL ARE YOU DOING?!' on her, but you know better than to shake up an ill girl on questionable meds... even if said ill girl is in heat. So you play dumb. As dumb as dumb can be. No, not 'A DUR!!1 LUK AT ME! IZ A FAIRREEE!' dumb, more like 'Gee, Ms. Rennels. How is dressing up in this super tight speedo in your private office at 2am going to get me to ace my final exam?' dumb. Here goes!

You pleasantly woke up like you were having the most wonderful dream and the first thing that catches your eye was that cute purple-haired bunny girl from earlier!

Reisen's eyes widened and her pervy smirk immediately dropped.
"Hi Ms. Udongein Inaba!"

*Gasp!!* With a loud gasp, she literally tumbled right off your bed like a cheesy slapstick comedy segment! Geez, even THAT was a bit too much for her?!
“Oh geez! Are you ok?” you offered to help her up, but she backed away, perhaps too embarrassed over what she was doing!

“A-A-Alex-er, M-Mr. Whitestone!” Reisen’s face went red as she pushed her skirt down and rebuttoned her top, “I… see youre… awake. A-And in good condition!”
“Um, were you just on top of me a moment ago?” you asked a naive ‘No shit, Sherlock’ question.

“Uuuhhhhh…” Reisen rolled her eyes back and forth as if obviously brewing a good convincing excuse, “Y-yes. You see, I notice you were shivering really bad in your sleep a-a-and you were ice cold. A-And since the heater’s broke… and we’re out of electric blankets, I… I had to um… improvise.. with my body!” Any sane person with the IQ above a peanut that heard that would be facepalming. However, you are an actor!

"Gee, was I really shivering that bad?" you kept your naive facade going, "I dont feel like I was that cold."

"Oh, you were!" Reisen kept lying, "you were paler than my old friend, Miyako, and she's a hopping corpse!" Ew. That's pretty revolting to think about.

"Geez, I must be coming down with something bad," you state, "maybe I should tell the doctor about this-"

"NO!" the bunny girl blurted out, "Um, I mean there's no need. Fortunately, you were warmed back to normal temperature thanks to the invigorating heat emanating from my lustrous bosom and well-renown thighs of steel." Heh! A bit egotistical, aint she? You sure as heck wanted to play along some more!

"Wow, just your lustrous bosom and well-renown thighs of steel were enough to get rid of my cold?"
Reisen nodded, "Yep. Heck, my luxrious baby-blue and pure-white striped bra and panties I typically wear have to be custom-made to trap in excessive warmth... otherwise, I could have risked giving you heatstroke." Oh mercy. She was making it tough not to crack up!

“Wow,” you feigned acknowledgment for her, “you did that for me? Resorting to using your own body to keep me warm while I sleep? That‘s incredibly selfless of you.”

“It is?” she tilted her head before twitching her bunny ears, “I-I MEAN, yes it is! There was no way I could just let you catching your death of cold like that. A-a nurse always keeps her patient’s wellbeing top priority!” Ugh.

“Oh, Nurse Udongein Inaba,” you cupped your hands together as if verbally saying ‘MY HERO’, “how can I ever thank you?” The distant stare in those glowing red eyes was really creeping you out! You kinda shivered a bit, making you wanna rethink ‘thanking her’ in her preferred way.
Her hands were twitching anxiously, craving to be ‘thanked’ properly! You were hoping you were just seeing things and only imagined seeing drool drip down her lips! Where in the hell is the emergency call button when you need it?!

Suddenly, Reisen slapped herself! Part of her still harbored restraint that giving herself one good hard slap in the face snaps her out of it! Knocking herself back to sanity she turned away and shook her head, probably having a mental discussion with herself.
After that, she pulled her little bottle of pills out of her pocket and popped a pill in her mouth.

She sighed in relief and cleared her throat, “*Ahem!* Well, um, if you’d like to thank me, I could really use a hand tomorrow. It’s my turn to volunteer looking after the little girls at Eientei’s daycare center and if youre feeling healthy enough, I’d really appreciate your help.” You’d question how SHE of all people is mentally sound enough to look after children, but now wasnt the time or place. She asked you if youre willing to help her out with taking care of some kids at the hospital’s daycare center.

“Uh, that is… if it’s alright with you,” Reisen heavily emphasized, “you know, y-you dont have to if you dont want to…” it was hard not to feel warm and fuzzy inside when she gave you such pleading eyes, “…but this lonely, heartfelt, incredibly gorgeous with a dynamite body nurse would love it if a nice strapping young man offers to help her out.”
1113121221.title: Playing Dumb

11131212211.content:
You thought for moment about the offer. Your shoulder don't feel that much pain anymore and you were feeling good enough to do some activity.

"Sure, I'll help out." You agreed.

You saw reisen smile big and hugged you. You could feel her soft skin and you could slightly see her cleavage, but you resisted the urge.

"Thank you mr.whitestone!" Reisen said.

She got off from you and bid farewell for tonight and left th scene. You sighed and laid down and went back to sleep. Next morning arrived and after breakfast, you, anna an eirin were outside the house.

"I thank you letting my little brother stay in your area." Anna said. "I will swear I'll pay back after tje mess clears up."

"Don't worry, ms.whotestone. Everythint is undercovered." Eirin said.

Anna smiled and turned to you. She gave you a great hug, feeling her chest against your body. Yoi could tell her body structure were just like your mother.

"I'll call you when I get chance." Anna said.

"Thanks anna." You replied.

She then got off and bid farewell. After she left, you and eirin went back in and saw reisen standing at the entrance. Reisen told her about you helping her out during breakfast and reisen blushed when she looked at you.

"Ok mr.whitestone, Good luck with assistance today." Eirin said.

"Yes ma'ma." You replied.

As eirin left, tewi came as she was assigned to take parents to eientei to drop off their kids to the daycare. You didnt know how many kids she took care, and it revealed to be...
11131212211.title: Agree to help out.

choices: Cut the story short! Time to leave!
111312122112.content:
Holy crap. 20 parents. Each one has at least 2-3 kids, at the most 7-8. This wasnt a daycare, it was a university class! It was kinda nerve-wrecking for you to handle, but you agreed to volunteer and help Reisen and youre a man of your word.
The kids consist of different kinds of youkai if that's what you wanna call them. Cat youkai, dog youkai, bird youkai, snake youkai, rabbit youkai, the works... You felt like the odd one out. You didnt just feel lonely, you also felt a little scared. It was a natural animal instinct, but maybe you really didnt have anything to worry about. It's probably a silly stereotype and old wives’ tale to think that youkai eat humans.

"Er, you should probably wear these before anybody see you," Reisen whispered, handing you a pair of elven ears.
You raised an eyebrow, "Uh... why?"
"Some youkai have the tendency to eat humans." You crammed the elf ears on immediately! Political correctness, be damned! But you didnt like wearing them, mainly for the reason that it reminded you of all those OTHER pointy-earred associates you used to work with.
"They look cute on you!" Reisen commented, “oh, hang on. This’ll make you look more official!” She sprinkled glitter on your cheeks and even a little in your hair! “NOW you look like a true bona fide sparkly elf!” You cringed at the glittery reflection in the mirror.
“Aw man, I look ridiculous!” you muttered.
“C‘mon, just bear with it for a while,” Reisen assured you, “do a good job and later tonight I might just reacquaint you with my lustrous bosom and well-renown thighs of steel!” She unbuttoned her shirt enough to give you a glimpse of her blue and white striped bra again! Bye bye any and all complaints!

On the plus side, there were a lot of bunny nurses assisting in the daycare with you and Ms. Stripes. You didn’t really have to interact with much of the kids other than pick up their leftover toys, prepare sandwiches, or answer their many questions like children often do (such as ‘Who are you?’ ‘Are you the Moon Rabbits’ stud?’ ‘What’s a stud?’
You were ordered by the other nurses not to answer any questions and let them answer for you… except for Tewi who got a thump on the head when she answered you were Eientei’s special love slave. You left it all up Ms. Udongein Inaba to lead the pack while you remained a silent unimportant helper.

That is until story time. With puppets. The kids gathered around as you personally helped Reisen tell the story of western warrior from the great Scottish lands, Sir Zane of Rosewood and his struggle to free the moon people from the clutches of the Kagutsuchi and his nefarious scheme to seize the moon itself and create a worldwide empire of Eternal Daytime.

“Wow… the stars are so beautiful,” Reisen voiced Kaguya-Hime, her pink-haired bunny-girl queen of the moon people in a black kimono, “I thought we’d never get the luxury to see another starlit night ever again.”
“It is a gorgeous sight, Lady Kaguya-Hime,” you voiced Zane, the red haired human in the white hood with a little sword sewed to his hand, “I think I can actually see earth from here!”
“How could the Kagutsuchi hate night so much that he’d want to take all of this away from us?” asked ‘Kaguya-Hime‘, “we of the Moon Kingdom cannot thank you enough for putting a stop to such a demon!”

“I was just doing my job, Lady Kaguya-Hime,” ‘Zane’ answered as he ‘walked off‘, “now it’s time for me to return home. It was a great pleasure to meet you, your majes-”
“WAIT!” suddenly Reisen grabbed your arm, preventing Zane from walking off and Kaguya-Hime zipped right in front of him, “I-I cant simply let you leave without thanking you properly! W-why don’t you stay here a little longer? …P-preferably, a lot longer.”
“Er, I’m sorry, your majesty,” geez, Reisen’s gripping your arm a little tight, “but I still have more quests to complete back on earth.”
“B-but you… havent COMPLETELY completed this quest!” Reisen seemed to be going off the script, “y-you still havent found out the Kagutsuchi’s TRUE motive!”
“Uh, yes I did-”
“No, you clearly didn’t!” Reisen squeezed your arm tighter, “the TRUE motive… involving the Queen herself!” The kids gasped at the expected plot-twist while you gasped at how close Reisen suddenly scooted up to you!

“W…what are you talking about?” that was more YOUR question than it was Zane’s.
“Th…the truth is…” Reisen began to sweat a little… and youre confident it wasn’t out of nervousness, “I created the Kagutsuchi!” The kids gasped again.
“You what?!” you pretended to gasp while you squinted your eyes.
“Yes, it was I,” Reisen wrapped her arm around yours looking Kaguya-Hime circled around Zane “My Kingdom is slowly crumbling due to my sheer loneliness and lack of a suitable suitor fit to rule beside me and pass along my bloodline! So I created the dreaded Kagutsuchi in hopes that I would attract a great hero brave and strong enough to slay it… and earn his place as my King!” Way way WAY off the script. Makes for a hell of a movie, but way off the script!

“Reisen, that’s not how the story goes-”
“IT WAS MY GREAT IMPOSSIBLE TASK FOR THOSE WHO SEEK MY HAND IN MARRIAGE!” Reisen shouted, ignoring your correction, “Sir Zane, I knew there was something special about you since I first laid eyes on you. And these eyes have yet to lie. I know of none best suited for the reward besides you!”
“L-Lady Kaguya-Hime I, Reisen what are you-” now she wrapped her legs around one of yours! You failed to notice just how bright her red eyes were glowing! This was getting awful uncomfortable to deal with. Sure you knew something was off about her from the get-go, but maybe letting her get away with it isnt a very good idea. And worst of all, she’s doing in front of the children!! Still, for the sake of the children, you had to keep cool. You wouldnt wanna freak out any of these little ankle-biters.
Than again, it's a little hard when Reisen's freaking YOU out!

“Please do not deny me after all we’ve been through,” Reisen’s Kaguya-Hime puppet was hugging your Zane puppet… so hard that your hand was getting a cramp, “…don’t you know that rabbits die from loneliness?”
111312122112.title: Wont somebody please think of the children?!

choices: Hellz yeah! Tear open that condom!
1113121221121.content:
Despite Reisen being dangerously close in far more ways than one, you kept your will (and poker face) strong. Your top priority is the sake of the children youre looking after. And unless youre gonna end up teaching them sex-ed (which if you had to bet money... *ahem*), you needed to not only resist temptation, but also keep your wits about you!

You took a hard breath and with your second wind, you yanked your Zane puppet away from Reisen's Kaguya-Hime puppet!

"So the rumors WERE true, then?!" 'Zane' snapped in an angry suspicious tone.
"R...Rumors?" Reisen tilted her head, obviously THIS wasnt in the script either.
"You truly are no kind and loving goddess!!" Zane pointed, "youre a manipulative witch who manipulates mortals for her own amusement!"

"W...what are you..."

"All those innocent lives lost... sacrificed... all because of your own selfish desire to find a partner?!" you continued, "Have you no shame?!"
"Yeah! You tell her!" one of the kids remarked.
Reisen's eyes twitch, but continued her roleplay, "W-Wait, Sir Zane! I can explain!"
"This was all a game to you, isnt it?!" Sir Zane backed away from the manipulative goddess, "I expected better from a graceful deity worthy of worship. How could I possibly love someone who toys with morals' lives like that?!"
"S...Sir Zane..."
"I've had enough to this game. Find someone else to toy with. I'm leaving!" And with that, you turned the Zane puppet around. Your bunny girl friend glanced over at you, then as fast as a bullet coming out of gun, she ensnared your hand/Zane Puppet in a little cage!

"REIS-ER, KAGUYA-HIME, what are you doing?!"
"Alright, Sir Zane..." Reisen's cold sounded both calm AND threatening, "if I cannot have you, then no one shall!"
"H-HEY! L-LET GO OF ME!!" that was you talking, not Zane!
"Perhaps a little time in the palace dungeon should teach you some respect," Kaguya-Hime ordered, "then we'll either prepare for the wedding... or the execution!"
"E-E-Execution?!" You got incredibly nervous having a hard time figuring out if it's just part of the puppet show or is Reisen really going yandere on you?! And you cant brush away the thought of the latter. Considering she's a veteran, who knows what kinds of uh... 'interrogation' methods she may have learned to back up her threats?!

"...To be continued!" Reisen suddenly turns her head to the young audience and announces sweetly right before letting go of your hand! It was like her eerie threatening mood was never there! Guess she's just a very talented actor?
Anyways, the kids 'awww'ed in disappointment and not much later, it was time for the kids' recess. You were so relieved to have avoided a very awkward incident in front of the kids youre supposed to be watching.

And judging by the way your purple-haired bunny friend sighed in relief, so was she.

"That was a close one," Reisen sighed, "thank you for helping out, Alex-sama. I uh... didnt make you feel TOO uncomfortable, did I?"
You did, but you shook your head. "No, it was kinda fun! I'll think I get really used to this job!" You probably wont.

"Yeah..." she shrugged a little and turned away. Hm, her cheeks were red. She was still shivering and panting like she was during the puppet show. Oh bother.

"Are you alright?" you asked.

"W....well...." Reisen's eyes loomed on all directions as she tried to keep a straight face, "I'm... just going through a little withdrawal from one of the meds master is making me take. I'm sure it'll clear up soon."
"What kind of withdrawal?" you had to ask despite possibly knowing the answer.
"Err..... um... to m-make the long story short... my urge to bear baby bunnies just quadrupled!" Oh geez! You didnt expect her to lay it on so thick!

And neither did her apparently, judging by the way she quickly turned away, red with embarrassment, but ears and body twitching with anticipation for something!
"Well..." you blushed yourself, "if you need to, you can go to the restroom and uh... er... rub that one off," you felt pretty embarassed using THAT choice of words, mainly cuz you didnt know the female equivalent for it, "Ahem! I wont tell anybody! I promise!"

"A...actually," Reisen slowly turned back to you, cheeks still flushed, shiny red eyes avoiding contact with yours, "...I... personally think it might be more effective *gulp* quelling that urge... if I had a nice strapping male helping with that." OK, THERE IT GOES!
"R-Reisen-"
"W-wait! Please hear me out!" Reisen pleaded, "I'm not really asking much. All you'd really need to do is... *gulp* just use your hand and... *sniff* you know, play with it a little... just until I say stop! It wont take long! I promise!"

"You want me to jerk you off?" you flat out ask, again unaware of the female equivalent of the term, "is that what youre asking?"
She groaned, "If that's what you wanna call it, fine, whatever! Look, I promise it'll be quick and I'll clean up the mess if there is one! And I'll definitely pay you back later!" You SO believe that! And in all honesty, it's incredibly tempting! Still...

"I er.... I dont know," you start blushing as well as thoughts of her 'paying you back' flash in your head!

"It's not that big a deal!" she states, "all I'm asking is to just use your fingers! That's all!" Then she turns away again and once more her cheeks went red, "O...of course... if you'd rather... feel like putting something else in there and... quell an urge of your own...." She shivered even more as she played with her tie, "I wont object...." she then reaches into her blazer and pulls out a square shaped wrapped, "however I'll have to ask that you put this on first. I cant afford to go on maternal leave just yet." UGGGHH!! OF COURSE, SHE'S GIVING YOU THAT OPPORTUNITY!

An opportunity youre having a hard time saying no to! Hell, despite her embarrassed demeanor, you can almost hear the loud voice in her head screaming 'Please take the condom! Please take the condom! PLEASE TAKE THE CONDOM!!'

Still, this would cause quite a scene (and a possible MURDER scene) if you get caught! You needed to be on your best behavior while youre being a guest at Eientei. Still, a hawt bunny girl was giving you such a tremendous opportunity, who are you to turn it down and possibly jeopardize the chances of getting another... or being given a particular opportunity you might NOT enjoy?

What's your choice?
1113121221121.title: Hey... we ALL gotta do it!

choices: She fainted, passed out from horror.
1113121221122.content:
"W-well! let's live forever then!! And both zane and kaguya-hime lived happily ever after, the end!" you spoke.

You then got out of the room with blush on your face. You couldn't believe what reisen was saying and acting towards you...infront of the children! You never had that closeness since the day when maebe tried to hit on you for some reason. You then got to your sense and realized you were outside, in the bamboo forest. You wondered if you went too far from the mansion then you heard an clicking noise. You turned around and saw a well suited guy with pointy ears on him. You immediately realized he was one of the Maeve's men.

"You!" You spoke.

"I knew I sensed your presence, twirp." Man said, "now I can kill you so my reputation will be better!"

You knew he was about to kill you. You tried to turn to run away but he immediately shot the ground, making you inescapable with him. You thought of the way to escape but you had nothing on your head. You then noticed a shadow moved in the bamboo forest, not knowing what it was, then you heard the man shouting 'hey!' at you. Your arms were in the air, but you do have feeling that he would not leave without killing you.

"What are you going to do after you kill me?" You asked.

"Simple: Find your slut sister and kill her as well." Man replied, "Now die!"

Before he could pull the trigger, someone came behind and slit his back with razor blade. It was anna, and when the man turned around she swiped him many time with the razor on his body and finally cutting his throat. Just then, reisen came to the scene and saw what just happened. She screamed loud as she was shivering at what she was seeing: You're sister, holding a blood stained razor and a dead man drowning in puddle of blood.

Before you could explain to her...

You nodded and went inside. In her dream, reisen slowly opened her eyes and noticed she was standing infront of jail bar. She didnt know what was going on until she heared screaming noise. She looked and saw many people killing each other.

She then saw a female with jason mask killing a man with hammer and they both saw someone coming in and massacred almost everyone except reisen and the masked women. The person had monks robe and hiding itselfs face. Reisen wondered who this person were until it came to the women.
