11131212211222.title: She fainted, passed out from horror.

choices: Insist youre fine in the chair.
111312122112222.content:
A random question. A question you were not prepared for. It wasnt something you couldnt answer though. But it was something that took you by surprise.

"W...why do you ask?" you restraighten yourself in your chair.

"I'm... just curious that's all," Reisen answered, "if you dont wanna talk about it, that's fine."

"No, it's fine, it's fine," you recline in your chair a little until it's finally comfortable enough for your spine and tell her, "well, my mom died when I was a baby, so I dont really know much about her."
"I'm sorry."
"No it's alright," you continue, "I mean, I've seen her in a few family photos and my dad took the time to film her coming back from the hospital after giving birth to me." You exhaled, "I remember seeing her escorted back home in one of my former boss's limos. My dad was a senator back in D.C. back where I lived. Le Fey had major connections and easily funded him a winning campaign which was how he was elected." You leaned with your back away from your chair and continued, “He was a very respected man who did quite a lot of good things for our home state, ya know, cut needless spending, strengthen law enforcement, shrunk the unemployment rate, he even pushed a few ideas included in passed laws submitted by President Trump himself.” Yep. It's THAT future! “Unfortunately, one of his political opponents exposed him and his ties with the Le Fey cartel as well as a few nasty deals he had done for them and as a result, President Trump fired him.”

“Yikes,” said Reisen, “how the mighty have fallen.”

“After that whole episode, he attempted to cut ties with Le Fey and try to get himself a fresh start,” you looked down to the floor, “...I dont really know what happened to him after he submitted his resignation.”

“Oh geez...” she cringed, “you dont think he's-”

“I hope to God that they killed him!” you boldly admit, “I dont even wanna imagine the things theyre doing to him if they didnt!” This conversation was at your very limit. You didnt want to talk any more about your dad. Any further and you'd have to talk about some of the kinds of horrible things Le Fey does to traitors they dont want dead. The word 'snowman' has been stripped from your vocabulary because of it!

“I dont have any brothers or sisters,” you explain to her, “I'm an only child.”
“But Anna, isnt she your-”
You sucked in air. Part of you tells yourself you shouldnt give away this information to just ANYBODY, but here you go. “She's not my biological sister. She's actually a changeling hired by my boss to fill the role of my big sister and look after me since I was a baby.”

Reisen's eyes squinted. You couldnt blame her for being a bit stupified upon hearing that oddity.

“A...changeling? Her?”
“Yeah, you didnt notice her ears?”
“She always had them under her hair,” Reisen said.
“Well yeah, she's a pure-blooded fairy,” you explained, “but I dont care. I still think of her as my sister and nothing less. She's been with me since I was very little. We grew up together. LITERALLY. She was a kid when Ms. Le Fey put her to work with my dad as his daughter! She is seriously a born killer! Around the age I was learning how to spell my name, she had already learned how to properly juggle a Kalashnikov!”

“Yeah. I could tell your sis is really something,” the ill bunny girl admitted, “I'm g-glad you got a r-really great sister l… looking after you… er, even if she isnt related by blood.” She gives you a light smile, however she looked a little hesitant while she was saying that. Guess she must be a bit shaken up from earlier.
Come to think of it, it probably isnt a good idea to talk any more about your sis tonight. The poor mentally ill bunny girl probably got herself more mentally scarred after seeing what she did to that red cap. If she had known that jerk got the EASY way out...

“We can talk some more about her tomorrow,” you tell her, “it's getting pretty late.”
“Really?” Reisen looked around, probably for a clock or watch, “h-how long was I out?”
“A couple hours,” you said, “we had to send all the kids back cuz we were too busy cleaning up the blood. I'm sorry I ruined the whole day care thing. That red cap only came here because he was after me.”
“Well… I'm glad the children are safe,” at least she looks on the bright side.

You swallowed, “Eirin told me to keep an eye on you while she's writing up apology letters to the parents.”
“W-well, I'm feeling better. You can head back to your room now.”
“This is my room.”
“O...oh. I'll be going then-”
“No it's alright, you can sleep there,” you stop her just before she got up, “you deserved it after how I made such a mess of today.”

Despite how much you owed her, it showed she still cared for your well being too when she asked “Then where are you gonna sleep? Certainly not the floor, it gets too cold at night.”
“Eh, the chair's fine,” you assure her.
“That's bad for your back,” Reisen still cared.
But you assure her again, “Dont worry, I think I made a comfort groove in it so it shouldnt be too bad.”

“No no! I dont want you to do that!” Reisen, being so caring as she was, made you an offer that part of you totally didnt want to refuse, “come on. Get in.” She lifted the covers for you. And then quickly remembering last night, you turn away with your face red.

“N-N-N-No! T-t-t-that's fine!” you waved your hand and hid your blush, “I'm… well… I'm good.”

You could feel her glowing red eyes burn a hole through your facade!
“C'mon, Alex-sama… it's nice and cozy in here. And there's just enough room for another bedmate.”
Thoughts of last night quickly filled your head. Thoughts of what could have happened last night if you didnt stop her flood in there too!

“S-S-seriously,” you almost lose the pitch of your voice, “y-you dont need to worry about me!”

“It's sooooo warm in here too,” she sighed, “then again, it could just be because of this luxurious striped ensemble under my clothes.”
Drip. Drip. That was the blood from your nose staining the floor! Nothing's gonna get that out.

Anyways, Reisen isnt exactly wrong. The bed would be an infinitely better place to sleep than your ratty chair. Not to mention it is still YOUR bed, although you wouldnt dream of kicking your new friend out of it after the crap you just put her through thanks to your bad past.
However, part of you is still thinking with your libido and you dont wanna end up doing things you'll regret. Youre still a guest in Eientei and the last thing you wanna do is overstay your welcome by knocking up a respected inhabitant. Not to mention Anna gets pretty jealous. And when she gets pretty jealous, she gets pretty violent.

But it's getting pretty cold and the current thing youre gonna be sleeping in is no good for your back. Pride before comfort?
111312122112222.title: Family Matters (minus the Urkel)

1113121221122221.content:
You clearly knew that the chair was not good enough to be sleeping. You gave in and went to the bed and got under the cover. Just like reisen said, it was warm and comfy, yet your heart beat little faster as the mentally ill bunny girl was laying next to you. You told reisen good night and she did the same and both of you closed your eyes and went to sleep. Hours went by and during your sleep, you had an dream about the past. You dreamt about you going to middle school while Anna escorted you. You fully understood that she was not your biological sister, but the changeling is when she told you about it while she was escorting you. You were shocked at first but didn't complain as she always protected you when bully tries to come closer to you. You clearly remember her smile that was sweet and innocent, covered with full light. You opened your eyes, seeing the pitch black room and got up to get some water. As you were walking through the hallway you saw Anna leaning on the wall, closing her eyes.

"Hey sis, you're not going to sleep?" you asked.

"I was. Had to go to the restroom." Anna replied.

"Oh, I see...well, Good night." You replied.

You passes through her to get some drink until you felt anna wrap her arm around you. You felt her warmth and when you looked at her you noticed that her eyes were somewhat blank. You didn't know why then you felt her squeezing you little tighter. You had some sort of idea that anna might be either sad or afraid, then anna spoke to you.

"Little brother...does it bothers you about me not being a biological sister?" Anna asked.

"What are you talking about? of course not." You replied.

"I known you since you were a baby and when I was only 7 years old. You growned up so quickly that I didn't even notice.." Anna spoke.

You looked at her ears, showing a pointy side on top and then you looked at her, realizing that her tears were coming down. You didn't know why she was crying then she spoke up again.

"I'm so sorry, that I couldn't be your true sister.." Anna apologized.

You have thought to comfort her and when she released you, you..
1113121221122221.title: Get in that bed!

11131212211222212.content:
You hated when it got like this. You hated when she had to reflect on blood relations. If there's one thing that giets a hardass chick like her all mopey, it's this. How many times do you have to tell her you didnt care?!
On the plus side, at least responding to this mopey attitude of hers makes you feel about 7 years older. It you have to do it a million more times before she finally gets it, you'll gladly do it a million more times before she finally gets it!

She almost gasped when you suddenly pulled her in close and hugged her right back! You squeezed her tight while she practically stunned at your sudden boldness, as she always is. Heck, youre so bold, you tickle her behind her elven ear. Normally, she REALLY hates being tickled behind the ear... but not when YOU do it!

"A-Alex?"

"I told you already," you whisper to her, "it doesnt matter to me."
"B-But-"
"It doesnt matter," you repeated, "youre still my sis. I dont care what anybody else says. I say you are and will always be my sis." If you had a dollar for every time you said that and it caused Anna to shut up, your dad wouldnt be needed to pay off the national deficit!

And add another dollar. Judging by the feeling of her resistance dwindling down to nothing, youre certain she's feeling better. But you dont let go. Something tells you she wants you to keep hugging her, so that's what you do.
And sure enough, you notice her cheeks get a little red before she hugs you right back. Wow, she's so warm.

“Alex, sir...”

Very warm. And boy does she have a tight grip. Not that it feels bad, youre completely fine with-your eyes widened as you felt her hand firmly squeezing your butt!

************

You wake up in a single blink of an eye before you could become scarred for life (even though she's not your biological sister, so it's not THAT awkward!). You sighed, pondering that dream but only for a few seconds, when you realize your arms were wrapped around a certain bedmate of yours!

Thankfully, Reisen's still sleeping pretty soundly despite keeping a firm grip with her hug. Not to mention, you STILL felt a hand on your butt!
Unfortunately for you, pushing her off was far easier said than done. Youre not sure how, but she's quite a bit stronger than she looks. She's not squeezing enough to crush bone, but it's not a grip you can just squeeze out of.

“Pst! Reisen!” you whispered, “Reisen wake up!” She moaned a little, but instead of waking up, she just squeezed you a bit tighter! “Reisen! C'mon wake up!” Nope, she just snuggled even closer. “R-Reisen, c'mon!” you resort to squirming in impenetrable grasp with little to no resort, “I said wake up! Wa-” Her grip finally loosens and you break free… but you learn last minute you were too close to the edge of the bed!

*Thump!*

“Hm?!” hearing you hit the cold floor snapped Reisen out of bed, “Alex? ...OH!” You got to see her big glowing red eyes gaze down at you in surprise before she kindly helps you, “Are you ok? Did you fall off? You didnt hurt yourself, did you?”

“I'm fine I'm fine,” you pretend you didnt just twist your ankle, “I'm glad to see you managed to sleep pretty soundly.”
The ill but rather strong bunny girl chuckled nervously, “W-well your… bed is much comfier than mine, so… er, anyways, thanks for letting me sleep here.”
“It was no problem,” you assured her, “you needed it more than I did. Now let's go. Anna's gonna make us breakfast,” Reisen's ears twitched a bit hearing you mention your sis again, but you didnt notice, you were just about to rush out the door, “you havent lived until you tried her steak. You will not find a steak house that can make their meat as tangy and zesty as she can!”

“W-wait.”

Somehow, hearing Reisen's voice sound so timid just stopped you in your tracks. Still concerned for her, you turn back to her.

“What is it?”

Her face went red and she had a hard time keeping her head straight, “I was just… wondering something. It's about your sister.”
You give her your undivided attention.
“Were you two um… close?”

“What are you talking about?”

“I-I-I mean, well, considering youre not really related by blood, and you two were really close for so many years,” she's laying it on pretty thick, “I'm just wondering if youre CLOSE-close.”

You squinted your eyes a bit. Youre a little thick-headed, but you might know what she's asking. Still, you need to be sure.

“Well she is attractive… if youre into the whole tough girl with funny ears sorta schtick,” ironic SHE of all people mentioning funny ears, “so, what I'm asking is… do you have feelings for her? Not 'sibling' feelings, but 'significant other' feelings.”

OOOOOOOOHHHHH! THAT'S what she's asking, eh? That's a good question.

…..


What's the answer?
11131212211222212.title: Playing the Bro

111312122112222122.content:
"..Er..Well....umm..." You mumbled.

You really couldn't answer that question as when you realized that she was not your biological sister, you started to feel some love that was not sibling love. You had some affection toward her as she always protected you and took care of you when you were growing up. When you done some easy missions with her the feeling became more stronger as she was becoming a women with strong attitude. Anna told you that she felt little sympathy for your father when he died, and both you and anna became very close since then.

"..You see reisen, I love my sister as who she is. But she is...well...how can I say this_" you spoke.

Reisen read the atmosphere and smiled. She came to you and hugged lightly as you blushed light. She told it was alright and not tell her right away then went to the dining room to get the breakfast. Once you arrived in the dining room everyone else was there with food on the table. Anna was sitting next to tewi and reisen sat next to her master. You sat down and looked at the food as it was steak and egg with hash browns and english muffin and some tea. You all thanked for the food and when it started to eat breakfast, reisen pointed out something that was obvious to the eientei crew.

"say, where's the princess?" Reisen asked.

"I bet she went all-nighters playing Online game. I swear that NEET Princess...." Eirin replied, sighed.

After that speech you heard door slide open. It was Kaguya with many lines under her eyes. She looked very tired as she greeted everyone and sat next to you to have some breakfast. She thanked for the food and started to cut the steak and eat some. You could tell she was very tired as her eyes were narrowly open and she was chewing the steak very slowly.

"Princess, did you really play the game all-nighter?" Reisen asked.

"I was fighting this superboss that was super tough with my online friend." Kaguya replied.

You sweated little as she was talking to others while eating, you looked at anna and she was just quiet and continued to eat some breakfast. You were starting to feel like talking, so you turned your attention to...
111312122112222122.title: bold talk

1113121221122221221.content:
Since you two bonded so well this far, you figured why stop? You worked together, you saw some shit together, you slept in the same bed together, it's like fate wants you to share as much time with this bunny girl as you can before your inevitable demise. And it is certainly inevitable.

"How you feeling?" you whispered into one of Reisen's bunny ears. Your mind still wasnt used to the fact that they were real. But lo and behold, they twitched when you spoke into them.
She turned her head to you as if waiting for you to explain what you meant. You didnt say anything for a moment until you had enough of a space of privacy between the two of you. After seeing Eirin was in a bit of a long discussion with your sister while Kaguya was pretending to listen while taking glances down at her 3DS, it was as private as you could get at the moment.

"I mean... after what happened yesterday," you clarified.
She exhaled, "I'm doing better. I take vitamins for my stress problems, so I'm already relaxed."
"I'm really sorry about what happened," you apologized, "I promise what just happened last night... I'll make sure it wont happen again."
She inhaled then exhaled again, but smiled. “Dont worry, Alex-sama,” what is with that nickname? “this wasnt the worst I've ever experienced. As a veteran myself, I've er… seen things.” A veteran, eh?

“You were a veteran?”this intrigues you. That would explain why she seems a bit stronger than she looks.
Unfortunately she frowned and got a bit nervous, “I… was… I'm sorry, I'd rather not talk about it right now. S-Sorry.”
If she's reluctant, it might be something traumatizing. Best not ask her about it just yet. For all you know, the reason she's so mentally ill could be due to PTSD.
You nodded, “Ok. I understand. I wont talk about it.” So you immediately change the subject, “And once again, I'm sorry I ruined day care for everybody. I dont know how you guys are gonna save face after that blood bath.”
“Tsk!” the bunny girl for some godforsaken reason snickered, “you think that the worst day care day gone wrong? I've had clients who ended up EATING other clients' kids and they STILL come back a week later to drop their remaining ones off!” Your eyes nearly bugged out of their sockets hearing something so disturbing.

“S-S-seriously?”
She nodded, “There's a real good reason I made you wear those cute little elf ears, Alex-sama. Not just cuz they look absolutely adorable on you!” She remarked with a giggle.
Being such a sucker for flattery coming from such a cute (yet ill) bunny girl, you were obligated to repay her in kind.
“Well, if it means I get to see more of you in that luxurious striped ensemble, I'll gladly put on the green cap and tunic to match!”

“Eheheheh…” Reisen gave you a nervous smirk and fidgeted almost uncontrollably from your flattery. In all honesty, the reaction kinda scared you a little. Maybe flirting with a rather strong mentally ill woman who may possibly have military training aint such a good idea.
But then again, you've already pissed off the most fearsome mafia in existence, so youre pretty much a dead man walking already. You might as well just stick your head between Reisen's boobs and yank her striped bra off with your teeth while youre at it!

“Hey.”

Your friend almost hopped out of her seat with surprise hearing your sister suddenly call her out just inches behind her! As usual, Anna's so sneaky, not even you saw her coming!
Reisen was still trembling as she was forced to turn her head to her, possibly hoping she didnt hear the slightly perverted conversation she had with her brother (considering the kind of power house Anna was, she had every reason to be afraid!)

“Y-Y-Yes, Anna?” Reisen continued trembling, “...sama?”
Thankfully, Anna wasnt angry. Her face didnt show off any particular mood. Just cold and nearly lacking emotion.
“Uh, Ms. Udongein Inaba, right?”
“Y-yes,” the bunny girl answered, “how can I help you?”
“I heard from the others you can speak a bit of farsi, is that true?” your sister questioned.
Rei nodded, “Y-yes it is. I studied overseas when I was younger. Persia had one of the highest ranked universities in the world back then.” Persia? Doesnt she mean Iran?

“Good. I could really use your help,” Anna insisted, “I've got to deal with an international trade proposal and I need a translator.” OH SONOVA-
You spit out a chunk of steak and glared at her! “Anna, youre not seriously asking her to-”
“Dont worry Alex,” she interrupted you, “she's not gonna be in harms way. All I need you to do, Ms. Udongein Inaba, is to simply transcribe the little conversation I'm gonna be having with a couple of smart mouthed Peri bitches from the Summer Court.”
“The Summer Court?!” you couldnt take this lying down, “why are you getting involved with them? They HATE you!”
“I know,” she admitted, “but I have something that a certain few fairies on that side want bad.” You gritted your teeth. It's bad enough she's still making shady deals with shady people even while on the run, but now she wants to drag an employee/patient of the very hospital that's allowing you refuge along with her?!

“You have my word that nothing will happen to you,” your sister promised Reisen, “it's just gonna be a quick a transaction. We'll get in, you talk between us, we make the transaction, and we'll get out. I promise you a nice share if you do it.”

Reisen took a bit of time deciding whether or not to go with her. You dont think it's a good idea, but if your sister assures her she'll be fine… well, you do trust her word… considering you looked up to her for so long. She'd be in safe hands with your sis watching her.
However, you seriously wish she'd stop putting other people in the middle of her shady affairs as well as quit these shady affairs to begin with!

Not to mention, maybe YOU'D like to have a little more alone time with the bunny girl! Wink wink!
1113121221122221221.title: No Rest for the Rabbit

11131212211222212211.content:
"Alright, I'll help." Reisen responded.

You couldn't believe what she spoke, then Anna told her to get ready after breakfast. You told her you would tag along, but she declined your offer as it was too dangerous. You held in your annoyance and accepted her words. After breakfast, both Anna and Reisen gotten ready and got out, leaving you behind. You sighed, wondering what you had to do and turned only to see the princess standing from afar.

"Oh, hello princess houraisan." You greeted.

"Mm.." Kaguya replied, still sleepy.

She got her shoes and walked pass you and got out. You wondered what you wanted to do until you saw someone come out of the bamboo forest. It was Momoi, the pyromancer who were a arch rival to Kaguya.

"Hey Kaguya!! I'm here to fight you!" Mokou showed.

"Stop shouting, I'm not in mood in fighting." Kaguya replied.

"Well, I'll make you feel it!" Mokou shouted back.

She shot few fire bullets and hit her chest. It made Kaguya wake up and the wound healed and started to smirk.

"Fine, you bitch. I'll make you regret it!" Kaguya said.

They then started to fight while you observed the fight to ease boredom. Meanwhile, both Anna and Reisen arrived in the human village. Anna explained that the people she knows are very powerful fairy, and they are not to be messed with. Once in the village, they got to the destination as it was an abandoned house. They got in and saw a tall lady with long black hair and white dress while other wore green skirt, short green hair and had a fairy wings. There were a tention and Reisen could feel it to the point she could tast it. Anna went in and sat as Reisen did the same, the tall fairy spoke in Farsi.

"Um...she says that if you brought what they want." Reisen said.

"Tell then I have it." Anna replied.

She translated and saw anna summon a gold coin and a crown. Reisen wondered what it was while she noticed the tall fairy bring out a huge case. Reisen looked and the tall fairy opened the case, revealing a full cash before her. She then spoke and Reisen responded to Anna.

"She says this is the cash in full." Reisen said.

Anna just looked at it and took one stash of bill. She counted the money and looked at the sky to see if it's not fake. She nods and put it back and handed over the crown and the gold coin and took the case.

"Tell her the deal is done." Anna said.

She translated it, and anna told her that they are leaving and got up. Before they could leave, Reisen heard a clicking noise and once she looked back, she saw the green haired fairy holding a sword, pointed at Anna and spoke in Farsi.

"You bitch...I'll never forget what you did with our ambassador..?" Reisen spoke.

Anna didn't say anything and started to walk. The green hair was about to chase after her until someone put a blade on her neck while the tall one had the same situation. It was a purple haired woman's with skull mask on their face on their back. Anna then turned around and spoke up.

"Reisen, tell them that if they dare come close to me, my brother, the surroundings...I will personally erase their fire." Anna said.

Reisen then noticed a vein looking things appear on her neck and her both cheeks. Reisen could tell she was using "something" and it was evil. She translated it out of fear and after that, they got out and the skull masked lady got off and vanished in darkness.

Back in eientei, the fight between Kaguya and Mokou lasted.
11131212211222212211.title: Walking on the sun

111312122112222122112.content:
3 hours. THREE hours. THREE WHOLE HOURS! 3 hours of listening to those two over-aged immortal brats scream their heads off at eachother, tear the place apart trying to get at eachother, and desperately dodging their destructive blows and projectiles as they hadnt a single care in the world of all the innocent bystanders in the way of them! This was a hospital and there were quite a few sick people in beds clinging to life, and these two didnt care the slightest. Their bloodthirsty hatred for each other outweighed the concern for their safety.

Not to mention, when it wasnt dangerously violent, it was loud and annoying. Their screamed at each other for the stupidest things. One loses at a video game, they shriek. One gets a bigger slice of pizza than the other, they shriek. One gets one or two less bruises than the other during their fighting, they shriek. One reminds the other of the time the other's dad tried to propose to the one and she turned him down flat cuz he was unworthy, they ROAR and shriek! Honestly, you get some people just plain dont like eachother, but good lord, this was getting insane!

So for three hours, you put with Kaguya and Mokou trying to kill eachother. Well actually, you ferment for three hours, slowly bringing your blood to a boil, trying to ignore that which cant be ignored. It's quite an amazing feat that all the servants of Eientei can put up with their unbearable brat of a princess and her equally hotheaded rival's ragefest for such a long time (maybe cuz theyre used to it), cuz you cant. You cant take it anymore.

You snap.

*BANG!! BANG!! BANG!!!*

Mokou and Kaguya stopped pulling eachother's hair as the sound of loud gunshots in the air put the whole of Eientei to silence! The eyes of the arch-rivals narrowed toward the direction of the young mortal human panting heavily with the smoking gun in his hand raised in the air! A glance of the sheer absolute rage on his face stopped the two cold.

"SHUT UP!!" you screamed as loud as your aching vocal cords would allow, "SHUT! UP! SHUT THE FUCK UP!!

They stared, frozen with shock and possibly fear as you paced toward them, giving your throat a short moment to relax before screaming again.

"CANT YOU GODDAMN HOWLER MONKEYS SOLVE YOUR LITTLE DISPUTE WITHOUT TEARING THE PLACE APART?!" you take another breath and lower your smoking gun, "THIS IS A FUCKING HOSPITAL! THERE ARE BEDRIDDEN PATIENTS BARELY CLINGING TO LIFE THAT ARE TRYING TO REST! YOU TWO GOT A PROBLEM, SETTLE IT OUTSIDE AWAY FROM HERE AND STOP BUGGING EVERYBODY!!!"

You panted like an exhausted dog after finally letting that out. It seemed like the entire ESTATE itself went quiet for a brief moment as Mokou and Kaguya stared back at you silently and unblinkingly. Finally after a long silent couple of seconds, the two quickly darted out of there as fast as they could run! Problem solved?
With that 3 hour nightmare finally put to an end, you collapsed on the floor and put your gun away, still catching your breath. Lord knows your throat's gonna be sore tomorrow.

"Damn, son!" little Tewi popped up out of nowhere, ruining the moment of silence, "check out the cajones on THIS gringo! Them little putas didnt know what hit 'em!" Despite still boiling a little inside, you appreciated the humor, but you were too out of energy to laugh.
"In all serious, though," the little rabbit girl said with a serious tone, "I hope you know the Princess aint gonna forget that little outburst of yours any time soon."
"Yeah, I know," you finally sighed.
"Still," she smirked, "it's about time SOMEBODY finally put her in her place!"

You inhaled and exhaled and finally felt your heart rate go down to modest levels. "Are those two ALWAYS like that when theyre together?"
"Nah," Tewi answers, "just every other day. Then once in blue moon, for some reason, they get along incredibly well and do things together like really really close friends... then the next day, it's back to the fighting again."
You groaned. "I'm sorry you have to put up with all that. I'd hate to imagine how long you guys have had this!"
"Well, you get used to it," she explains, "sooner or later you find something to pass the time to take your attention away from it. Eirin fiddles with her drugs, I pull a few pranks on total morons, Reisen volunteers to be one of those total morons, we all cope in our own way."

"Well, no offense, but the whole purpose me and my sister came here was to get AWAY from such murderous mayhem," you had to get your opinion across, "if I knew THIS was what I had to look forward to, I'd probably still be on the run."
Little Tewi sighs and shakes her head, "Oh c'mon. Dont throw in the towel just yet. You just need to break yourself in a little. If we can handle your demons that see to be hunting you down, you can handle ours." Oh right. THOSE demons. Like the ones that ambushed the daycare center! And there you were complaining that the brat pair was way too much for you to handle!

“Yeah,” you sigh in defeat, “thinking about it, if the worst I gotta put up with is your princess's temper tantrums, maybe I shouldnt be complaining.”
Unfortunately, Tewi inhaled through her teeth, signaling that it might not be the worst! “Actually er… there is um… well, one particular woman that shows up around here once in a long while that… well, to be quite honest, we're all scared shitless of..”
“Who might that be?” you get curious.
“Well, I better not tell you too much, cuz she said she'd skin me alive and feed me to the sharks if I opened my mouth too much,” she stated with fear, “but she's kinda the reason we're all HERE instead of up on the moon with the rest of the Kingdom!”
“Is she a fearsome mob-boss too?” you asked.
“Yes and no,” Tewi says, “she's also not completely of sound mind. Every once in a while, she shows up at the daycare center, scaring ALL of our customers away, and makes us look after her darling son.”
“What's the big deal about that?”
“Her son's been dead for years!!” GEEZ! These guys actually have to look after crazy mob-boss's son's corpse?! Nightmare fuel.

The little brat began looking all directions as if checking to see if she's being watched, “Look, you'll know if she ever shows up. Trust me. And when she does, you just smile and keep your big fucking mouth shut. And dont ever EVER ask her about her son!”
“Alright, dont worry, I'll mind my manners. I promise,” you assure her, “anyways, that little explosion took a lot out of me. I'm gonna head back to my room and lie down.”

“Need a little bedmate to keep you company?” you try your best not to look disturbed by that brat's offer.
“It's ok. I'm fine!” you answer with a forced smile and dart off. No sooner that you shake off that weird moment, does the regret of screaming your head off at the leader of this establishment that's allowing you refuge come crashing over you.

You tell yourself that it was for the best, especially considering not just your tolerance for pointless violence and unbearable whining, but also for safety of the workers and patients of this hospital. Still, you were practically biting the hand that's sheltering you.
Well, youre gonna have to cross that burning bridge when you get to it. 'Til then, you hopped in your warm cozy bed and took a nice long nap. At the very least, getting some shuteye was a breeze after biting a few bickering's brats head off.

At least for a few hours, anyway. Few hours later, youre quickly jolted back awake cuz your body was feeling very funny. Your lower half had a bit of weight pressing over it and under the covers you felt a draft YET it was surprisingly warm down there at the same time! And your crotch… well, it was acting all kinds of crazy to say the least. You couldnt really say it was a BAD feeling you were feeling… cuz it sure wasnt feeling bad! In fact, you'd lying if you said you didnt wanna let this feeling keep feeling!

However, you took no chances and gazed downward toward the source of this incredible feeling.. which was happening under the covers. You could make out a silhouette bobbing up and down right where youre feeling that feeling! You were getting suspicious. You were also twitching with ecstasy from the incredible sensation down there!

But youre suspicious nonetheless, so you look under the covers.

Oh thank god! Reisen's back and unhaARRRRRRMMMMMED?! Suffice to say your little bunny girl friend was very happy to see you… what with her vigorously sucking your dick and all. Youre thrilled that your sister didnt get her killed while your friend downstairs was completely overjoyed she was having her lips and tongue slurping up on all the right spots!

You wanted to be shocked, but you were desperately holding back the urge to moan! Her mouth was working your nether-muscle hard! Your conscience was nagging you to make her stop and focus on asking her where she and Anna went and if they ran into trouble. But the vast majority of your body (at least the part that mattered) was willing to wait until later! MUCH later!

The longer you pondered whether or not to stop Reisen, the longer she continued sucking on your manhood passionately, savoring that particular 'flavor' she was longing for since that other night she snuck in your room!
Well, you managed to stop her last time. Will you be doing that again… or did she happen to change your mind with her special 'oral persuasion technique'?

11131212211222212211222.title: Young sister?

111312122112222122112222.content:
Suddenly, well actually not quite so suddenly, the door opens and in walks two particular girls you've had a not-so-grand experience with last night. The princess and that pyromaniac she was spending 3 whole unbearable hours fighting with. And sure enough, they were staring your direction. Just yours.

Though you were slightly terrified that they held a grudge, you kept a straight face going for your big now little sister.
"Hi Mokou," Reisen greeted the white haired suspender wearing pyromancer, but quickly twitched realizing how her rudeness. "G-Good afternoon, Lady Kaguya!"

"Mr. Whitestone," Kaguya still looked your way, her facade completely unreadable, "would you come with us for a moment? There's something we need to show you." You felt nothing but bad vibes. Were they still upset? Tewi said Kaguya wouldnt forget. Then again, you dont think anybody in the hospital is gonna forget the sound of random gunfire and the roars of the only male around telling their princess to shut the fuck up. Youre probably gonna have to bend over backwards to say the least to forgive you for such an unacceptable transgression!

Little Anna looked worried, which made you even more worried. If something was up, she might not be in a position to bail you out. Even Reisen's ears were twitching with caution.
It cant be helped. You cant keep relying on your sister to bail you out forever. Sooner or later, you gotta face the music by your lonesome. Besides, maybe worse case, you'll probably just get chewed out for a couple hours and expected to do a bunch more chores. How horrible can it be?
"It's alright," you whispered to your sis, "I'll be ok."

You get up and nod to Kaguya, "Ok. I'll go." And with that, you leave with the two. It was a long and quiet walk down the hallway. Not a sound was made except for the occasional drag from Mokou as she violated the obvious No Smoking rule. You dont say anything and youre surprised Kaguya doesnt either. You'd think that resort to at least ONE pointless fight!

Speaking of which, that reminds you.

“Um… er...” you attempt to break the silence, “l-look, if this has anything to do with uh, what I did yesterday, well...”

“OH! That?” Kaguya smiled and laughed, “no no, dont worry about it. If anything, we should thank you for that.” Thank you?
“Oh yeah!” Mokou nodded, “you were right. We were SO out of line yesterday. Hell, I even forgot what we were fighting about!”
“S...so youre not at me or anything?” you asked with your hopes starting to rise.
“Absolutely not!” said the princess, “in fact, right after we ran due to tremendous fear of being shot, Mokou and I sat down and had a talk. You wouldnt believe how much of a weight off our shoulders it truly was.”
“Yep,” Mokou agreed just before flicking her used cigarette, “we really do need to quit all these pointless feuds. I mean so what if I'm clearly the better fighter in every way shape or form?”
“And so what if every male member of her family still has the hots for me?”
“The point is there is SO much more we can accomplish together if we actually put our petty differences aside!”

Well, that's great news! Maybe things will be looking up after all. It sounds like you just accomplished a next-to-impossible feat Eientei wise! Getting the two biggest, bitterest rivals to finally get along permanently!

“Speaking of which,” Kaguya smiled and the three of you stopped at a door, “we've combined our powers and brainstorm an idea that would keep a horrible disastrous beast out of our and my family's hair for a while.” She opens the door and the three of you walk in. You give quick notice of the rather large coffin-like box with red velvet padding inside. The box itself stood on a big stand in front of a large heart shaped sign with flowers and the letters 'Happy Birthday Junko' written on it.
“It involves you.”

Suddenly, you felt a quick jab in your neck! You spotted the syringe in Mokou's hand, but it was already too late! Whatever was in that stuff was hella strong. The drug spread throughout your body at mach speed and in just seconds, you were out cold! You didnt even have the strength to so much as struggle the tiniest as they dragged your immobile body. You barely heard, “Hurry! Theyre gonna be here any minute!”

You get no pleasant rest. It was more like a sleep paralysis you were feeling. You couldnt move or open your eyes, but you could listen. You heard a bit of whispering. Then voices you havent heard before. Most of it was unintelligable but there was a brief moment you clearly overhear.
“Whoa! You got her THIS for her birthday? You gonna get ME something similar for mine soon?”
“He's a former member of Le Fey. He knows things. Things your employer be interested in knowing.”
“Hm. And you think he's worth your pop's freedom, huh?”
“Absolutely.”
“Well, it's ultimately up to HER but-” you hear a loud slam and the voices are unintellible again.

Time passes. Who knows how much. At the very least, you start to come to. Youre aching, uncomfortable, and you feel quite a draft. And sadly, you dont wake to the joy of having your dick sucked by a cute bunny girl.
You come to and find yourself sealed up in a cramped velvet padded prison. The box! Worse even, your clothes were gone! Youre naked! And it's the padding is freaking cold!

Not only that, youre tied and gagged! Red velvet ropes bind your hands and feet together! You muffle and struggle in your constraints but to no avail. Even worse, there's a collar around your neck. In a quick instant, the doctor came charging toward your sister, prying her choking arm from Reisen's throat AND attempting to wrestle the gun of out her hand! A loud bang shot echoed, piercing the wall inches away from Reisen's face! The poor bunny girl froze up like a deer caught in headlights with her ears stood on end and her bladder evacuated!
You screamed for your sister to stop as she resisted restrained by Eirin.

"Arggh... let me go!!" you sis growled almost feral-like!

"I...I... I..." Reisen was shivering like a cute little bunny rabbit cornered by an angry starving cobra that was your sis!

"ANNA, COOL IT!" you finally shouted loud enough to get her attention! "She didnt rape me! I let her have her way with me!"

Anna, Eirin, Tewi, and Reisen all stopped what they were doing and turned their heads your direction in unison, completely shocked at what you just said!

"YOU DID?!" Anna, Eirin, and Tewi said together.
"Y...you did?" Reisen stuttered.

"Yep!" you said with no shame whatsoever, "I already knew she was there the whole time. I was pretending to sleep." The four girls unison expression changes to completely separate ones! Reisen was blushing nervously, Eirin cringed with panic, Anna glared with disgust, and Tewi was holding back the urge to laugh!
"Y...you were?" Reisen stuttered then flinched back as soon as Anna turned her anger toward her again!

"That's right, Ms. Udongein Inaba," her eyes practically sparkled when she heard you call her by her... uh... maiden name? "I enjoyed every moment and would gladly do it again if I could!"
"Oh dear," Eirin groaned, "this cant seriously be happening..."
"Does this mean we can put him to stud with the other girls?" Tewi asked.
"NO!" was the doc's immediate response.

"Bro, this is a HOSPITAL!" Anna tried to talk some sense into you, "a lot of these patients have serious mental issues! Specifically THAT one!" She pointed to Reisen, who started to become cross. "I read HER profile! She's very prone to mental instability and random violent outbreaks! What the hell made you think SHE'S worth giving your virginity too?!"
"B....because..." you shamelessly began to fade away. The truth of it was very devastating to admit. "....because it's inevitable that Le Fey is gonna kill me. At least thanks to Ms. Udongein Inaba, I not only wont die a virgin... or be a part of one of their sick 'virgin-sacrifices', but I can at least pass down our bloodline to the next generation."
Reisen couldnt help but muster a little smile from hearing that.

"You SURE you dont think we should stud him out to the other girls?" Tewi suggested, "cuz he clearly said he'd-"
"SHUT UP, TEWI!" shouted Eirin.

Your sister gave you that familiar cold glare of shame and disappointment. You remember that one real well. Whenever you done something she thought was really REALLY stupid, she'd smack you upside and say, 'What the hell is wrong with you?!'

*Smack!* "What the hell is wrong with you?!" She did just that. "Where did this sudden nihilistic point of view come from? Dont you get that this is what Maeve WANTS you to feel? Always afraid and feared for your life? C'mon, bro! She wants to mutilate me a thousand times more than you and you dont see me whining about it!" Dang it, she had a point. "I busted my ass to make sure youre safe from the Fey, that you'd never be as vulnerable to them as I was. These people are good people. They'll protect you and treat you right." She then pointed to Reisen again, "...with a FEW exceptions, of course!"

"H-Hey! HEY!" Reisen was finally sick of being alienated, "I most certainly will protect Alex-sama!"

"Bitch, who said YOU could talk?" Anna pointed her gun at the bunny girl. Despite being afraid, Reisen kept her strength up.
"HYAA!!" then all of a sudden, Reisen karate kicked the gun right out of Anna's hand! She assumed some sort of a martial arts stance while pointed her two index fingers toward your sis! While this, Anna extended her palms and you coulda sworn you saw sparks of fire emit from them! SONOVABITCH! THAT'S why her chest is badly burned?!!

"D-Dont talk to me like that!" Reisen glared back, "you heard your brother! Alex-sama trusts me so such that he gave himself to me willingly!" Oh crap! That didnt sound right to you! "His seed has become property of the Udongein Inaba clan!" Property of the what?!
Tewi smirked as Eirin's headache rose!

"You better watch what youre saying, twerp!" Anna warned her. She still didnt back down.
"I do not need to take this from you, Alex-sama's sister!" she didnt even call her by her name, "I invoke the Moon Rabbit breeding law, which clearly states that the male who inseminated the female becomes the official prime breeder of the female's clan!" Even YOUR eyes widened hearing that odd proclamation,
"Dont worry, Alex-sama! My mom and sisters will take very good care of you!" Aw dangit! What sort of bottomless rabbit hole have you fallen into?!

"R-Reisen, Moon Rabbit law doesnt apply to Eientei," Eirin states.
"Yes it does," Tewi corrected her, "Emperor Houraisan allowed special sovereignty to major Lunarian government officials. The Udongein Inaba clan have big names in the Lunarian military." HOLY CRAP!

"I dont give a rat's ass about your Moon Rabbit law!" Anna remarked, "like Hell I'm letting my brother be a sex-slave to your mentally deranged family!"
"He's not a sex-slave! He's a 'shared husband'!"
“The only thing you and your family are gonna share is a pistol clip!”
“You did NOT just threaten the Udongein Inaba family!!”

“Sis! Reisen! Please stop!” as if they were gonna listen to you.

“Bro, tell this psychotic loony that youre not letting yourself to be engage to someone you just met!” Anna ordered, “and got horribly raped by!”

“Alex-sama!” Reisen orderd, “tell your short-tempered homicidal sister that it’s not up to her to decide what’s best for OUR family!” This was a hell of a bind you got yourself in. Sadly, not even the doc could help you. After turning your head to Eirin, she just shrugged her arms and shook her head!
“Told you we shoulda put him out to stud,” Tewi muttered.

It was hopeless. You couldn’t quell BOTH girls’ rage! Your only hope at the moment was to quell at least one of theirs. On one hand, you werent in any hurry to have a polygamous relationship with a girl you just met and slept with on your first day, let alone share yourself with her family!
On the other hand, it could be a new beginning for you. Maybe being Mr. Udongein Inaba-Whitestone could give you a fresh start, away from the jaws of the Fey and finally get that second chance you hoped for. To finally put your past behind you.

"You're safer in this city now little bro. I guarantee it." Anna said.

"Anna, why are there former men here? And why are they calling you captain?" You asked.

She had the idea that you would ask that question. She asked you to go in with her to the house. You nodded and once you got into the house, she escorted you to the dining room. The area was wide and livable as you sat down on the chair, she sat next to you.

"You see little bro, after I left the Le Fay gang, there were some men who chose to follow me due to respect. Le Fay saw this as treachery and tried to hunt them down, but fortunately we came to this area before she could find us. Afterward, I formed the rebellion army against the Le Fay gang and I became the captain of the army." Anna explained.

You now understood why they called your sister 'captain' and you knew the guys. She now started to rebel against the strong gang and you know she had upper hand since she had good weapon and intelligence against her and such.

"But sis, you know they have upper hand." you said.

"For now, yes. But I'm currently recruiting an non-human to support my cause." Anna said.

You know what she meant as she was talking about youkais and others. You had the urge to help your big sis since you were always been protected by your own sister. You always wanted to pay back for all the good deed she have done and you thought that it was time for you to return the favore.

"Say Anna, why don't I-"

"If you're asking for recruitement, I'm afraid I have to reject you." Anna interrupted.

You didn't know why she rejected you rightaway and asked her.

"Why? I want to help you." You said.

"I know you want to, but I refuse to risk putting you on the front line." Anna said.

Before she could say any further, she got a phone call. She got the phone and once she talked for moment she put it away and turned to you. She told you she have an urgent meeting and stood up.

"Don't worry, alex. You will be safe here." Anna said.

She then left the scene. You wanted to follow her but she was very fast to leave the area. You looked around and thought of doing something, then you heard the two guards talking. You then peeked outside and you saw....
11131212221111.title: new area

111312122211111.content:
For a split second, you were almost blinded by the shiny red eyes of one of those so-called 'soldiers' chatting to eachother outside. The two were dressed in similar mujahideen militant uniforms carrying kalashnikovs, however one wasnt that difficult to identify. Despite keeping hidden under uniform and hijab, you could spot the same purple hair, facial structure and glowing red eyes!
"R-Reisen?!" you whispered in shock, "S-she followed me?!"

R-Reisen! S-She followed you! Nice job hiding the bunny ears under the hijab, but the eyes clearly dont lie! How she managed to find you, you got subtle hints. After a bit of talking you couldnt hear, you spotted Reisen reaching into her pocket and pulling out a couple of dollar bills and handing it to the other soldier! A freaking bribe! Anna may have leadership qualities, but she does not pick her allies well.

The paid off soldier nods then Reisen nods before he turns around and walks off... but not before Reisen pokes his shoulder. You lean in carefully to watch the Mujahibunny slip him a few more dollars... and the other soldier reaches into his pocket and hands her what looks to be a bag of pills!
Crap. She's apparently keen on the whole cartel thing, too! Next thing youre gonna find is she probably knows arabic and memorized a few Quran verses... just to blend in with the 'locals'! (well, she DOES have a crescent moon pin!)
Still you do kinda miss her. She was the one you willingly gave your first time to (WILLINGLY. Maeve will never in a billion and a half years be considering your first!).

"See somebody you know?" you were temporarily started after hearing that condescending tone from earlier. You get your head away from the window and turn to see happy cheerful little elf brat who gleefully waltzed into your safe house uninvited.

"Uh... yeah," you tell her, avoiding her snooty Little Miss Sunshine glare, "just an old friend."
"Must be nice," she remarked sarcastically. God you feel so lonely being around her!
"So uh... what are you doing here?" you try to remain civil, "uh, Parsee was it?"

She clapped her hands and put on a super forced smile, "Oh wow! You actually remembered my name! I feel so special now! Tsk." She snagged a bottle of wine off the dining table and poured it into a glass, "My damn bridge keeper shift is over. It's not like I wanna be here, but it's the only place around here I can get a little buzz without having to hang out with those lushes." Oh goodie. The anti-social scale is through the roof.

Despite the atmosphere around her being incredibly depression, she's currently the only companionship you got at the moment, so you figure you might make the most of it.
You sit in a seat next to her, "Mind if I have a drink with you?"
"Yes," she glared as she sipped her drink.

Ignoring her 'charming' personality, you grab the wine bottle and pour yourself a glass.
"I can see you got a bit of emotional baggage, too," you comment while she snuffed, "would you like to talk about it?"
"Nah," Parsee shook her head, "if I wanted to cry out all my personal problems, I'd be getting drunk with those oni lushes that never leave me alone."
"Friends of yours?" you asked as you sipped.
"I dont have friends," she sneered, "I dont NEED friends." Boy this wine tastes incredibly bitchy today.
"Honestly, I could use some," you still attempt to converse with her, "ever since we left Le Fey, my sister and I are always moving around place to place. I never got enough time to settle down and actually make a real friend."
"Tsk. Like that mentally deranged rabbit you screwed?"

You did a tremendous spit-take hearing those words come out the elven bitch's mouth, and you TOTALLY didnt mean to do it in her face! You slammed the glass on the table and shout, "Y-Y-YOU KNEW ABOUT THAT?!"
"Big Sis told Mr. Frost," she smiled condescendingly, "and Jack Ass has a big mouth. He was thinking of throwing you a little 'Congrats on Becoming a Man' party!" Your face was getting red, both with anger and embarrassment.
"I wouldnt be celebrating if I were you," Parsee sipped some wine, "she's very unstable and prone to violent outbursts like onis are to smelling like shit. If youre that desperate to die a horrible death, I suggest pissing in Hakurei Shrine's donation box."

Alright. That's it. You tried being nice with this pointy-eared Iranian bitch but she's clearly not willing to give you a chance. You'd rather be alone now.

"Whelp, I'd say a good screw would cheer you up too, but it's most likely full of razor blades," you get up out of your seat, "I'm gonna go take a nap."

"Lucky you... you actually get a bedroom," you heard her mutter, "ya know... instead of the dirty floor... like the rest of us unworthy peasants." You ignore her and just head upstairs. It takes you a little while to find out which door your key unlocks but as soon as you find it, you slam the door behind you and groan, "GOD! WHAT THE HELL IS THAT GIRL'S PROBLEM?!" It was almost like she wanted you to feel miserable like she does!

Fortunately at the moment you were feeling a little tired. You wanted to go to sleep as soon as possible before that elf's emo rubs off on you! It was incredibly hot in this underground base and there was no air condition so you didnt even bother to pull the covers over you. You just lied on of the bed and shut your eyes, wishing a certain lovable bunny girl would come climb on top of you in your sleep and do naughty things...

Unfortunately, you shoulda been more careful with what you wished for! As soon as you opened your eyes again, your almost blinded by the glow of the big beautiful red eyes beaming down at you! But unlike last time, you quickly jerked yourself up! You caught a quick glimpse of her eyes widen with shock before you leaped out from under her!

"Rei-!"
"No no no! Sh! Sh! Please!" she put a finger to her mouth then quickly got down on her knees and begged in whispers, "please dont!"

*Knock knock!*
"Mr Whitestone? I thought I heard shouting. Is everything ok?" you heard Mr. Frost call out from the other side of the door. You pondered what to say as your mentally ill bunny girl stalker was still on her knees begging, shaking her head, giving you the sad puppy dog eye look! The angel and devil on your shoulders had a hard time deciding what the good or bad choices were. You felt a little sorry for Reisen and part of you was kinda happy to see her again, but you cant help but remember Parsee said about her (despite the mean tone!). If you rat her out, Anna's goons might hurt her. If you keep her a secret from them, she could end up hurting you.

You give your intruder one last look in her shiny red eyes before shouting back-
111312122211111.title: The Sin of Envy

1113121222111111.content:
"Yeah, I'm fine!" you shouted back at Mr. Frost, "sorry, just had a crazy nightmare, that's all!" You dont know whether covering for Reisen was for or against your better judgment, but you knew what your sister could end up doing to Reisen if she gets caught. And you really didnt like the scenario. Plus, you got a gun in the drawer next to your bed just in case.

"Alright," Jack called back, "but keep it down. There are plenty of guys here that are trying to sleep." And fortunately for your uninvited guest, that was it.

The bunny-girl intruder sighed in relief and rushed to hug you, "Oh, thank you, Alex-sa-"

"Stay back!" she stopped as soon as you pulled the gun out of the drawer. Strange, you dont really notice much fear on her face as you do disappointment. "Reisen, you know youre not supposed to be here. How did you even managed to find me?"
"Well..." Reisen spoke up, "it's like Tewi said. The Udongein Inaba family has major connections. The only reason the Lunarian Kingdom still exists is thanks to the special forces and secret surveillance funded and operated by the Udongein Inaba family." Ugh. That does answer a few questions. But now wasnt the time to learn about her bloodline!

"Nevermind that!" you changed the subject, "you shouldnt be here! If Anna or the others find out-"
"I know," she frowned, "but I just couldnt let you skip out of my life for good after just the first day of meeting you! Not after you've taken my virginity and possibly sired my first little girl!"

WHOA! Slow down there!

“Uh, Reisen?” you remind her, “YOU forced yourself on ME while I was sleeping.”
“But… you told your sister that you were pretending to sleep, so… if you didnt like it, you couldve told me to stop at any time.” aw dang it! She's got a darn good memory! No use denying it.

Like a defeated man, your just blushed and said nothing. Surrender with grace!

“Hah! See? I knew you liked me!” she said with a smile. As mad as you wanted to be at her, seeing such a warming smile on a cutie like her melted your heart a little. You sighed and put your gun on the desk.

“You wont be able to stay here,” you warned her, “a few particular members of Anna posse already know about you and theyre going to rat you out if they find you.”
“It's alright. I promise I'll keep myself scarce,” she assured, “and if there's any trouble, I know some people to call up.” You give her a stern stare and she sighed, “If I cause too much trouble, I promise I'll leave on my own. But I wont! You have my word!”

You knew you had to tell her no and to get out before she gets caught, but something deep down told you not to. If you had to make a guess, maybe it's that part about her telling you that you might have impregnated her that's causing you to be so hesitant. Damn it, you just gotta make it work somehow! For the baby!

“Alright, fine,” you groaned with gritted teeth.
“YAY!!”
“SHH!!”
“Oh right. Heh, sorry.”

“Ugh...” you lied back on your bed, remembering your gun on the desk just in case, “I got the hugest headache.”

“I got something for that!” your involuntary roommate reached under her uniform and pulled out a bottle of pills, “take one!”
You raised your eyebrow, “Are they aspirin?”
“No, but they guaranteed to make you feel REALLY good!” red flag.
“No thanks,” you quickly turn her down, “I'm not taking any drugs. I am out of that business.”

“These are not drugs,” she corrected you, “these are herbal supplements. Great for the body and the mind. Helps you relax and unwind after after moods of stress and frustration.”
You squint your eyes at the bottle, knowing better.
“No, those are black market drugs possibly stolen from a pharmacy,” you correct HER, “I can still see the prescription label in arabic stuck to the bottle.”

Reisen gave you an unamused sorta pouty look.

“It's FARSI,” she corrected as if it really mattered, “and it wasnt stolen. It was just resold off the market for a major discounted price cuz the patient failed to properly pay his insurance premium.”
“Does Eirin even know your buying drugs like that?”
“Of course not,” she lowers her head, “but the medicines she usually give me are far too weak, taste absolutely fowl,” she cringes, “...or have to be… inserted.”
You exhale and shake your head.
“That's why I usually call up some people who know some people who trade with some people who supply arms with some people. The stuff they supply are a hundred times better for my certain mood swings,” she then smiled and pulled out two pills, “and if theyre good enough to keep ME chipper, I'm sure you'll get a real kick out of them!”

You'd be lying if you said you werent feeling all sorts of pent up stress and frustration that you'd REALLY like to ease. You could really use something to help you unwind. But black market prescription pills?

“Dont worry, these are safe,” she promises, “I'll prove it. Here, I'll go first.” She opened her mouth wide and dropped a pill on her tongue, then closed her mouth and swallowed hard.
“See?” she opened her mouth wide again showing no sign of the pill, “all gone!”

Somehow, being a prude was beginning to seem less popular to you. You needed a cooldown. And your sister's ambitions certainly werent helping. In fact, they were probably more hazardous to your health than the remaining unknown pill that cute bunny-drug dealer was offering you.

You looked over at the pill and thought for a brief moment...
1113121222111111.title: Winners... Probably Use Drugs.

11131212221111111.content:
You were getting truly stressed, and you did need something to ease not only your stress but your migraines as well. As your morality says no, you took the offer and reisen was pleased. You took the pill and popped it into your mouth as it tasted like green apple, you swallowed it and moment later, your migraine and your stress were wiped off!

"Holy..my headache's gone." You said.

"See Alex-Sama, it's a good pill right?" Reisen asked.

"Yeah, thanks reisen. I owe you one." You replied.

She giggled then suddenly both you and reisen heard the door knock. You told reisen to hide and she immediately hid in the closet and shut the door. You shouted 'come in!' And the door opened, revealing to be Mr.Frost and two guards.

"Mr.Frost, something wrong?" You asked.

"I thought I heard you speaking to somebody.." Jack said.

Your heart jumped as they came in,he noticed you sweating little and you shivered little.

"I-I think your just imagining things." You answers

Jack didn't say anything for moment then ordered his men's to search the room. You begged him not to but he and the men searched the room until jack got to the closet. Your heart raced as jack grabbed the knob, he opened the door and quickly pointed his gun. You looked, realizing that reisen weren't there! Jack huffed and lowers his weapon and turned to you.

"Your right, it's just my misunderstanding." Jack said, "after all, captain whitetaker is preparing her plan to get green light."

"Whitetaker? Who're you talking about? And what do you mean by plan?" You asked.

"Don't you know? Your sisters real family name is whitetaker." Jack answered, "she took your family name to keep your family supervised. As for the plan..it's classified plan."

You were both surprised and expected as Anna was from the fey since she was a newborn but didn't know she took your family name for some reason. You thought for moment and then the three mens reached for the door and jack turned to you.

"If you need anything, please notify me." Jack said.

"Alright, thanks." You replied.

As the door closed, you turned to the closet and saw the wall move and reisen was revealed! You didn't know how she did it and reisen came to you, explained that she brought an stealth backpack in case something happens. You sighed in relief and the bunny girl came to you closer.

"Oh Alex-Sama..we are destined to be together." Reisen spoke.

"Reisen.." you spoke.

As her face was getting closer, her red eyes glew little. It was vexing as your mind was start to fade and was about to do something that you shouldn't do..

"I wouldn't do that if I were you."

Reisen jerked her face and you got to your sense, looked at the window and saw..
11131212221111111.title: Hidden darkness

111312122211111111.content:
It was a teen that was around your age. He had short blond hair and had cowboy suit and had gun in his gunholder. You remember him as Billy Tenship, one of your pal from the mafia. You were glad to see him as he got in, he was smiling while reisen became defensive.

"Hold on reisen, I know him." You said.

"Oh?" Reisen spoke.

You nodded and came to him and you two gave a high five. Reisen relaxed little and both you and Billy talked for few minutes. Billy was considered to be the quickest gunslinger as he never misses a target with super speed, and he was a descent person to hang out.

"So Billy, why're here?" You asked.

"Anna secretly hired me to watch for a specific being for her ultimate plan." Billy responded.

"Ultimate plan? What is that?" Reisen asked.

"Sorry ms, but that's highly classified detail and I cannot say." Billy answered.

You really wanted to know what Anna was doing. Anna never tells you anything when something comes up, and she always disappears for at least 3 months every year. You wanted to know and you wanted an answer.

"Billy please, tell us. I swear I won't tell." You asked.

"Like I said, it's classified documents." Billy shot you down, "besides..."

He looked at the window and unknowingly to you and reisen, a secret sniper was hidden in the roof far from the house pointing at Billy's head.

"..it's not my place to say the details."

"But...I have to know! Anna always kept secrets from me, and I have right to know!" You responded.

Billy looked at your eyes and knew you wouldn't back down. He sighed and snapped his fingers. From the window a tall female with military cloth on came with a sheet of paper. He took the paper and handed toward you.

"This is part of the diary that your sister kept. It have a crucial detail so you better hide it carefully." Billy said.

"Thank you Billy, I owe you one." You replied.

Billy smiled and bid farewell and both him and the female left. Both you and reisen looked at the paper, and it wrote:

September 11th, 20XX

I have now completed the final cast of the ancient book, and I have now have the ten rings of Solomon. With this, I can now summon the 72 demons that the ancient king have summoned and destroy the fey and the humans who have wronged me and my tribes. I shall name this power:

Ars almadel salomonis, the time of birth have come, he is the one who masters everything.

You dropped the paper in fear as you were very familiar with the the story of king solomon, the ancient Israeli king who summoned the 72 demons to complete the temple. Reisen were surprised to see this and told you she'll go back to eientei to tell eirin about it and quickly left being invisible. You breathed in and out, took the paper and hid it in your pocket and got out of the door. Jack noticed you and got up.

"Your heading out?" Jack asked.

"Yeah, I need fresh air." You replied.

"I'll accompany you. I need cigarettes." Jack replied.

You nodded and both of you got out. You leaned on the wall as jack got the box of malboro and took one stick out. As he lit the cigarette and relaxed, you heard someone calling your name, and it was...
111312122211111111.title: Partial secret

11131212221111112.content:
You had bad feeling about this and put your hand onto her hands. You told her your thoughts, telling why you don't do drugs in the beginning until you notice her blush and pushed you to the ground.

"Reisen!?" You spoke.

"I'm sorry Alex Sama, this might be our destiny.." Reisen spoke.

"D-destiny? What Are you talking about?" You asked, unknowingly.

Just then, her red eyes started to glow, making you feel dizzy. You hear her chuckling and feel her chest on top of your body.

"We shall be one...Alex-Sama.." Reisen spoke.

Suddenly, a window suddenly broke. Reisen looked back as you snapped out of yourself, you saw a big sized oni with stab wounds on his chest. You and Reisen looked at the window and saw Anna with black sword and a woman with white robe on her and a purple haired female with unique black cloth.

"A-Anna?" You spoke softly.

You then heard a door slam open and saw frost and hid guard seeing Reisen and pointed their gun at her.

"Raise your arms! Don't move!" Frost spoke.

Just then, Anna and the other two jumped to the corpse and landed safely. Anna looked different as her eyes looked dead and had vein looking thing on her neck. She looked at Reisen for moment then turned to the ladies.

"Hasan of serenity, Jing Ke..patrol the area." Anna spoke.

"Yes, my lady." Purple haired said.

"是的我的女士" black haired replied.

They left as Anna turned back at Reisen, you saw the rabbit girl pointing her a gun at her. Frost ordered Reisen to put the gun down and you wanted to stop her but then you heard Anna laughing.

"Your one clever rabbit, I give you that!" Anna spoke.

She then stopped laughing, and looked at her. She could feel the strong evil vibes from her and suddenly she came forward and grabbed her face.

"But you shall die today."

She threw her out of the house. Reisen flew and Anna dashed toward her and they started to fight. You shouted them to stop but they didn't as frost and his men's came to you so you won't escape.

2 hours went, and the one fell to its knees were...
11131212221111112.title: Boxcar rebellion

1113121222111112.content:
"We have intruder here!"

Reisen were shocked to hear that as the door was knocked down, Mr.Frost pointed his assault rifle at her. She was looking at him with narrow eyes and was about to use her sanity ability until she got sharp pain in her head. She got off from you quickly as she was grabbing her hair, screaming and moaning over pain. Mr.Frost called for back up and got in.

"I knew something was wrong...Men's you bribed shall be seen through." Mr.Frost said.

"Aarg...I'm in pain!!" reisen shouted.

"Of course. Captain took precaution and secured with anti-youkai machine so if any idiot youkai try to use their power in this perimeter, it will shower them with nano-machine fused air to let their power back fire.." Mr.Frost explained, as he got her up.

You couldn't believe that Anna will do everything to protect you, even to this far. You sighed in stress as he told the lunatic bunny she will be dealt with the captain, you all got out of the house until you all saw a recognizable woman standing with two other soldiers with her.

It was Anna.

She was looking at reisen as she smoked cigatette, she puffed some smoke and walked toward you three. Mr.Frost saluted as residents was still in pain, Anna stopped and looked at her more until she took out her colt magnum and shot her shoulder and her left thigh.

"Gyaaa!"

"Anna!?"

Reisen was in pain and you tried to stop her until one of the soldier shot a round on your ground, making you stop, and Anna looked at reisen continued to look at reisen with disgust.

"You got nerves, bunny. I warned you before about my precious little brother, now you continue to mock me by following me?" Anna spoke.

"Anna, I can-"

"Shut up alex. This is between her and I" Anna interrupted.

You held your words as Anna was looking at her, reisen kicked Anna's shin, but two soldiers shot reisen with few rubber bullets and she fell as the nano-machine that inside her bloodstream preventing her from using the ability. Anna kicked her body as she was furious at the bunny, she stopped kicking.

"Tell me, do I have to kill you just so you can understand my words?" Anna asked.

Reisen then looked Anna and smiled at her.

"Try killing me, you low-life bitch." residents said.

Anna was silent and she knelt befor her and grabbed her neck collar. Reisen coughed blood as the captain to the rebel was frowning, she smirked.

"I won't kill you now, oh no. I will enjoy torturing you first before I kill you." Anna said.

You felt as if Maeve possessed your big sis as she did the same as what Anna's doing. You were frustrated as you felt you couldn't go up against your big sis, but you wanted to at least do something for reisen, as if you could be her guardian until further notice.

Decisions..
1113121222111112.title: "We got an intruder!"

11131212221111121.content:
It was never easy to stand up to Anna. Hell, it always proved to be one of the hardest things to do outside of successfully quit Le Fey (and survive). Not just because you were a little intimidated by her, but because you owe her a tremendous debt. But you know how she gets when she's very angry. She tends to do things she really shouldnt. Bad things. VERY bad things. To say she's prone to violent outbursts is being too optimistic. If Parsee thinks Reisen is unstable, she's never met your sis!

Plus, Reisen may or may not have your child forming inside of her. Call it paternal instincts.

"Anna, stop this!" you demand in a more serious tone, "stop it now!"

"Shut up bro," Anna remarked as she began twisting Reisen's bunny ear. The poor bunny girl let out a high pitched shriek of pain!

"Anna, I said stop it!" you demand again. She pays you no attention and continues twisting Reisen's ear, no doubt relishing her screams of pain. Sheesh, you didnt think bunny ears were THAT sensitive!
"Anna, that's enough!" you rushed over to her to stop her only to end up getting smacked hard in the face by her! The quick moment you hit the ground, the realization of it hit harder and faster! Anna actually slapped you! Her own little brother! This was unbelievable! How could she do that to you?! You were just looking out for her! Something ticked inside of you after that happened. It kinda tipped you over the edge. You expected Maeve to harshly backhand you like that for no legitimate reason, but not sis!

It hurt you to do this, but you saw no other way around it. Before you fled, you stole something from Le Fey that the rest of the fairies kept locked up and sealed away because it was painful to them. VERY painful. A lump of what they called 'Holy Iron'. Youre not sure what type of type of iron material it is nor where it came from, but all you knew is these fairy fuckers cringed when theyre near it. Bad move on their part for assigning you to guard it for a while!

You reached into your pocket and dug in your wallet, then pulled out that little iron cross and shoved it against your sister's pointy ear!

"GyyAAAHHH!!!!" boy, did she let out a shriek of agony! You quickly regretted it! You didnt expect it to hurt her THAT bad! You gasped when she fell to the ground gripping her aching... SMOKING ear! The other soldiers watched, absolutely shocked at the display, but despite being armed, even they flinched when you pointed your cross at them!

"Stand back!" you warned them, "dont come any closer! I swear, the rumors about this thing ARE true!"
“H-How did you get that?!” Frost questioned you.
“Dont worry about how I got this. Worry about how bad it'll hurt if you come any closer!”
Jack Frost swayed his arm downward, signaling his crew to lower their weapons! Even Parsee hissed at you like an angry wildcat when you pointed the cross at HER!

"I'm sorry, Anna," you whispered as you took her colt magnum. Time to floor it.
"C'mon," you helped your bunny stalker up, "can you still walk with that wound?" You referred to the one in her thigh when your sis shot her.
She coughed a little, wiped blood off her lip and stuttered, "I've had worse. Let's go!" And just out of nowhere, she grabbed your hand and dragged you off with her, despite the beating Anna gave her! Talk about a second wind!

As his crew helped up Anna, Jack finally shook off his state of shock and ordered, "G-Get him! Dont shoot him, dont hurt him! Just bring him back!"

By the time Frost's troops finally came after you, Reisen had already zipped into the cavernous alleyways still dragging you along the way! Frost's men were on your tail, but your partner had an unbelievable amount of speed and stamina to outrun them! It was incredible how quickly she was moving despite her wounds. You knew she was a youkai, but you were still worried about her health and all.
"Reisen, you shouldnt be overexerting yourself like this," you tell her.
"I'm fine," she said as she scanned around looking for places of cover.
"But youre hurt pretty bad," you say, "I mean, you been shot and-"
"I told you, I've been through worse," she said, "...but thank you for your concern, Alex-sama.” She gave you a smile that made you a little warm and tingly inside.
“Well… I...” you blushed despite being dragged like a ragdoll by the girl you just saved, “I just couldnt-”
“Duck!!” you didnt even get to see her ears twitch before she yanked you down with her, immediately out of the way of incoming gun fire!

“IDIOT! FROST SAID DONT SHOOT HIM!” you overheard shouting.
“WHAT? THEYRE STILL RUBBER BULLETS!”
“YOU HAVE ANY IDEA HOW HIS GUARDIAN GETS WHEN YOU HURT HER FOSTER BROTHER?!”

“Foster brother?” Reisen raised her eyebrow after hearing that bit of detail that was supposed to kept secret, goddamn it Anna, why cant you pick better allies?!
“Well, the uh, thing about that-”
“Talk later!” she quickly cut you off as she dragged you out of a dark tunnelway and into the middle of a huge crowd of people! You could finally see the sky again, so it looks like youre out of that underground city.

From the looks of things, you seemed to have ended up in some sort of older Japanese style town. The place looked like something out of the 17-18th century, but somehow it was incredibly populated like modern day Tokyo. Not to mention, you noticed stores and signs in Japanese lit up with big flashy lights… kind of out of place for a 17-18th century setting!

“Just act casual,” Reisen whispers, “try to blend in and they wont spot us.”
“H...how are you still able to keep moving with those wounds?” you couldnt help but nag, “you really need to see a doctor!”
“I will!” she told you, “I'll let master take a look at me when we get back to Eientei.” And there we go!
“E..Eientei?” you got a bit tense remembering when your sister took you OUT of there! “b-but...”
“What's wrong?” your pal looked a bit worried, “y-you dont wanna go back with me?”
“Well, no, it's not that, I just-”
“Oh! Whew, I'm glad!” she sighed in relief. Although youre relieved you didnt hurt her, part of you regrets giving her that answer. “In the meantime, we just need to find a place to lay low. ...AH! Here's one!”

Normally you'd take up the offer of joining Anna's stupid rebel army just for the sake of saving Reisen who you still wonder may currently be carrying your soon-to-be-developing child.
