"No," she corrected you, "technically youre MINE. After everything I did to protect you, youre gonna assume that I didnt want anything in return?! Youre not 'free' of any obligation. You just owe ME an obligation!"
You went silent for a moment, trying to soak up what she just said, "W...what are you saying?"

Anna sighed hard, "Alex, dont tell me you honestly havent learned anything under us. Did you seriously forget the rule of a fairy's obligation?"
"A fairy never offers or accepts a favor without expecting one in return. ....!!!" your eyes then widened. You didnt want to believe it, but...
You dont get enough time to ponder it before you see Reisen dart into the room and-

*Bang!*

“Arrrggh!!” put a bullet in Anna's leg! Your sis after screaming in pain lost her balance and fell to the floor. You dont get even a short moment to drop your jaw, seeing Reisen free and wearing her ovaries on the outside again! And your sister doesnt get a short moment to get up before Reisen plucks a moon shaped hairpin from her hair and points in just in front of Anna's eyeball! Your sis was flinching uncontrollably just from it being near her! Is that Holy Iron, too?!

“You make ONE move,” Reisen warned, “you get a burning eye-socket to match that ear.” Anna gritted her teeth, but instead of fighting back, she didnt move at all. The hairpin must be Holy Iron.

Pretty soon, the room flooded with moon rabbits in militia garb similar to Reisen's. A couple of them untied you while a few others tied up Anna with your special friend still threatening her with the hairpin.
“R-Reisen?! H… how did you escape? I mean just you heard you screaming-”
Reisen let out that exact same piercing shriek you heard earlier! So she can act, too. Wow.

“I told you I'd be alright, Alex-sama!” Reisen's voice suddenly changed a lot more uppity when it was directed at you, “I have a lot of friends in high places.” Well, maybe what Tewi said about her family means something. “Now let's get going. This place is gonna turn into a war zone in a few minutes.” Although you worry for your sister, you took Reisen's hand and hoped she knew what she was doing.

“Oh! Wait!” Speak of the devil, she looked down at your sister, “Hey, Anna-chan?”
Anna got a good hard look at her brother getting liplocked by that same damn purple haired demoness that raped him in his sleep! You on the other hand were briefly blissing out accepting Reisen's outrageously passionate oral embrace for the second time. Reisen's red eyes were on Anna's the whole time, making sure she was watching just who she was kissing! Cold. Stone cold.

After practically signing her own warrant to Anna, Reisen pulled her salivating tongue out of your mouth and dragged you off with her.

Fortunately, your bunny-captor/protector was there to hold your hand and carefully guide you out of the line of fire. She kept both your head and hers hunkered down under covered (despite risking her bunny ears being shot off) and navigated through the terrain of debris and bullet-resistant makeshift cover. It's almost as if she's done this kind of thing before.

“Dont be scared, Alex-sama,” she cutely coaxes you in the middle of a war zone, “we'll be out of here real soon.”
“Er...h..how… how did you… how are you… I mean-” halfway through your haphazard question, you think about it and practically answer it yourself, “...wait. Was Tewi actually right about the Udongein Inaba clan?”
“She certainly is!” she was so badass, she gave a prideful smile while bullets were raining down on her, “The Udongein Inaba family are the highest in the military chain! The highest in Lunar Central Intelligence with connections all across the moon and parts of the earth!” That does explain a bit. She can get not only a doctor (after plucking out a bullet from her own wound) but an army on such short notice cuz of her rank!

Not only that, she got a ride to escape too! She hopped into the conveniently placed armored jeep with you along and said something to the driver in some sort of arabic language which the driver gave a nod and floored it.

Despite the ride not being so smoothly (and wishing it came with seatbelts) Reisen was still cool and calm while giving directions and orders in that second language to her driver.

“It's Farsi, actually,” she corrected you (as if you knew the difference), “our clan has great ties with the Persian youkai from trading to arms dealing.” And DRUG dealing! “Yep, the Houraisan royal family would probably be under enslavement if not for us! Heck, if things were different, WE wouldve been royalty!” Princess Reisen?

Smoke blowing aside, sounds like your mentally ill friend is one hell of an ally. You just might need one now that youre beginning to question who you thought was supposed to be your sister. Sure, you knew she was just ASSIGNED that role, but you still thought it was official! But instead, she sees you as just someone who owes a favor like all those OTHER fairies? What exactly is she up to?

Better question, what is REISEN up to?

"Where are we go-" before you could ask, just as the jeep was leaving the village, you noticed Anna's troops raised the bridge! Shoulda figured your sis wasnt gonna make it that easy.

111312122212.title: St.Anger round my neck

choices: Tell her you never saw him in your life!
1113121222121.content:
"Uh, Alex-sa-"

Suddenly, you grabbed the bunny girl with both arms and held her tightly before she could get the first word in! You squeezed her as hard as you could, which in your condition wasnt very strong. And even if you had the strength to muster a bear-hug, she'd probably be too super-human for it to inflict any major damage. Unlike sis.

"Are you alright, Reisen?!" you questioned for her safety as you continued holding her tightly, "I'm really REALLY sorry about my sister. Sometimes she's just too damn overzealous for her own good. Are you ok? How's your neck? Would you like a massage?"

Reisen suddenly got kinda jittery in your loving and affectionate embrace! "Er, n-no... that's quite alri-OOOOOooo!!" As soon as you began massaging her neck, she fell into absolute bliss. She was reduced to putty as you got to work on the sensitive parts that no doubt had the worst amounts of pain. She, much like all the others, could not resist those magical fingers of yours. Heck, if theyre good enough for the Erlking’s daughters, theyre good enough for your wife!

…the MASSAGES, I mean!

“Feel better?” you asked.

“Muuuuuch…” she mumbled in ecstasy with her eyes rolled back and her lips drooling. Sadly for her, your loving embrace and divine massage of the Heavens came to an end. She snapped out of her trance the second you let her go.

“Once again, I’m REALLY sorry about what my sister did,” you apologized, “I shouldnt have played dead like that and fooled her into thinking I was in trouble.”
Fortunately for you, Reisen gave you an assuring smile, “Dont worry about it, Alex-sama. I’ve been through far worse pain than that. I’d pretty much have to be a patient in a hospital like this one. A lot of the girls here are either incredibly strong or shoot incredibly strong projectiles!” It was relieving to see her still up and at ‘em even after getting in a face-to-face confrontation with Big Sis and surviving!

“More importantly, what about YOU?” Reisen asked, “I remember you telling Anna-san about your fear of Le Fey. Surely, you didn’t do anything THAT bad to make you completely think youre fated to be killed by them!” Oh dear. She had to say such a thing. Not that you had any right to be offended by her sheer curiosity. Your future wife (or one of them) had a right to know.
“I disobeyed an order,” was the simplest answer you could give her.
“An order?” Reisen tilted her head, “ONE order? Just one?” You nodded. “Um, what was the order?”

“Kill my sister.”

Reisen sucked in air deeply and her bunny ears twitched as if realizing she hit a major nerve. It didnt bother you any.
“My boss’s clients caught wind that my sister was taking jobs for one of our rival gangs in order to pay for a safe and secluded nestegg to seek refuge from Le Fey. Maeve had my sis tied up and gagged and demanded I shoot her and take her place or I‘d suffer a worse fate than she would.”
“That’s horrible! What did you do?”
“It was kind of blur, but I ended up shooting Maeve in the chest then I was running for my life and the next thing I knew I wound up somewhere around where my sis and your doctor saved me and patched me up.”
Your biggest regret is that you didn’t kill the great Elven Queenpin. No man can.

“Hm,” Reisen had a hard time finding the right words to say. Not much she could say to soften the mood at the moment. Except maybe this, “Well, your sister is right. Youre safe here. We’re all practically living in hiding.” Her bunny ears lowered, “Some of us for bigger reasons than others. Still, you have nothing to worry about here.”

You nodded in agreement, your mind already changed a while ago, “I know. And now I have an incentive to KEEP fighting on. Cant let all my wives down, can I?”
She smiled nervously, “Actually, I kinda lied. There is no Moon Rabbit breeding law.” She scratched the back of her head, “I sorta made the whole thing up. Heh, cant believe EIRIN of all people believed me!” Wait. So youre NOT gonna be shared with her mother and sisters?! Why the hell does this disappoint you? If anything, you should be suspicious!

“Hell of a bluff,” you had to admit.
“But seriously, I didnt mean ill will to your sister!” the bunny girl got on the defensive again, “you have my word, I wouldnt have gone any further with you than I already did if she didnt barge in.”
“You wouldnt?” that response kinda disappointed you, “that’s a shame. I savored every moment you had with me.”
“ER, d-did I say I wouldn’t have gone further? I… I meant to say I WOULDVE gone further! MUCH further! Yeah, awake or not, I’da had you crying out in pleasure, squealing out in raw delight until I squeezed you dry and filled my belly enough to make octuplets!” Hah! She then crossed her arms and lifted her chin as she reeked with pride, "Yep, it's dangerous to mate with a rabbit youkai. We're far harder to keep up with than any bland human female!" Gotta love a girl with guts.

“Well, in that case,” you stood up and scooted up closer to the bunny girl giving her what you thought was a pervy smirk, “you up for Round 2, Ms. Udongein Inaba?”

But instead of seeing her go all bashful like you expected (or frigging jump you right then and there!), she frowned. “Sorry, Alex-sama. I think I mighta pulled something earlier.” She cringed in pain as she rubbed her aching backside.

“If you’d like, I could massage that too.”

“I-I-I…. I better get to bed, it’s getting late! Good night, Alex-sama!” she wanted to end the discussion awfully quick. And even then you took the initiative. As soon as she raised her head from her bow, you snuck a quick kiss on the lips, causing her to go all bashful again!
“Goodnight, Reisen-chan,” you winked.

She hid away her blush then bowed again with a smile before trotting off with an eye-catching sway to her hips…
“Ow. Ow. Ow. Ow.” too bad it was hurting her money-maker trying to make her money. Yet despite the intense pain she was having, she still seemed adamant to swoon you with her sexy hip sway! You could stop yourself from snickering when she wasnt looking!

Dang. Quite the change you’ve had this very night. Thanks to your new friend, youre practically seeing the better side of living dangerously. Granted, she’s probably too mentally unsound for you and lord knows she’ll end up hurting you LITERALLY, but that’s part of the joy in living dangerously. So what if she's a little crazy? You love crazy!

Speaking of living dangerously, the pain you were feeling seemed to subside. It still hurt a little to stretch, but the pain was manageable by this point. However, you couldnt sleep. It was getting late and you werent in the least bit tired. You werent up for watching any tv nor did you want to read a book. Against your better judgement, you thought the best course of action would take a little walk outside. You probably werent allowed to leave your room, but as stated earlier, youre living dangerously!

So you hopped up out of your bed, zipped your pants back up, and waltzed out of your room without a care in the world! The hallway was a little dark but it didnt bother you... what with you living dangerously and all.

Unfortunately it was so dark, you inadvertently bumped into a wall. Well, actually a bean bag. Two bean bags to be exact. Considering your luck, your heart race assuming awful quickly what these 'bean bags' really were and jumped back asap! You tried keeping a very straight face as you raised your head to face eye-to-eye the very tall blue haired woman standing before you who thankfully seemed unconcerned that your head was in her cleavage! Then again, that in itself might not necessarily be a good thing.

You gave your undivided attention to this tall woman in a blue dress with a blue bow in her hair and what looked like six blue icicles floating behind her back like wings of some sort. Her blue eyes locked onto yours as she stared with what seemed to be slightly pouty expression. It reeked of immaturity.

"Ey, twerp!" her matured deepened didnt match the childish tone in it, "ya wouldnta happened to see another little twerp by the name of... of..." She pulled out a piece of paper and read it out, "Al... ex...and...er... W...whi...t.....white... yeah, White. Ss....s....sto....ne... dis guy?" It was a bounty letter with your name written in bold! You then took a quick glance over at the fancy golden bracelets on her wrists. They bare the little fairy insignias you recognize as a calling card.

LE FEY'S calling card!

Geez, a guy cant get some decent shut-eye around here! As soon as your eyes opened, you glanced over at Tewi and Reisen arguing over something. Sadly, Reisen resorted to shouting to get her point across. Not good for your ears. Then again, considering the kind of manipulative brat Tewi is, she probably has darn good reason to be so angry.
The two of them finally stopped their bickering and noticed youre wide awake.

"Morning, hubby!" Reisen greeted with a smile, giving you a hefty reminder of what occurred last night (Er... AFTER the sex, I mean!)
"Morning, 'HUBBY'!" Tewi greeted with a wide grin as your 'wife' glared at her.

"Good morning Reisen. Morning Tewi," you smiled back at them. Someone owed you a big explanation, but that wasnt your top priority at the moment. The top involves that fairy you met last night that has a contract with your name on it! She may have been dumb as a brick, but she was built like a brick house (urge to motorboat was rising!) and she could be but one of many hired mercenaries now hunting you down.

"Guys, there's something important I need to talk about," you were more than ready to tell them about it.

"Same here!" but Tewi thought HER important matter was more important than yours, "do you mind if we talk about your future?"
"Tewi!" the purple-haired rabbit woman seemed rather fed up.
"I'm asking HIM!" replied the short rabbit-runt, "listen Al, may I call you Al?"
"No you cant!" Reisen replied but was ignored.
"Look Al. Did you know that moon rabbits are over 99.9% female? Male moon rabbits are so rare that a majority of us live our whole lives without seeing one."

"Wow that's... horrible," you werent prepared to hear such trivializing facts about endangered species.

"It is!" Tewi nodded, "and all of us living here in Eientei are all women. We cant breed and keep our bloodlines going without men, so... well, YOURE a man, so-"
"NO! Mr. Whitestone is NOT sleeping with the other girls here!" youwhoknow stated.
"But Rei, this is our big chance to keep the moon rabbit race going!" Tewi insisted like it was an understandable opportunity... at least until she added, "...plus, I think a good hump will fix Eirin's sour attitude. Lord knows she could use one!"
"M-MASTER?! YOU-" uh oh. Apparently bringing Reisen's boss into this tipped her over the edge, "...I'm gonna bury you alive in one of your pot holes!!"
Despite being a little croggy, you were in tip top shape to hold back that mentally ill bunny girl from horribly slaughtering her coworker.

“Tewi?” you say nicely while restraining Reisen, “I’m afraid that’s not going to happen. I am more of a one woman kind of guy.” Your mate seemed to relax her struggle quickly after hearing that.

“But Al!” Tewi whined, “we’re desperate for mates to keep our bloodline going! Besides, it’s not like youre gonna get babies from HER!”

Suddenly, everything went quiet. Little Tewi put both hands to her mouth, realizing she might have hit far below the belt. Whatever she meant by that, it was enough to make Reisen surge furiously. With a quick swift superhuman swing of her arm, she easily swung you off her and turned her bloodthirsty rage to the shrimp!
“O….oops…” the poor little twerp froze up and shivered, realizing she may have something WAY too much! It was a good thing you couldn’t see the look Reisen was giving her…

“Eaaaa-UGH!”
Thank the heavens for a convenient distraction coming from outside! All three of you turned your attention to the noise.
“MOKOI!!” Reisen and Tewi shouted in unison.

All three of you made a dash to the door to see what’s going on. When all three of you stepped outside, all turned of you turned to see a poor white haired girl with white bows in her hair and red suspenders and parachute pants writhing on the ground in pain thanks to her opponent she was apparently losing against.
That big buxom blue haired fairy from last night!

Sonovabitch! What’s SHE still doing here?! You expected the bunny girls to leap in and help who you assume is their friend in need, but instead they seem to be busy staring flabbergasted at the fairy.
“Now ya gonna tell me where yer little bro is?!” the fairy put her hands to her hips and gave her an immature smug smile.
The white haired girl gradually picked herself back up, “Urgh… what on earth are you talking about?! I don’t have a brother!”
“Tsk! Ya think ya can fool me, fire lady?!” the fairy pointed to herself, or rather pointed to her incredibly large easily jiggly bosom, “I already knows about you and yer bro’s antics! Hand the squirt over and I wont turn ya into an ice cube and drop ya in my tea!”

Aw crap, she’s confused this girl with your sister!

The fairy saw Reisen’s finger projectiles long before you did as she didn’t so much as turn her head before raising a huge ice wall to block the bullets!
“Do yous bunnies mind?” the big fairy turned with a snooty sneer totally unfitting for someone her age! “I’m in the middle o’ business here!”

“C-Cirno?! I-Is that you?!” oh goody. Tewi knows her too! “g-geez what happened to you?! ...And did you actually kick Mokoi's ass?”
“CIRNO?!” Reisen couldn’t believe her bunny ears, “THAT brick house is Cirno?!”
The ice fairy turned her attention to the kid and her partner, “Heh. Jealous, little bunnies? Not only am eye the strongest, I’m the biggest, fittest, muscliest, and smexyest! Aint that right, James?” AW DANG IT!!

The bunny girls looked confused as you pretended to ignore Cirno. Too bad Cirno was not the type to be ignored.
"Yo James!" Cirno got a little perturbed... and you felt her outrageously ice cold aura intensify, "I done asked ya a question! Ya gonna answer it?!" You dare not underestimate a fairy wearing bracelets of high Le Fey rank like those. You seen the kind of damage a few of Maeve's private goons wearing those bracelets could do.
"James?" Both Tewi and Reisen turned their heads at you with squinted eyes.

"Uh... yep! Of course! Definitely!" you constantly winked your eye, "She's a total one-woman wrecking ball!"
"Uh, yer eye got a bad itch or something?" a NINE-ball apparently.

You keep winking your eye, hoping the two will not blow your cover. Only bad things'll happen if this idiot finally figures out youre the Alex she's looking for! Surely, theyre not as dumb as this fairy, right?

"What's going out there?" eirin asked.

She was stunned to hear this and when you explained to her, she understood where you were coming from. She then summoned her bow and arrow and equipped with it.

She nodded and went to aid reisen. You looked at the door and grabbed the knob, twisting it and opened the door. You got into the room and saw your big sister sleeping soundly on her bed. She giggled lightly and she rose her arms. You suddenly felt an chill down the spine as the dark aura was getting denser, she smiled at you as she killed other people.

"I'm still the same Little brother. I'm still your beloved big sister, and I have protected you for many years." Anna said, "And now, your wish will be granted through me."

She then rushed toward you and grabbed your face. You felt some pain and struggled to get her off of you but with no avail. The purplish aura then suddenly came through the arm and engulfed your. You felt the evil, resentful power from this aura and anna smiled.

"Now, engulf yourself with the power that I wield to kill the vermins...the power of your own shadow." Anna spoke.

"Anna...!!" You spoke in pain.

Moment later, you felt the dark energy rush through and you screamed in pain...

11131212221211121.title: Shadow fight

111312122212112.content:
"Good morning, Mr. Whitestone!" greeted your friendly neighborhood doctor savior, smiling sweetly at you.. instead of staring at you intensively while you sleep and then having her way with you like your 'wife'.
"Good morning, Eirin," you got up and stretched as she put a bowl of cereal next to your bed. Plain cereal, nothing special and luxurious like the food they used to serve back in Le Fey… but you’d sooner eat tasteless hospital food than anything decent that reminds you of them!

“I certainly hope you’ve slept well,” Eirin’s smiling face seemed a bit worried, “despite um… her.”

“I slept fine, thanks,” you assured her.

“Good, good,” the doctor got close to you, wanting to discuss something very important, “so… about last night… with Ms. Udongein Inaba… is there something we need to discuss in private?”
You shook your head, “No, nothing you dont already know.”
“You sure?” she raised her eyebrow, “I mean… when she… you know… it was purely consensual? You weren’t drugged or anything?” Oy, THIS is what it’s about?!
“No I was perfectly clean,” you answer with a shred of discomfort, “I’m sorry I helped cause a scene… especially with Anna. I didnt mean any trouble by it. I just… I got a little too curious for my own good, you know?”

“So… you alright with my patient?”
“I wouldnt have called her my wife to my sister if I wasnt.”

“That’s… that’s good to hear,” she said with a bit of relief, but uneasiness still dwindled, “I’m glad that you managed to get along very well with Reisen… however, I dont think it’s an idea to refer to her as your wife at the moment. I mean no offense, but she‘s still not exactly in the correct state of mind for um… THAT kind of occupation.”

“You don’t have to sugar-coat it,” you say to her, “I know what youre saying. But it’s my decision. I will cope with it.”
“Then…” Eirin swallowed, “…you better make sure she takes her meds. Otherwise, she may be prone to violent outbursts. And especially try not to tease her too much!” Ugh. Such is ‘living dangerously’.

Speaking of ‘living dangerously’ and ‘last night’…

“Speaking of last night,” that reminds you, “I saw somebody sneak into Eientei late last night.”

You had the doc‘s undivided attention. ”Who?”

“I think a hired mercenary of Le Fey,” you told her, “she had a bounty contract on her with my name on it!”
Her eyes widened and she went for a pencil and notepad, “Can you describe her?”

“Very tall, possibly built, long blue hair, blue dress with white triangle designs near the folds,” Eirin squinted her eyes while you continued, “blue bow in her hair and these big white ice crystals sticking out of her back like some abstract wings.”

Eirin cringed with disbelief. It seems like she’s having doubts about her drawing. “Is… THIS her?” She drew a picture of a cute little chibi-version of your assassin. Same bratty face, but short and in child form!

“That’s pretty close,” you answer, “but the merc from last night was much older, taller, built like an amazonian!” You wanted to refrain from commenting on her chest. Although she had quite a lot of it!
“We cant be talking about the same girl,” she denied, “Cirno’s tiny, bratty, dumb, annoying and harmless to anyone except frogs!”
“Well, this assassin seemed bratty and dumb,” you said, “but she didnt seem harmless. Looked like she could bench press me with one of those icicles…” Dang it, why did you have to say that out loud?!

“That is weird,” she commented, “maybe Cirno’s got some distant relatives nearby…” Or maybe there’s something to do with those stupid bracelets of hers! “Anyways, I’ll pass the message to the Princess and let the other patients know to keep an eye out for intruders.”
“Let my sis know, especially!” you insist, “Le Fey’s still after her too!”

“I’m afraid she’s already left Eientei,” Eirin delivered the bad news.
“Oh right. How far is Scarlet Manor from here?”
“She’s not there,” Eirin delivered more bad news, “she said she had to make a last minute change of plans and she went to meet an associate of hers.”
“Where is she going?”
“She made me promise not to tell you,” Eirin delivered even more bad news! “said it was an emergency and didnt want you involved.” Not again, you thought. She wants YOU to stay safe while SHE’S out putting her ass on the line for nothing?! Dang it, wasn’t that damn burn bad enough for her?!

You pulled out your cellphone and called her up, but sonovabitch, she blocked your number.

“I’m sorry, Alex,” Eirin apologized, “I tried to talk her out of it, but…”
“She’s too damn stubborn,” you answered for her. Stupid Anna. What was she thinking?

“Don’t worry, Mr. Whitestone, I’m sure she’ll be fine,” Eirin tries to comfort you, “I’m going to need to go spread word to the Princess about the intruder. By all means hit the buzzer if you need anything. And once again, dont overdo it.”
“Thank you, doctor,” you say your thanks. As soon as she walked out, you try to call up your sister again, but you were still blocked. You call up one of her ‘alternate’ numbers, but even they were blocked. Even sending a simple text was to no avail. Man, why the sudden last minute secrecy to her own brother? Something big was up, you just know it. Maybe she got wind of the local bounty and wanted to… do something about it.

“You damn sure better not get yourself killed,” you muttered. No soon after that mutter did you notice last minute that you had another name under your Contact list besides Anna.
“Reisen?!” her name was in your contact list, “when did she get a hold of my phone?!”
Eh, you probably didnt wanna know.

Besides, it presented some opportunity to pass the time. Do you feel like calling her up? Or maybe feel like passing the time some other way? Getting out of your room and stretching your legs?

11131212222.content:
"What is going on here? What's all that noi-" suddenly, a black haired woman wearing what appeared to be a pink silk buttoned shirt over a red kimono walked into the room and the first thing that caught her eye was your darling sister putting that poor bunny girl in a sleeper hold while pointing a gun to her head! Without any care or concern of her own being, she actually lunged at Anna, attempting to pry her arms off Reisen's neck!

"Stop it!" she demanded as she attempted to wrestle the gun out of Anna's hand, "Stop it this instant!!"
"Let go of me, Kaguya!" your sister roared, "I'm giving this bitch what she deserves!"
"I give you... rggh... and your brother sanctuary..." Kaguya struggled, "...and you repay me by trying to kill one of my subordinates?!"
"L-Lady Kaguya...." you could hear Reisen groan with a little admiration in her voice, "..you came here... to save me...."

You really shouldve shouted again and told Anna to stop, but instead you just kept your mouth shut and lied back down in your bed, pretending to still be asleep! Not sure why. Maybe because you just wanted to see where this dispute would go... even at the expense of that poor ill bunny girl who was only guilty of simply pleasuring herself... with you. Your member was still squirting a little semen from the intense ride it still hasnt recovered from!

Thankfully, despite that short temper of hers, Anna finally cooled down. She growled a bit, but she finally slammed her gun on the desk and dropped Reisen, leaving her to cough and wheeze on the floor!
"Now, tell me what's going on!" Kaguya demanded from your sister, "or I will have you permanently removed from my mansion!"

"Your goddamn subordinate," she pointed your way, "just got through raping my brother in his sleep!" Kaguya gasped at your pantsless body and twitching shaft finishing squirting out the last drops of post-sex cum! She quickly jerked her head away and her face went red. Then so did yours!

"Is this true, Reisen?" she questioned Reisen.

Finally finished catching her breath, she lowered her head and nodded, "Y-Yes, my lady."
*Smack!*
You almost flinched yourself see that epic smack across Reisen's face! Yikes! Kaguya certainly doesnt take insubordination well.

"HOW DARE YOU!!" she shouted at the bunny girl, "you disgusting perverted swine! Just when I seriously think your disturbing antics couldnt get any worse, you actually do THIS?!" Kaguya mercilessly scolded Reisen as she kept her head low in shame. "Unbelievable AND unacceptable! ...You KNEW it wasnt even your turn!"

'Wasnt even her turn'?

You jerked your head to her for a split second then resumed pretending to sleep after you heard her utter that.

"Wait!" Anna suspected something fishy about that statement to, "wasnt even her turn?"
"I'm dreadfully sorry, Ms. Whitestone," Kaguya apologized, "she clearly knew that her breeding time with your brother wasnt even until late next week! It was clearly posted on the calendar, wasnt it?"
"Y-Yes, Lady Kaguya."

Anna was speechless! For good reason! Reason that would result in the horrible massacre of the person or people responsible!

"A-A-Am I hearing this right?!" Anna gave Kaguya the Sneer that caused Reisen to flinch, "did you honestly just imply that your little bunny bimbo was SCHEDULED to screw my brother?!"
"Um, yes?" surprisingly, Kaguya was unaffected by the Sneer, "he's scheduled to breed with every fertile lunarian in Eientei." Your eyes widened and quickly closed.
"Like hell he is!" your sis snapped, "that was not part of the deal!"

"Um, yes it was," Kaguya corrected her, "that was the whole purpose of the deal! I offer your brother sanctuary, and he offers heirs to the fertile females of this place. That was our agreement!"

"You lying rat!" Anna sneered some more, "I NEVER agreed to that!"
"LYING RAT?! You have some nerve!" Kaguya sneered back, "you most certainly DID agree!"
"I most certainly did not!"
"Yes. You. Did. I told you specifically. SPECIFICALLY what Eientei needed. I went through hefty detail discussing why we need a young fruitful and endowed male here."
"Wha-"
I told you the very tale of why moon rabbits produce so incredibly few males in their species!"
"I-"
"I even had Tewi and her friends perform the lunarian play about the Moon Goddess and the curse she placed on the rabbits of the moon!"
"..B..."
"And when I did ALL that, you said and I quote 'Sure, Kaggie! Little Ally here gonna make you lotta babies! LOOOOTTA babies'!"

'Little Ally', she said? Was she drunk when she made that deal?! The only time she EVER calls you 'Little Ally' is when she's pissed drunk and making REALLY bad decisions! How can you possibly forget '*Hic!* Why sure, Big Erl! Little Ally's got them magic hands'll make them little girls o' yours feel REALLY good!" She was honestly surprised the Erlking's daughters were coming by dang near every night for free massages?!

Anna was... once again, speechless. This time not in anger. Mainly embarrassment. She hammered her forehead with her fists a couple of times, realizing what a dumb dumb DUUUUUUUUUMB thing she done!
"L-Look, I dont care what I said when I was filling up on sake!" Anna said, "I cant let my brother do that!"
"Well then perhaps you shouldnt have signed the paper!" Kaguya was not willing to budge.
"M-maybe we can work out another deal!" your sis attempted to barter, "I know a couple of high paying people with big pockets and a lot of rare fancy jewels!"
"I already HAVE all the money in the world," Kaguya crossed her arms and said with pride, "what I dont have are strapping men that could help my servants and soldiers produce offspring!"
"W...what about-"

"Um... I… I think it's my turn now," and as if the night couldnt get any worse, yet another person barges into your room uninvited! ….Eirin! Flashing what looked to be a raffle ticket with the name 'Alex-sama' on it!

“...YOU?!” Anna was furious, “YOURE IN ON THIS, TOO?!!”

The doc's eyes widened, “W-w-wait, Ms. Whitestone! This isnt what it looks like!” She hid her raffle ticket… and her bottle of hormonal enhancing pills behind her back, “I-I-I was merely scheduling a doctor's appointment for him! Oops.” Were those fuzzy cuffs that dropped out of her shirt collar?!

Anna quickly grabbed the nearest conveniently placed ice pick and chased after the doctor who quickly ran off screaming off the top of her lungs!

“Ms. Whitestone!” Kaguya ran after them, “if you dare impale Eientei's only medical expert….!!” And with that, it was just you and Reisen again. On the plus side, there was finally peace and quiet. On the minus side, it was just you and Reisen again.

Despite her neck still in pain from the choking received from your sister, her glowing red eyes still gazed your way. Or rather, she was gazing at that pecker of yours. Why were you STILL pretending to be asleep?!
Thankfully, instead of going for Round 2 and risking Anna's ice pick, she pulled out a handkerchief from her shirt pocket and wiped off the uh… 'runoff'. How uh, courteous.

“Goodnight Alex sir,” Reisen whispered, “and thank you for giving me your life-giving seed,” she smiled brightly, “as well as the fun. It felt really good *Smooch!*” She gave you a goodnight kiss. Even though you pretended to sleep, you couldnt pretend enough not to blush.
And after that kiss lingered on your cheek, Reisen finally left your room.
“SNIIIIIIFFF… ahhhh….” right after taking a large disturbing sniff of that handkerchief!

Whelp, Eientei certainly will take some getting used to. Provided Anna didnt screw this up by murdering the doctor who just saved your life. Youre quite a bit worried about what tomorrow will bring. But at least all this drama has finally made you tired for real this time. You close your eyes for real and drift off, finishing up that rest you need for tomorrow.

Provided nobody else rudely barges in of course!
11131212222.title: The best deals are the kind that are done SOBER!

111312122221.content:
Surprisingly, you manage to have no trouble sleeping despite that whole episode you pretended to be oblivious to. You dont recall the dream you had throughout the sleep. Something about an old wrecked supermarket haunted by a bloodthirsty ghost that hunts you down after you call out the name 'Beth'. Anyways, morning came before you knew it. You were up with the chickens before the alarm clock even went off.

Your back however was a little sore, thanks to a certain bunny-girl that got in touch with her inner-cowgirl! Despite your pelvis being a little achy, you got dressed and headed out, trying not to limp too much.

After a long walk down a long quiet hall, you come across a room that you overhear arguing… with two familiar voices.

“HIC! SuRe KaggIE! Li'l Ally here gon' make you a LOTTA babies! *Hic!* LOOOOTTA babies!” the face you made was priceless after you heard your own sister make such a drunken slur!

“See?! That was YOU slurring those words!” then you overheard Kaguya's rather furious tone come from that room. Curious you peeked into the room and see Kaguya replaying what looks to be a surveillance video to your incredibly nervous sister!

“That… that's not me!” Anna denied.

“Yes it most certainly is you!” Kaguya corrected, “same hair, same dress, same pointy ears you still seem to be trying to hide for some reason! YOU MADE THE DEAL!”

“Y-you cant prove that's me,” your sister was incredibly stubborn, “how do I know that wasnt just an impersonator you hired to try to scam me out of selling out my brother?!”
“Dear Chang'e almighty, is your head so far up your ass that youre getting high off the suppository Eirin stuffed up you?!”
That was clearly gonna take a while. You'd best not disturb those two and cause an even bigger scene. Your sister's in enough trouble as it is. No reason to waltz in there and 'confront' her for what you already know…

Besides, speaking of confrontations, just a short distance away, you spot that particular bunny girl from last night that ended up being your third sexual experience (the second was Maeve as part of your 'initiation'. The first… it was Anna. Years ago. She was drunk and she thought you were too young and naive to understand what she was doing to you. She was wrong.)

You notice Reisen had carried a rather large backpack on her back. It was thick and huge, almost her size (not counting the length of her bunny ears)! As much as your sister was most likely holding a grudge against her, you approached Reisen from behind.

"Good morning, Reisen!"

"!!!" the bunny girl almost jumped up and hit the ceiling regardless of the huge backpack weighing her down. After her bunny ears unstiffed, she turned around and smiled nervously.
“Oh! H-Hi Alex, sir!” you could see her sweat a little, “d-did you manage to sleep well?”
You smiled, “Oh yes! I dont think I've slept this well in ages! ...Although I coulda sworn I heard somebody call out 'Alex-sama' in the middle of the night, though.” Heh. You couldnt resist.

Reisen's face went completely red. She quickly turned away, hoping you didnt see the blush (you so freaking did!)
“W-Well! I-I'm glad to hear that! ...I certainly hope you'll get to sleep well tonight too,” was that an invitation? “N-Now if you'll excuse me.”
“Where are you going?” you asked because you were filled to the brim with curiosity.

“I have to deliver a huge supply of medicine to a new client of my master over at the Human Village,” she answered.
“Yikes! And ALL that is drugs you gotta carry?!” you pointed to the huge backpack.
She nodded, “Normally, it's much much smaller. However, this particular new client is a huge buyer. They tend to purchase our products in huge loads!” Geez, that cant be good for her back!

“You look like you could use a hand. All that weight's gotta be killing you!” youre a gentleman. Of course youre gonna be worried.
“That's alright. I've done a lot of heavy lifting back at my old job,” she assured you “I HAD to. But thank you for being concerned about me!” Now youre curious about her old job, but she didnt look like she had time to talk about it (not that she'd wanna talk about it, anyways!).

You noticed her cringe slightly painfully… well, actually, she merely twitched in discomfort, yet somehow you could easily detect that was a cringe of pain.
“Are you alright? You look a little sore,” you observed.
She got incredibly nervous, “Oh… th-that? No, I… mustve slept awkwardly in my sleep. N-Nothing big.” Translation: I got a charlie horse from riding you like one last night!
“Well, I know for a fact, when you got one of those kinda aches, the last thing you wanna do is add too much stress to it,” you pull that out of your ass, “so let me lend you a hand carrying those things to the Village.”

“I, er, appreciate your generosity,” Reisen was looking several directions as she was saying this, possibly checking for witnesses, “but it's incredibly dangerous to bring you along. T-too many wild youkai out there… outside and inside the village.”
“Dont worry, I cant take care of myself,” you assure her, “plus I've got some experience making great deals with clients. There was this female one from Russia who my sister absolutely hates for some reason, yet when sis offends her in some way or screws up a job really bad, I get just a few minutes alone with her, and that client magically forgets whatever headache my sis gave her! And I dont even know a single word of Russian, yet I can STILL manage to-”

“Alex sir? I really need to be going now,” aw, your story was about to get to the best part!
“Can I come along, please?” you keep nagging, “I promise I wont be in the way. Plus, if I'm gonna be staying here, I really should get used to what goes on over here. And...” you blush a little, “I think it'd helpful to get along with some of the employees. And I'm sure WE”RE gonna be working together an awful lot, so...”

Reisen's ears immediately stood on end again. She quickly jerked her head behind her, but not to look at you. She looked past you. You had a guess what she was looking out for. “Um… I would love to let you… but I dont think I'm allowed to.” She was right. She'd be getting herself in trouble. Most likely not just with your sis.

“Pleeeease?” still, you begged to come along, “I promise I wont get in the way. I'll do what you tell me. I wont be a burden! You have my word!”
Reisen, kinda sweating from slight terror from possible repercussions, while at the same time nervous from vulnerability to peer pressure thought for a moment, then finally answered...
111312122221.title: The Morning After

1113121222211.content:
"O...ok," the nervous bunny girl answers, against her better judgment but unable to refuse your generous irresistible offer! “...p...please dont tell anybody about this. E-e-especially your sister.”

“You have my word!” you vow as you happily assisted with the heavy load she was hauling on her back. It seemed as though the majority of the bulk was a rather large take with several hazmat stickers and warnings in another language.
“Be extremely careful with that,” Reisen warned, “that is nitroglycerin youre carrying.” NOW she tells you?! “that container should keep it protected very well. Still, dont try to run or bounce around too much. If you need to put it down, put it down VERY slowly.”
“O..Ok,” you begin to regret making your generous offer. But you've already come this far, no turning back now!

Fortunately for you, the walk toward the human village is a smooth and easy one after passing through the heavily trapped bamboo forest. But your still very nervous carrying such a large and very explosive chemical on your back. Reisen seemed equally nervous, but for a completely different reason. She looked like she was having a hard time hiding something. A really really big secret. And each time you turned your head to her, she trembled even more, no doubt this secret involved you. You were pretty sure you knew what this secret is, but you kept your mouth shut.

Not just because you found it cute watching the guilty bunny girl sweat. Also because it'll be rather awkward if word got out that you kinda VOLUNTEERED to be put in such a controversial position!

“Er… Alex… sir?” after a quiet awkward moment, Reisen finally breaks the silence.
“What is it?” you ask as she still looks uneasy.
“L-listen,” she swallowed, “...I dont know if you might have heard… but I think the Princess is gonna have you… uh… perform a certain task… tasks involving the other workers in Eientei.”
“What kind of task?” you ask, pretending to be dumb and enjoying watching Reisen sweat.
“Um...” she continues to sweat and blush, “...I havent heard that much yet. B-But I'm sure it's incredibly important to all of us!”
“Well, I'll be sure to do my best then!” you answered, making Reisen jerk her head away and blush even more, “er, whatever that task is.” Too bad that was the end of the conversation.

Shortly later, the two of you reached the village. Despite being called the Human Village, the place was heavily populated with a wide variety of unique people. There were people were animal ears, animal tails, animal faces, extra limbs, extra tails, wings, horns… you'd wage a guess and say that least 60% of the Human Village population were non-human. Made you feel like the odd one out.

Fortunately you didnt have to worry about that for long. The two of you reached your destination. A cramped shoddy flat in the middle of an alleyway barely lit up by a half-dead lightbulb hanging right over the door.

Reisen set her backpack down and you carefully set your huge nitro tank on the ground as she gave what you assumed to be a secret knock on the door. It took a little while before someone answered the door.
A woman. A tall slender woman, maybe a little over 6 feet tall, about your age in spectacles. It took only seconds to quickly recognize her and as soon as her eyes turned to you, she recognized you even quicker!

“Alex?! ALEX!!”

The next thing you knew, you were smothered against soft cushiony pillows that were the elegant breasts of Yumi Majima as she wrapped her arms around you and squeezed you tight!
“Alex, youre alright!!!” Big Yumi beam with excitement, still embracing you, still smothering you in boobage, “I'm so glad youre alright! I was worried Le Fey had gotten you!”
“N-N-nice to… nice see you too, Yumi!” you hugged back, but struggled in her grasp a little just to be able to speak. Reisen just stood there speechless. You could only imagine what she'd be feeling right that moment!

“Yumi?! What are you doing?! I told you to let the others answer the door!”
Just then, a one-eyed greasy-haired gentleman in a sleazy shirtless snake-skin jacket and leather pants wearing way too much cologne rushed over and scolded Yumi. And sure enough, as soon as you pulled your head out from her cleavage, you were quick to recognize this sleazy gentleman.

“...Alex? Alex-chan is that you?!” he rushed over to you when his little (using the term loosely) sister finally let go of you.
“Goro?” you were just as surprised to see him. Yet another one of your sister's old acquaintances youre very familiar with. Goro Majima. Former 7th Hand Yakuza affiliate now an owner of some porno movie industry. Damned if you know how he and Anna ever got along, but to be fair he's an awful lot nicer than many of her 'friends' ever been. Got along really well with all his sisters, too. Especially Big Yumi. You can only imagine the flash flood of tears rolling down her eyes if she finds out what Eientei's gonna be having you doing :( .

“A...Anna told me you were dead!” Goro stated. Obviously she wanted to keep you hidden from pursuers, “w-what are you doing here?”
“Mr. Whitestone and his sister are currently staying with us, Mr. Majima,” Reisen answers, “he is currently under care and servitude of the Princess until further notice.” Servitude?! Wait a sec!
“Heh, how bout that?” Goro chuckled, “it's as if fate itself doesnt want to keep us apart! Of course, if you and your sister were on the run, why didnt you just come to me. I woulda got you a nice safe house! Provided you dont mind sharing a room with Yumi over here.” Goro swayed his head to his big little sis who was currently blushing like mad. Reisen breathed heavily.

“Because Anna's worried you might push me to be in one of your films,” you answer truthfully. Reisen slowly turned her head to you with a cold blank expression.
Goro just shrugged his arms, “So?! Aint no shame in it! It's still an honest and fulfilling career that one can make a good living from. It's no different than being a Hollywood actor… except there aint no stunt doubles to do the hard work for you! You know what I'm saying, Yumi?”
“Goro!”

“Er, excuse me, Majima-san,” your bunny girl partner interrupted the siblings' discussion, “I dont mean to intrude, but we have supplies we need to drop off.” Ah yes, the delivery.
“Oh! Right right! Sorry Reisen! Totally forgot. HEY TOHRU! GET OVER HERE AND HELP ME CHECK THE INVENTORY!” So Goro and a couple of his goons inspected the boxes of questionable medicines that you and Reisen delivered. You questioned what Goro needs with a shit ton of odd medicine when he openly stated that he left the drug-dealing industry (to join the porn industry) but you know better than to ask too many questions.

They took quite an awful long time carefully inspecting the nitro tank. You hoped that it's for safety reasons, cuz you did not feel safe being around people constantly tapping it, shaking it around, pounding it against the ground and so forth! Thankfully the 'inspection' ended without an explosion.

“Ok. Everything's accounted for,” Goro finished the inventory check, scratching off the last item on his list and signing off for the purchase. Following that, Goro wrote up the check and handed it to Reisen. “Here ya go! That should cover everything. ….And a little something for you!”
“*GASP!*” the bunny girl flinched when that pervy sleazy ex-mob general stuffed a couple of bills down her blouse!
“Brother! What's wrong with you?!” Yumi scolded him.
“What? I still paid her good!”

Reisen, despite clearly being offended judging by the enraged glare in her eyes, controlled her temper and kept civil.

“Alright. We're finished here. Let's go, Alex-sa-”

“Hey! Dont leave already!” but Goro interjects, “it's been a while, Alex-chan! We got some catching up to do! Did you know Big Yumi just became an official Hollywood movie star?” That peeked your interest!
“Really Yumi?” And it's not one of GORO'S movies, too?!
Yumi smiled and blushed, “Well, it's not really THAT big a roll. I'm just in a few scenes with a few lines in an upcoming movie “ Still impressive enough if it's an actual Hollywood movie.

“Come inside, we'll tell you all about it!” Goro offered.
“Congratulations, Ms. Majima,” Reisen stated, “but we may need to hear about it another time. Alex-sama and I are on a tight schedule… and I'd rather not get in trouble with his sister (again)!”
“No worries, I'll talk to Anna!” he insists, “now c'mon! Dont keep a Hollywood star waiting!”

“Alex...sama...” Reisen looked at you pleading with a worried expression, “we really should be heading back.” You know why she's worried. You cant blame her.

Still, you'd like to catch up a bit with an old friend regardless of how much of an eyesore her big bro can be. Then again, you'd hate to get your brand new associate and possible mother of your future children in any more trouble than she already is (nevermind Anna got YOU in trouble making an incredibly outrageous deal while under the influence!)...

111312122221121.title: You spoke

1113121222212.content:
"Sorry, Alex," the purple-haired bunny-earred powerhouse with a back like a tank reluctantly refused, "I cant." You attempt to plead with her one last time, but you dont get to so much as open your mouth before she quickly adds, "I have to get going. I'll see you later, Alex!"

"Yeah, bye Reisen," you mutter in defeat. Yeah, it's probably for the best. You got her in enough trouble already (although to be fair, it was HER choice to sneak into your room and mount you!). Besides, you probably shouldnt devote TOO much of your attention on her considering youre meant to mingle with all the other girls in Eientei thanks to Kaguya and your lush of a sister!

You'd best start introducing yourself to them like a proper Alpha. And as the fates deemed it, your blind trekking led you to the doctor's office. Dr. Eirin Yagokoro's office to be exact. Hopefully, Anna didnt manage to hurt her that much.

With a nervous sigh, you knock on the door.

“Come in,” you hear her call. You walk in as she's in the middle of writing up notes. Without further ado, you holler, “Good morning, Dr. Yagokoro!”
Eirin froze for a few seconds. Not in surprise, but sortof in dread. She stopped writing and slowly turned her head before smiling back at you almost forcefully. Good, no ice pick stab wounds as far as you can see… which is VERY good, cuz Anna usually goes for the neck!

“Good morning Alex sa-...I mean, Mr. Whitestone!” she smiled as her eyes quickly darted around you, “did you need something?”
“I was wondering if you werent busy,” you say, “and if you are, I thought I could lend you a hand.”
“I already have plenty of aides for that,” Eirin says to you, “but since youre here… um...” She gets up out of her seat, walks toward you while checking behind you for something, “...I suppose I should give you your checkup for today. Um, your sister isnt around, is she?” So THAT'S what she's so stressed about!

“No, she's currently arguing with Kaguya about something,” you answer.
Eirin exhaled hard, “I see.” She shuts the door behind you and locks it, “Please have a seat over there.” You took your seat and waited paitently for Eirin to examine you. She took your temperature, checked the inside of your mouth, checked your ears, checked your heartbeat, checked your bloodpressure.
“I'm uh… gonna have to ask you to tilt your head and cough.”
I dont think I need to tell you what she checked THERE!

“We're um… *gulp*… almost done,” the doctor got even more nervous as she headed to a drawer and pulled out a bottle of pills, “I er, dont know if anybody told you about the… particular task that the princess requires you to fulfill to be allowed safehaven in Eientei.” It was probably gonna be nerve-wrecking to make her explain it to you, so you spared her the agony.

“I did overhear it when sis was talking to Kaguya,” you answer, “I'm supposed to breed with the inhabitants of this place cuz youre running short of fertile males?”
“Well, we dont have males PERIOD,” she corrects you, “but yes, that's hitting the nail on the head. I'm sorry that her majesty put you in such an awkward position. But the truth is we are that desperate. Most of the inhabitants here have never even seen a male in their lives, let alone mated with one. And we cant rely on magical experimentation to breed forever.”

“I understand, I understand,” you state, “to be honest, I'm kinda stuck between a rock and a hard place. If I leave this place, I'll be hunted down. If the cost of staying safe and sound is I'm banging a couple of bunny girls, so be it.”
“Hmph,” Eirin plucked out a pill from the bottle in her hand, “here. It's recommended you take one of these a day. It's a supplement to strengthen your immune system that prevents contracting any… diseases.” Didnt take more than a second to get her meaning!
“Venereal diseases?”
“D-Dont get me wrong! I'm not saying any of our girls are unclean. 99.9% are completely clean, I assure you! However… well, after engaging in sexual intercourse an awful lot of times, statistically you'll eventually be vulnerable.”

Eh, what the hell?
“Ok, sure thing,” you popped the pill in your mouth. Unfortunately, the nanosecond it hit your tastebuds, you nearly gagged at the foul, nasty, unbelievably horrendous taste coating it's shell! You cringed, your eyes watered, and you were desperately trying to relax the gag reflex! Of course medicine tastes awful, but WOW! You'd dip it in a dog turd if it could cover up some of that outrageously nasty taste!

“WATER! PLEASE! WATER!!” you gasped. Eirin quickly handed you a glass which you immediately chugged to force the pill down, then you gargled and spit out what was left, trying to get the remains of the taste out of your mouth. “AUGGGHH! I am so glad I didnt have breakfast yet!”

Eirin sighed, “I'm sorry. A lot of our medicine have very special preservatives to ensure extremely long shelf life. I'm well aware that they may affect the flavor of them.” No shitting, Dr. Strange! As much as you wanted to say that out loud, you politely kept your mouth shut. Besides, even if you opened it, all that'd come out are more groans of tastebud agony!

“So… *cough*… guess we're done with the checkup then?”

“A-almost,” Eirin got even more nervous, “um, it's not just the moon rabbit inhabitants youre meant to breed with.” AW HERE IT COMES! “The princess also suggests that you er… breed with Eientei's leading doctor because she believes it would lead to the birth of more potential doctors with her mental capacity for medical knowledge. And she certainly isnt too old to still bare children!” Does she still have her raffle ticket ready?

“Do you wanna do it now, Dr. Yagokoro?” you surprise her by how quick and to the point you were! Speaking of surprise, suprisingly, an older more mature and more experienced woman like Eirin seemed to be a bit shy and rather bashful.
“W...well, the thing is, u-um...” she stutters a little, “i-it's not like it's my first time, it's… it's just that… well, it's been awful long time since I've ever… done… that… so perhaps I'm in need of a little refresher course.”
You try to comfort her, “Dont worry about it. It's not like I can claim MY first time was very… glamorous, anyways.”

However, Eirin's face just gets even redder, “H-her majesty suggests that we engage in roleplay to help set the mood and spice things up.”
“Roleplay?” your eyes beamed with interest.

Her face remained red, “She… even gave me appropriate wear for this roleplay.”
'FUCK YEAH' screamed the voice in your head off the top of it's lungs! You attempt to make the best poker-face your face could give, but you were breathing HEAVILY!

“Well! Let's not waste any time!” you say with a hint of excitement in your voice, “Anna's not gonna arguing with your princess for long!”
The nervous and embarassed doctor lowers her head and sighs, “Wait here.” And she walked into the backroom. You sat there waiting a little impatiently for her to come back out, trying hard to contain your excitement. Like they say, 'Sex can be fun if you have fun with sex'! Damned if you know WHO said it, but hey!

Your heart was beating fast. But not as fast as the doc's! You can hear it coming all the way from the backroom. You could overhear her groaning and mumbling. Mostly curses. 'This is fucking stupid.' 'I cant fucking believe I'm actually doing this.' 'I cant believe this fucking thing actually fits.' and such.

“O-o-ok… I-I-I'm ready!” you heard her squeal.

You stared wide-eyed with absolutely no blinking whatsoever as she nervously stepped out the backroom, looking down at the floor, biting her lip. You could not and would not look away from Eirin as she came now wearing…

"Uh," Goro scratched his head, "I wasnt taking pictures. I was trying to film you two fucking, but my finger slipped. Why'd they put the stupid 'snapshot' button so close to pause?"
Eirin clenched her fist and a vein appeared across her forehead.
"Now wait, wait a minute, doc!" Goro pleaded to her, "you have my word, I wasnt plan on making money off this one, I swear. I only filmed you as a favor for little sis!"

You squinted your eyes and cringed. "Yumi? YUMI asked you to do this? Big Yumi? This is the same Yumi we're talking about?" That innocent incredibly shy tall girl with spectacles that always seem to get so bashful whenever youre around? The polar opposite of her sleazy porn-filming brother?! Someone as awfully innocent as Big Yumi requested to see you in a porno?!
"Yep," he didnt even blink as he gave you that straight answer.
Your mind was blown. You'd never in a million years believe sweet darling Big Yumi would be interested in that kind of thing!

"I... I cant honestly believe this," you had no luck making sense of this anomaly, "your sister, YOUR SISTER OF ALL PEOPLE actually wants to get off seeing me fuck an older woman dressed as a schoolgirl?" Eirin blushed with embarrassment.
"Well actually she wanted to see you get gang-raped by half a dozen women," Goro answered truthfully, "but this was the best I could get for her." YOU'D NEVER IN A BILLION YEARS BELIEVE-

"You foul disgusting perverted shit-stain!" the doc got mad, "Trespassing on our property is a major offense in itself, but doing so while committing such a vile action you've done is morally outrageous! I should honestly kill you right here!"
"Easy, easy," you held her back, "Goro, give me the tape."
Goro sighed and plucked the tape from the camera, handing it to you. You handed it to Eirin who glared back at the cameraman as she stuffed it down her sailor shirt. Youre sure he's got plenty of backups. And he'll probably be psyched as hell to use 'em when he finds out what's in store for you at Eientei! ...And so will Big Yumi, apparently. Geez, SERIOUSLY her?! She was too timid to do anything to you when you had to share a pay-shower stall with her that one day!

"Come inside," you order him, trying to best to hide the fact that your mind was still blown.
"This is not wise," Eirin rightfully disagrees, "after what he's just done here, how could you honestly allow him here?"
"He's a good friend and ally of my sister," you explain, "he's trustworthy enough for her. Move it!"
"Youre the boss, Alex-chan," he replies obediently.

And so the three of you returned back inside the confines of Dr. Yagokoro's office. Eirin glared at him with absolute distrust the whole time, but she seemed disinterested in destroying that tape she confiscated for some reason.

"So how'd you find us?" you asked.
"And how many others are there?" Eirin questioned.

"I got a van outside, 'senpai'," Goro answers which made Eirin grit her teeth, "Anna told me where you guys were. She told me to come meet her involving a special deal."
"Without even getting our permission?" the doc continued to question, "this is a private restricted property. You cant just come and go as you please! And how did you even get through the security? We have traps all over the forest!"
"Bribed one of your bunny eared twerps," Goro had no problem answering that one, "word to the wise, doc: Whatever youre paying your 'security' aint nearly enough."

The doc in the schoolgirl outfit growled and stomped around mumbling to herself while you sighed, trying to be the calm yin to Yagokoro-Kohai's yang.

“And what exactly is this deal?” you ask him.

Before you could answer, you overhear arguing up the hallway heading right toward the doctor's office. The arguing consists of two particular women.

“Look, how about I set you up with a decent drug supplier? I know of a great place that'll hook you up with all the finest medicine you can find on the planet!”
“For the last time NO! Eientei has PLENTY of medicine! What it DOESNT have is the means to produce heirs!'”
“Ok, what if I find a couple of guys to screw all your staff?”
“Your brother is all we need! That's what we agreed to!”
“BUT-”

And just then, Kaguya and Anna burst through the door and stop their conversation short and turned your attention.

“Eirin, who is this?!” the princess questioned the eye-patched gentleman.
“G-Goro? What are you doing here?” Anna was surprised to see him, “and why the hell is the old hag dressed like an anime schoolgirl?!”
“Old hag?!”

“I AM TALKING HERE!” Kaguya blurted out, “now will someone explain to me who he is and what's he doing here?”
“He was an old acquaintance of mine,” Anna briefly states.

“Goro Majima,” he introduces himself, “Retired 7th Hand Yakuza Captain, now Founder/Chairman/CEO of Sweetest Dreamz Productions. An award-winning film studio that specializes in top quality hollywood-styles movies of the most erotic persuasion!” He has a fancy way of saying he runs a porn studio.

“Ms. Whitestone, why exactly did you invite a porn director to our hospital?”
“What?! I dont know what he's doing here! I never invited him!”

“Uh, yes you did,” Goro corrected him, “we made a deal over the phone last night, remember?”
“W-wait, I...”
“C'mon, you said clear as day we could shoot a film here if we dropped off crate of um… 'acquired' “ he even did the quotations with his fingers, “Summer Court arms. We got 'em in the van.”

“Hoo boy...” you muttered silently.
“ARE YOU SERIOUS?!” raged Kagura, “you told a complete stranger he could shoot a porno on MY property without my consent?!”
“Absolutely not! He's lying!” Anna denied. Unfortunately…

“Anna, were you drunk?” you had to ask.

“She sounded pissed out of her mind to me,” One-Eye quipped. That was all you needed to know. Honestly, you need to consider installing a breathalyzer for each DOORWAY she's about to step out of!
“I'm sorry, Mr. Majima,” Eirin states, “but due to safety and security reasons, I'm afraid Eientei does not allow filming of any sort at this time.”

Goro shrugs his arms, "Hey I understand. It's a tough unforgiving world out there. You gotta keep yourself on your toes and strapped at all times cuz ya never know when youre gonna suddenly need to fight for dear life. ...Ya know, I still got that crate of arms in the van. It'd be an awful waste to send back all that advanced military grade hardware when it could come in good use here..."

"We are not interested in any-" the princess raised her hand, cutting the doctor off.
"What kind of arms?" Kaguya asks with sparked curiosity.
"I'm talking high-tech state of the art 22nd century Israeli-designed special ops weaponry!" Goro bragged, "not some cheap, old, rundown, poorly made Chinese crap! If you ever planned on war, nobody would dare touch you when they see you strapped with THESE babies!"

"Your highness!" the doctor was not liking this, "please dont consider this! This is not a brothel! And what if... CERTAIN people discover our location from whatever his ilk is filming?!"

"You have my word. Sweetest Dreamz keeps all of it's clients strictly confidential!" Goro assures, "not to mention, you and your community will be well compensated."
Kaguya's eyes almost beamed hearing the 'compensated' part.
"We're got a huge paying fanbase internationally," Goro insists, "I'm talking big profits. Plenty of big bucks in my business... if you get my meaning." Judging by the brief flash of dollar signs in Kaguya's eyes, she certainly did, "So... do we have a deal, your highness?"

She pondered the generous offer before...

11131212222121113.content:
The choice was hard to make, but you chose the lesser of three evils (at least you hoped it was the lesser). Obviously the first option would be bad for your health. If you pretty much worn yourself out fucking Reisen alone, how well do you think you'll fare with Reisen and everyone else?! The second option... well, it'll be pleasurable for the girls youre going down on, but not so pleasurable for you. The third one sounded much safer AND much more pleasurable!

With your face reddened with embarrassment as the eyes of the world were upon you, you coughed, "...The third one." Sure enough, you heard a few 'Awwww's, Anna cursing in another language, and Goro smirking.
"See, what'd I tell you? Goro knows best!" he turns about and shrugs his shoulders, "alright, alls I need is two volunteers to be Alex-chan's partners. Who wants to-"

"ME ME ME ME ME ME!!!" a certain purple haired bunny girl was more ecstatic to volunteer! She was literally hopping up and down like the wascally wabbit she was!
Eirin facepalm with humiliation and Anna shook her head ferociously but it was too late.

"Alright!" Goro was simply pleased, "that's what I love to see! Real authentic enthusiasm!"
"Goro I do NOT want that bitch fucking my brother!" Anna scowled.
"That's not your decision to make!" Kaguya snaps at her.
"B-But your majesty..." Eirin stutters, "s-she's already had er... her desired time spent with him. W-wouldnt it be more... fair to have another girl take her place?"
"As long as she's seeing to it that her belly is popping out more loyal soldiers, I see no problem with it," the princess exclaims, "and Mr. Majima, there WILL be absolute anonymity, right?"

"Of course," Goro answers, "you have my word. Their eyes will be blacked out in post, NOBODY will be able to identify them! Now we just need one more volunteer."
"I have a former colleague who'll be happy to join in," Reisen offers, "I'll go bring her over."
"Awesome," Sleazy Mashima approves, "here's your script youre gonna be using. And here's one more for her. Study it carefully, add-lib if you feel you need to, but make sure you dont go off-script too much."
"Yes sir, Mashima-sama!" Reisen politely bowed while her voice still beamed with excitement, "you have my word we will not let you down!"
"God I wish I had such devoted hard workers like you!" Eyepatch commented, "dont forget your script too, Alex-chan." You exhaled hard as you took your script, feeling the heat emitting from Anna's cold glare of death.

"Look forward to working with you, Alex-sama!" Reisen smiled your way just before giving you a kiss on the cheek. Anna's cold glare only amplified as the happy naive bunny girl hopped off.

...............

"Aaaaand ACTION!"

The movie was basically similar to reality. Youre an ex-mafioso trying to run from the mob who's currently hunting you down! Quite a bit of glaring differences, though. No sister or associates to bail you out. You were on your own. After several hours of running (cut to about a minute or two to save movie time), you think you lost their trail.

You gasped heavily, nearly out of breath, ready to collapse at any moment. You dare not, cuz you know Hokou will stop at nothing to hunt you down. He'll hunt you down long after he dies. He'll have your head mounted on his GRANDKIDS' wall if need be! You'll never sleep again. His men will be waiting for you in your dreams.

Terrified and paranoid, you keep looking over your shoulder. No men in sight. As you caught your breath, you observe the new surrounding. This wasnt the woods anymore. Youre in the middle of a bamboo forest! A completely different setting from just moments ago! How far did you keep running?
"W...where am I?" you panted looking around every direction. You walk a little bit and come so close to touching trip wire!
"?!" you gasped looking down at the wire so close to your foot and slowly and carefully back away.
"Aw jeez!" one footstep too many collapse the grass below you revealing a pot hole! You come EVER so close to falling in it!

You back away from the hole and take a few more steps...
...and you jump out of the way of a swinging log trap (well, swinging bamboo trap), narrowly avoiding it's carefully carved jagged edge!
"Whoa," you muttered, almost seeing your life flash before your eyes. It was then you noticed the warnings painted on several of the bamboo trees. Most of it was written in kanji and you couldnt read them, but the painted red Xs and skulls with bunny ears gave away that you were in restricted territory!

"I get the feeling whoever's here doesnt like visitors," you say the memorized scripted quip. Nonetheless, there didnt seem to be turning back at this point. And even if there was, there's probably a shit ton more traps along the way!
As you walked, you felt like you were being watched. You saw movement in the shadows, you heard distant breathing, and you think you spotted pairs of red eyes that glowed in the darkness! Nevertheless, you trekked and trekked.

"YIPE!"
Until an incredibly strong force yanked you out of nowhere! Perhaps a bit too hard, cuz you almost suffered whiplash! Next your arm was twisted behind your back and a kabar was pointed at your adam's apple!
You froze up as your captor, a purple-haired bunny-eared woman in military camo with a garb covering her mouth pressed up against you aggressively! Good news is she didnt seem to be one of Hokuo's hired assassins. Bad news is she isnt any less threatening!

"Who are you?" your bunny-eared captor questioned, "identify yourself!"
"A-a-Alex!" you obediently answer, "Alex Whitestone!"
"Your name's not recognized," she speaks, "state your business here."
"N-n-none!" you say, "I-I-I was just passing by-EEP!" She pressed the kabar even closer to your throat! Youre getting the feeling that knife might not be fake!
"State your business here!" she repeats.
"None!" you repeat, "I had no intention of coming here! I was trying to get away!"
"FROM WHO?" Reisen asks.
"A couple of mobsters. I didnt mean to come here! I'll kindly get as far away from here as possible!"
"It's not possible now," she warns, "youre smack dab in the middle of our territory and there's kilometers of traps as far as the eye can see." She then squints her eyes, "Awfully convenient you just ran through all of them like they were nothing..."
"P-please dont hurt me! I mean no harm! I never meant to trespass, I just-...uh, Reisen is that knife real?"
"How many others are with you?" Reisen ignored your question and asked her own.
"None," you swallow and answer, "I came here alone."
"...Alone, huh?" Reisen's voice had a hint of intrigue in it, "...that's too bad."

"Ui! We got ourselves a trespasser over here all by his lonesome!" she called over another figured that popped out of the bushes. A pink-haired bunny eared bucktooth woman in similar military camo with similar red eyes. She stalked toward you pointing a 1911 that for all you knew had real live ammo in it!
"Pat him down," Reisen orders Ui.
"Yes ma'am," Ui pats down your chest, then works her way down your legs, then searches your pockets, then sticks her hands down your pants and you bite your lip from the caressing you were getting there...
"He's unarmed," Ui confirmed.

"OWW!" Reisen then knocked you flat on the ground with a tremendous kick. Youre pretty sure that wasnt scripted, cuz that fucking hurt! You were just about to pick yourself up, then you felt the 1911 pressing the back of your head!
"Turn around," you heard Reisen ordered, "turn around!"
You rolled over, facing the two armed bunny girls gazing down at you hostilely. You dare not move as then leaned down at you, red glowing eyes gazing into your soul and Ui's 1911 still aimed at your brain.
"Wh-" you coughed, "what do you want from m-"
"Shut up!" Ui ordered, tapping your head with her gun! Reisen merely stared quietly with interest. Her eyes lingered downward toward your lower section.. and breathed a bit heavier than usual. No doubt she was getting anxious for THAT part to happen!

Nonetheless, she kept her cool and did as scripted. Paced around you in silence, whipped out a cigarette, took a quick drag, blew it the distance.

"What should we do, ma'am?" Ui breaks the silence, "do you want me to call up the others?"

Reisen stared almost longingly at you before plucking the cigarette out of her mouth and saying...
