11131212222121131.content:
Both Kaguya and Eirin seemed to be in a big deep discussion with one another to even acknowledge you while you placed two plates full of chicken, dumplings and egg rolls on their sides of the table. They dont say thank or even look your way when you give them their food, but you brush it off as whatever theyre talking about was important. You'd soon find out that it IS important, cuz you eavesdropped on their conversation!

"But Princess! Think about what youre doing! These girls arent prostitutes! We cant sully Eientei's grace honor by letting a pornogrphic film industry make their perverted movies here!"
"Do you think I dont feel any shame whatsoever?! Do you not think I'm just as disgusted as you are if not moreso?! However, if this gives actually gives us a greater fighting chance to liberate my family and my people from Junko's grasp, I will gladly swallow my pride!"
"Do you know the kind of damage and destruction that'll happen if Junko even THINKS youre trying to wage war with her?!"
"All I know is just kneeling to her and kissing her feet is only getting more and more expensive for my father. Pretty soon the 'protection' money will become so unaffordable that we'll have to make particular 'sacrifices'. At least this way, we'll have future soldiers AND the proper weapons to arm them!"
"But we arent ready to make such a move! And besides, what if Alex decides he doesnt want to go through with this? What if sooner or later he decides he wants to settle down and find a significant other?"
"He'll have SEVERAL significant others! The rabbits will be his partners! Each one of them will be his friend, girlfriend, wife, and lover! That's all he needs!”

You were not liking this discussion nor were you feeling up for getting caught in such a discussion. How should you be feeling about this predicament? Giddy that you got yourself a bunny-girl harem? Demeaned and degraded that youre reduced to being a breeding stallion for bunny-girls?

Speaking of, you set down plates of food for the other moon rabbits sitting at tables. Many of them were grateful. Very grateful. Many smiled your way. Some gave you kisses. A few of them smacked you on the ass. One of them invited you to sit with her and was not willing to take no for an answer. She had quite a strong grip too, but fortunately you managed to break away!

After getting your molestation quota fulfilled, you felt it was time to break away from everybody else for a while until the heat dies down. You stand somewhere in the middle of the hallway and finish your meal in peace. The brief moment of peace gave you the opportunity to appreciate Mao's fine cuisine. You were never much of a fan of Chinese food to begin with. But with the fresh ingredients she uses, the way she prepares the food, apply the perfect flavorful seasons, it tastes perfectly authentic. You might actually go as far as to say you LIKE her food! It sure aint Marcus's gourmet hood food, but it does have it's own charm to it!

Sadly, the moment ended as soon as a large shadow casts over you. A shadow in the shape of a nurse with bunny ears. Oh dear, Eientei's got some girls that really love their Wheaties, eh?
Trying to play cool and not seem the least bit intimidated, you slowly turn to face the tall nurse and almost bump your head on her elegant breasts!.

Backing away from her chest, you lift your head upward to properly face the slender 6ish foot tall black haired nurse in spectacles who gazed down at you with a nervous smile.

Hm… this nurse certainly looks familiar. And those bunny ears dont seem to be looking very… eh… 'natural' like all the other bunny girls' you've seen!

“G-Good afternoon, Mr. Whitestone!” she bowed politely, “it's… time for your physical examination!” Youre pretty sure that's Eirin's job.
“Um… I believe Dr. Yagokoro is doing my physical.”
“She's going to be a little busy later,” Nurse Miyu quickly replies, “dont worry, Mr. Whitestone! You'll be safe and sound in my care!” That's not what you were worried about.
Not that it matters cuz she already grabbed your hand and dragged you off with her! Your still tilting your head, trying to properly recognize the tall bunny girl with the not-so-authentic bunny ears.

“I… um… have we met before?” you ask as you eye her nametag suspiciously. Nurse MIYU, eh? “You look familiar.”
'Miyu' tilted her head, “Err… well, we couldve cross each others' paths once or twice since you first came here. It's statistically possible.” Hmph. A really tall bunny girl like would definitely stick out in your head! ...But youre quite sure you seen a particular girl her size and figure without those bunny ears.
“I think it's been more than that,” you remark, “havent I seen you on tv once?”
“Nope… stupid producers dont wanna come near me after they found out who I'm related to….?!!” her slightly depressed tone quickly turned to shock as if realizing she just said something she shouldnt, “...er… th-that is… c-c-cuz big sis is kindof a hardass and way way too protective of me!”
She carefully adjusted her glasses as she finished up that lie. Just like that one girl you knew.

...YUMI?! Big Yumi?! Is this nurse really Goro's sis, Yumi?! SHE'S here too?! How'd she get here?! Does Goro even know she's here?! Most likely not if she's trying to pass herself off as a bunny girl nurse which she's neither (except maybe on tv). Honestly, she'd probably be more convincing passing herself off as an oni instead, but then the image of her chugging down a whole bottle of sake as alcohol drips from her lips and down her sleek slender tiger-striped bikini-clad body left you feeling a bit flustered! Kinda thirsty too.

“Here. It's just beyond that door,” Yumi says escorting you through the door.
Which by the way was not the door to an infirmary room. It was to somebody's bedroom. And by the time you noticed that, Yumi had already turned to lock the door. And by the time she did that, you noticed a little raffle ticket hanging out of her dress pockets.

“Ok, Mr. Whitestone,” she turned back to you and smiled, “if you could kindly take off your clothes and lie down on that bed over there, we can begin the examination!”

And still detecting something was off about her, Reisen slowly approached her, squinting her eyes. "Hmmm..." Reisen just glared suspiciously, unaffected by her flattery.

"Oooo! Someone's got the hots for you, girl!" Tewi nudged Reisen's side, "I'd take that big girl if I were you! Plenty of her to wrap your arms around at night AND she'll give you loads of shade on a hot sunny day!"
"Tewi, I swear to god," the purple haired bunny girl gritted her teeth and the little black haired bunny girl while the big black haired phony bunny girl bit her lip, hoping to finally get some breathing space!
"Aw c'mon! You two would make a really cute couple!" the little brat exclaims, "dont you think, Al?" She's asking YOU? But it does beg a question.
You finally squeeze yourself out from behind your tall companion and ask, "Er... Yumi, do you swing that way?"
"Absolutely not! My heart only belongs to-" Miyu cuts herself, ".....um, wait, who is this 'Yumi' person, Alex? I told you already, my name is MIYU."
"Tsk! Please!" Tewi snickers, "if I had a yen coin for every time I heard a girl say she didnt swing that way right before eating cooch, I'd never need to borrow money ever again!" Geez! Can she possibly make an already awkward situation any more awkward?! "Even Rei-Rei here's got a thing for a certain cute undead gardener down at Hakugyokurou!"
"TEWI!!" Reisen screamed, but blushed.
"Dont get all tsundere on me! Everybody on the planet knows you like Youmu! Heck, Miyu probably already knew, didnt you?"
Miyu didnt say a damn thing when Reisen turned her head back to her!

"Heeeyy..." the little brat then sparked an idea, "your morning shift's about to start soon, aint it? You know, tons of boxes you gotta haul and carry around place to place, kinda rough on your back, aint it?"
"Just what are you getting at?" Reisen questions her.
"Aint it obvious? Wont the job be done twice as fast and half as painful if you had a nice big hawt vixen like Big Miyu here helping you out?"
"...M...ME?!" Miyu blurted with surprise, "...b...but I.. I still have to do Mr. Whitestone's physical!"
"Dont worry, Alex, can tag along!" the twerp smirked, "that way you can both get your thorough hands-on up and down exam on him while trying to resist the urge to get lost in eachother's eyes!" ...HEY WAIT A SEC!!

"Hey!!" you finally blurted out, feeling a little left out, "dont I get a say in this?!"
"Not really, stud!" Tewi gives it to you straight, "if these two love-birds in the making wanna double-team ya, theyre gonna!" Again, youre having a hard time trying to figure out what youre supposed to be feeling! Offended that theyre not letting YOU give your opinion... as well as offended if (and that's a huge IF) Miyu and Reisen end up falling for EACHOTHER, youre just gonna be the side-trick between them?! Intrigued that you'd get a chance to be intimate with both Reisen AND possibly Big Yumi herself? Terrified that Anna's gonna go ballistic while Goro's probably wanna film it (seriously dude, that's your SISTER!! ...Possibly)?!

Regardless, both Reisen and Miyu seemed to be ignoring your plight as the two of them stared at each other thinking.

...THEN they both stared at you.... thinking. Uncomfortable stares. You felt ashamed of yourself for not having the guts to stand up for yourself and actually speak out. But that's what happens.
So after a long uncomfortable moment of staring at you, they both decide...

111312122221211313121.content:
You thanked the gods of this universe that despite Reisen's suspicion, impatience, and possibly envy with the new bunny-girl nurse, she just exhaled and caved.

"Fine, whatever," she stretched out and cracked her neck before picking her row of crates back up, "just focus on the task at hand, ok?"
Poor little Big Miyu feeling she was spared an awful confrontation bowed to her superior, "A-A-absolutely, Reisen."
"Ms. Udongein Inaba," Reisen corrected her as she resumed walking.
"R-right! Ms. Udongein Inaba!" the tall nervous nurse obediently followed behind. And for a short while during the trek through the forest, all was well. No sounds of wildlife at all. It was like every single animal and bug just skipped down. All literally was quiet. All was so quiet you could hear a pin drop, but all was still well.

Too bad Miyu was feeling a bit antsy. Since she couldnt risk walking too close to you without Reisen giving her the stare of death, she at the very least wanted to start some sort of conversation to break the awkward silence.
And since she couldnt risk peeving Reisen any more by talking to you....

"Hey Reis-....Ms. Udongein Inaba?" Miyu spoke up. Reisen didnt respond, but her bunny ear twitched. Something Miyu's never did. The miniature bunny-titaness stepped a bit closer to the shorter, but possibly dangerous purple-haired bunny-vet.
"Look, um...about this Youmu girl..."
Reisen quickly jerked her head to her and gave a threatening stare. It was not a topic she wanted to be discussing, but Miyu continued.
"Wait, please hear me out!" Miyu pleaded, "yeah, I admit that I did overhear that you had feelings for this Youmu girl. Your partner, Tewi was kinda blabbing it to a bunch of the other girls."
Reisen groaned, "Remind me to bury her alive in one of her trap holes later."
"Still," Miyu continued, "have you thought about... you know... talking about it? C'mon, one girl to another?"
Reisen just growled and turned away.
"I mean it! I wasnt lying when I said you were gorgeous! I'm sure Youmu feels the same way. I'll bet she'll be really flattered when she finds out you have a thing for her!"
"Miyu...."
"If you'd like... maybe I could lend you a hand? I happen to be a very talented wing-woman! You can ask any of my old friends from high school! Them and their crushes are STILL together to this very day and-"
"STOP. TALKING." Reisen coldly warned her through angry gritted teeth, "NOW."

Miyu looked down at the enraged bunny girl with a ton of fear in her eyes not well hidden behind her glasses. Knowing she inadvertently struck a nerve, she pulls back.
“O-o-ok,” Miyu backs away, “I'm sorry. I wont bring it up again.”
Reisen, possibly regretting that she lost her temper, turned away from her and inhales, “There's nothing between me and her. Alex-sama is the only partner I need to concern myself with. Same goes with the rest of the girls of Eientei.” Somehow, you couldnt be flattered by that statement. It seemed like having intimate relationships with you is just a duty she has to fulfill as an employee of Eientei… nevermind nobody gave her the order to sneak into your room and mount you while you were asleep!
Thinking that way, it begs the question: if Reisen does like this Youmu girl, how would she react if she ever finds out about her brand new commitment with you?

Ugh. This is getting a bit too much for you to handle. Best focus on the task at hand and worry about a potential lesbian love-triangle later!

“Reisen, where are we headed to first?” you asked.
“First we're heading to Genbu Ravine,” she had no problem starting a discussion with you, “the kappa engineer who runs the place, Nitori, just purchased a large shipment of ammonium nitrate from us and said she needs it ASAP. She said she needs it no later than noon or we wont get paid.” Ammonium nitrate? Hm.

“What does she need with ammonium nitrate in such short notice?” you questioned.
“Customer confidentiality,” Reisen states, “if they got big pockets, we wont ask questions.”
“Either she's got a really huge garden to fertilize or she's making chemical explosives,” Miyu butted in, which Reisen didnt appreciate.
“You will keep your mouth shut while we're around Nitori,” she demanded Miyu, “and if so much as a single word of this event is breathed over at the LDC, I'm gonna know who did it.”
“Y-You have my word,” Big Miyu backs off, “I wont breathe a word to anyone!”
Reisen's eyes squinted… as they rolled even further upward… toward the direction of Miyu's bunny ears.
“How come they dont twitch?” she questioned while HER ears twitched in suspicion.
“How come what dont twitch?”
“Your ears,” her own ears twitched upward to them, “since we've left, I havent noticed them move at all the whole time.”
UH OH.

Miyu inhaled hard, trying to conjure up a good excuse in such short notice, “I was in a really bad car accident when I was little. I've recovered for the most part… but I've lost feeling in these ears ever since.”
“Really?”
“Yeah,” she nodded as she flicked her own ears, “cant feel a thing with them. Internally, I can hear just fine out of them but externally,” she pinches her ears, “...nothing.”

Again, Reisen was giving her that cold stare of suspicion. She knew something was off about 'Miyu'. But does she suspect that she might not be a fellow rabbit?

Fearing the worst, you can only stand aside and wait, hoping Yumi's facade was still holding strong. But Reisen's got quite the eye… does she know? Has she figured it out? Is Big Yumi's cover blown?!

1113121222212113131212.title: busted big girl

choices: "I'm... kinda short on dough this month to pay for the stuff."
11131212222121131312121.content:
The atmosphere in the room suddenly got incredibly intense. Primarily because Reisen suddenly grabbed Yumi's arm and despite being towered over by her, the bunny girl's icy cold glare had no difficulty melting this tower of a woman!

"WE are not done yet," Reisen warned Yumi who was looking back down at her, failing to hide the timid look behind her glasses. Reisen pointed to her a chair and ordered, "Sit down."
Big Yumi sat down.

The silent moment in the room quickly became a hundred times more awkward. The real bunny girl glared coldly at the fake bunny girl, crossing her arms, and waiting.

"Well?"

"W...well what?" Yumi stuttered.

"You know the answer to that!" Reisen snapped, "dont play dumb!"

Your old friend could only glance back with the most timid of expressions, "I...I'm sorry. I dont know."

"Urgghhh," Reisen groaned and rolled her eyes, "WHO put you up to this?! WHO hired you to spy on us?! How many others came with you?!"
"N-N-No one came with me!" Yumi pleaded, "nobody hired me to do anything-"
"LIAR!! START TALKING OR I'M GONNA RIP YOUR REAL EARS OFF!"
"That's the truth! I'm not a spy!! I swear my reasons for sneaking over are strictly for selfish ones!!" Yumi actually said that out loud!

Nonetheless, it was necessary for you stepped in. Not just to avoid a drastic situation for Yumi, but considering youre a close friend and she's the brother of your sister's acquaintance, this situation wont look good for you and Anna if you dont curve the escalation.

"Reisen?" you stepped in and turned to Yumi, "Yumi does your brother know you snuck here?"
"Of course not, Goro's never interested unless some big shot Hollyw-" her eyes widened and put both hands to her mouth. She immediately let the cat out of the bag and blew her cover. Not that it was much of a surprise to you. To REISEN, however...

"YOU KNOW THIS GIRL?!" she turns her suspicion on you.
You sighed, "Yes. She's Goro's little sister.” And you use the term 'little' loosely.
“So you already knew who she was and you didnt tell anybody?” Reisen raised a damn good question that you didnt have the answer too. Which made her even MORE suspicious, “...Are you two in on a scheme?!”
“No, he wasnt involved with me!” Yumi spoke up for you, but blushed a bit, “W… when Alex fled his old boss, everybody told me he was dead. Then when I heard he was alive, I took the time to find out where he was hiding and… I kinda snuck here to find out myself if it was true. I just wanted to make sure you were alright.” Aww.

“How did you manage to find me?” you asked.
“I bribed a couple of my bro's associates,” Yumi answered, “my newest role in an upcoming movie really paid well, so I went on a bit of a spending craze. Paid off bro's goons, paid off some of your sis's goons, paid off some of YOUR goons,” she looks over to Reisen, “that pretty much sums it up.”

“Are you aware that espionage is a capital offense according to Lunarian law?” Reisen warned her, “one punishable by swift execution?” That got the big girl's undivided attention!
“No! No no no no NO!” Yumi constantly shook her head, “Honest to god, I wasnt trying to commit espionage! I was only hoping to make sure Alex is doing alright! That's all!”
“Well I'm afraid Alex-sama is no longer your concern,” Reisen boldly states, still referring to you by her special nickname, “whatever you had or hope to have with him no longer applies anymore. He already has a special commitment with the workers and patients of Eientei.” Not to mention, Reisen may or may not currently be carrying your child. You dare not say that out loud, however. You could only imagine the outrageous bloody catfight that would occur when Yumi finds out HOW that occurred!

But even being blissfully unaware of that, Yumi started to get cross with the bunny girl.
“Alex, are you seriously ok with this?” Yumi questioned, “I mean, I'm not trying to tell you what's best for you, but THAT kind of thing… well, I've heard a lot of real scary stories involved in those kind of relationships. This is practically human trafficking, aint it?”
“As I said, that's not your concern,” Reisen spoke before you could have the chance to, “those are the princess's orders and as long as he's staying under her roof, what she says goes.”

“Even if it means losing the opportunity to start something with Youmu?”

Reisen's eyes twitched from Yumi's reply. Again, she's hitting a nerve!

“Can you really call what ALEX is going through a proper 'relationship'?” Yumi continued, “how would you feel if Youmu had to go through the same thing he is?! How would you feel if HER boss decided that in order for her to live under her roof, she'd be whoring HER out to a hundred or so of her associates?! You wanna imagine HER being passed around the way you and your buddies wanna pass HIM around?!”

“I THOUGHT I TOLD YOU TO STOP TALKING!” Reisen got fierce.
But Yumi for some reason couldnt stop herself.
“Hey! I've got an idea,” she continued, “I wonder if darling Youmu would like to star in one of my brother's movies? You wouldnt mind if I ask her, would you?!”
“I'm warning you, 'MIYU',” Reisen warned through her gritted teeth, “drop this now or-”
“Or what?!” Yumi cut her off, “what's the problem? I thought you said 'Alex-sama' was the only partner you need to concern yourself with! Why should it matter whether she decides to take the offer and became a famous movie star? Surely, you dont still have feelings for her, do you?”
Reisen clenched her fists. Her top was about to blow. Yumi was clearly hitting a very very sensative nerve. But still she wasnt backing down. She probably should though, cuz that bunny girl looked to be inches away from uppercutting your friend into the stratosphere! You'd certainly never forgive her if she does that, but as she already proved, she has a bad habit of not thinking before she acts!

“Ok guys! A quick update I need to report!”

Praise be to Yevon, Nitori cut in and put the life-threatening conflict to a halt! Both Yumi and Reisen turned their attention to her, ready to hear her update, unaware that you let out a hard exhale of relief! As you wiped the sweat from your brow, Nitori announced...

111312122221211313121211.title: Boost up

1113121222212113131212111.content:
"Very well," in no time at all, X-200 zipped right up to Big Yumi and did a quick scan on her, "Destination of Origin: Dotonbori. Osaka, Japan. Initializing fastest route..."

"W-WAIT!!" you tried to stop her, "you dont need to do that! Yumi's no threat to me whatsoever! Trust me!"

"She infiltrated our establishment and passed herself off as lunarian rabbit nurse," Reisen stated, "a tremendous criminal offense."
"But she's no criminal or a threat!" you plead, "I know her pretty well! She wouldnt be doing anything like that! She-"

"It's alright, Alex," unfortunately, it was Big Yumi herself that had to cut you off, "what I did was really reckless and dangerous. If I have to leave, I'll leave."
"BUT YUMI-"
"At the very least, I'm glad I finally got to see you again," Big Yumi smiled down at you, "I'm really happy to see youre alright." While you were trying to hold it back outside, inside you were breaking apart! You mustve really missed Yumi that much! Now was a very opportune time to deeply regret taking advantage of all those slight skiddish advances she made on you! Hell, you had to share a freaking shower stall together while on the road cuz Goro was too cheap to pay for two! Curse you for not scaling that lovely tower of a woman when you had the chance!!!

And right on cue with your fit of regret, X-200 announced, "Fastest route initialization complete. Preparing for teleportation..."
Yumi then turned her direction to the REAL bunny girl that wants her gone, and bowed politely, "I'm sorry to be burden on you, Ms. Udongein Inaba. I never meant to cause you or any of the others trouble. It was all just to confirm an old friend of mine was doing ok."
Reisen curled her lip but gave a simple nod.

"It was great seeing you again, Yumi," because you just couldnt help yourself, you rushed over to Big Yumi and gave her a great big hug, briefly blissing out on the one major thing you missed: nuzzling your head against her soft warm pillowy breasts!
And her soft warm pillowy breasts squeezed your face right back as she wrapped her arms around you and returned the hug. For the brief period, being in Big Yumi's embrace was one of the few things in the universe that could completely take your mind off of all the hardships you were facing... for that brief period, all that surged in your mind was the ambience that Big Yumi's hug offers you. If Heaven truly does exist, you hoped it would equate to being smothered in Big Yumi's embrace for all eternity.

Sadly, it didnt take long before both the feeling of her hug and the ambience from it vanished. By the time you snapped of it, she and X-200 were gone. You deeply miss her already. With her gone, the rest of the world just seemed so depressing. You came down with a bad case of 'The Road Not Taken' syndrome.

"She was an old girlfriend of yours?" Reisen asked, breaking the cold depressing silence.
You shrugged your arms, unsure how to answer that, "I... dont know. She was a real close friend. One of the very few associates of my sister I could actually trust... well, technically she's the sister of an associate, but still. Reisen, please dont tell anybody about her deception. She really didnt mean any ill will to you and the others."
Reisen exhaled, almost sadly, "What she did was unacceptable... but I cant blame her for what she did. I'd probably have done the same if I had the opportunity." Hm.

"Transfer complete," suddenly X-200 reappears. Sadly, ONLY X-200. "Yumi Majima has successfully been returned home." Road Not Taken Syndrome continues.

"Thank you, X-200," Reisen thanks her, "let's continue our deliveries." The wheels in your head began to turn.
"Hang on," you stopped her, "X-200? Can you find the fastest route to Hakugyokurou?"
Reisen double-taked.
"Certainly, client Whitestone. Initializing fastest route."
"Alex-sama, that's not one of our stops."
"I know," you stated, "but maybe we can take a little break and pay a visit to that gardener?" Her eyes widened as you continued, "X-200 can get us there in a heartbreak, so it's not like we'll be wasting a lot of time."

"Er... but... I..."

"Fastest route initialization complete. Do you wish to teleport now?" X-200 asks. That wasnt a question YOU were gonna answer.

"Reisen?" you turn back to her, "you wanna go see Youmu again?"

Reisen raised a finger and opened her mouth about to sharply turn the offer down... but nothing came out of that mouth of hers. Her eyes glanced about, possibly hesitant to say no. Her finger lowered as she glanced down at the ground, most likely STILL mulling over the opportunity you were giving her.
With a quick huff, she closed her eyes and answers...

“What is it lady yuyuko?” Youmu asked.

“Can I get some snack? I’m kind of hungry.” Yuyuko said.

“But you just had breakfast hour ago! We just can’t have snack right away.” Youmu said.

“But Youmu~I’m hungry~please~.” Yuyuko begged.

She sighed and caved in, told all of you to wait as she get some snack for all of you. You told her you three were not going to be staying that long but she insisted staying and left the scene. As you waited, reisen were next to you and X-200 we’re behind you waiting for order, Yuyuko were just sitting quietly with fan on.

“So why did you come to hakugyokuryo?” Yuyuko asked.

“For a little detour, and maybe reisen could see Youmu for moment.” You replied.

“True. They haven’t seen each other for while since Eirin gotten more busy.” Yuyuko said.

You could kinda tell that Eirin is a busy woman that deserves a holiday. You don’t know why, but you just can’t muster it up to tell her that, then reisen spoke up.

“Master Yagokoro is doing great, she does need some rest though.” Reisen said.

“Yes, a nice long holiday.” Yuyuko said.

You thought that maybe you should tell her that, but she’s a doctor and docs rarely gets any holidays. They all thought for moment until Youmu came back with sweets on her trays.

It was..
111312122221211313121211111.title: Head mansions talk

choices: Stop peeking! Get out of the bath!
1113121222212113131212111111.content:
Youmu came out with plates of round, doughy, colorful dumplings on sticks coated with a sticky brownish glaze. No surprise, you were the only one in the room and quite possibly the entire building confused by the unfamiliar exotic delicacy she was bringing it. What shouldve surprised you more was the fact that one plate of glazed dumpling-sticks was for you, Reisen, and Youmu while the other plate full was strictly reserved for Yuyuko alone!

"Yay! Dango!!" Yuyuko said with delight and quickly swiped a kebob of them off the plate before Youmu could even set it down!

"Thank you, Youmu!" Reisen presented her gratitude to her crush before taking a kebob and biting off a piece. You, still being clearly confused by the exotic dish, stared at the kebob in your acts questionably.
"Um, what are these?" you asked.
"Theyre dango," said Reisen's crush, "sweet rice dumplings. An old acquaintance of Reisen taught me the recipe when she came by a while ago." Reisen almost choked on her dango and jerked her head over to Youmu.

"A-Acquaintance?!" you noticed a worried expression on her face as she asked that question.
"Yes, uh... Ringo, I believe her name was," Youmu reminisced, "is she a friend of yours? Er, blonde hair? Kinda chubby? Usually wears her bunny ears down?"
You eyed Reisen closely as she stared off into space silently, still giving that worried expression.
"N-no, cant say I remember any Ringo," she clearly lied, "is... is she around, nearby?"
"No, she already left to the moon capital," Youmu didnt pick up on Reisen's lie, "dont know when we'll be seeing her again."

"You missed out, too!" Yuyuko added as she scarfed a whole kebob down... including the stick! "she had a whole suitcase full of these things! Each one more tastier than the last!"
Reisen seemed relieved that this Ringo person was gone. Not that you were gonna pry. Instead, you took a bit out of one of the dumplings yourself. The taste... was interesting. Very doughy. A little more tangy than sweet. The dumpling itself didnt have much taste despite the doughy texture. It was mostly the tangy glaze you were tasting that overpowered whatever sweet flavor the dango itself had. Suffice to say, it wasnt unpleasant, but you've tasted better. Still, you ate what was given to you.

It wasnt that you werent used to eating exotic foods. You've had plenty when you were staying at Big Yumi's place. Guess dango wasnt one of the foods you ever had over there. You had rice balls and pockys. You loved pockys. You could sure go for some right now! ...Aw dang it, as soon as you start missing pockys, you start missing Yumi again.

"Oh I'm sorry, did you want one as well?" Youmu offered X-200.
"I am not programmed to eat," was her expected answer.
"Oh... alright," Youmu didnt seem to understand what she meant, but she accepted the answer. You dont remember much of what else happened after that. Reisen and Youmu were chatting with eachother and Yuyuko was finishing her plate and then asking if you were gonna eat the rest of yours. Then you just tuned everything out and just stared over at Reisen and Youmu talking. You werent listening to their conversation, but you were staring and noticing how bright eyed Reisen was while she was chatting it up with her crush. Envy washed over you as you thought about Yumi and kept asking yourself what if. What if.

Later on, Yuyuko invited you and Reisen to their private hot spring bath(not X-200 for obvious reason!). Earlier, Reisen wouldve refused sighting that she and you didnt have enough free time, but now that she's gotten so used to being reunited with her crush, she eagerly accepts and shares a bath with her! Fortunately, the hot spring was divided in half by fence for both men and women to enjoy at the same time. UNfortunately, you were the only man at the moment so it was very lonely.

The hot spring water was nice and warm to counter the awful cold weather, not to mention it really put your aching muscles to ease, but it still didnt make you feel even a tiny bit better about having to say goodbye to Yumi! Quickly you were regretting suggesting that Reisen paid her crush a visit! You were happy for her that she got to spend some time with her girl, but you didnt think you were actually gonna be JEALOUS!

'I'm getting too overwhelmed,' you think to yourself, 'I'm just not thinking straight. I need to clear my head.' You lie back in the spring water and immerse yourself in it's pleasant soothing warmth and attempt to clear that troubled mind of yours.

"Reisen, I am so so glad you finally had free time to come visit!"
But you couldnt do that, cuz you could overhear Youmu coming from the other side of the fence!
"It, it wasnt any trouble, Youmu! Really! Hakugyokuryo just... happened to be on our way and... well it seemed like forever since I last got to see you, so..." you could overhear Reisen's bashful responses, too!
"Still, I hope you dont get in any trouble for this! I'm sorry if you get yelled at later!"
"Dont worry... it wouldnt be the worst thing I've done.... *gulp*... recently."

You ran your hands through your hair and gritted your teeth. You just wanted some peace and quiet!

"Still... I really appreciate you coming down here to visit. I really miss seeing you."
"Y-yeah... m-me too, Youmu."

You groaned hard and TRY to tune them out. But you dont try very hard. Especially after they bring you up!

"I've never seen that guy with you before... um, Alex, was it?"
"Y-yes. Alex-sa-um, Alex is the brother of Eientei's newest client... and er... our new... *gulp*... employee... so to speak." 'Employee'? Youre their breeding stud!
But now that they name-dropped you, you felt it was your personal right to eavesdrop!

You quietly creep over to the fence and peek through a conveniently placed hole in the middle of it. You carefully and quiet peek at Reisen and Youmu barely covered in towels staring almost longingly at one another, red on the bunny girl's face as she tries to regain her composure in front of the girl she loves!

"Curious... if you dont mind me asking. If you dont wanna answer, I'll understand," Youmu assures ahead of time before popping the question, "he's not... um... with you... uh... in THAT way... is he?"
Reisen's ears twitched, quickly understanding what she meant and her face gets red. "Umm... n-no. Uh, not in THAT way! My relationship with him is strictly... work-related!"

'Work-related!' you almost chuckle. Fortunately, for her, her white-haired crush didnt get the meaning.

"Oh good! I was almost worried!" Youmu sighs with relief.
"Worried about what?" Reisen's ears twitch with interest.
Youmu cheeks got a bit red as she replied, "That somebody else already claimed you."

Her bunny girl friend got even more bashful after hearing that, "Y-Y-Youmu... chan. You... didnt have to worry about that... Because... to be honest.... I was hoping that... you might be the one to... claim... me?"

In no time whatsoever, the white haired half-ghoul pressed her lips against the bunny girl's whose ears stood up frozen with surprise! Your eyes widened at the sight, yet you didnt feel compelled to look away! Reisen finally shook out of her frozen state and returned the kiss, pressing her lips right back. They both held hands as they shared a long passionate kiss.

You wanted to feel happy for Reisen that she finally got what she wanted. But all it ultimately did was make you feel more jealous. Jealous and mad at yourself for not answering Yumi's obvious approaches when you had the chance! Perhaps you should consider sneaking out of Eientei and finding her. Hm, just how far is Osaka from Gensokyo?

As you pondered, things got steamier. Reisen got a bit bold and slipped a hand under Youmu's towel. Youmu returned the boldness and slipped her hand under the top of Reisen's towel, gently caressing her breast! Next thing you knew, they were putting their hands all over eachother while they were sucking face!

Again, you were having a hard time looking away but for OTHER reasons! You were feeling a bit ansy yourself and that fellow between your legs wasnt afraid to show it! To be frank, the sight of two lovely young women making out did not repulse you. In fact, you were feeling a different kind of jealous! Jealous that you werent joining them!

Your conscious was attempting to snap you out of it! It was very wrong of you to keep peeking and you need to stop! But the sight was a bit hard to look away from! Still, if you got time to eavesdrop then youre clearly finished with the bath and need to leave now before you get caught!
1113121222212113131212111111.title: The Sin of Envy

You..

1113121222212113132.content:
Miyu froze up on sight of your sister and that two-bit sleazy director whom Miyu looks strikingly like the sister of. Odd, you expected her cute bunny ears would stand on end to match the stiff expression she was making. Could they be fake, you wonder?

“See? I told you your bro was fine. Can we go now?” Goro didnt seem the least bit surprised that a bunny girl that looks an awful lot like his sister is in a bedroom alone with you.
“Alex, what are you doing here? And put your fucking clothes back on, for god's sake! These bitches here wanna rape you!”
“That you personally told their matriarch was fine and dandy, just saying.”
“Shut the hell up, Goro!”

“I'm getting an exam from Nurse Miyu,” you ignored Anna and Goro's little spat and answer your sister. The tall nurse who was observing you only looked back at the two nervously.
“I thought that was Eirin's job,” Anna remarked, “not that I can trust THAT hag with you either...”
“Dr. Yagokoro had made previous arrangements,” Big Miyu pulled that lie out of her Big Ass, “now if you'll excuse us…?!!!”
The tall bashful nurse suddenly froze up as Anna leaned in toward her REAL close. Getting a REAL good look at her!

“You… look familiar,” she comments.
“O-o-oh?” Miyu sweats a bit as she adjusts her glasses.
“Goro? Does this girl look like someone you know?” Anna asks her colleague which shouldve pretty much given it away. Judging by the way Miyu froze up as he got close, that pretty much gave away to you her true identity.

Goro… well, he raised an eyebrow and tilted his head and lifted his eyepatch to get a good look at her with his glass eye-is he phoning this in?!
“Ehhhh...” he 'uhs' for a tremendously long time, “...sorry, Annie-chan. I've gotten like a billion girls come and go at my place. Cant exactly remember EVERY face.” He then smirked, “But I'm sure I'd remember having to tilt my head up every time I needed to look this broad in the eye! They been putting super growth hormones in your carrots, little bunny?” Miyu could only laugh nervously. You refused to believe Goro didnt know who this girl is! What kind of decent big brother couldnt recognize his own sister?!

Goro took the moment to carefully observe her, “Ya know something? I think you might be just what I need for a special upcoming movie I'm making paying homage to She-Hulk…” OH GOOD LORD ALMIGHTY, NOT YOUR FREAKING SISTER!! GROSS!! “You wouldnt be interested in a spot, would you?”

“Um….” the nurse (and quite possibly his SISTER!) blushed and asked, “...w...will Alex be in it?”
“I dont see why not.”
“NO HE WONT!” Anna interfered while the thought of seeing a green Yumi clad in a thin purple and white spandex jumpsuit that shows how her elegant chiseled yet very feminine physique left you feeling awful flustered! Ok you cant decide which one you like better. Oni Yumi or She-Hulk Yumi?

“Well anyways, if you two could please excuse us," the nurse quipped, "Mr. Whitestone is still in the process of his exam!"
"Not so fast, 'Miyu'," Anna read the name tag, "I'm still curious about this 'exam' youre giving my brother."
"Anna, who cares?" Goro speaks up, "let the two have their fun. We still got stuff we need to talk about."
“I'm still not letting him in any of your sleazy movies,” Anna snaps.
“For the last time, you made the deal with the boss here and she said it was cool!”
“I. WAS. DRUNK.”
“If that aint a good excuse to give a cop, why the hell would it be a good excuse to give me?!” And they argued and argued as they left the room. Geez, anybody else wants to jump in and ruin the reunion youre having with Yumi?! Reisen? Tewi? You wanna jump in?! The damn door's still open!

Speaking of which, Nurse Miyu breathed a sigh of relief.

"I'm sorry about my sis," you apologized, "she can be a bit overprotective."
"Guess it helps to have a brother who's underprotective."
"Hm?"
"Nothing! Sorry! I was just thinking out loud!" Miyu coughs, "well we're almost finished with your examination." And with that she grabs both your hands.... kind of a strong grip, but thankfully not superhuman or She-Hulk strong or anything! You get reminded of how significantly taller than you she is when she looks down and you and smiles. "There is just one last thing we need to do before we call it a day!"

You get a bit flustered as you try to move your head away from her breasts to get a better look at her face. "W-what's left?"

Miyu's glasses twinkled as she answered...

“Some strange lady in black cloth and a weird mask asked me to give this to you once you wake up.” Reisen said.

Dear little brother

If you’re reading this, you know now that I’m still alive and well. I was confined in Maeve’s personal torture chamber for at least 4 months. Thankfully, I managed to escape that room and with help of my close associates I have managed to escape and hide into this land. I want to see you, but I cannot let that bitch Maeve to seek you, especially her high ranking officials. I have sent Marcus to tell more details about the situation to the people in your current shelter. I miss you little bro, but until the further notice, we will be in different area.

Yours truly

Anna Whitestone

“Little al! Sup big man?” Marcus spoke up.

You two gave a high hive and within second he handed over a package for you. You looked in and it was a huge rum cake! You loved his cookings, especially his desserts and pastries. One time you gorged on the rum cake that you had an blissful stomachaches.

“I baked that just for you my man.” Marcus said.

“Thanks Marcus! Um..you know where Anna is,” you spoke.

Marcus was silent for moment then shook his head.

“I know where she is, but I promised her not to tell you her location.” Marcus replied.

“But why!? I need to know! I have a right to know!” You said angerly.

Marcus were lightly troubled and you noticed it. You apologized and then you noticed reisen came next to you.

“Mr.Whitestone! You must get up yet!” Reisen spoke, “and you’re..?”

“I apologize miss. I’m Marcus Benedict, a cook, and I’m here to tell your head doctor about Mr.Whitestones situation.” Marcus replied.

“I...see. Come in, I’ll take you to a meeting room and I’ll call master Yagokoro.” Reisen said.

You asked Reisen if you could come and she replied..

11132.content:
...A black abyss. The teen didn't know where he was until he was dropped out of the area that he have never went before: an open grass field. He didn't know where he was until two shadows overloomed him. He turned around and saw two people standing over him. They were both blond women but one had light purple dress wore hat with ribbon while other women had white/blue dress and hat pointy hat..and had multiple tails! The young teen were in awe then the multiple tailed women whisperd to the other lady.

"No ran, we will not hurt him..yet." Women said.

The nine tailed women sighed and helped you get up.

"Look kid. My master pulled you from that little run away, but I fear your up to..something." Ninetailed women said.

"I didn't do anything! Please get me off!" He replied.

"Ran."

Ran looked at her master and then noticed her looking at her in glare. Ran didn't say for moment and then got him off. The women then came to you and patted him while ran gave way for her.

"Sorry for little fiasco. I am Yukari Yakumo, the gap youkai and she's Ran Yakumo, my shikigami." She said.

"I'm..Strange..I don't remember my name." He said.

Both Yukari and Ran looked at each other, then decided to take him to their house. Yukari opened the gap, letting everyone go through the gap to get back home. The teen realised they lived in orientle house and once they got in, the teen explained to the two about what happened, and not knowning his own name.

"Hmm..you remember the chase, but don't remember why..I think you have amnesia." Ran said.

"Am..nesia?" He asked.

Ran nodded, and yukari sipped her tea. Few seconds later, she smiled and looked at him.

"Well..if those bad people are hunting you down, then we can let you stay here." Yukari said, "And for your name..until memory comes back, your name will be kain!"

He was surprised to hear that, and ran sweated little.

"Lady yukari, you can't just name a person.." Ran spoke.

"Oh come on. Then you have anything better?" Yukari asked.

Ran just huffed and stood up, telling her that she will get ready for lunch. As she left, kain relaxed for moment and then yukari just staired at him. Kain felt little disturbance and then turned to her.

"Y-yes?" Kain asked.

"You're pretty young for yourself." Yukari asked, "How old are you?"

"I'm 22." kain replied.

"Oh! I thought you were 18!" Yukari replied.

He expected that as many told him he looked more younger then his own age. He didn't hate it, but it was rather little annoying that everyone keeps telling him that quote. Yukari then sipped few more time and turned to him.

"Well then, since you're staying here...I want you to do some chores." Yukari said.

"Chores?" Kain asked.

"Yes. I can see that your wanted by them but I'm not truly fond of lazy people. Think of this as a repayment for stay." yukari said.

"Uh-huh...alright, what should I do?" Kain asked.

yukari decided to let him be...

-chireiden-

In the underground city, where it stood chireiden (earthly spirit mansion.), a few lights were made in it. Inside the mansion, one man with three familia fairies behind him were at the open room pointing gun at the pink haired girl with blue shirt and pink dress. It was Satori Komeiji, the satori youkai who is the owner of chireiden. She was on the wall with some blood stains on her shoulder. The man smiled as satoris third eyes looked into his heart.

"You...your heart is filled with hate and anger...why are you doing this!?" Satori said.

"Don't think this is bad, lady komeiji." Man said, "I'm doing this for the sake of the many whos justice were never fufilled."

The fairied besides him chuckled and then from the gate a winged girl with red eye thing on her chest and the red haried girl with cat ears bursted in. They were Kaenbyo Orin and Utuho Reiuji, satoris pets. They both came infront of satori to defend their master and utsuho pointed her cannon at the man.

"Nobody hurts lady satori!!" Utsuho said.

"How dare you hurt our lady!" orin said, "And you three fairies..how dare you betray the land of gensokyo!"

The three were Lunachild, sunnymilk, and starsapphire. They were the three mischivous fairies who always plays tricks on the humans and others who they wish to trick. They giggled and lunachild spoke to them.

"Betray? we never betrayed the land of gensokyo!" Lunachild said.

"She's right." starsapphire said, "This mans boss, who lived in desperate area, were betrayed first."

"For that reason, he fights for what is right." Sunnymilk said, "And the wrongdoers in this land will be struck by the hammer of justice..harveys hammer, that is!"

The man chuckled and was about to shoot satori until they heard a clapping noise. They all turned around and saw a tall man with mid-long black hair, blue eyes and small glasses. He also had good shirt on him, and as he came to them the man and the three fairies knelt before him. It was Harvey Austerlitz, east german born man who later forced to go to america due to the collapse of eastern germany to become one of the big crime boss. He looked at satori then turned his attention to the man.

"I can see you have done well, Jacob." Harvey said.

"I'll do anything you told, mr.austerlitz." Jacob replied.

He smiled then turned to satori and others. Utsuho were about to shoot the cannon until he disappeared and reappeared infront of her, putting his hand on the cannon and slowly pushing it down gently.

"Now now, isn't it bad for a girl like you to hold a weapon?" Harvey asked, "You should be punished for it."

His eye glowed in red and then her eyes glowed in red as well, then she fell to the ground in pain. She didn't know what was going on as orin tried to hurt him he then turned around and grabbed her throat and hanged her infront. Utsuho slowly got up and pointed her cannon at orin, letting her know she was going to shoot at her.

"No wait, okuu! STOP!!" Orin shouted.

"You will die under her as I have the power to control the victims strength and power." Harvey said.

Just then, satori shouted 'STOP!!!' and harvey looked at her. She was sobbing and she had wetted herself as she was scared about this.

"Please...let them go...I'll do anything." satori said.

Harvey thought for moment and then dropped orin. He then released okuu as she fell as well, hecame infront of satori. She was still sobbing and then he knelt before her, lifting her face toward him by softly grabbing her chin. Satori looked at his blue eyes as it showed his tiredness. She looked into his heart, and it was calm for moment.

"Miss....I didn't want to attack your people. Infact, I wanted to make this less violent, but you refused, causing me to order an issue to attack." Harvey said, "Everyone deserves equality and justice until one betrays everyhing..Don't you think its unfair?"

Just then, satori felt his hatred and anger in his heart. She looked in and saw many dying people on the street, hungry children, poor people...and people in the coffin. She was afraid and then he stood up with remourse on his heart.

"Sunnymilk, lunachild, starsapphire." Harvey said.

"Yes, sir?" they all said.

"I'm going to eientei to have little...talk to our member." harvey said, "Get the chopper ready."

"Yes sir!" Sunny said.

Then he told jacob to clean things up and make satori clean up and thrown her into her bedroom as a house arrest.

1113211.content:
You and others were eating some lunch. It was udon noodles and it had suited your tast. While you were eating the noodles, you were thinking about the past. You first remember joining the gang when you graduated high school. You looked for many jobs but with no avail until one of the female member of the gang picked you up. You were interviewed directly by the head mafia and then accepted to the gang. At first you went smoothly as there were few people in the mafia that were supportive until you felt something...bad about the head. You then left the gang 5 years after you joined, making the head mafia mad and labeled you a deserter and ordered a hit on you. You sighed, making yukari and others notice your sighing.

"What's wrong, kain?" yukari asked.

"Well...I sort of remember..that I was in mafia for while.." You replied.

This got them intrigued and put their chopsticks down. They wondered if your memory were recovering. They would like to know more until heard someones scream. Ran got up to see what was going on then saw a dark void open outside, dumping out three corpses. You and chen were horrified by this as both yukari and ran were serious on this until someone came out. It was white haired man with muscular body and had red eyes. He was grinning as ran were ready to defend her master and everyone else.

"So...the famous defector is hidining in this little pithole, huh?" Man said.

"Who..are you?" You asked.

"Oh, don't tell me you forgotten my name." MAn said,

"Who are you? You know it's rude to trespass and dump those bodies." Yukari replied.

The man looked at yukari and cracked his fists.

"This blows...name's Marcus Firevein, and I am part of the great graue Engel mafia." He replied.

Yukari and ran translated on what that ment, and it was translated as 'gray angel mafia' in german. They all knew he was one of the member that would hunt down you, then marcus pointed at you.

"I finally found the traitor, and I'm going to take you back to the head." Marcus said, "Prepare yourself, you bastard."

He ran toward you until yukari opened the gap, scooping him in and closed it up. You were glad that yukari were on your side, and then she smiled to you.

"Don't worry kain. As long as you are with us, we shall not anyone touch you." Yukari said.

"Thank you." You replied.

Suddenly, a dark void opened and the spiral flame came out. You and others looked and once the spiral faded, it revealed marcus with fire still lit on both of his arms. Yukari and others were shocked to see this as marcus cracked his shoulders, he cracked his neck as well.

"What was that for, you old bitch. Interfering with my business means death." Marcus said.

"Why don't you try me, little mortal." Yukari replied.

Marcus gotten angry and was about to burn the area alive until the transmittor went on.

'Marcus! this is xiaolin beetle! we need back up!'

Marcus picked up the transmittor and spoke to it.

"That's your business. I have the main fucker infront of me." Marcus said.

'we need you now! or do you want harvey to yell at you!?'

"Tch, fucking sonofabitch...fine, I'll be there." Marcus spoke.

He turned off the transmittor and then turned to you all.

"You'll live for today, you damn twats." Marcus said, "until then, brace yourself."

He then casted the fire wall and jumped back, sucking into the dark void. You and others began to worry about what's going on and then yukari stood up.

"Ran, chen. This incident will not be overlooked." Yukari said, "Get reimu notified."

"Yes, lady yukari." Ran said.

Yukari and then told you to go with ran, and you nodded and followed.

Meanwhile at eientei, the full blown war was raged between the mafia squad 'xiaolin beetles' and the eientei crew. It started when the mafia members told them to hand over the medicines to the mafias. Eirin, the lead doctor of the eientei, refused to help and the war broke between them. During the battle, Eirin noticed that her assistant lunar rabbit Reisen Udongein Inaba were missing. She didn't know why she was gone then immediately turned her attention to the fighting. The mafia crew were about to lose until Marcus arrived.

"Is the group alright?" Marcus asked.

"Surviving sir! Please help us!" One crew told him.

He smiled and walked toward the eientei crew. They noticed him and was about to drive him back until both his arms were covered in fire and he shot the wave of flame toward them. Many bunny crew of the eientei got caught in the fire, roasting them into either perfect crisp or beyond recognition. The crew had no choice but to return back into the building. Once they got in, they noticed someone was standing across the hallway.

It was reisen herself.

"Reisen? is that..you?" Eirin spoke.

She nodded and Eirin rushed toward her and hugged her, worried about her safety. She remembered that she sent reisen on the investigation on the outburst of disease. She went there and that was the last time she heard the assistant.

"Thank god you're alright! Where were you!?" Eirin asked.

Reisen was quiet and eirin and others felt some strong vibe from behind. Someone appeared from behind and it revealed itself as Harvey himself! Eirin got her bow ready as He smiled, he vanished only to appear infront of the doctor and broke the bow instantly with his arm. Eirin were speechless as Kaguya and Tewi tried to stop him the mafia mens caught up and shackled them with the retraints. Harvey smiled and spoke to her with some light tone.

"Ms.Yagokoro... I presume?" Harvey spoke, "I came here because of what my mens have told me."

He came to her and touched her jaws. She immediately tried to bite him but he evaded the bite. Eirin was furious and confused: why would Reisen, her own assistant, is standing behind the mafia man.

"Reisen! why are you with him?" Eirin spoke, "Answer me!"

Reisen was silent for moment and then she finally spoke up.

"Because he have given me a new hope." Reisen spoke.

"What?" Eirin asked.

Reisen came infront of her master and smiled. Eirin felt the bad jive from her and then reisen slapped her masters face hard. Eirin didn't understand as she looked at her assistant with disbelief and confusion, reisen took out an picture of herself with bandage and coverage (https://pbs.twimg.com/media/B6wLzmOCEAAw...).

"Ever since you sent me to the human village, I got sick and gotten beaten by the villagers, making it my fault for not coming sooner. You didn't come to rescue me, but this man have." Reisen said, "He have given me a new hope, where everyone should live in harmony."

"Reisen....what are-"

"Mr.Austerlitzs idea and his ambition shall not be thwarted." Reisen said, "I shall assist him with all of my might."

Eirin and others were shocked to hear this and Harvey ordered the mens to give them the house arrest. Eirin and others tried to use their power but with no avail as Harvey already using his ability to negate the power of his enemy. As they took the eientei crew away, reisen stood next to her new boss. Harvey patted her head as she blushed little, he spoke up.

"I have nothing but one goal." Harvy spoke.

The eientei have fallen to the mafia.

He knew that if he act soon, he would be caught so he didn't take the sharp stick. He looked closer and noticed two mens in soldiers uniform and ak-47 on them. He quickly knew it was his ex mafia members and they were hunting for him. The mafia mens were created by the old soviet soldiers who were throwned away by the new government, and they swore loyalty to the colonel who became the head of the russian mafia. He then noticed the two mens talking to each other.

"...I know comrade colonel wants us to get the head of this mansion to have allience, but how should we do it?" One soldier asked.

"Dunno. Comrade alexandra told us it would be fine." Other soldier said.

"Yes, even though the gate keeper have granted us passage but we can't just do it without any detection." One soldier said.

"Just do what comrade colonel taught us, comrade." Other said.

He nodded and went to the mansion. The defector got out of the bushes and slowly followed them and went inside. As he followed them, they stopped and the defector hid himself behind the pot stand. It was a grey haired women in maid outfit who stopped the two and she spoke to the two.

"Mylady is expecting you, gentlemen." maid said.

"I am honored, madam." one soldier said.

The maid then let the two into the door. The defector got close to the door and within few minute, a loud gun shot noise were made. The defector didn't know what happened until he felt something from the neck. It was the same maid from earlier and she smiled at him.

"Oh, another rat came in?" Maid said, "Sheesh..alot of rats coming in lately."

"Who..I-" He spoke.

"Shut your mouth. I think mylady wants to see you." Maid spoke.

She then told the defector to open the door. As he did, he saw two ex-members on the ground, knifes on its head and throat. He was horrified as he saw a blue haired girl in red dress on. She looked at him as few more fairies came in, the girl spoke up.

"Fairies. Take these two rats out so the youkais could eat them." Girl said.

"Yes, lady remilia." Fairies replied.

They then took the bodies out and left the area. Remilia looked at the defector and showed him the wings. Defector were scared then the maid pushed him down to the ground.

"Show respect to remilia scarlet, the eternally young vampire." Maid said.

"V-vampire!?" Defector spoke.

She kicked on his face, causing him to bleed. REmilia just chuckled and got up from her chair and walked toward the defector. Once she stopped, she put her hand on his cheeck and rose his head up. He could see the slit iris on her eyes and moment later, she looked at the maid.

"Sakuya? give us a few minutes." remilia said.

"But, mylady, I-"

"Sakuya."

Remilia stopped her speech and sakuya just bowed and left the scene. Remilia then released him and he slowly got up from where he was at and she went back to the seat. The defector were in pain but had some intention that she's not harming him for now.

"Sorry for my maids attitude, but I've seen many rats coming into my place." Remilia said, "but ofcourse, it's natural..what is your name?"

"I...am daniel...daniel mcdough." He said.

"And I am remilia scarlet." She said. "Tell me about yourself.."

How long it lasted?

-hakugyokuro, gate of white jade-

In the netherworld of hakugyokuro where the spirits go to see the cherryblossom tree, there stood a traditional eastern house and it rose some smoke. In the garden, one girl with silver hair and green dress knelt with some blood, holding a katana while a purple haired women in light blue dress were holded by a black haired women in military outfit. It was the head of the russian mafia and many of her mafioso members were with them. Few of them even had the flag of the soviet union in air.

"Well well..you're one tough bitch, arn't you?" Women said.

"*cough* how...could my ability *Cough* nullifyed?" pink haired women spoke, coughing.

The women were yuyuko saigyouji, the head of the hakugyokuro and the one with katana were youmu konpaku, her servant and yard keeper. The mafia women just smiled and then threw her to the ground. She coughed blood as the mafia boss came to her, she took out her handgun and pointed at her.

"Why do you ask? because I have some...elite soldiers who required some ability and one of them is this young girl." Women said.

She turned to the young girl, who were around 22-24 years old, chestnut eyes and red head. Her name was Alexandra Azarov, born few years before the soviet union fell. Her family disowned her after the soviet collapsed, and the mafia leader took her for recruitment. Afterwards, she was loyal to her and did whatever she asked. the mafia lady continued to smile and turned to yuyuko.

"And now...at first I asked you to kindly use your house as a headquarter. You refused, and this is the outcome for such refusal." She said.

"You...damn bitch!!" youmu shouted.

The soldiers and alexandra pointed their weapons at her, but the mafia leader stopped them. She quickly shoots youmus chest three time, making her fall down to the ground. Yuyuko shouted her name and the mafia leader pointed at her leg and shot one bullet. Yuyuko screamed in pain as the leader were amused by her scream, she grinned.

"Heh. How wonderful your little assistant have absolute loyalty, ms..." Leader spoke, not knowing her name.

One soldier came to her and whispered, and turned back.

"...Yuyuko Saigyouji." Lady said, "I respect that, but sometime people must shut their own mouth to protect themselves."

"You...you're cold hearted fool.." yuyuko said.

"Am I?" women asked, "Well...you can call me that."

Just then, other soldier came. It was bulky many who were 6'7" tall. He also had short black hair and scar on his left eye. His name was Boris Vasnetsov, commander to the soviet army that accompanied the colonel. After the breakup, he was the first one to be chosen by her and followed her ever since. Boris then came to her and saluted to her.

"Comrade vladlena, I have ergent news." Boris spoke.

"Speak, comrade boris." vladlena spoke.

"Two of our spies disguised as a peace allience were killed." Boris replied.

Vladlena looked at boris with cold eyes. She knew something would come up since those two were not experienced enough. Vladlena sighed and took out a cigar and a cutter. She cut the tip off and put the end to her mouth as she took out the lighter and lit the end, she puffed some smoke.

"Where was the scene?" Vladlena asked.

"Scarlet devil manor." Boris answerd.

She didn't say anything and then heared yuyukos moaning in pain on the ground. She thought for moment and then turned to boris.

"We will go see this people first thing in the morning." Vladlena said, "For now..treat these fools."

She then went back to the mansion, boris saluting and then telling the soldiers to aid the two.

Hakugyokuro were besieged by the mafia.

"Mr...Johnson. We have decided to let you stay in our mansion." Remilia said.

"Thank you, mylady!" Daniel replied happy.

"But with one condition." Remilia spoke.

He knew something was up and gotten ready to hear what she have to say.

"From this forward, you will become...

111331122.content:
"...Gate guarding with Meiling," Remilia finished her sentence. You were just about to gratefully accept your new job, when you noticed Remilia and her maid were looking all directions expecting something or someone.
Remilia turned her head back to you and coughed, "Ahem! I said from this day forward, you will become Gate Guarding with Meiling!" She jerked her head toward the hallway, perhaps expecting someone to come running. No one came.
"I said you will become. GATE. GUARDING. WITH. MEILING!" Remilia shouted, "AS IN ASSISTING HONG MEILING! MY CURRENT GATE GUARDIAN!!"

Nothing but awkward silence.

"Why isnt she barging in screaming off the top of her lungs?" Remilia question her maid, "you know how stubborn she is about her job."
"I'm not sure, my lady," Sakuya stated, "she shouldve done so by now.”
Remilia scowled, “She didnt fall asleep on the job again, did she?!”
Sakuya shook her head, “No, I already punished her for the last time. She wouldnt dare do it any time soon.” Already, youre not liking your new employment! But considering your position and the fact that outside of this mansion you are a dead man walking, you keep your mouth shut.

Remilia shook her head and sighed, “Just drag her over here.”
The maid bowed and only a microsecond later, within a single blink, she had appeared with a dizzy looking red-haired woman in her grasp! You almost gasped in surprise that in such outrageous speed, she was able to practically material the red-haired woman in a green Chinese gi suit without dropping her green Mao cap.

Somehow putting that anomaly aside, you notice the red-head looking a bit under the weather. Her eyes were droopy, her cheeks were flushed, her breathing was heavily, and you could hear her moaning under her panting.

Remilia raised an eyebrow, “Meiling? Meiling!”

“Hmm? Huh?” the red-head sloped opened her blue eyes, then they widened immediately at the sight of her boss, “OH! M-M-Mistress!” she quickly stood up straight and gave her boss the military salute, “Y-you called, Mistress? Oh, hi Sakuya.”

“Meiling are you feeling ok?” Remilia questioned her, “youre not looking too good.”
“No, I’m fine! Just fine!” Meiling announced, “fine and impenetrable as always!” Sakuya suddenly let out a quick chuckle.

“Good,” Remilia ignored the chuckled, “because we were just about to introduce you to your new partner-”

“Wh-wh-WHAT?!” Meiling jumped with outrage, “PARTNER?! I dont need a partner! The Scarlet Mansion is untouchable with just me!”
“That is not true and you know it,” Remilia stated, “I seem to recall a certain miko and her thieving companion slipping out of your radar one too many times.” You probably shouldnt question this. “I think it’d be beneficial for all of us to have TWO gate guards. And I‘d like you to meet our second! Meiling, this is Daniel-”

“I dont care who he is!” Meiling snapped as she turned her head to you, “I don’t nee-…ugh…” Only seconds after locking hate filled eyes with you, she squirmed in some kind of agony.

…Odd. What is that fragrant odor that’s suddenly slipping into your nostrils?

“Meiling, are you sick?” Remilia questioned.

“No, I’m not sick,” Meiling groaned, “it’s just… uggh… why did it have to be today of all days?” You began to sniff at the odor, trying to search out it’s source. Whatever it was, it was drawing you in. It wasnt a very good smell, but for some bizarre reason, it was inviting to you. You were partially salivating from the scent.

“Meiling if youre feeling sick, you need to see Patchouli immediately.”

“No! No, I said I’m alright!” Meiling insisted, despite trembling a little, “er…. c-cant we discuss why I don’t wanna work with this scrawny capitalist foreigner next week?”
“No!” Remilia shot her down. All the while, you were still sniffing out the scent. It seemed to be coming from Meiling’s direction. You didnt realize until too late you were edging a bit too close to her. “You will be working with Daniel and that’s final! Now take him to the front and show him how to man the post!”

“But….” whatever was wrong with Meiling was becoming way too overpowering for her to protest, “errgh.. yes, Mistress.” She snared at you as if it was YOUR fault. If you weren’t so intrigued by the smell, you’d be flinching.

‘What is with that smell?’ you wonder, drawing you toward it.

“Stop looking at me like that!“ Meiling growled, “move your ass!”
“Yes ma’am,” you said with a sniff and followed your new partner down the hall. You could overhear her groaning and mumbling something in Chinese, but youre not sure whether she was talking about you or how she was feeling. Either way, you didnt give a duck. Her fragrant odor seemed to be top priority.

Why does her smell entice you so? Maybe it might have something to do with her looking and acting sickly.

She mumbled quite a lot in what you assumed was an older dialect of mandarin Chinese. Despite learning a little mandarin from your dad during a business trip in Hong Kong, you couldnt understand most of the syllables she was spewing.
The only words you could understand were curses.

“This is the gate,” Meiling finally spoke in English and announced, “sit down and start watching.”
“Um, arent you gonna show me around?”
“I just did!” Meiling snapped, “You see that gate? That’s the gate youre gonna be watching! That’s all you need to see! Now sit down and start watching!”

You didn’t question her any more due to the condition she was looking and acting. Something was wrong with her but she seemed to be trying her darndest not to let it bother her. You werent sure whether to admire her confidence or be concerned for her health. Either way, the silence was killing you.

“So… Meiling?” you cleared your head, “what’s it like being-”
“No talking!” she wasnt in the mood for friendly chit chat. More awkward silence ensued.

As you stared out in the distance waiting for something or someone to come by, your partner seemed to be staring your way the whole time. It was getting uncomfortable.
You turned your head and opened your mouth.

“Stop staring at me!” she didnt liked being looked at either. You sighed hard and continued staring in the distance, ignoring her unbearably rude stare.

Through the corner of your eye, you spotted her scoot a bit closer to you. You ignored that and looked elsewhere.

She scooted closer. You took a deep breath and continued eyeing the horizon.

She scooted even closer. You bit your lip, getting a bit nervous.

She scooted closer some more. Her cheeks slightly reddened in the middle of her impatient glare your direction.

She whispered untranslatable mandarin awfully loud. She was so close, she was taking up all your breathing air with those sniffs of hers! This was getting incredibly irritating! You've only been on the job for two minutes and already it was too much to handle!
Not like taking a stand was easy, though. She seemed to have a bit of a short temper and if she's the sole gate guardian of this whole damn mansion, odds are she's a force to be reckoned with. Still, you dont know how long you could take this! What are you gonna do about it?

"So you're also in my shoes as well." You said.

"Yeah...but at least I found an awesome ally!" Adalgar said with smile.

"Oh yeah? who?" you responded.

"Follow me!" Adalgar answered.

You followed the young man through the cemetery and saw the opening on one of the grave hole. Both you and Adalgar went down, and in moment you saw a huge wide open area with some sort of old fashion eastern building not too far from the area. You were very surprised to see this as both you and adalgar got off from the ladder and landed safely on the ground.

"What is this place?" you asked.

"This place is called Hall of Dreams' Great Mausoleum, and the person who lives in there would help us." Adalgar responded.

You were astonished to see this as it was actually beautiful to see. Once you and adalgar walked, they reached the mausoleum and adalgar opened the door. As you two got into the building, you two were walking through the hallway until you and adalgar reached the doorway. He opened the door and once you two got in, you two were greeted by....
11133222222211.title: Meeting someone?

111332222222112.content:
You were gre-OH GOD THAT HORRIBLE STENCH AGAIN! You quickly paced outside because that smell filled the room like a really foul smelling elephant! Your eyes watered and you coughed to the point that you almost gagged! Somehow, Adalgar wasnt feeling the same way. For some reason he was completely unaffected by the horrible scent lingering in that mausoleum.

When you finally strengthened your will to tolerate that putrid smell, your eyes widened and jaw dropped but for a second before you had to cover it with your shirt! Before you stood that very same corpse from that hole you woke up in! Now standing up with her eyes opened facing you! And still reaching her arms out to you for some reason.

Good lord, was she faking her death?! Unfortunately no. Unless she was wearing that perfume 'Eau DéComposer', the stench still emitting from her told you she was long past the whole 'faking' point!

"Wh...wha.... y....you... youre...."

"Hiiii..." she slurred a bit like she was a lot more exhausted than... well, dead, "you must be Ratty's friend. You look tasty."

"S-STAY BACK!!" you back away from her, "dont come any closer!!" you reach into your pockets for something to use as a weapon, but all you had left was the little orthodox cross you hang around your neck. "I-I'm warning you! I'm a man of God!"
"...Do they taste like chicken, too?"

“Whoa whoa whoa, calm down Rookie, calm down!” then Adalgar put himself between the two of you to defuse the situation, “she's no threat. This is Yoshika Miyako, one of the servants in the Mausoleum.” That didnt really calm your nerves because 1. You never heard of this girl and 2. SHE'S A FUCKING ZOMBIE!

“I'm a Jiangshi!” she proudly exclaimed/corrected.
“Wh...what's a jiangshi?”
“….Uhhhhh…..” she rolled her eyes upward as if thinking really hard about the answer, “….ask Seiga.”
“And who is Seiga?”
“….Uhhhhh….” was this zombie serious?!
“She's Yoshika's superior and one of the heads of the Mausoleum,” Adalgar had to answer for her, “unlike some the others, she a bit rough around the edges and rather tough on those who arent exactly devoted taoists.” Oy. THOSE types, huh?
“I was gonna tell him that, Ratty,” Yoshika exclaimed.

“Anyways, we can introduce you to the others once we get there,” Adalgar said, “right now let's hurry on.” And hurry you did.

That is until you were blocked by some kind of invisible barrier. Adalgar and the jiangshi were able to pass through it no problem, but you, it was literally a wall. You banged on it a few times, but there was no budging it for you.

“Uh, what's going on?” you questioned, “I cant go any further!”
Adalgar looked at you with shock but Yoshika grinned.
“Seiga made this part of the hall blocked off to tourists,” Yoshika answered.

Your former partner still stared at you with confusion, “But he's not a tourist he's…” He passed through the barrier with no problem as he observed you carefully, “wait a minute. Youre still alive?”

You stared back with mutual confusion, “Uh, yeah? Arent you?”

He buttoned his fancy suit… revealing several bullet wounds pierced right through his chest and out his back!
“They managed to riddle me good before I made that leap into the hole,” he explained, “by the time I landed, I had already bled to death.”
“Jesus Christ!” you cringed looking at his horrible bullet-ridden chest, “youre actually dead?!”
He nodded, “That's pretty much why I'm allowed here, much to Seiga's dismay. And I cant believe that youre still alive after what you've been through!”
“That explains why you smell so yummy!” Yoshika passed through the barrier with ease and edged closer to you! On instinct, you edged back toward Adalgar like your human shield!

“This is a big problem!” says your former partner, “if the others find there's a mortal heretic trespassing, there going to go ballistic! I'm sorry rookie, but only the dead and devoted followers of their faith are allowed here.” Well, that's a problem then, aint it?
“Well what am I supposed to do?” you asked.
“Youre gonna have to die,” was his best answer and not the answer you wanted to hear, “but they confiscated my weapons, so it's not like I can kill you quick enough.”

“I could,” Yoshika spoke up with an another answer you didnt wanna hear. You paled seeing the drool drip down her abnormally long tongue, “...if you let me eat ya, you'll be allowed here.” Eat you?! DEFINITELY an answer you sure as well didnt wanna hear!

“You… you cant be serious! I aint letting you eat me!”

“You would die pretty fast,” Adalgar actually encouraged it! “Jiangshi bites are incredibly venomous. You might die of infection before she tears THAT deep into you.” How deep is THAT deep?!
“I… I dont believe what I'm hearing! You honestly expect me to let that thing chew me to pieces?!”
“C'moooooon!” Yoshika whined, “it'll just be a couple of bites into that ripe, tender, juicy, protein-rich meaty flesh! I wont take TOO much of ya! Promise!”
“Get the fuck away from me!” you demanded of this foul-smelling hungry ghoul, “there's gotta be another option!”
“Either that or you can convert to Taoism,” suggested Adalgar.
“NOT HAPPENING!” you said with pride for your religious heritage!

“Well, those are the only choices you got!” Adalgar tells you, “I'm sorry, but those are the Mausoleum's rules.”

Crap. This has gotta be the worst two choices you ever made. You most likely wont survive on your own outside of this place, but you kinda really dont wanna die, especially from the method youre currently presented.

Well, thankfully you have the other option. You can simply convert to Taoism and completely abandon years of culture, tradition, morals, and major belief that the carpenter and prophet of Nazareth was the son of God in which his very crucifixion shaped and molded the fate of Greater Europe and eventually most of the world as we know it! You can simply throw away that very faith you were baptized under as an alternative! That's MUCH easier than letting a smelly drooling zombie chew you to death, RIGHT?!
111332222222112.title: This is Thriller Night!
